0 (although any value less than 1 will also evaluate as false)
0(尽管任何小于1的值也将被赋值为false)
0 = automatic, 1 = full image, 2 = user defined.
0 =自动，1 =完整图像，2 =用户定义。
0 is the start of the path, 1 is the end of the path, and anything in between equates to that far through the path.
0是路径的起点，1是路径的终点，而两者之间的值等于路径的这段距离。
0 is the start of the path, 1 is the end of the path, and anything in between equates to the normalised distance along the length of the path.
0是路径的起点，1是路径的终点，两者之间的任何值都等于路径长度上的标准化距离。
0=normal, 90=turned 90 degrees counter-clockwise etc.
0 =正常，90 =逆时针旋转90度等。
0=right way up, 90=rotated 90 degrees counter-clockwise etc...
0 = 向右，90 = 逆时针旋转 90 度等...
1 (although any value equal to or greater than 1 will evaluate as true)
1(尽管任何等于或大于1的值都将被赋值为真)
1 = one single image / *.gif.
1 = 一张图像 / *.gif。
3.141592653589793280etc... (the exact value will depend on various factors like the platform being targeted)
3.141592653589793280等等……(具体数值取决于各种因素，如目标平台)
3D (5.1) audio.
A 16bit float.
一个16位浮点数。
A 1x1 pixel.
一个1x1像素。
A 32bit float.
一个32位浮点数。
A 3px outlined circle.
3px轮廓的圆。
A 64bit float.
64位浮点数。
A Linear distribution where all particles have an equal chance of appearing anywhere in the area.
一种线性分布，其中所有粒子在该区域的任何地方出现的机会相等。
A boolean value.
一个布尔值。
A brief description of the data being stored.
对所存储数据的简要描述。
A buffer of fixed size.
固定大小的缓冲区。
A buffer that will "grow" dynamically as data is added
随着数据的增加，缓冲区将动态"增长"
A buffer where the data will "wrap".
数据将在其中"包装"的缓冲区。
A chain fixture is comprised of a number of points, which are then connected together using edge shapes to join them.
链式夹具由许多点组成，然后使用边缘形状将这些点连接在一起。
A channel struct has the following variables:
通道结构具有以下变量：
A circle with an inward glow (looks like a bubble).
向内发光的圆(看起来像泡泡)。
A circle with an outward glow ' solid in the middle, glowing outwards.
一个向外发光的圆，中间实心，向外发光。
A closed path has its start point connected to its end point, forming a loop, and an open path has a definitive, unconnected start and finish.
封闭路径的起点与终点相连，形成一个循环，而开放路径有明确的、不相连的起点和终点。
A common example of use in programming would be to calculate the number of bits that are needed to represent a number.
编程中一个常见的例子是计算表示一个数所需的位数。

A default value of 0 will clear all the tiles from the layer (essentially making all tiles "empty"), while you can use the dedicated tile_* functions to create your own tile data to clear the tile map with.
默认值为0将清除该层中的所有tile(本质上是使所有tile为"空")，而你可以使用专用的tile_*函数创建自己的tile数据来清除tile地图。
A diamond collision mask shape
菱形碰撞遮罩形状
A diamond shape with the points at half width and half height.
一种菱形形状，其顶点半宽半高。
A ds_list of points to use to create the polygon.
用于创建多边形的点的ds_list。
A ds_map with the required header fields
一个ds_map，其中包含所需的报头字段

A duplicated sprite will be places on its own unique texture page when created, meaning that duplicating multiple sprites will create multiple texture pages and have an impact on performance, so use this function only when necessary.
创建时，复制的精灵将被放置在自己唯一的纹理页面上，这意味着复制多个精灵将创建多个纹理页面，并对性能产生影响，因此仅在必要时通过此函数。
A dynamic instance is one that is fully simulated within the physics world and this read-only variable will return true if the instance being checked is fully simulated or false if it is not
动态实例是在物理世界中完全模拟的实例，如果被检查的实例是完全模拟的，这个只读变量将返回true，否则返回false
A filled circle.
实心圆。
A filled square.
实心正方形。
A five-point filled star.
填充五角星形。

A force is any influence that causes an object to undergo a change in speed, a change in direction, or a change in shape, and is defined in the GameMaker physics world the same as we define gravity, by getting the vector from the two xforce/yforce components.
力是导致物体经历速度变化、方向变化或形状变化的任何影响，在GameMaker物理世界中的定义与我们定义重力相同，通过从两个xforce/yforce分量获得矢量。

A frozen buffer can be submitted to the shader faster than a normal, dynamic buffer and is recommended for those effects that require an unchanging custom primitive for the duration of a level or the game.
冻结的缓冲区可以比正常的动态缓冲区更快地提交到着色器，建议用于那些在关卡或游戏期间需要不变的自定义图元的效果。

A full path is only found there was no collision with the specified object or instance and if false is returned then a path is still generated, but it will only run up to the position where the path was blocked.
只有在与指定的对象或实例没有碰撞的情况下才能找到完整的路径，如果返回false，则仍然会生成路径，但它只会运行到路径被阻止的位置。
A function to be called for each character in range (allows arguments 'char' and 'pos').
为范围内的每个字符调用的函数(允许实参'char'和'pos')。
A further example is provided below.
下面提供了另一个例子。
A gaussian distribution where more particles are generated in the center rather than the edges.
一种高斯分布，其中更多的粒子在中心而不是边缘生成。
A generic snowflake shape.
普通的雪花形状。
A gesture event (Tap, Drag, Flick, Pinch or Rotate)
手势事件(点击、拖动、轻击、挤压或旋转)
A grid data structure
网格数据结构
A harshly glowing point (looks like an actual star in the night).
一个剧烈发光的点(看起来像夜晚的一颗真正的星星)。
A kinematic instance is one that has infinite mass (a density of 0) but can move.
运动学实例具有无限质量(密度为0)但可以移动。
A list data structure
列表数据结构
A map data structure
映射数据结构
A multiplier ' 1 = normal scaling, 0.5 is half etc.
乘数 1 =正常比例，0.5是一半等。
A path is created from a series of defining points that are linked together and then used to plan the movements of an instance.
路径由一系列链接在一起的定义点创建，然后用于规划实例的移动。

A persistent instance is one that will be "carried over" from room to room, meaning (for example) that it only has to be created once at the start of the game and it will be present in all further rooms.
一个持久的实例是一个将从一个房间"带到"另一个房间的实例，这意味着(例如)它只需在游戏开始时创建一次，并且它将出现在所有其他房间中。
A persistent object is "carried over" from room to room and maintains its properties at all times (for more information on persistence see the section on the Object Editor).
持久化对象从一个房间"转移"到另一个房间，并始终维护其属性(有关持久化的更多信息，请参阅对象编辑器一节)。
A persistent object is one that will cause any instances of it to be carried through from room to room unless they are explicitly destroyed.
持久对象将导致它的任何实例从一个房间带到另一个房间，除非它们被显式地销毁。
A polygon (primitive) has a front and a back side.
一个多边形(图元)有一个正面和一个背面。
A position relative to the current read/write position
相对于当前读/写位置的位置
A precise collision mask, where the mask will conform to the non-transparent pixels of the sprite, based on the tolerance value given (see below))
一个精确的碰撞遮罩，该遮罩将根据给定的容差值(见下文)与精灵的不透明像素相一致
A previously defined revolute joint
先前定义的转动关节
A previously defined revolute or prismatic joint
转动关节先前定义的转动关节或移动关节
A previously initialised array of floating point values.
先前初始化的浮点值数组。
A previously initialised array of integer values.
先前初始化的整数值数组。
A primitive consisting of a list of points.
由一列点组成的图元。
A primitive made up of a consecutive strip of lines.
由连续的条形线组成的图元。
A primitive made up of a consecutive strip of triangles.
由一连串三角形组成的图元。
A primitive made up of a individual lines in a list.
由列表中的单个行组成的图元。
A primitive made up of individual triangles in a list.
由列表中各个三角形组成的图元。
A priority data structure
优先级数据结构
A queue data structure
队列数据结构
A ratio of 32:1 will be specified as 1/32 (or 0.03125).
A real number argument
实数参数
A rectangular (non-rotating) rectangle collision mask shape
矩形(非旋转)矩形碰撞遮罩形状
A rectangular shape that fills the given area.
填充给定区域的矩形。

A revolute joint forces two bodies to share a common anchor point (often called a hinge point) and the joint has a single degree of freedom - the relative rotation of the two bodies around this point.
转动关节迫使两个物体共用一个锚点(通常称为铰链点)，关节只有一个自由度——两个物体围绕这个点的相对旋转。

A room with persistence flagged as true it will maintain the state of all instances within that room if the player leaves and then returns, whereas if persistence is flagged as false it will be reset to the initial state every time.
如果玩家离开后又回来，一个持久标记为真的房间将保持该房间内所有实例的状态，而如果持久标记为假，每次都将重置为初始状态。
A rope joint is one which is used to join two instances that you want to keep a constant distance apart, no matter what other forces are acting on it.
绳子连接是用来连接两个实例，你想要保持一个恒定的距离，无论其他的力作用在它上面。

A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the height of the sprite used), larger values will scale up, and negative values will mirror the sprite and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sprite used is just mirrored top-to-bottom about its (0, 0) position with no scaling).
比例为1表示不缩放(1:1)，较小的值将缩小(例如，0.5将是所用sprite高度的一半)，较大的值将放大，负值将镜像sprite并缩放它，除非所用的值正好是-1(在这种情况下，所用的sprite只是围绕其(0，0)位置从上到下镜像，而不缩放)。

A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the height of the sprite), larger values will scale up and negative values will mirror the sprite and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sprite is just mirrored along the y-axis with no scaling).
1的比例表示不能缩放(1:1)，较小的值将缩小(例如，0.5是精灵高度的一半)，较大的值将扩大，负值将镜像精灵并缩放它，除非使用的值正好是-1(在这种情况下，精灵只是沿y轴镜像，没有缩放)。

A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the width of the sprite used), larger values will scale up, and negative values will flip the sprite and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sprite used is just flipped right-to-left about its origin position with no scaling).
比例为1表示没有缩放(1:1)，较小的值会缩小(例如，0.5会是所使用精灵宽度的一半)，较大的值会放大，负值会翻转并缩放精灵，除非所使用的值正好为-1(在这种情况下，所使用的精灵只是围绕其原始位置从右向左翻转，而没有缩放)。

A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the width of the sprite), larger values will scale up and negative values will flip the sprite and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sprite is just flipped about its origin with no scaling).
1的比例表示不能缩放(1:1)，较小的值将缩小(例如，0.5将是精灵宽度的一半)，较大的值将扩大，负值将翻转精灵并缩放它，除非所使用的值正好是-1(在这种情况下，精灵只是沿着原点翻转而没有缩放)。
A signed, 16bit integer.
一个带符号的16位整数。
A signed, 32bit integer.
带符号的32位整数。
A signed, 8bit integer.
一个带符号的8位整数。
A single asset tag string or an array with various asset tags.
单个资源标记字符串或具有各种资源标记的数组。
A single click/touch and release has been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都检测到了单击/触摸和释放
A single click/touch and release has been detected for an instance
在一个实例中检测到一个单一的点击/触摸和释放
A single floating point value
单个浮点值
A single line, where the start point is the left and top and the end point is the right and bottom.
一条直线，起点在左上方，终点在右下方。
A single skeletal animation sprite can have various animation sets, and these sets can be assigned different tracks so that you can "mix and match" animation sets.
单个骨骼动画精灵可以有各种动画集，这些集可以指定不同的轨迹，以便您可以"混合和匹配"
A skeletal animation sprite can be drawn with a variety of textures (called "skins"), permitting you to use one single animation for multiple different purposes.
骨骼动画精灵可以用各种纹理(称为"皮肤")绘制，允许您将一个动画用于多种不同的目的。

A skeletal animation sprite may have other images added as attachments, with these images being added to a named slot (the name is given when you create the attachment slot in your animation program) and they will be drawn along with the animation of the current sprite.
骨骼动画精灵可以将其他图像作为附件添加，这些图像被添加到一个命名的槽中(该名称是在动画程序中创建附件槽时给出的)，它们将与当前精灵的动画一起绘制。

A skeletal animation sprite may have other sprites added as attachments, with these sprites being added to a named slot (the name is given when you create the attachment slot in your animation program) and they will be drawn along with the animation of the current sprite.
骨骼动画精灵可以将其他精灵作为附件添加，这些精灵被添加到一个命名的槽中(该名称是在动画程序中创建附件槽时给出的)，它们将与当前精灵的动画一起绘制。
A smooth gradient change will occur through the alphas over the particles lifetime from one to the other.
在粒子的生命周期中，从一个粒子到另一个粒子会发生平滑的梯度变化。
A smooth gradient change will occur through the colours over the particles lifetime from one colour to the other.
从一种颜色到另一种颜色，在粒子的整个寿命期间，颜色将发生平滑的梯度变化。
A smooth version of the explosion effect.
爆炸效果的平滑版本。
A solid object generates a special collision event when using the traditional collision system (ie: the physics world is off).
当使用传统的碰撞系统时，固体会产生特殊的碰撞事件(即物理世界关闭)。
A solid particle group prevents other fixtures from lodging inside of it.
一个固体粒子组可以防止其他设备在里面住宿。
A spark effect ' like a star with multiple points fading out.
"火花效果"就像星星的多个光点逐渐消失。
A special constant that is for "and"-ing with the tile data blob to extract the tile index.
一个特殊的常量，用于"and" -ing"与tile数据blob一起提取tile索引。
A sprite has to have at least one sub-image and this function will return just how many it has.
一个精灵必须至少有一个子图像，此函数将返回它有多少子图像。

A sprite is made up of one or more sub-images which can make the sprite appear animated as they switch from one to the other, or can they can be switched between in code to give different "states", much like a button has in windows.
精灵由一个或多个子图像组成，当它们从一个切换到另一个时，这些子图像可以使精灵看起来有动画效果，或者它们可以在代码中切换以提供不同的"状态"，就像窗口中的按钮一样。
A sprite of the avatar associated with this player in Opera GX, for rollback networking.
在Opera GX中，与此玩家相关联的头像精灵，用于回滚联网。
A squarish cloud of smoke ' requires multiple colours to resemble an explosion.
"方形烟云"需要多种颜色来模拟爆炸。
A stack data structure
堆栈数据结构
A string of any size, without the final null terminating character.
任意大小的字符串，不包含最后的空结束字符。
A string of any size.
任意大小的字符串
A string to send to the provider
要发送给提供程序的字符串
A string to send to the provider.
要发送给提供程序的字符串。
A string with one of the commands listed below.
包含下面列出的命令之一的字符串。
A struct containing a set of playback parameters.
包含一组回放参数的结构。
A struct containing any initial values for the effect's parameters.
包含效果参数的任何初始值的结构。
A struct containing the parameters for the filter/effect
包含滤镜/效果参数的结构
A structure that contains variables that are copied into the new instance before the Create Event is called
一个结构，其中包含在调用创建事件之前复制到新实例中的变量
A texel, or texture element is the fundamental unit of texture space used in computer graphics.
纹理元素是计算机图形学中使用的纹理空间的基本单位。
A thin cloud, requires up scaling and multiple particles to resemble a cloud.
薄云，需要放大和多个粒子来模拟云。
A touch/click has been held and moved anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方检测到触摸/点击被按住并移动
A touch/click has been held and moved for an instance
一个触摸/点击已经被按住并移动了一个实例
A value of 1 is the default value, and values lower than 1 mean that playback is slowed down and values greater than 1 mean that playback is sped up.
默认值为1，小于1的值表示回放速度变慢，大于1的值表示回放速度加快。
A viscous particle is one that exhibits "clinginess" or "stickiness", like oil.
粘性颗粒是一种表现出"粘性"的颗粒，就像油一样。
A wheel joint simply combines a piston and a revolute joint, like a wheel mounted on the shock absorber of a car.
车轮关节只是将活塞和旋转关节结合在一起，就像安装在汽车减震器上的车轮一样。
A zombie particle is one that will be destroyed after a single step with all others flagged in this way.
僵尸粒子是这样一种粒子，它将在一个单独的步骤后被摧毁，所有其他粒子都以这种方式被标记。
AA simply smooths the edges of vector images to give them a nicer look.
AA 只是简单地平滑矢量图像的边缘，使它们看起来更漂亮。
Accepts the following arguments (index) and should return the init value of the element.
接受以下参数(index)，并应返回元素的初始值。
Accepts the following arguments (prev, value, index) and should return a new 'prev'.
接受以下参数(prev, value, index)，并返回一个新的'prev'。
Accepts the following arguments (value, index) and should return a boolean.
接受以下参数(值、索引)并应返回一个布尔值。
Accepts the following arguments (value, index) and should return the mapped value.
接受以下参数(值、索引)，并应返回映射的值。
Accepts the following arguments (value, index).
接受以下参数(值、索引)。
Additionally resets all of the time source's children.
另外，重置所有时间源的子级。

Additive blending is a special blend mode that adds the luminosity values of each particle as they overlap, so that light colours will gradually get brighter (until they appear white) as they overlap, and dark colours become more and more transparent with black being almost invisible.
添加混合是一种特殊的混合模式，当它们重叠时，添加每个粒子的光度值，因此浅色会随着它们重叠而逐渐变亮(直到它们变成白色)，而深色则变得越来越透明，黑色几乎看不见。
Additive blending.
叠加混合。
After that you set the x and y coordinate (corresponding to the top left position of the view port) and then the width and height in pixels.
之后，您设置x和y坐标(对应于视窗的左上位置)，然后以像素为单位设置宽度和高度。
After that, keypresses to either key will be interpreted by GameMaker as coming from key2.
在那之后，按下任何一个键都会被GameMaker解释为来自键2。
After waiting a step it should return the new size correctly.
在等待一个步骤后，它应该返回正确的新大小。
Alarm event
警报事件(计时器)Alarm event
All cells within the grid will then contain this value, which can be a real number or a string.
网格中的所有单元格都将包含此值，该值可以是实数或字符串。
All checks will be from the given x/y position to the origin (the x/y position) of instances of the object specified.
所有的检查都是从给定的x/y位置到指定对象实例的原点( x / y 位置)。
All clockwise triangles will be culled
所有顺时针三角形都将被剔除
All counter-clockwise triangles will be culled
所有逆时针三角形都将被剔除

All instances have a unique identifier (id) which can be used to modify and manipulate them while a game is running, but you may not always know what the id for a specific instance is and so this function can help as you can use it to iterate through all of them to find what you need.
指定要查找实例的对象和一个数字，如果实例列表中该位置有实例，则函数返回该实例的id，如果没有，则返回特殊关键字noone。
All instances in GameMaker have certain "built in" properties that you can use and set to govern how they look and behave.
GameMaker中的所有实例都有特定的"内置"属性，你可以使用和设置这些属性来控制它们的外观和行为。
All other cells will be left untouched.
所有其他单元格将保持不变。

All resources in GameMaker have a unique identifying number, and the path_index is a read-only variable that holds the index value for a given path resource that has been assigned to an instance using the path_start() function.
GameMaker中的所有资源都有一个唯一的标识号，path_index是一个只读变量，它保存使用path_start()函数分配给实例的给定路径资源的索引值。
All this function does is take the ID and return a string of the ID name you gave.
此函数所做的就是接受ID并返回您给出的ID名称的字符串。
All values must be between 0 and 255.
所有值必须介于0和255之间。
Alpha can be between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque) with the default alpha value for the background element being 1.
透明度(Alpha)可以在0(完全透明)和1(完全不透明)之间，背景元素的默认alpha值为1。
Alpha can be between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque) with the default alpha value for the sprite element being 1.
透明度(Alpha)值可以介于0(完全透明)和1(完全不透明)之间，精灵元素的默认Alpha值为1。
Alpha is always calculated as a value between 0 and 1 where 0 is completely transparent and 1 is completely opaque.
Alpha总是计算为0到1之间的值，其中0是完全透明的，1是完全不透明的。
Also note that a value of -1 for the line separation argument will default to a separation based on the height of the "M" character in the chosen font.
还要注意，行分隔参数的值-1将默认为基于所选字体中"M"字符的高度的分隔。
Also note that if the layer that the instance is assigned to is flagged as invisible, setting this variable to true will have no effect until the layer itself is flagged as visible too.
另注意，如果实例所分配到的层被标记为不可见，则将此变量设置为true将不起作用，直到该层本身也被标记为可见。
Also note that if you call the function ds_list_clear() on a list, any items flagged as lists will be destroyed as well when the list is cleared.
还要注意，如果您在列表上调用函数ds_list_clear()，那么当列表被清除时，任何标记为列表的项目也将被销毁。
Also note that if you call the function ds_list_clear() on a list, any items flagged as maps will be destroyed as well when the list is cleared.
还要注意，如果您在列表上调用函数ds_list_clear()，那么当列表被清除时，任何标记为地图的项目也将被销毁。
Also note that on HTML5 only "device 0" will function correctly and other devices may give wrong values.
还要注意，在HTML5上只有"设备0"能够正常工作，其他设备可能会给出错误的值。
Also note that this function will not work on HTML5 unless it's added in as a "clickable" callback (see here for more details).
还要注意，此函数不能在HTML5上工作，除非它被添加为"可点击"回调(参见这里了解更多细节)。

Also note that using this function on a variable storing an array, a data structure, or a struct will convert the contents of these variables into a string which can then be output to the console or saved to a file for debugging.
还要注意，对存储数组、数据结构或结构的变量使用此函数会将这些变量的内容转换为字符串，然后可以将该字符串输出到控制台或保存到文件中进行调试。
Altering this for a static instance (ie: an instance with 0 density) will turn it into a kinematic instance
为静态实例(例如:密度为0的实例)更改此属性会将其转换为运动实例

为静态实例(例如:密度为0的实例)更改此属性会将其转换为运动实例。

Although the function uses the word "healthbar" you can use this to display anything you wish as long as the amount to be displayed is a percentage value between 0 and 100 (a percentage of any value can be calculated with the formula (CURRENT_Value / MAXIMUM_value) * 100), so, for example, you can use this to display power, health, mana, time or anything else that would benefit from a bar display.
尽管此函数使用了单词"healthbar ",但您可以使用它来显示您想要的任何内容，只要要显示的数量是0到100之间的百分比值(任何值的百分比都可以通过公式(CURRENT _ Value/MAXIMUM _ Value)* 100)来计算)，因此，例如，您可以使用它来显示电量、生命值、法力值、时间或任何其他可以从条形显示中受益的内容。
Although you can get (and set) this value for a straight-line path it will have no influence over how an instance uses the path as it is only relevant when the path kind is set to "smooth".
尽管你可以为直线路径获取(并设置)这个值，但它不会影响实例如何使用该路径，因为它只在路径类型设置为"光滑"时才相关。

GameMaker中的角度是向右0º计算的，并且是逆时针方向的——所以90º是向上，180º是向左，270º是向下——序列的默认角度是0º。

动画事件，为使用骨架动画的对象运行每一步

在物理世界中使用力的另一种方式是将力局部应用于实例。

Any further calls to the sound index after it has been destroyed will give an error.

As with draw_sprite() you can specify a sprite and a sub-image for drawing, then the x / y position in the room for the sprite to be drawn at and finally a width and a height (which must be pixel values).
与draw_sprite()一样，您可以指定要绘制的sprite和子图像，然后指定sprite在房间中的x / y位置，最后指定宽度和高度(必须是像素值)。

与draw_sprite()一样，你可以指定一个用于绘图的精灵和子图像，然后你必须在精灵的区域内提供相对坐标来选择绘图。
As with draw_surface() you can specify a surface and then the x / y position in the room for the surface to be drawn at and finally a width and a height (which must be pixel values).
与draw_surface()一样，您可以指定一个表面，然后指定要绘制的表面在房间中的x / y位置，最后指定宽度和高度(必须是像素值)。
As with draw_surface() you can specify a surface, but you then need to specify the relative coordinates within the surface of an area to select for drawing.
与draw_surface()一样，您可以指定一个表面，但随后需要指定要选择进行绘制的区域的表面内的相对坐标。

默认情况下，这是启用的，但在许多情况下，您会希望接管绘制表面的时间和方式(例如，当使用着色器时)，在这种情况下，您可以使用此函数将其设置为false，以便您可以在需要的时间和方式自己绘制表面。

调用不带参数的函数将简单地销毁当前在作用域中并运行代码的实例，但是您可以提供一个可选的"id"参数，并通过使用实例id值锁定特定实例，或者通过使用object_index锁定特定对象的所有实例。
Calling the function with true as the argument enables it and using false disables it (not recommended).

单元不是作为房间坐标计算的，而是作为网格坐标计算的，其中(0，0)是网格的左上角。

即使在创建了关节之后，某些关节属性也可以更改和设置。
Certain target platforms permit more than one listener, so it is important that you know how many the target has before changing or using different listeners.
某些目标平台允许多个侦听器，因此在更改或使用不同的侦听器之前，了解目标平台有多少个侦听器是很重要的。

Change the instance from static to kinematic mid-simulation can be expensive in terms of processing (depending on the state of the instances in the physics world) and therefore it is recommended to set the fixture to be kinematic using this function prior to binding it to an instance, so that it will be unaffected by collisions and forces (such as gravity) but may move with constant linear and/or angular velocity.
从处理的角度来看，将实例从静态更改为动态中间模拟的成本可能很高(取决于物理世界中实例的状态)，因此建议在将夹具绑定到实例之前，通过此函数将夹具设置为动态的，这样它将不受碰撞和力(如重力)的影响，但可以以恒定的线速度和/或角速度移动。

Changing the sprite does not change the index of the currently visible frame, so if you change the sprite on frame number 3, the new sprite will be drawn with that frame visible (assuming it has the same number of frames).
改变精灵并不会改变当前可见帧的索引，所以如果你改变了第3帧上的精灵，新的精灵就会以该帧可见的方式绘制出来(假设它有相同的帧数)。

Changing these values does not modify the resource in any way (only how it is drawn), and you can use any of the available sprite variables instead of direct values for all the arguments in the function.
改变这些值并不会以任何方式修改资源(只是如何绘制)，你可以使用任何可用的精灵变量而不是函数中所有参数的直接值。
Changing these values does not modify the resource in any way (only how it is drawn).

Collision with an object
与物体碰撞

Collision_circle creates a circular zone of the radius given by the user around the points x1,y1 and then checks that zone for a collision with any instance of the object specified by the argument "obj".
Collision_circle围绕点x1、y1创建一个半径由用户指定的圆形区域，然后检查该区域是否与参数"obj"指定的对象的任何实例发生碰撞。

Collision_ellipse uses the first four arguments (x1,y1,x2,y2) to define the width and height of an ellipse within the current room and then checks to see if any object that is defined by the "obj" argument is in collision with that area.
Collision_ellipse使用前四个参数(x1,y1,x2,y2)来定义当前房间内椭圆的宽度和高度，然后检查由"obj"参数定义的任何对象是否与该区域碰撞。
Collision_line checks along a line from point x1,y1 to point x2,y2 for a collision with any instance of the object specified by the argument "obj".
Collision_line沿着从点x1，y1到点x2，y2的直线检查与由参数"obj"指定的对象的任何实例的碰撞。
Collision_point checks the point specified by the arguments x1,y1 for a collision with any instance of the object specified by the argument "obj".
Collision_point检查由参数x1、y1指定的点是否与由参数"obj"指定的对象的任何实例发生碰撞。

Collision_rectangle uses the first four arguments (x1,y1,x2,y2) to define an area within the current room and then checks to see if any object that is defined by the "obj" argument is in collision with that area.
Collision_rectangle使用前四个参数(x1，y1，x2，y2)来定义当前房间内的一个区域，然后检查由"obj"参数定义的任何对象是否与该区域碰撞。
Collisions are based on the mask of the instances, and if any part of the mask over-laps with the target point it then the function will destroy that instance.
碰撞基于实例的遮罩，如果遮罩的任何部分与目标点重叠，则此函数将破坏该实例。
Colour-mixing particles take on some of the colour of other particles with which they collide.
混色粒子呈现出与它们碰撞的其他粒子的一些颜色。
Command-line parameters are those extra commands that you can add to an exe to change how the program is run and with this function you can get the chosen command-line parameter as a string.
命令行参数是那些额外的命令，你可以添加到一个exe来改变程序的运行方式，通过此函数，你可以得到一个字符串形式的命令行参数。
Command-line parameters are those extra commands that you can add to an exe to change how the program is run.
命令行参数是那些可以添加到exe中以改变程序运行方式的额外命令。

DS maps take up space in memory, which is allocated to them when they are created.
DS map占用内存空间，这些空间是在创建它们时分配给它们的。
DS maps are not stored in a linear form, for that use DS list, so all this does is find the first key as stored by the computer.
DS map不是以线性形式存储的，因此使用DS列表，这样做只是找到计算机存储的第一个键。
DS maps are not stored in a linear form, for that use DS lists, so all this does is find the last key as stored by the computer.
DS map不是以线性形式存储的，因为它使用了DS列表，所以所有这些只是找到计算机存储的最后一个键。
Damping is also much cheaper to simulate than friction, but please note that damping is not a replacement for friction; the two effects can, and should, be used together.
阻尼的模拟成本也比摩擦低得多，但注意，阻尼不是摩擦的替代品;这两种效果可以，也应该一起使用。
Damping is used to reduce the physics simulation velocity of instances over time, much like air resistance in the real world.
阻尼用于随着时间的推移降低实例的物理模拟速度，就像现实世界中的空气阻力一样。
Damping is used to reduce the physics world velocity of instances, and differs from friction in that friction only occurs when two instances with fixtures are in contact.
阻尼用于降低实例的物理世界速度，与摩擦不同的是，摩擦仅在两个带有夹具的实例接触时发生。
Damping parameters should be between 0 and infinity, with 0 meaning no damping, and infinity meaning full damping.
阻尼参数应该在0到无穷大之间，0表示无阻尼，无穷大表示有阻尼。

Each component of the colours is stored as a floating point value between 0 and 1, and the new colour is calculated by multiply each component of the source colour by some factor and by multiplying each component of destination colour by some other factor and then adding the results together component by component.
颜色的每个组成部分都存储为0到1之间的浮点值，新颜色的计算方法是:将源颜色的每个组成部分乘以某个乘数，将目标颜色的每个组成部分乘以其他乘数，然后将结果逐项相加。

每个hat值是不同方向的位掩码，其中:
Either true to set release mode or false for general development.

Epsilon is a value used to determine whether two numbers subject to rounding error are close enough to be considered "equal".
Epsilon是一个值，用来确定两个有舍入误差的数字是否足够接近，被认为是"相等"的。

Essentially, by default when z-testing is off and you have two objects drawing to the same space, both objects will be rendered regardless of whether one will over-draw the other, resulting in unnecessary draw calls.
本质上，默认情况下，当z-testing关闭，并且你有两个对象绘制到相同的空间时，两个对象都会被渲染，而不管一个对象是否会过度绘制另一个对象，这会导致不必要的绘制调用。
Even if a cell partially falls within the defined rectangular region it will be cleared.
即使单元格部分落入定义的矩形区域，它也会被清除。

Even if you have defined the physics for your objects, without a world to place them in they will default to the traditional GameMaker collision system, so you need this function to create the physics system for the specified room either in an object event, or the creation code of the room itself (it can also be defined without using code in the room editor).
即使你已经为你的对象定义了物理系统，如果没有一个世界来放置它们，它们将默认为传统的GameMaker碰撞系统，所以你需要此函数来为指定的房间创建物理系统，或者在一个对象事件中，或者在房间本身的创建代码中(它也可以在不使用房间编辑器中的代码的情况下被定义)。
Even when a sprite has a precise collision mask, the bounding box exists and is used for certain things, and so you can use this variable to find it.
即使精灵有一个精确的碰撞掩码，边界框仍然存在，并用于某些事情，所以你可以使用这个变量来找到它。

Every instance that you create - whether through code or by adding them to a room in the Room Editor - is given a number that is used internally to identify this instance and the variable id is what you can use to reference it.
您创建的每个实例——无论是通过代码还是通过在room Editor中将它们添加到房间中——都有一个编号，用于在内部标识该实例，变量id是您可以用来引用它的。
Everything in GameMaker is based around steps and, normally, each event will only happen once per step.
GameMaker中的一切都是基于步骤的，通常情况下，每个事件在每个步骤中只会发生一次。
Extra configuration parameter.
额外的配置参数。
Failure to do so can cause memory leaks which will eventually slow down and crash your game.
如果做不到这一点，就会导致内存泄漏，最终导致游戏速度变慢并崩溃。
Finally you call this function, which will start the saving of the files.
最后调用此函数，它将开始保存文件。
Finally you can assign a priority, which is then used to determine how sounds are dealt with when the number of sounds playing is over the limit set by the function audio_channel_num().
最后，您可以分配一个优先级，然后使用它来确定当播放的声音数量超过函数audio_channel_num()设置的限制时如何处理声音。

Finally you give an object index or an instance ID to use as the object that is going to override the sequence (supplying an instance ID will simply use the object that the instance was created from as the override).
最后，您提供一个对象索引或一个实例ID，用作将要覆盖序列的对象(提供实例ID将简单地使用创建实例的对象作为覆盖)。
Finally you give the buffer index to copy the vertex data into, as well as a data offset to define the position to copy the vertex data to in the destination buffer.
最后，给出顶点数据复制到的缓冲区索引，以及定义顶点数据在目标缓冲区中的复制位置的数据偏移量。
Finally you must give the number arguments that the function can take (from 0 to 15) and for each of the arguments you must specify its type too.
最后，您必须给出函数可以接受的参数数量(从0到15)，对于每个参数，您还必须指定其类型。
Finally you need to call physics_particle_group_end() to create the group of particles in the room.
最后，您需要调用physics_particle_group_end()来创建房间中的粒子组。
Finally you need to specify the length of the array (or the length of the part that you want) to copy.
最后，您需要指定要复制的数组的长度(或者您想要的部分的长度)。

Finally, if a persisted system moves to a room with a layer at the same depth as the layer the system was created on, it will not be assigned to this layer, but instead a new layer will be created at the same depth (with the same name as the original layer).
最后，如果一个持久的系统移动到一个具有与创建系统的层相同深度的层的房间，它将不会被分配到这个层，而是在相同深度(具有与原始层相同的名称)创建一个新层。
Finally, the x and y position is the position within the room that the sprite will be drawn, and it is centered on the sprite x offset and y offset.
最后，x 和 y 位置是房间内精灵将被绘制的位置，它以精灵 x 偏移和 y 偏移为中心。

当您收到聊天消息，包括本地玩家发来的消息(在rollback_event_param消息中)时触发

Fog can be used in 3D games to make instances in the distance look blurred or even disappear, which helps in creating atmosphere as well as masking the fact that you are not drawing instances that are far away.
雾可以在3D游戏中使用，使远处的实例看起来模糊甚至消失，这有助于创造气氛，并掩盖你没有绘制远处实例的事实。

For a polygon shape, the points are relative to the origin of the fixture, with the 0,0 position of the x/y axis being the centre, and the subsequent coordinates being calculated as usual in GameMaker with down/right being +x,+y and up/left being -x,-y.
对于多边形形状，这些点相对于夹具的原点，x/y 轴的 0,0 位置为中心，随后的坐标在 GameMaker 中照常计算，下/右为 +x,+y 和 上/左为 -x,-y。
For each contact point there is an associated contact normal (which is usually the same normal for all points of contact in the collision).
对于每个接触点都有一个相关的接触法线(对于碰撞中的所有接触点通常是相同的法线)。
For example - sign(458) will return 1, sign(-5) will return -1 and sign(0) will return 0.
例如 - sign(458)将返回1，sign(-5)将返回-1，sign(0)将返回0。
For example if you have a minimum of 3 and a maximum of 6, all particles will be created with a speed between three and six pixels per step.

Friction is one of the "built in" properties that instances can have and can be used to slow the instance down over time when the speed is other than zero.
摩擦是实例可以拥有的"内置"属性之一，可以用来随着时间的推移减慢实例的速度，当速度不是0时。

Friction is the force that resists the relative motion of material elements sliding against each other, which in the GameMaker physics world, translates as the loss of momentum caused by the collision of two instances with fixtures bound to them.
摩擦力是阻止材料元素相互滑动的相对运动的力，在GameMaker物理世界中，这种力被解释为两个实例与绑定到它们的夹具碰撞所导致的动量损失。

If the background element has no sprite attached or the sprite used has no sub-images, this function will have no effect.
如果背景元素没有附加sprite或者使用的sprite没有子图像，此函数将不起作用。
If the data being copied exceeds the length of the destination array, the array will be extended to accept the data.
如果复制的数据超过了目标数组的长度，数组将被扩展以接受数据。
If the decompression has failed (for example, you are supplying a buffer that hasn't been compressed) then the function will instead return a value less than 0.
如果解压缩失败(例如，您正在提供一个尚未压缩的缓冲区)，那么此函数将返回一个小于0的值。
If the destination surface already has information this will be overwritten by the copy, and the function does not change the source surface in any way.
如果目标表面已经有信息，该信息将被副本覆盖，并且此函数不会以任何方式更改源表面。
If the display name contains any characters that are not permitted for a file name, they will be replaced automatically with "_".
如果显示名称包含任何文件名不允许的字符，它们将自动替换为"_"。
If the effect is anything other ef_rain or ef_snow then you can define an x/y position to create the effect, and the size can be a value of 0, 1, or 2, where 0 is small, 1 is medium and 2 is large.
如果效果是ef_rain或ef_snow之外的任何东西，那么您可以定义一个x/y位置来创建效果，大小可以是值0、1或2，其中0表示小，1表示中，2表示大。
If the element ID given is not a valid one, then the function will return -1.
如果给定的元素ID不是有效的，则函数将返回-1。
If the element has no sprite assigned, the function will return -1.
如果元素没有指定sprite，函数将返回-1。
If the element is not an instance, the function will return -1.
如果元素不是实例，函数将返回-1。

If the emitter itself is not ever going to move you would normally not need to set these values, but, for example, if you are making a scrolling shooter game where the enemies come from the right and scroll to the left, you would set this to have a velocity of (hspeed, 0, 0) in the create event of the enemies (and update the emitter of each instance in the step event using audio_emitter_position()) to give any sounds emitted by the enemy instances the correct Doppler as they pass the player instance (which in turn would be using the function audio_listener_position() to set the listener to the correct position).

如果发射器本身不会移动，你通常不需要设置这些值，但是，例如，如果你在制作一款卷轴射击游戏，敌人从右边来，向左滚动，你可以将其速度设置为(hspeed, 0,0)在敌人的创建事件中(并在步骤事件中使用audio_emitter_position()更新每个实例的发射器)，以在敌人实例通过播放器实例时为其发出的任何声音提供正确的多普勒(这将依次使用函数audio_listener_position()将侦听器设置到正确的位置)。

If the file already contains information, this information will be erased and the string will be written at the beginning of the file, unless you have opened the file with the file_text_open_append().
如果文件已经包含信息，则该信息将被擦除，字符串将写入文件的开头，除非您已经使用file_text_open_append()打开了文件。
If the file does not exists then the function will return the value -1.
如果文件不存在，函数将返回值-1。
If the function fails - ie: an invalid group is given, or the group has no texture assigned to it - then the array will be empty (0 length).
如果函数失败-例如:一个无效的组，或组没有分配给它的纹理-那么数组将为空(长度为0)。
If the function fails, -1 is returned.
如果函数失败，则返回-1。

If the function returns false (ie: the audio context status is not running), then only unstreamed sounds may play (but it's not guaranteed, and you should assume that no audio can be played), while if it returns true then all audio will play.
如果此函数返回false(即:音频上下文状态未运行)，则可能只播放未流式播放的声音(但这并不保证，您应该假设没有音频可以播放)，而如果它返回true，则所有音频都将播放。
If the given key contains a DS list ID, then the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
如果给定的键包含DS列表ID，那么函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
If the given key contains a DS map ID, then the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
如果给定的键包含DS map ID，那么函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
If the given key does not exist then it will be created for you, and if it does then the current value will be replaced with the new value.
如果给定的键不存在，则会为您创建它，如果存在，则会用新值替换当前值。
If the given position contains a DS list ID, then the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
如果给定位置包含DS列表ID，那么函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
If the given position contains a DS map ID, then the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
如果给定的位置包含一个DS map ID，那么函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
If the given tilemap ID is incorrect or the tilemap doesn't exist, the function will return -1.
如果给定的tilemapID不正确或tilemap不存在，此函数将返回-1。
If the global variable does not exist already in the game it will be created and then assigned the value.
如果全局变量在游戏中还不存在，它将被创建并分配值。

If the grid size is larger than the current grid, the new cells will have a base value of 0, and if the size is smaller then the values held in the cells that are no longer within the new size will be lost.
如果网格大小大于当前网格，则新单元格的基值将为0，如果网格大小较小，则不再属于新大小的单元格中保存的值将丢失。
If the information is not available, it will hold simply an empty string "", or "en" for "English" language.
如果信息不可用，它将只包含一个空字符串""，或"en"表示"English"语言。
If the information is not available, it will hold simply an empty string "".
如果信息不可用，它将只保存一个空字符串" "。
If the ini_file does not exist at the location you are checking, GameMaker may create one, but only if you write data to it.
如果ini_file不存在于您正在检查的位置，GameMaker可能会创建一个，但前提是您向其中写入数据。
If the instance has no path assigned, the variable will be set to -1.
如果实例没有分配路径，变量将被设置为-1。

If the instance is being controlled by a sequence, this variable will hold the sequence instance struct for the Sequence controlling the instance, otherwise it will be undefined. This is a read-only variable and cannot be changed.
如果实例由序列控制，此变量将保存控制该实例的sequence的序列实例结构，否则将为未定义。这是一个只读变量，不能更改。
If the instance is being controlled by a sequence, this variable will return true, otherwise it will return false. This is a read-only variable and cannot be changed.
如果实例由序列控制，该变量将返回true，否则将返回false。这是一个只读变量，不能更改。
If the keyboard is not visible, 0 will be returned.
如果键盘不可见，将返回0。

If the layer assigned has instances added to it, then the shader will be applied to all the draw events that the instance uses - for example if the instance has a Draw GUI Begin event, then the shader will be applied automatically to it.
如果分配的层有实例添加到它，那么着色器将应用到实例使用的所有绘制事件-例如，如果实例有一个绘制GUI开始事件，那么着色器将自动应用到它。
If the layer is not one of the room editor ones (ie: it was created using layer_create()) then an empty string will be returned.
如果该层不是房间编辑器的层之一(即:它是使用layer_create()创建的)，那么将返回一个空字符串。

If the layer is one that has been designed in the room editor, then the next time you leave the room and then return, the layer will be recreated again with the original contents, however if the room is persistent, the layer will be removed unless room persistence is switched off again.
如果该层是在房间编辑器中设计的，那么下次您离开房间并返回时，该层将使用原始内容重新创建，但是如果房间是持久的，则该层将被删除，除非再次关闭房间持久性。
If the list contains strings, these will be sorted alphabetically, based on the English 26 letter alphabet.
如果列表包含字符串，则这些字符串将根据英文26个字母进行字母排序。

If the listener itself is not ever going to move, or the movement is not a constant motion, you would normally not need to set these values, but, for example, if you are making a scrolling game where the player has a constant bottom to top movement and the enemies a constant top to bottom movement, you would set the listener and emitter velocities (for emitters you would use audio_emitter_velocity()) to the appropriate vectors to simulate the correct Doppler effect as they move past the player instance.
如果侦听器本身不会移动，或者移动不是恒定的移动，你通常就不需要设置这些值，但是，例如，如果你在制作一款滚动游戏，其中玩家的移动是恒定的从下到上，敌人的移动是恒定的从上到下，你可以设置和发射器的速度(对于发射器，你可以使用audio_emitter_velocity())到适当的矢量，以模拟正确的多普勒效应，因为它们经过播放器实例。
If the load fails for whatever reason, the function will return -1 and a message will be shown in the compiler output window saying that the load has failed.
如果加载因任何原因失败，函数将返回-1，并且编译器输出窗口中将显示一条消息，说明加载失败。
If the map that the string is being read into contains any key/value pairs, these will be cleared first before the saved map is re-constructed.
如果字符串读入的映射包含任何键/值对，那么在重新构建保存的映射之前，将首先清除这些键/值对。
If the method was not defined in a script then the function will return -1, otherwise it will return the index value for the script.
如果方法没有在脚本中定义，那么函数将返回-1，否则将返回脚本的索引值。

If the number of places specified is greater than the value to be shown and/or the number plus the decimal places that have been specified is less than the total places, then spaces will be added before the value to make up the difference (see the example below).
如果指定的位数大于要显示的值和/或数字加上已指定的小数点位数小于总位数，那么将在值之前添加空格以弥补差额(参见下面的示例)。
If the object has reached the end of a path it is following
如果对象已经到达了它所遵循的路径的尽头
If the object's sprite has reached the end of its animation
如果对象的精灵已经到达其动画的结尾
If the player id argument is not given, the preferences for the local player will be returned.
如果没有给定玩家id参数，将返回本地玩家的首选项。
If the point falls within the defined circle the function will return true otherwise the function will return false.
如果该点落在定义的圆内，此函数将返回true，否则此函数将返回false。
If the point falls within the defined rectangle the function will return true otherwise the function will return false.
如果该点落在定义的矩形内，函数将返回true，否则函数将返回false。
If the point falls within the defined triangle the function will return true otherwise the function will return false.
如果该点落在定义的三角形内，此函数将返回true，否则此函数将返回false。
If the point is outside of the range of the path (ie: a path has 8 points and you ask for the x position of point 10) then a value of 0 will be returned.
如果这个点在路径的范围之外(例如:路径有8个点，而你要求得到点10的x位置)，那么返回值为0。
If the point is outside of the range of the path (ie: a path has 8 points and you ask for the y position of point 10) then a value of 0 will be returned.
如果这个点在路径的范围之外(例如:路径有8个点，而你要求得到点10的y位置)，那么返回值为0。
If the queue is empty then the function will return the constant undefined, otherwise it will return the real or string value contained in the queue.
如果队列为空，那么函数将返回常量undefined，否则将返回队列中包含的实数或字符串值。
If the real number is an integer, it will be saved with no decimal places, otherwise, it will be saved with two decimal places.
如果实数是整数，则保存时不带小数位，否则保存时带两位小数位。
If the rectangle is filled, then the colour arguments will be used to generate a colour gradient from the centre to the edges, where colour 1 is the centre colour and colour 2 the edge colour.
如果矩形被填充，那么颜色参数将用于生成从中心到边缘的颜色渐变，其中颜色1是中心颜色，颜色2是边缘颜色。
If the scheduler's resolution is set to the default value (as set by Windows), the function will return -1.
如果计划程序的分辨率设置为默认值(由Windows设置)，此函数将返回-1。

If the service is not available, the user is logged into a "pretend" game centre and all achievements and scores are stored on the device so that when the actual service is available, these details can be uploaded.
如果服务不可用，用户就会登录到一个"虚拟"游戏中心，所有的成就和分数都存储在设备上，这样当真正的服务可用时，这些细节就可以上传了。

If the sprite is animated, then you can get the current frame of the animation by checking the image_index variable, or if you want to change the state of a static sprite, you can select a new sub-image by setting this variable to the desired sub-image of the sprite.
如果精灵是动画，那么你可以通过检查image_index变量来获得动画的当前帧，或者如果你想改变静态精灵的状态，你可以通过设置这个变量来选择一个新的子图像。
If the sprite used has no sub-images, this function will have no effect.
如果使用的精灵没有子图像，此函数将没有效果。
If the sprite used has no sub-images, this variable will have no effect.
如果使用的精灵没有子图像，这个变量将没有效果。
If the stack is empty then the function will return the constant undefined, otherwise it will return the real or string value contained in the stack.
如果堆栈为空，那么函数将返回常量undefined，否则将返回堆栈中包含的实数或字符串值。

If the system is not flagged as persistent then it will be automatically destroyed at the end of the room it was created in (this is the same as if you had called the function part_system_destroy() and will also destroy any emitters associated with the system).
如果系统没有被标记为持久的，那么它将在创建它的房间的末尾自动销毁(这与调用函数part_system_destroy()是一样的，并且还将销毁与系统相关的任何发射器)。

If the time line was created dynamically using the timeline_add() function, then this function should be used the moment that the time line is no longer needed to prevent any memory leaks that could slow down (and eventually crash) your game.
如果时间线是使用timeline_add()函数动态创建的，那么应该在不再需要使用此时间线的时候删除，以防止任何可能降低游戏速度(并最终导致游戏崩溃)的内存泄漏。
If the user presses "Cancel" an empty string "" is returned.
如果用户按"取消"，则返回空字符串""。
If the value being searched for does not exist, then the function will return -1.
如果要搜索的值不存在，那么函数将返回-1。
If the value does not exist in the priority queue then undefined will be returned.
如果该值在优先级队列中不存在，则将返回undefined。

If the value is larger than the number of sub-images, then GameMaker will automatically loop the number to select the corresponding image (for example, if the sprite being drawn has 5 sub-images numbered 0 to 4 and we set the index value to 7, then the function will draw sub-image 3, numbered 0).
如果该值大于子图的数量，那么 GameMaker 会自动循环该数字来选择对应的图像（例如，如果正在绘制的精灵有 5 个子图，编号为 0 到 4，我们将索引值设置为7、然后函数会绘制子图3，编号为0）。
If the value is not found the function returns -1.
如果没有找到该值，则函数返回-1。
If the variable does not exist already in the instance it will be created and then assigned the value.
如果该变量在实例中不存在，则将创建该变量，然后为其赋值。
If the variable does not exist already in the struct it will be created and then assigned the value.
如果该变量在结构中不存在，将创建该变量，然后为其赋值。
If the variable is not a method then the function will return undefined.
如果变量不是方法，则函数将返回未定义。
If there are no assets with the given tag(s), or if there is an error (eg: the given tags do not exist), then an empty array will be returned.
如果没有具有给定标签的资源，或者如果有错误(例如:给定标签不存在)，那么将返回一个空数组。

If there are no layers at the given depth then the array will have a single entry at the [0] position with a value of -1, but, if there are layers at the depth, then an entry will be made in the array for each layer found - the entry value will be the unique ID value for a layer.
如果在给定的深度上没有层，那么数组将在[0]位置上有一个值为-1的单一条目，但是，如果在深度上有层，那么将为找到的每个层在数组中创建一个条目—条目值将是一个层的唯一ID值。

If there is no room after the one you input then -1 is returned. Note that this function will not recognise or take into consideration rooms that have been added dynamically using room_add() or room_duplicate().
如果在您输入的空格之后没有空格，则返回-1。注意，此函数不会识别或考虑使用room_add()或room_duplicate()动态添加的房间。
If there is no room before the one you input then -1 is returned.
如果在您输入的空间之前没有空间，则返回-1。
If these colours are not the same, you will get a gradient effect from one to the other (the colour settings will over-ride the base colour set with the function draw_set_colour()).
如果这些颜色不相同，您将得到从一个到另一个的渐变效果(颜色设置将使用draw_set_color()函数覆盖基本颜色设置)。
If these colours are not the same, you will get a gradient effect from one to the other and the colour settings will over-ride the base colour set with the function draw_set_colour().
如果这些颜色不相同，你将得到从一个到另一个的渐变效果，颜色设置将使用draw_set_color()函数覆盖基础颜色设置。
If they are not touching at all the function will return 0, if the source is completely within the destination it will return 1, and if they are simply overlapping then it will return 2.
如果它们完全不接触，函数将返回0，如果源完全在目的地内，函数将返回1，如果它们只是重叠，函数将返回2。
If this check leads to a collision then it starts looking at directions more to the left and to the right of the ideal, straight-line direction.
如果此检查导致碰撞，则它开始查看更偏向于理想直线方向的左侧和右侧的方向。
If this is disabled (false) then images will be drawn based on the nearest pixel when scaled or moving which may lead to "blocky" images.
如果禁用(false)，那么当缩放或移动时，图像将基于最近的像素绘制，这可能导致"块状"图像。

If this is not what you require, then you should use a function like path_duplicate() to create a copy of the path first, then call this function on the duplicated asset (don't forget to call path_delete() on the asset when it is no longer required).
如果这不是您所需要的，那么您应该首先使用一个类似path_duplicate()的函数来创建路径的副本，然后在复制的资源上调用此函数(不要忘记在不再需要它时在资源上调用path_delete())。

If this is set to true, no external force (either from coded impulses or forces, or from collisions) will affect the rotation value of the instance and this would have to be set manually using the phy_rotation variable
如果设置为true，没有外力(来自编码的脉冲或力，或来自碰撞)会影响实例的旋转值，这必须使用phy_rotation变量手动设置
If this is switched on, the bounding box and the precise collision mask will be drawn as outlines around the sprite.
如果启用此选项，边界框和精确碰撞遮罩将被绘制为精灵周围的轮廓。

If this path has been created dynamically using path_add(), the variable that holds the path index will no longer be valid for accessing the path as it no longer exists, and if the path was created using the Path Editor that path can no longer be accessed in the whole game as you are permanently deleting it.
如果这个路径是使用path_add()动态创建的，那么保存路径索引的变量将不再有效，因为它已经不存在了，如果这个路径是使用路径编辑器创建的，那么这个路径在整个游戏中就不能再被访问了，因为你已经永久删除了它。
If this room does not exist, an error will be thrown and the game will be forced to close.
如果这个房间不存在，将抛出一个错误，游戏将被迫关闭。
If true, col1 is irrelevant.
如果为真，col1是无关的。
If true, enables a debug view
如果为true，则启用调试视图

If used on a path from the Asset Browser, note that the function will change the actual asset, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.
如果在来自资源浏览器的路径上使用此函数，注意此函数将改变实际的资源，因此将永久地影响游戏中所有实例使用该路径的方式(从此函数使用到游戏结束)。

If you are checking an analogue button, then the check will take into consideration the threshold setting and only return true while the raw input value is over the given threshold (you can get this raw value using the function gamepad_button_value()).
如果您正在检查一个模拟按钮，那么该检查将考虑阈值设置，并且只在原始输入值超过给定阈值时返回true(您可以使用函数gamepad_button_value()获得这个原始值)。

If you are copying a file on Android from within your Included Files area (which will be inside your APK) it will copy into memory first, so, be aware that copying very large files from the APK may cause devices to run out of memory.
如果你在Android上从你的包含文件区(将在你的APK中)复制一个文件，它将首先复制到内存中，所以，注意，从APK复制非常大的文件可能会导致设备内存不足。
If you are not sure of the contents of the JSON, you can use the different Variable Functions (like typeof() or variable_struct_get_names()) to check the returned contents.
如果不确定JSON的内容，可以使用不同的变量函数(如typeof()或variable_struct_get_names())来检查返回的内容。

If you are running this on a the HTML5 or PC and Mac modules then this value is updated constantly, as long as the device (usually a mouse) is plugged in, however for mobile devices, this will only be updated while the screen is being touched and note that the maximum number of touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs.
如果你是在HTML5或PC和Mac模块上运行此函数，那么只要设备(通常是鼠标)插入，这个值就会不断更新，但对于移动设备，这个值只会在触碰屏幕时更新，注意可以检测到的触碰的最大次数将取决于所使用的设备及其运行的操作系统。

If you are running this on a the HTML5 or PC and Mac modules then this value is updated constantly, as long as the device (usually a mouse) is plugged in, however for mobile devices, this will only be updated while the screen is being touched, and note that the maximum number of touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs.
如果您在HTML5或PC和Mac模块上运行此函数，则只要设备(通常是鼠标)插上电源，此值就会不断更新，但是对于移动设备，它只会在屏幕被触摸时更新，注意，可以检测到的最大触摸次数在很大程度上取决于所使用的设备及其运行的操作系统。

If you are using multiple views then the function should be used in the Draw Event and you can use the variable view_current to selectively apply the given camera only to the camera view currently being rendered.
如果您正在使用多个视图，那么应该在绘制事件中使用此函数，并且您可以使用变量view_current来选择性地将给定的相机仅应用于当前正在渲染的相机视图。

If you are writing a file to disk, working_directory points to the area of local storage that is reserved for your game on the target device (in windows this is "%LOCALAPPDATA%/gamedir/" where the "gamedir" is the directory with the name of your game).
如果您正在将文件写入磁盘，working_directory将指向目标设备上为您的游戏保留的本地存储区域(在windows中，这是"%LOCALAPPDATA%/gamedir/"，其中"gamedir"是包含您的游戏名称的目录)。

If you call this function on a path asset, then the removal of the point will be permanent and all instances assigned the path in the future will be missing the point that was removed. If this is not what you require, then you should use a function like path_duplicate() to create a copy of the path first, then call this function on the duplicated asset (don't forget to call path_delete() on the asset when it is no longer required).
如果您在路径资源上调用此函数，那么点的删除将是永久的，并且将来分配了该路径的所有实例都将缺少被删除的点。如果这不是您所需要的，那么您应该首先使用一个类似path_duplicate()的函数来创建路径的副本，然后在复制的资源上调用此函数(不要忘记在不再需要它时在资源上调用path_delete())。
If you create a new layer through code using the function layer_create() then that function will return the unique ID value instead (dynamical created layers do not get names).
如果你通过layer_create()函数创建一个新层，那么此函数将返回唯一的ID值(动态创建的层不会获得名称)。
If you created that surface using surface_create(), then this will be the positive integer which is the unique ID for that surface
如果你使用surface_create()创建表面，那么这将是正整数，它是表面的唯一ID
If you do not call this function, nothing will be drawn as this effectively tells GameMaker that you have finished and that it can now draw the defined primitive.
如果你不调用此函数，就不会绘制任何东西，因为这会有效地告诉GameMaker你已经完成了，它现在可以绘制定义的图元了。
If you do not need the id of the colliding instance you should consider using position_meeting() instead.
如果您不需要碰撞实例的id，您应该考虑使用position_meeting()来代替。
If you do not specify the name of the layer, then the created layer will be assigned a name with the format "_layer_XXX", where "XXX" is a hex value used to give the layer a unique name.
如果不指定层的名称，则创建的层将被指定一个格式为"_layer_XXX"的名称，其中"XXX"是一个十六进制值，用于给层一个唯一的名称。
If you do not supply a clear colour argument, the default colour of black will be used.
如果不提供颜色参数，将使用默认的黑色。

If you do not use the function after you have used any of the ini write functions, then nothing will be written to disk, as the file information is held in memory until this function is called, which forces the write.
如果在使用了任何ini写函数后不使用此函数，则不会向磁盘写入任何内容，因为文件信息会保存在内存中，直到调用此函数时才会强制写入。

If you do not use this function (the default setting) then the GUI layer will be positioned with its (0,0) point at the same position as that for the application surface (the area where your game is being drawn) and the width and height will be stretched to fit the this surface, such that setting a GUI width of 256px with this function when the application surface is 512px would stretch those 256 pixels to fit, effectively making the pixels twice as large.
如果你不使用此函数(默认设置)，那么GUI层的(0,0)点将被定位在与应用程序表面(绘制游戏的区域)相同的位置，宽度和高度将被拉伸以适应这个表面，因此当应用程序表面为512像素时，使用此函数设置256像素的GUI宽度将拉伸这256像素以适应，有效地使像素增加一倍。

If you do supply the extra value for initialising the array, then all indices within the new array will be set to that instead of 0, but note that the function will have a greater performance overhead in this case.
如果您为初始化数组提供了额外的值，那么新数组中的所有索引都将被设置为该值，而不是0，但是注意，在这种情况下，此函数的性能开销会更大。

If you enable the window resize option in the Game Options for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the maximum height to the size you specify.
如果你在目标平台的Game Options中启用窗口调整选项，那么玩家就可以将游戏窗口调整到任何他们想要的大小，但是通过使用此函数，你可以将最大高度限制为你指定的大小。

If you enable the window resize option in the Game Options for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the maximum width to the size you specify.
如果你在目标平台的Game Options中启用窗口调整选项，那么玩家就可以将游戏窗口调整到任何他们想要的大小，但是通过使用此函数，你可以将最大宽度限制为你指定的大小。

If you enable the window resize option in the Game Options for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the minimum height to the size you specify.
如果你在目标平台的Game Options中启用窗口调整选项，那么玩家就可以将游戏窗口调整为任何他们想要的大小，但是通过使用此函数，你可以将最小高度限制为你指定的大小。

If you enable the window resize option in the Game Options for the target platform, then the player can resize the game window to any size they wish, however by using this function you can limit the minimum width to the size you specify.
如果您在目标平台的游戏选项中启用了窗口调整选项，那么玩家可以将游戏窗口调整到他们想要的任何大小，但是通过通过此函数，您可以将最小宽度限制为您指定的大小。
If you give a value of -1 as the camera ID then you are removing a camera from the view port and note that if that view port is enabled and visible you may get some unpredictable results.
如果你给相机ID的值是-1，那么你就是在从视图端口中删除一个相机，注意，如果视图端口是启用的并且可见的，你可能会得到一些不可预知的结果。
If you give a value of -1, the element will have no sprite assigned (but will still exist and can have a sprite assigned again later).
如果给定的值为-1，该元素将不会被赋予sprite(但是仍然存在，并且可以在以后再次被赋予sprite)。
If you have a larger or smaller port size than that assigned to the camera, then the camera view will be scaled down - or up - to fit, as illustrated by the image below.
如果您的端口大小大于或小于分配给相机的端口大小，则相机视图将会缩小或放大以适应需要，如下图所示。
If you have created an external function call to a dll or dylib using external_define(), you can use this function to then call it.
如果使用external_define()创建了对dll或dylib的外部函数调用，则可以使用此函数调用它。
If you have only read information from the ini file, then the default values for the read function will be returned, but the ini file will not actually be created.
如果您只从ini文件中读取信息，那么read函数的默认值将被返回，但是ini文件实际上不会被创建。
If you have previously created an audio stream from a file using the function audio_create_stream() and no longer need that sound, you can call this function to delete it from memory.
如果您之前已经使用函数audio_create_stream()从文件中创建了一个音频流，并且不再需要该声音，那么可以调用此函数从内存中删除它。
If you have set the camera to a view port through the Room Editor, this variable will hold the camera ID for that port.
如果您已经通过Room Editor将相机设置为一个视图端口，那么该变量将保存该端口的相机ID。

If you have view ports set to visible and then disable this option, the whole room will be drawn to the screen scaled to the window size instead of the different cameras being drawn through the view ports.
如果将视图端口设置为可见，然后禁用此选项，则整个房间将被绘制到按窗口大小缩放的屏幕上，而不是通过视图端口绘制不同的相机。

If you imagine a circle around your instance, and then imagine a point anywhere on that circle, to move to that point we need to move the object so many pixels in that direction... so this function (when used with lengthdir_x()) gets the position of that point on the circle to be used in code by the instance.
如果你想象你的实例周围有一个圆，然后想象这个圆上的任意一个点，为了移动到那个点，我们需要在那个方向上移动对象这么多像素...因此，此函数(当与lengthdir_x()一起使用时)获得了该点在圆上的位置，供实例在代码中使用。

If you imagine a circle around your instance, and then imagine a point anywhere on that circle, to move to that point we need to move the object so many pixels in that direction... so this function (when used with lengthdir_y()) gets the position of that point on the circle to be used in code by the instance.
如果你想象你的实例周围有一个圆，然后想象这个圆上的任意一个点，为了移动到那个点，我们需要在那个方向上移动对象这么多像素...因此，此函数(当与lengthdir_y()一起使用时)获得了该点在圆上的位置，供实例在代码中使用。

If you know, or suspect, that a string may have other characters then you can use string_digits() to remove all non-numeric characters, before using this function to turn the resulting string into a real number.
如果您知道或怀疑一个字符串可能有其他字符，那么您可以使用string_digits()删除所有非数字字符，然后使用此函数将结果字符串转换为实数。
If you multiply a number with itself, you get the square of that number, but sometimes you want to do the reverse and get the square root of a number.
如果你把一个数和它本身相乘，你会得到这个数的平方，但是有时候你想反过来得到这个数的平方根。
If you need the data from the current pose, use skeleton_bone_state_get().
如果需要当前姿势的数据，请使用skeleton_bone_state_get()。
If you need the un-scaled height you should use sprite_get_height().
如果你需要未缩放的高度，你应该使用sprite_get_height()。
If you need the un-scaled width you should use sprite_get_width().
如果你需要未缩放的宽度，你应该使用sprite_get_width()。
If you need the un-scaled xoffset you should use sprite_get_xoffset().
如果你需要未缩放的xoffset，你应该使用sprite_get_xoffset()。
If you need the un-scaled yoffset you should use sprite_get_yoffset().
如果你需要未缩放的yoffset，你应该使用sprite_get_yoffset()。
If you need the unique index for the asset, then you can use the function asset_get_index() along with the returned name.
如果您需要资源的惟一索引，那么您可以使用函数asset_get_index()和返回的名称。
If you need to check a continuous press of the button you should be using the function gamepad_button_check().
如果你需要检查按钮的连续按下，你应该使用函数gamepad_button_check()。
If you need to get the data for a tile at a specific room position then you need to use the function tilemap_get_at_pixel().
如果需要获取特定房间位置的tilemap的数据，则需要使用函数tilemap_get_at_pixel()。
If you need to get the tile data from a specific tile cell you should be using the function tilemap_get() instead.
如果需要获取特定房间位置的tilemap的数据，则需要使用函数tilemap_get_at_pixel()。
If you need to get the unique instance id if the object being collided with you should use instance_position().
如果你需要得到唯一的实例id，如果物体被碰撞，你应该使用instance_position()。

If you need to know whether a given sound index is for streamed audio or not you can use this function which will return 1 for streamed, 0 for sound in memory, and -1 if there is any error or the index does not point to a valid sound resource.
如果你需要知道一个给定的声音索引是否为流音频，你可以使用此函数，它将返回1为流音频，0为内存中的声音，和-1，如果有任何错误或索引没有指向有效的声音资源。
If you pass invalid grid coordinates to the function, then the value returned will be undefined and an error will be shown in the output window.
如果将无效的网格坐标传递给函数，则返回值将是未定义的，并且将在输出窗口中显示错误。
If you provide an incorrect listener index then the function will return -1.
如果您提供了不正确的侦听器索引，那么此函数将返回-1。
If you require messages to be displayed when not in debug mode, then you should be using show_debug_message().
如果您需要在不处于调试模式时显示消息，那么您应该使用show_debug_message()。
If you require more decimal places, then use the function string_format().
如果需要更多的小数位，那么使用函数string_format()。
If you select either automatic (0) or full image (1) as the bounding box mode then the individual bounding box values can be set to 0.
如果选择自动(0)或完整图像(1)作为边界框模式，则单个边界框值可以设置为0。
If you set a value greater than 360 this will be looped to bring it within the 0 - 359 range.
如果你设置的值大于360，这将循环使其在0 - 359范围内。
If you set a value outside of the range of sub-images, then the image index will loop around.
如果您设置的值超出了子图像的范围，那么图像索引将会循环。
If you set the gravity to 0, then no gravity will be applied to the instance (this is the default value).
如果将重力设置为0，则不会将重力应用到实例(这是默认值)。
If you set them to the same value the particles will all be created with the same orientation.
要使所有粒子具有相同的寿命，请将这两个值设置为相同。
If you set them to the same value the particles will only move in one direction.
如果将它们设置为相同的值，粒子将只向一个方向移动。
If you set this on an instance that was previously static (ie: it has a density of 0) it will become a kinematic object and begin rotating
如果你将此设置在一个以前是静态的实例上(例如:它的密度为0)，它将成为一个运动对象并开始旋转

If you set this value to 0, then there is no cap the particles created, and setting it to any other value will stop any further particles being created when the total number of particles is equal to the value.
如果将该值设定为0，则创建的粒子没有上限，如果将该值设定为任何其他值，当粒子总数等于该值时，将停止创建任何更多的粒子。

If you supply a value outside of this range, the animation will be looped to make up the difference, for example if the animation has 5 frames and you set the frame to 8, the actual frame shown will be 3.
如果您提供一个超出此范围的值，动画将循环播放以弥补差异，例如，如果动画有5帧，而您将帧设置为8，则显示的实际帧将为3。
If you supply a value outside of this range, the animation will be looped to make up the difference, for example if the given position is 1.5 the actual position will be 0.5.
如果您提供一个超出此范围的值，动画将会循环以弥补差异，例如，如果给定位置是1.5，则实际位置将是0.5。

If you supply an asset index value, then you will need to supply the optional asset type argument (a constant), as assets of different types can have the same index, even though they cannot have the same name.
如果您提供一个资源索引值，那么您将需要提供可选的资源类型参数(一个常量)，因为不同类型的资源可以具有相同的索引，即使它们不能具有相同的名称。
If you switch off automatic drawing then you need to handle this yourself, using the following code (for example):
如果您关闭了自动绘制，那么您需要自己使用以下代码来处理这个问题(例如):
If you switch this on then the z-buffer is tested to see whether an object will be "visible" and not drawn if it's not.
如果你打开这个开关，那么z-buffer就会被测试，看看一个对象是否"可见"，如果它不可见就不会被绘制。

If you think about any rotating object in the "real world", unless it has a motor or is in space, it slows down over time due to the influence of external forces (like friction with the air around it).
如果你想象一下"现实世界"中的任何旋转物体，除非它有发动机或在太空中，否则它会随着时间的推移，由于外力(如与周围空气的摩擦)的影响而减速。
If you try to open an ini without having previously closed another one (or the same one) you will get an error too.
如果你试图在没有关闭另一个ini的情况下打开它，你也会得到一个错误。

If you use this function to change the size of the game window, the contents of the window will be scaled to fit with a 1:1 ratio to the background canvas which will keep the image crisp and clear (although scaled if the window is other than the room or view size).
如果您通过此函数来更改游戏窗口的大小，窗口的内容将按1:1的比例缩放以适应背景画布，这将保持图像清晰明了(尽管如果窗口不是房间或视图大小，也会进行缩放)。
If you use this function with HTML5 or are getting an image from a URL, this function will also generate an Image Loaded asynchronous event.
如果你在HTML5中使用此函数或者从一个URL中获取一个图像，此函数也会产生一个图像加载异步事件。
If you want the group to loop then pass in true, otherwise pass in false, but note that if you want them to loop, all the tracks added later need to be the same length.
如果你想让这个组循环，那么传入true，否则传入false，但是注意，如果你想让它们循环，所有后来添加的轨道需要长度相同。
If you want to create a sophisticated mechanical contraption you might want to use gears.
如果你想创造一个复杂的机械装置，你可能想使用齿轮。
If you wish to apply an angular force to an instance using torque, then you should be using the function physics_apply_torque().
如果希望使用扭矩对实例施加角向力，则应使用函数physics_apply_torque()。
If you wish to change this value then you should use the function gc_target_frame_time().
如果希望更改此值，则应该使用函数gc_target_frame_time()。

If you wish to create an instance in the current room you should be using the function instance_create_layer(). Note that calling this function on a room asset created in the Asset Browser will permanently add the instance to the room, and even calling game_restart() will not return the room to it's original state (only ending the game and opening it again will start with the room in its original state again).
如果希望在当前房间中创建实例，应该使用函数instance_create_layer()。注意，对在资源浏览器中创建的房间资源调用此函数会将实例永久添加到房间中，即使调用game_restart()也不会将房间返回到其原始状态(只有结束游戏并再次打开它，房间才会再次以其原始状态开始)。

If you wish to ensure that the list is "truly" empty on create, then you should call ds_list_clear() after creating the list, which will then mean that any values returned for unpopulated list slots will be undefined, which you can then check consistently using the is_undefined() function.
如果您希望在创建时确保列表"真正"为空，那么您应该在创建列表后调用ds_list_clear()，这将意味着为未填充的列表槽返回的任何值都将是未定义的，然后您可以使用is_undefined()函数进行一致的检查。

If you wish to ensure that the list is "truly" empty on create, then you should call ds_list_clear() after creating the list, which will then mean that any values returned for unpopulated list slots will be undefined.
如果您希望在创建时确保列表"真正"为空，那么您应该在创建列表后调用ds_list_clear()，这将意味着为未填充的列表槽返回的任何值都将是未定义的。
If you wish to go back to the default behaviour (ie: no minimum), then use a value of -1.
如果您希望返回默认行为(即:没有最小值)，那么使用-1值。
If you wish to place a path point at some other position that is not the end, you should use path_insert_point().
如果您希望将路径点放置在非终点的其他位置，您应该使用path_insert_point()。
If you wish to simply change these values, you should be using the function motion_set().
如果您希望简单地更改这些值，您应该使用函数motion_set()。
If your defined vertex format takes a colour value you can use this function to add that data to the vertex being defined for the current primitive.
如果定义的顶点格式接受颜色值，则可以使用此函数将该数据添加到为当前图元定义的顶点。

If your game has different rooms or instances to control menus and game-play and other things, then it is probable that you will need to change the position and key maps of your virtual keys at some point.
如果你的游戏有不同的房间或实例来控制菜单、游戏和其他东西，那么你可能需要在某个时候改变虚拟键的位置和键映射。
Image Loaded event
图像加载事件
In GM all the trigonometric functions work in radians, but most people work in degrees and this means that to convert your degrees into radians you need to use this function.
在GM中，所有的三角函数都以弧度表示，但大多数人以度表示，这意味着要将你的度转换成弧度，你需要使用此函数。
In GameMaker there are two main ways that can be used to tell the speed at which your game runs.
在GameMaker中，有两种主要方法可以用来判断游戏的运行速度。
In a right angled triangle cos(val) = Adjacent / Hypotenuse where val is one of the three angles.
在直角三角形中，cos(val) =邻边/斜边，其中val是三个角中的一个。
In a right angled triangle dsin(val) = Opposite / Hypotenuse where "val" is one of the three angles.
在直角三角形中，dsin(val) =对边/斜边，其中"val"是三个角中的一个。
In a right angled triangle dtan(val) = Opposite / Adjacent where "val" is one of the three angles.
在直角三角形中，dtan(val) =相对/相邻，其中"val"是三个角中的一个。
In a right angled triangle sin(val) = Opposite / Hypotenuse where val is one of the three angles.
在直角三角形中，sin(val) =对边/斜边，其中val是三个角中的一个。
In a right angled triangle tan(val) = Opposite / Adjacent where val is one of the three angles.
在直角三角形中，tan(val) =对边/邻边，其中val是三个角中的一个。

In computing, a post request is used when the client needs to send data to the server as part of the retrieval request, such as when uploading a file or submitting a completed form, and the same is true of this function in GameMaker.
在计算中，当客户端需要向服务器发送数据作为检索请求的一部分时，例如上传文件或提交完成的表单时，就会使用post请求，GameMaker中的此函数也是如此。

In contrast to the http_get() request method where only a URL is sent to the server, http_post_string() also includes a string that is sent to the server and may result in the creation of a new resource or the update of an existing resource or both.
与http_get()请求方法相比，http_post_string()还包括一个发送到服务器的字符串，可能会导致创建新资源或更新现有资源，或两者都有。
In cryptography, MD5 (Message-Digest algorithm 5) is a widely used cryptographic hash function with a 128-bit hash value and has been employed in a wide variety of security applications.
在密码学中，MD5(消息摘要算法5)是一种广泛使用的加密哈希函数，其哈希值为128位，已被广泛应用于各种安全应用程序中。
In cryptography, MD5 (Message-Digest algorithm 5) is a widely used cryptographic hashing function with a 128-bit hash value and has been employed in a wide variety of security applications.
在密码学中，MD5(消息摘要算法5)是一种广泛使用的具有128位散列值的加密散列函数，并且已经被广泛应用于各种安全应用中。

In cryptography, SHA-1 is a cryptographic hash function designed by the United States National Security Agency and is employed in several widely used applications and protocols like the popular Git where it is used to check for file changes.
在密码学中，SHA-1是由美国国家安全局设计的一种加密散列函数，并在几种广泛使用的应用程序和协议中使用，如流行的Git，它用于检查文件更改。

In cryptography, SHA-1 is a cryptographic hash function designed by the United States National Security Agency and is employed in several widely used applications popular Git where it is used to check for file changes, and the protocols TLS and SSL, PGP, SSH, S/MIME, and IPsec.
