值得注意的是，此函数返回的最终数据大小还包括GameMaker头信息，这是额外的12个字节。
It is worth noting that the function will also take two reserved strings to help perform debugging using external applications like Visual Studio.
值得注意的是，此函数还将使用两个保留字符串来帮助使用外部应用程序(如Visual Studio)执行调试。
It is worth noting that the garbage collector does not need to be active for this to work.
值得注意的是，垃圾收集器不需要处于活动状态就可以工作。

It is worth noting that you can bind built-in functions as well as user defined functions, and you can also supply undefined as the instance/struct argument meaning that the current self scope will be used for the binding.
值得注意的是，可以绑定内置函数和用户定义函数，还可以提供undefined作为实例/结构参数，这意味着将使用当前的自作用域进行绑定。
It is worth noting that you cannot place tiles at negative positions within the tile map, so all tiles must be placed within the cell spaces 0 to width - 1, 0 to height - 1.
值得注意的是，您不能将单幅图块放置在图块集中的负位置，因此所有单幅图块必须放置在0到宽度- 1、0到高度- 1的单元空间内。
It only returns a string with the full name and path of the file.
它只返回一个带有文件全名和路径的字符串。
It pauses the simulation if the flag is set to true and no further physics calculations will be done until the flag is set to false again.
如果标志设置为真，它将暂停模拟，并且不会进行进一步的物理计算，直到标志再次设置为假。

It requires the unique "id" of the bound fixture (as returned by the function physics_fixture_bind() and it will remove all the currently defined physics properties for the instance, permitting you to redefine a new fixture and bind that to the instance.
它需要绑定的夹具的唯一"id"(由函数physics_fixture_bind()返回)，它将删除实例当前定义的所有物理属性，允许您重新定义一个新夹具并将其绑定到实例。
It returns -1 if there are no further notifications queued, or a real value otherwise representing the ID for the notification.
如果没有其他排队的通知，则返回-1，否则返回一个表示通知ID的实值。
It returns -1 if there are no notifications queued, or a real value otherwise representing the ID for the notification.
如果没有排队的通知，它将返回-1，否则将返回一个表示通知ID的实值。
It returns an index that should be stored in a variable for use in all the other MP grid function calls.
它返回一个索引，该索引应该存储在一个变量中，供所有其他MP网格函数调用使用。
It returns the new format "handle" (index) which must be used in all further vertex functions that refer to this new format.
它返回新的格式"handle"(index)，该格式必须在引用该新格式的所有其他顶点函数中使用。
It returns true if it is, otherwise it returns false.
如果是则返回true，否则返回false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is a 3 value vector or not.
它根据值是否为3值向量返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is a 4 value vector or not.
它根据值是否为4值向量返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is a matrix or not.
它根据值是否为矩阵返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is a pointer or not.
它根据值是否是指针返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is an int 32 or not.
它根据值是否是int类型32返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is an int64 or not.
它根据值是否为int64返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on whether the value is defined or not.
它根据是否定义值返回true或false。
It returns true or false depending on which one of the two buttons the user presses.
它根据用户按下的两个按钮中的哪个返回true或false。
It should also be noted that other factors like gravity and collisions can also affect the torque of an instance.
还应该注意的是，重力和碰撞等其他因素也会影响实例的扭矩。
It should be larger than 1.
它应该大于1。
It should be noted that HTTP request parameters (the bits sometimes "tacked on" to the end of a URL when you submit a form on a web page) are perfectly acceptable when using this function too.
需要注意的是，在使用此函数时，HTTP请求参数(当您在网页上提交表单时，有时会"附加"到URL末尾的位)也是完全可以接受的。

It should be noted that forces are not applied to the center of mass of the object, but rather at a point in the room and they will change the direction and speed as well as the torque (spin) dependant on any other forces that are working on the object (like gravity).
应该注意的是，力不是施加到物体的质心，而是施加到房间中的一点，并且它们将改变方向和速度以及扭矩(旋转),这取决于作用在物体上的任何其他力(如重力)。

It should be noted that if you call this to check the application_surface immediately after having changed its size using surface_resize() it will not return the new value as the change needs a step or two to be fully processed.
需要注意的是，如果您在使用surface_resize()更改了application_surface的大小之后立即调用此函数来检查application_surface，它将不会返回新值，因为更改需要一到两步才能完全处理。
It should be noted that this function only works properly when used on the Windows target.
应该注意的是，此函数只有在Windows目标上使用时才能正常工作。

It should be noted that this function will only delete those files that GameMaker is able to create and parse: ini files, text files and binary files, or those files made to store game created resources like sprites or surfaces.
需要注意的是，此函数只会删除那些GameMaker能够创建和解析的文件:ini文件、文本文件和二进制文件，或者那些用来存储游戏创建的资源(如精灵或表面)的文件。
It should be noted that this function will work for on the HTML5 platform, retrieving the url parameters.
需要注意的是，此函数将在HTML5平台上工作，检索url参数。
It should be noted that this will free up the stream but on the target platform this may not show up in a memory manager.
应该注意的是，这将释放流，但在目标平台上，这可能不会显示在内存管理器中。

It should be noted that with this function, forces are not applied to the center of mass of the object, but rather at a point relative to the instance and they will not be instantly applied as they are dependent on any other forces that are working on the object (like gravity).
应该注意的是，通过此函数，力不会施加到对象的质心，而是相对于实例的一个点，并且它们不会立即施加，因为它们取决于作用在对象上的任何其他力(如重力)。
It should be of the "grow" type, with the size being approximately that of the expected return data.
它应该是"grow"类型的，大小与预期返回数据的大小大致相同。
It takes the group index as returned when the group was created using the function audio_create_sync_group(), and frees all resources used by the group.
它接受使用函数audio_create_sync_group()创建组时返回的组索引，并释放组使用的所有资源。
It takes the half width and height as the physics world uses this value far more than whole width/height values to determine things like collisions.
它采用半宽和半高，因为物理世界使用这个值远多于整个宽度/高度值来确定碰撞之类的事情。
It uses a "sprite strip", where each sub-image is be an individual symbol or letter, and the images are mapped to letters based on the argument "string_map" of the function.
它使用一个"精灵条"，其中每个子图像是一个单独的符号或字母，根据函数的参数"string_map"将图像映射到字母。
It uses the indicated step size while trying to avoid collision with either all instances or only those flagged as solid.
它使用指示的步长，同时试图避免与所有实例或仅标记为实体的实例发生碰撞。
It uses the indicated step size while trying to avoid collision with instances of the object specified by the "obj" argument.
它使用指示的步长，同时试图避免与由"obj"参数指定的对象的实例碰撞。
It uses the indicated step size, the same as in the function mp_linear_step().
它使用指定的步长，与函数mp_linear_step()中的步长相同。
It will be snapped to the nearest corresponding position on the "invisible" grid that the hsnap and vsnap values define.
它将被捕捉到由hsnap和vsnap值定义的"不可见"网格上最近的相应位置。
It will check to see if the user is already logged into Google services, in which case it will return true, or not, returning false.
它将检查用户是否已经登录到谷歌服务，在这种情况下，它将返回true，或不返回false。
It will not dequeue the value, meaning that it can still be read in the future by this function or the ds_queue_dequeue().
它不会将该值出队，这意味着它仍然可以在将来被此函数或ds_queue_dequeue()读取。
It will not pop the value, meaning that it can still be read in the future by this function or the ds_stack_pop().
它不会弹出该值，这意味着它仍然可以在将来被此函数或ds_stack_pop()读取。
It will only work for those games running through a browser (ie: HTML5), and for all other platforms it will return true.
它只适用于那些通过浏览器运行的游戏(即HTML5)，对于所有其他平台，它将返回true。
It will return a new buffer's ID which is created by the function as a "grow" buffer (see here) with a byte alignment of 1.
它将返回一个新的缓冲区ID，该ID由函数创建为一个字节对齐为1的"增长"缓冲区(参见此处)。
It will return only the decimals behind the dot of a value, so frac(3.125) will return 0.125, frac(6.921) will return 0.921, etc...
它将只返回一个值的点后面的小数，所以frac(3.125)将返回0.125,frac(6.921)将返回0.921，等等……
It will then use the 0,0 defining point of the physics world to calculate the direction and strength of gravity based on the vector calculated from the xg and yg inputs.
然后，它将使用物理世界的0，0定义点，根据从xg和yg输入计算的向量来计算重力的方向和强度。
It will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs.
它将触发一个回调社交异步事件，其中包含用相关键/值对填充的async_load映射。
It works in exactly the same way as point_distance() but with the addition of factoring in the z value (depth) for use in 3D space.
它的工作方式与point_distance()完全相同，但添加了在3D空间中使用的z值(深度)。

It works simply by subtracting an amount from the speed every step until the object has a speed of 0, so if the friction is set to, for example, 0.1 and the speed of the instance is 1 (1 pixel per step), it will slow down and stop after 10 steps have passed.
它的工作原理很简单，就是每一步从速度中减去一个量，直到物体的速度为0，所以如果将摩擦设置为0.1，实例的速度为1(每一步1像素)，它将在经过10步后减速并停止。

It's important to note that when you switch off automatic drawing and draw the application surface yourself, that you may see certain issues with the alpha component of sprites and the surface itself.
需要注意的是，当您关闭自动绘制并自己绘制应用程序表面时，您可能会发现精灵的alpha组件和表面本身存在某些问题。

It's in these cases that you can switch on backface culling, as this saves about half the amount of drawing time, although it means you have the task of defining your polygons in the correct way to prevent issues.
在这些情况下，你可以打开背面剔除，因为这节省了大约一半的绘制时间，尽管这意味着你有任务定义你的多边形以正确的方式防止问题。
JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) is a lightweight data-interchange format which is easy for to read and write, for both people and machines.
JSON (JavaScript对象表示法)是一种轻量级的数据交换格式，对人和机器来说都易于读写。
Just as it says, round() takes a real number and rounds it up or down to the nearest integer.
正如其所言，round()取一个实数，向上或向下舍入到最接近的整数。
Keep in mind that for legacy support strings are indexed from 1, so 1 is the first position in the string, not 0 as you may expect.
请记住，对于传统支持，字符串是从1开始索引的，因此1是字符串中的第一个位置，而不是您所期望的0。

Keep in mind that the instance sprite can have a blend colour and alpha setting (image_blend and image_alpha), as can the attachment (see the function skeleton_attachment_create_colour()), and so the final colour and alpha that the assigned attachment sprite for the slot will have will be a composite of all these values.
请记住，实例精灵可以有一个混合颜色和alpha设置(image_blend和image_alpha)，附件也可以(参见函数rectangon_attachment_create_color())，因此分配给插槽的附件精灵的最终颜色和alpha将是所有这些值的组合。
Keep in mind when calculating the position to insert into that strings are indexed from 1, so the first character in a string is 1 and not 0 as you may expect.
请记住，在计算要插入的位置时，字符串的索引是从1开始的，所以字符串中的第一个字符是1，而不是您所期望的0。
Keyboard/Keyboard Pressed/Keyboard Released
键盘/键盘按下/键盘释放
Keys can be integers or strings, and if the given key does not exist then it will be created for you and set to the value.

Like a revolute joint, the prismatic joint only has one degree of freedom, but with this joint it is directional relative to an axis rather than rotational and actually prevents any form of rotation.
像转动关节一样，移动关节只有一个自由度，但这个关节相对于轴是有方向的，而不是旋转的，实际上阻止了任何形式的旋转。
Like in the function mp_potential_step() it uses potential field steps to accomplish this and the manner in which it does this can be modified through the function mp_potential_settings().
与函数mp_potential_step()类似，它使用势场步长来完成此操作，其操作方式可通过函数mp_potential_settings()进行修改。
