No updating means that particles created in this system will no longer change position, colour or any other parameter and that emitters will cease to work too, "freezing" the system at the exact point in which the automatic update was set to false.
无更新意味着在此系统中创建的粒子将不再改变位置、颜色或任何其他参数，并且发射器也将停止工作，将系统"冻结"在自动更新设置为 false 的确切点。
Normal blending (the default blend mode).
正常混合(默认混合模式)。

Normally all surfaces have depth buffers so if you draw 3D objects to them then it'll sort them properly by depth in order to maintain functional parity between rendering to surfaces and rendering to the back buffer, however allocating depth buffers essentially doubles the amount of memory required for surfaces, which could be an excessive and unnecessary overhead especially if your game is very memory intensive, and for 2D games they aren't generally required.
通常情况下，所有的表面都有深度缓冲区，所以如果你绘制3D对象到它们，那么它将根据深度对它们进行适当的排序，以保持表面渲染和反向缓冲区渲染之间的功能一致性，然而分配深度缓冲区实际上会使表面所需的内存数量增加一倍，这可能是一种过度和不必要的开销，特别是如果你的游戏是非常内存密集型的，而对于2D游戏来说，它们通常不需要。

Normally all surfaces have depth buffers so if you draw 3D objects to them then it'll sort them properly by depth, however allocating depth buffers essentially doubles the size of surfaces, which could be an excessive and unnecessary overhead especially if your game is very memory intensive or predominantly 2D.
通常情况下，所有的表面都有深度缓冲，所以如果你绘制3D对象，那么它就会根据深度对它们进行适当的排序，然而分配深度缓冲实际上会使表面的大小增加一倍，这可能是一种过度和不必要的开销，特别是当你的游戏是非常内存密集或主要是2D的时候。
Normally both sides are drawn, but if you make a closed shape (like a pyramid) then this is a waste of processing power because the back side of the triangle can never be seen.
通常情况下两边都是画出来的，但如果你制作的是一个封闭的形状(如金字塔)，那么这就是一种处理能力的浪费，因为三角形的背面永远看不到。
Normally for a physics simulation to work, it must be continuous and cannot be stopped and started, or have instances suddenly moved from one place to another in the room.
通常情况下，物理模拟必须是连续的，不能停止和启动，也不能让实例突然从房间的一个地方移动到另一个地方。

Normally texture widths and heights lie in the range 0 - 1, but if you specify a value larger than 1 by default the rest is not drawn (the entire texture will be drawn with an "empty" section corresponding to the percentage over 1 that is used.
通常纹理的宽度和高度在0 - 1的范围内，但是如果你指定了一个大于1的缺省值，其余的部分就不会被绘制(整个纹理将被绘制成一个"空的"部分，对应于所使用的大于1的百分比。
Normally the mass, center of mass, and inertia for an instance is calculated using a combination the surface area of the bound fixtures and their density.
通常情况下，实例的质量、质心和惯性是通过结合使用绑定夹具的表面积及其密度来计算的。
Normally this will happen automatically when one of the two instances is destroyed, or when the room ends, but there are times when you may wish to do this manually.
通常情况下，当两个实例中的一个被破坏时，或者当房间结束时，这将自动发生，但有时您可能希望手动执行此操作。
Normally you will use a damping value between 0 and 1, but you can use any non-negative value if required.
通常情况下，您将使用0到1之间的阻尼值，但如果需要，您也可以使用任何非负值。
Normally you would assign these attachments in your animation program (Spine), but with this function you can create your own at run-time using a sprite asset from your game.
通常，您可以在动画程序(Spine)中指定这些附件，但是通过此函数，您可以在运行时使用游戏中的精灵资源创建自己的附件。
Normally you would assign these attachments in your animation program (Spine), but with this function you can create/replace your own at run-time using a sprite asset from your game.
通常情况下，您可以在动画程序(Spine)中指定这些附件，但是通过此函数，您可以在运行时使用游戏中的精灵资源创建/替换您自己的附件。
Normally you would set this when you start the path using path_start() but you may wish to change this behaviour depending on any number of events in your game.
通常你会在使用path_start()启动路径时设置这个，但是你可能希望根据游戏中的事件数量来改变这个行为。
Normally you would use the function part_system_create_layer() instead of this one.
通常您会使用函数part_system_create_layer()而不是此函数。
Normally, in each step the position in the time line is increased by 1, however you can change this amount by setting this variable to a different value.
通常情况下，在每一步中，时间线中的位置增加1，但是您可以通过将该变量设置为不同的值来更改此量。

Normally, when an instance has a parent object, it automatically inherits all the same events as the parent, but if (for example) your parent object has a create event and you add one to your child object, all instances of the child object will run the new create event that you have added and not that which is in the parent object.
通常，当一个实例有一个父对象时，它会自动继承所有与父对象相同的事件，但是如果(例如)你的父对象有一个create事件，而你将一个create事件添加到子对象中，那么子对象的所有实例都会运行你添加的新create事件，而不是父对象中的那个事件。
Not only can you apply force and gravity to an object with the physics in GameMaker but you can also apply an impulse.
你不仅可以用GameMaker中的物理原理对物体施加力和重力，还可以施加脉冲。
Not used currently.
目前未使用。
Note that AA is enabled by default, but you can change the AA state for added fonts using the function font_add_enable_aa(), as long as it is called before adding the font.
注意，AA在默认情况下是启用的，但是您可以使用函数font_add_enable_aa()来更改已添加字体的AA状态，只要在添加字体之前调用此函数即可。
Note that GameMaker does not automatically append the .gif file extension, so you should include this as part of the filename string if you wish the saved file to be identified as a GIF.
注意，GameMaker不会自动添加.gif文件扩展名，因此如果您希望保存的文件被识别为gif文件，您应该将它作为文件名字符串的一部分。
Note that activation is not instantaneous, and an instance that has been activated in this way will not be considered to be active until the end of the event in which the function was called.
注意，激活不是瞬时的，以这种方式激活的实例在调用函数的事件结束之前不会被认为是活动的。

Note that after you no longer need the sound you should call the function audio_destroy_stream() with the sound index to remove it from memory otherwise you may get a memory leak which will slow down and eventually crash your game.
注意，当你不再需要声音时，你应该调用函数audio_destroy_stream()和声音索引将其从内存中删除，否则你可能会出现内存泄漏，从而减慢速度并最终崩溃你的游戏。
Note that angles are returned in degrees, and 0º is to the right, 90º is up, 180º is to the left and 270º is down.
注意，角度是以度为单位返回的，0º为右，90º为上，180º为左，270º为下。
Note that any audio currently being played when this function is called will be stopped.
注意，调用此函数时，当前正在播放的任何音频都将被停止。
Note that any white space placed at the start of the string will be stripped out before being parsed for drawing because of this.
注意，由于这个原因，在解析绘图之前，放在字符串开头的任何空白都将被删除。
Note that as the value to be written can be a real number, all decimals will be written with a "." point as separator.
注意，由于要写入的值可以是实数，因此所有小数都将使用"。"作为分隔符。
Note that attached sprites are referenced through their name string as assigned in Spine, or when you called skeleton_attachment_create().
注意，附加的子画面是通过在Spine中指定的名称字符串引用的，或者是在调用skeleton_attachment_create()时引用的。
Note that before you can delete the buffer itself, you must first free all sound ID's associated with it.
注意，在删除缓冲区本身之前，必须首先释放与它相关的所有声音ID。
Note that by default the function is synchronous, meaning that your game may appear to "hang" as the connection is made.
注意，默认情况下，此函数是同步的，这意味着您的游戏可能会出现"挂起"的连接。

Note that calling this function on a room asset created in the Asset Browser will permanently clear the room of instances, and even calling game_restart() will not return the room to it's original state (only ending the game and opening it again will start with the room in its original state again).
注意，在资源浏览器中创建的房间资源上调用此函数将永久清除房间的实例，即使调用game_restart()也不会将房间返回到其原始状态(只有结束游戏并再次打开它，房间才会再次以其原始状态开始)。

Note that clearing a list will de-reference any data structures stored in it giving a memory leak, so you would need to go through the list and destroy all data structure items manually before clearing it to prevent this.
注意，清除列表将会取消对存储在列表中的任何数据结构的引用，从而导致内存泄漏，因此您需要检查列表，并在清除列表之前手动销毁所有数据结构项，以防止这种情况。

Note that clearing a map will de-reference any data structures stored in the map giving a memory leak, so you would need to go through it and destroy all data structure items manually before clearing the map to prevent this.
注意，清除map将去引用存储在映射中的任何数据结构，从而导致内存泄漏，因此在清除映射之前，您需要遍历它并手动销毁所有数据结构项，以防止这种情况发生。
Note that deactivation is not instantaneous, and an instance that has been deactivated in this way will not be considered to be inactive until the end of the event in which the function was called.
注意，停用不是即时的，以这种方式停用的实例，直到调用此函数的事件结束前，不会被视为非活动的，。

Note that depth is defined as being higher the "further away" from the camera and lower the "closer" to the camera, so if you have three layers with depths -100, 0, 100, the layers will draw in the order 100, 0, -100, so that the "top" layer (ie, the closest to the camera view and so drawn over everything else) will be the layer with the -100 depth.
注意，深度被定义为越"远离"相机越高，越"接近"相机越低，所以如果你有三个深度为- 100,0,100的图层，这些图层将按照100,0，-100的顺序绘制，因此"顶部"图层(即，最靠近相机视图的图层，因此被绘制在其他所有图层之上)将是深度为-100的图层。

Note that destroying a list will de-reference any data structures stored in it giving a memory leak, so you would need to go through the list and destroy all data structure items manually before destroying it to prevent this.
注意，销毁列表将取消对存储在列表中的任何数据结构的引用，从而导致内存泄漏，因此您需要检查列表，并在销毁列表之前手动销毁所有数据结构项，以防止这种情况。

Note that destroying a map will de-reference any data structures stored in the map giving a memory leak, so you would need to go through the map and destroy all data structure items manually before destroying it to prevent this.
注意，销毁map将撤销对存储在map中的任何数据结构的引用，从而导致内存泄漏，因此在销毁map之前，您需要遍历map并手动销毁所有数据结构项，以防止发生这种情况。

Note that directions in GameMaker are usually calculated as 0° being right, 90° being up, 180° being left and 270° being down, and that the gravity and gravity_direction variables can modify the direction value when they are used in your games.
注意，GameMaker中的方向通常计算为0°为右，90°为上，180°为左，270°为下，重力和gravity_direction变量可以在游戏中使用时修改方向值。
Note that directions in GameMaker are usually calculated as 0° being right, 90° being up, 180° being left and 270° being down.
注意，GameMaker中的方向通常以0°为右，90°为上，180°为左，270°为下来计算。
Note that each room is permanently added to the game until the executable is closed, ie: rooms added through code cannot be deleted again.
注意，每个房间都是永久添加到游戏中，直到可执行程序关闭，即:通过代码添加的房间不能再次删除。

Note that even if you have a view port set to visible, if view ports are not enabled (using the built-in variable view_enabled or enabling them in the Room Editor) then they will not be drawn to the screen.
注意，即使您将视口设置为可见，如果视口未启用(使用内置变量view_enabled或在房间编辑器中启用它们)，则它们不会被绘制到屏幕上。
Note that floats can also be used but the upper value after the point will be excluded, so irandom(9.7) will return a value from 0 to 9 only.
注意，也可以使用浮点数，但是点后面的上限值将被排除，所以irandom(9.7)将只返回一个从0到9的值。
Note that gravity is a cumulative force and will accelerate the object if you choose not to cap the final speed, and it's usual that you'd set this variable to small decimal values like 0.01.
注意，重力是一个累积力，如果你选择不限制最终速度，它会加速物体，通常你会将这个变量设置为小数，如0.01。
Note that if either of the objects have no sprite or no mask defined, the results will be incorrect.
注意，如果任何一个对象没有定义精灵或遮罩，结果将是不正确的。

Note that if one of the texture pages is used elsewhere in the room (by another instance sprite or a background, etc...) you may get a minor performance hit as the page is immediately reloaded back into memory again, so care should be taken when using this function.
注意，如果一个纹理页面在房间的其他地方被使用(通过另一个实例精灵或背景，等等...)您可能会受到轻微的性能影响，因为页面会立即重新加载到内存中，所以使用此函数时应该小心。
Note that if only one of the two colliding particles is a colour-mixing one, the other particle retains its pre-collision colour.
注意，如果两个碰撞粒子中只有一个是混色粒子，则另一个粒子会保留其碰撞前的颜色。
Note that if the DS map being loaded was saved with an array as one of the key values, this array will have been converted into a DS list on load.
注意，如果正在加载的DS map保存时使用数组作为键值之一，则该数组将在加载时转换为DS列表。
Note that if the DS map being saved contains an array, this array will be converted into a DS list instead when saved.
注意，如果保存的DS map包含一个数组，则该数组在保存时将转换为DS列表。
Note that if the DS map being saved contains an array, this will be converted into a DS list instead when saved.
注意，如果保存的DS map包含一个数组，那么在保存时它将转换为DS列表。
Note that if the array index given is out of bounds then the game will crash with an error.
注意，如果给定的数组索引超出边界，那么游戏将崩溃并报错。
Note that if the calling object have no sprite or no mask defined, the results will be incorrect.
注意，如果调用对象没有定义sprite或mask，结果将是不正确的。
Note that if the curve or channel does not exist then you will get an error.
注意，如果曲线或通道不存在，那么您将得到一个错误。

Note that if the entry being set is outside the bounds of the list (ie, you set list entry 20 but the current list only contains 10 entries) then the list will be filled to the given position and each entry will be set to 0.
注意，如果设置的条目在列表的边界之外(即，您设置了列表条目20，但是当前列表只包含10个条目)，那么列表将被填充到给定的位置，并且每个条目将被设置为0。
Note that if the file can't be created (because of an illegal filename, for example) the function will return -1.
注意，如果不能创建文件(例如，因为文件名非法)，函数将返回-1。
Note that if the index you search for has not been initialised previously, this function will cause an error as it is searching for non-existent asset indices.
注意，如果您搜索的索引之前没有初始化，此函数将导致一个错误，因为它正在搜索不存在的资源索引。
Note that if the index you search for has not been initialised previously, this function will cause an error as it is searching for non-existent indices.
注意，如果您搜索的索引之前没有初始化，此函数将导致错误，因为它正在搜索不存在的索引。

Note that if the layer the background element has been assigned to is not visible - or the element itself has been made invisible - you will not see any difference with this function until the layer or element has been made visible again.
注意，如果背景元素分配到的图层不可见，或者元素本身不可见，则在图层或元素再次可见之前，您将看不到此函数的任何区别。

Note that if the layer the sprite element has been assigned to is not visible - or the element itself has been made invisible - you will not see any difference with this function until the layer or element has been made visible again.
注意，如果精灵元素被分配到的图层不可见——或者元素本身不可见——在该图层或元素再次可见之前，你不会看到此函数的任何区别。
Note that if the number of vertices does not match those being copied you may get corrupted vertex data.
注意，如果顶点数与正在复制的顶点数不匹配，则可能会获得损坏的顶点数据。
Note that if the sprite has sub-images then it will animate too (this can be controlled using the layer_sprite_index() and layer_sprite_speed() functions).
注意，如果精灵有子图像，那么它也会有动画效果(这可以使用layer_sprite_index()和layer_sprite_speed()函数来控制)。
Note that if the sprites are different sizes, then the appended sprites are stretched to fit the image size for "ind1".
注意，如果子画面大小不同，则附加的子画面会被拉伸以适合"ind1"的图像大小。

Note that if the texture page is used elsewhere in the room (by another instance sprite or a background, etc...) you may get a minor performance hit as the page is immediately reloaded, so care should be taken when using this function.
注意，如果纹理页面在房间的其他地方使用(由另一个实例精灵或背景等...)当页面立即重新加载时，您可能会受到轻微的性能影响，因此在使用此函数时应该小心。
Note that if the value is outside of the tile map area, and no cell is available, it will return -1.
注意，如果值在tile map区域之外，并且没有可用的单元格，它将返回-1。
Note that if the variable being checked is an uninitialised variable (that a particle emitterwould otherwise have its index assigned to) this will throw an error.
注意，如果被检查的变量是一个未初始化的变量(否则粒子发射器会将其索引分配给该变量)，这将引发一个错误。
Note that if the variable being checked is an uninitialised variable (that a particle system would otherwise have its index assigned to) this will throw an error.
注意，如果被检查的变量是一个未初始化的变量(粒子系统会将其索引赋值给该变量)，这将抛出一个错误。
Note that if the variable being checked is an uninitialised variable (that a particle type would otherwise have its index assigned to) this will throw an error.
注意，如果被检查的变量是一个未初始化的变量(一个粒子类型将被赋予它的索引)，这将抛出一个错误。
Note that if there are more than one entries in the list with the same value, the position of any one of them may be returned, and that if the value does not exist, then -1 will be returned.
注意，如果列表中有多个条目具有相同的值，则可以返回其中任何一个条目的位置，如果该值不存在，则将返回-1。
Note that if you check for the existence of a path through a variable that has yet to have been declared, this will throw an error.
注意，如果您通过尚未声明的变量检查路径是否存在，这将引发错误。

Note that if you choose an object ID and there is more than one instance of that object in the room, there is no way for GameMaker to know which instance you wish to follow and so it could be any of them.
注意，如果您选择了一个对象ID，并且房间中有该对象的多个实例，GameMaker将无法知道您希望跟随哪个实例，因此它可能是其中的任何一个。

Note that if you do not supply a full path to the ZIP directory then the current drive root will be used, and if you want to place it in a relative path to the game bundle working directory then you should use the working_directory variable as part of the path (relative paths using "." or ".." will not work as expected so should be avoided).
注意，如果您没有提供ZIP目录的完整路径，那么将使用当前的驱动器根目录，如果您想要将它放在游戏捆绑包工作目录的相对路径中，那么您应该使用working_directory变量作为路径的一部分(相对路径使用"."还是".."不会按预期工作，因此应该避免)。
Note that if you give a position that is outside of the given list size (ie: position 11 in a 10 value list) then the function may return undefined or 0.
注意，如果您给出的位置超出了给定的列表大小(即:10值列表中的位置11)，那么函数可能会返回undefined或0。
Note that if you give the name of a layer that does not exist in the current room, then you will get an error and the project will crash.
注意，如果您给出的层名在当前房间中不存在，那么您将得到一个错误，项目将崩溃。

Note that if you have deactivated a layer that has instances of objects flagged as Persistent, then you will need to reactivate the layer again with the function instance_activate_layer() before changing room, otherwise any persistent instances on the layer will not be carried over and will be discarded.
注意，如果你停用了一个带有标记为Persistent的对象实例的层，那么在更改房间之前，你将需要使用instance_activate_layer()函数重新激活该层，否则该层上的任何持久实例将不会被保留并被丢弃。

Note that if you have deactivated a layer that has persistent instances, you will need to reactivate the layer again with this function before changing room, otherwise any persistent instances will not be carried over and will be discarded.
注意，如果你停用了一个有持久实例的层，你需要在换房间之前用此函数重新激活该层，否则任何持久实例都不会被保留下来，而是会被丢弃。

Note that if you have deactivated an instance or object that has been flagged as Persistent, then you will need to reactivate it again with the function instance_activate_object() before changing room, otherwise it will not be carried over and will be discarded instead.
注意，如果您已经停用了一个标记为持久的实例或对象，那么您将需要在更换房间之前使用函数instance_activate_object()重新激活它，否则它将不会被保留，而是被丢弃。

Note that if you have deactivated an instance or object that has been flagged as Persistent, then you will need to reactivate it again with this function before changing room, otherwise it will not be carried over and will be discarded instead.
注意，如果您已经停用了标记为Persistent的实例或对象，那么在更改房间之前，您需要使用此函数再次激活它，否则它将不会被保留下来，而是会被丢弃。
Note that if you pass the function a struct literal (ie: a struct that was created without using a constructor function) then it will simply return the string "struct".
注意，如果你传递给函数一个结构字面值(即:一个没有使用构造函数创建的结构)，那么它将简单地返回字符串"struct"。
Note that if you supply a value that is not a weak reference, the function will return undefined.
注意，如果提供的值不是弱引用，则函数将返回未定义。
Note that if you supply an array where any of the values are not a weak references, the function will return undefined.
注意，如果您提供的数组中的任何值都不是弱引用，则函数将返回未定义。

Note that if you try and access a value in the list before it has been populated - i.e. the list is "empty" - then the return value may be 0 since internally the first few entries in the list are set when created to minimize performance issues when initially adding items to the list (although the ds_list_size() function will still return 0 on a newly created list).
注意，如果在填充列表之前尝试访问列表中的值(即列表为"空")，则返回值可能为0，因为在内部，列表中的前几个条目是在创建时设置的，以最小化最初向列表添加项目时的性能问题(尽管在新创建的列表中，ds_list_size()函数仍将返回0)。
Note that if you try to use this format again after calling this function, you will get an error.
注意，如果您在调用此函数后再次尝试使用此格式，将会出现错误。
Note that it will be considered triggered for the duration of the step, and for all instances that have any mouse events or that use this same function.
注意，它将被认为在步骤持续期间被触发，并且对于所有具有任何鼠标事件或使用此相同函数的实例都被触发。
Note that it will restore the version of the game that was used to create the save, so any updates made after it will not be visible.
注意，它将恢复用于创建保存的游戏版本，因此在它之后所做的任何更新都将不可见。
Note that mb_right will only be detected if a double tap touch is detected and held on the second tap (this behavior can be disabled using the function device_mouse_dbclick_enable()).
注意，只有在检测到双击触摸并按住第二次点击时，才会检测到mb_right(可以使用函数device_mouse_dbclick_enable()禁用此行为)。

Note that mb_right will only have been detected if a double tap touch is detected and held on the second tap before release (this behavior can be disabled using the function device_mouse_dbclick_enable()).
注意，只有在检测到双击触摸并在释放前第二次点击时按住时才会检测到mb_right(可以使用函数device_mouse_dbclick_enable()禁用此行为)。
Note that negative values are valid, and will "flip" the element around the (0,0) position, so an x scale of -1 would show the image reversed.
注意，负值是有效的，并将围绕(0,0)位置"翻转"元素，因此x比例为-1将显示图像反转。
Note that no matter how far paired particles get from each another, the connection between them will not snap.
注意，无论成对粒子彼此相距多远，它们之间的连接都不会突然断开。
Note that on all other platforms other than HTML5, the function will always return true..
注意，在除HTML5之外的所有其他平台上，此函数将始终返回true..
Note that on both macOS and Ubuntu (Linux) the "HOME" environment variable will return the "~/" path which maps to "/Users/<username>" on macOS and "/home/<username>" on Ubuntu (Linux).
注意，在macOS和Ubuntu (Linux)上，"HOME"环境变量将返回"~/"路径，该路径在macOS上映射到"/Users/<username >"，在Ubuntu (Linux)上映射到"/home/<username >"。
Note that on some platforms you can have a gain of greater than 1, although a value of 1 is considered "full volume" and anything greater may introduce audio clipping.
注意，在某些平台上，您可以获得大于1的增益，尽管值1被视为"最大音量"，任何更大的值都可能引入音频削波。注意，在某些平台上，增益可能大于1，尽管1的值被认为是"完整音量"，任何大于1的值都可能导致音频削波。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the height of the browser window, rather than the physical display size.
注意，在HTML5目标上，这个值是浏览器窗口的高度，而不是物理显示大小。
Note that on the HTML5 target, this value is the width of the browser window, rather than the physical display size.
注意，在HTML5目标上，这个值是浏览器窗口的宽度，而不是物理显示大小。
Note that reading will always start at the beginning of the buffer plus the offset value and not at the current seek position plus the offset value.
注意，读取总是从缓冲区的开头加上偏移值开始，而不是从当前寻道位置加上偏移值开始。
Note that sequences created using the function sequence_create() will not have a name and this will simply be an empty string "".
注意，使用sequence_create()函数创建的序列没有名称，而只是一个空字符串""。

Note that setting the speed and/or the direction, will also modify the values of the hspeed and vspeed variables, and that gravity, gravity_direction and friction can all modify the value of this variable when they are used in your games.
注意，设置速度和/或方向也会修改hspeed和vspeed变量的值，并且重力、重力方向和摩擦力在游戏中使用时都会修改该变量的值。
Note that since there are no restrictions on file names for HTML5, this string will probably be the same as that returned by game_display_name.
注意，由于HTML5对文件名没有限制，所以这个字符串可能与game_display_name返回的字符串相同。
Note that some languages also have a relevant Regional Code too, so to distinguish between different regions of the same country use the function os_get_region().
注意，有些语言也有相关的地区代码，因此要区分同一国家的不同地区，请使用函数os_get_region()。
Note that the "width" argument is based on a scale of 1, so if the scale is different, this value should be changed proportionally.
注意,"宽度"参数基于1的比例，因此如果比例不同，该值应该按比例更改。
Note that the DS map is not automatically cleared from memory and you should use the ds_map_destroy() function when you no longer need it.
注意DS映射不会自动从内存中清除，当您不再需要它时，应该使用ds_map_destroy()函数。

Note that the buffer must have been created using the function ds_map_secure_save_buffer() for this to work correctly, and also note that if the DS map being loaded contained an array, this will be converted into a DS list instead on load.
注意，缓冲区必须是使用ds_map_secure_save_buffer()函数创建的，这样才能正常工作，还要注意，如果正在加载的DS map包含一个数组，那么它将在加载时转换为DS列表。
Note that the description given here is for the default z-testing comparison mode, but that can be changed
注意，这里给出的描述是针对默认的z-测试比较模式，但可以更改
Note that the duration value is from 0 to 1, where a value of 0.5 would have a "half and half" interpolation from one set to the other.
注意，持续时间值是从0到1，其中值0.5表示从一个集合到另一个集合的"一半一半"插值。
Note that the final GIF data will have been palletized using the Universal 884 Palette (see here for more information).
注意，最终的GIF数据将使用通用884调色板(参见这里了解更多信息)进行托盘化。
Note that the fog start indicates the radius relative to the view camera where the fog starts, and the fog end indicates at which radius (also relative) instances will be completely invisible.
注意，雾开始指示相对于视图相机的雾开始的半径，雾结束指示在哪个半径(也是相对的)实例将完全不可见。
Note that the friction is usually set to a value between 0 and 1, but you can use any non-negative value if required.
注意，摩擦通常设置为0到1之间的值，但如果需要，也可以使用任何非负值。
Note that the function also accepts the special keyword all, in which case all instances found to be in collision will be listed.
注意，此函数还接受特殊关键字all，在这种情况下，将列出所有发现有碰撞的实例。
Note that the function can only be used to check local files, but not any files stored on a remote server.
注意，此函数只能用于检查本地文件，而不能检查存储在远程服务器上的任何文件。

Note that the function cannot require any additional arguments when using this function, and if you use it to modify a Timeline asset present in the Asset Browser, then all instances that use this timeline will be affected, and the change will last until the end of the game (calling game_restart() will not reset the change either).
注意，在使用此函数时，此函数不能要求任何附加参数，并且如果您使用它来修改资源浏览器中存在的时间轴资源，则使用该时间轴的所有实例都将受到影响，并且更改将持续到游戏结束(调用game_restart()也不会重置更改)。

Note that the function is not meant to be called in any draw events or step events, but rather only needs to be called at the start of the room in the Room Creation Code or in the Create Event / Room Start Event of an instance.
注意，此函数并不意味着在任何draw事件或step事件中调用，而是只需要在房间创建代码中的房间开始处或在实例的Create事件/ Room Start事件中调用。
Note that the function will load from a "default" folder, which does not need to be included as part of the file path you provide.
注意，此函数将从"默认"文件夹加载，该文件夹不需要包含在您提供的文件路径中。
Note that the function will modify the array supplied directly, but will also return a reference to it (or a reference to a new array if none is supplied).
注意，此函数将修改直接提供的数组，但也会返回对它的引用(如果没有提供数组，则返回对新数组的引用)。
Note that the function will return -1 if flush is not supported for the chosen resource, or it will return 0 if all worked correctly.
注意，如果所选资源不支持刷新，此函数将返回-1；如果一切正常，此函数将返回0。
Note that the function will return -1 if flush is not supported for the chosen resources, or it will return 0 if all worked correctly.
注意，如果所选资源不支持刷新，此函数将返回-1；如果一切正常，此函数将返回0。
Note that the function will return -1 if prefetch is not supported for the chosen resource or the target platform is HTML5, or it will return 0 if all worked correctly.
注意，如果所选资源不支持预取，或者目标平台是HTML5，则此函数将返回-1；如果一切正常，则此函数将返回0。
Note that the gain scale is linear, and to instantly change the gain, simply set the time argument to 0.
注意，增益比例是线性的，要立即改变增益，只需将时间参数设置为0。
Note that the instance must have a speed for wrapping to work, because the direction of wrapping is based on the direction of the motion.
注意，实例必须有一个速度才能进行环绕，因为环绕的方向取决于运动的方向。
Note that the list is always sorted in descending order starting from the top-most slot.
注意，该列表总是从最顶端的槽开始按降序排序。
Note that the maximum number of device touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs
注意，能够检测到的设备触摸的最大次数在很大程度上取决于所使用的设备及其运行的操作系统
Note that the maximum number of touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs
需要注意的是，能够检测到的触摸的最大数量取决于所使用的设备及其运行的操作系统

Note that the message can be either a string or a real number, but if you need both then the number will have to be converted to string first using the string() function (see the example below) and that if the number has more than two decimal places then you should use string_format() to show them as by default decimals are rounded to the nearest two decimal places (so "1.2468" would show as "1.25" in the output window).
注意，消息可以是字符串或实数，但是如果您需要两者，则必须首先使用string()函数将数字转换为字符串(请参见下面的示例)，如果数字有两个以上的小数位，则您应该使用string_format()来显示它们，因为默认情况下，小数四舍五入到最接近的两个小数位(因此"1.2468"将在输出窗口中显示为"1.25")。
Note that the minimum number of particles you can create in a simulation is 128, so setting this value any lower will have no effect (unless set to 0).
注意，在模拟中可以创建的最小粒子数是128，因此将该值设置得更低将不会有任何效果(除非设置为0)。

Note that the position is in frames and if you set a value greater than the total number of frames (or less than 0) then the actual final playhead position will depend on the type of sequence playback that has been selected, following these rules:
注意位置以帧为单位，如果你设置的值大于总帧数(或小于0)，那么实际的最终播放头位置将取决于已选择的序列播放类型，遵循以下规则:
Note that the return value will be very different depending on the type of speed that was applied in the Sprite Editor, either Frames Per Second, or Frames Per Game Frame.
注意，根据精灵编辑器中应用的速度类型(每秒帧数或每游戏帧帧数)，返回值会有很大不同。
Note that the room will not change until the end of the event where the function was called, so any code after this has been called will still run if in the same event.
注意，在调用函数的事件结束之前，房间是不会改变的，因此在调用此函数之后的任何代码都将在相同的事件中运行。

Note that the room will not change until the end of the event where the function was called, so any code after this has been called will still run if in the same event. This function will also trigger the Room End event.
注意，在调用函数的事件结束之前，房间是不会改变的，因此在调用此函数之后的任何代码都将在相同的事件中运行。此函数还将触发Room End事件。
Note that the room will not restart until the end of the event where the function was called, so any code after this has been called will still run if in the same event.
注意，直到调用此函数的事件结束，房间才会重新启动，因此，如果在同一个事件中，调用此函数之后的任何代码都将继续运行。

Note that the sprite should have been designed in your animation program with this in mind, such that the "base" animation in track 0 only has keyframes for certain bones, while the next tracks have keyframes for the others.
注意，在动画程序中设计精灵时应该考虑到这一点，这样，轨迹0中的"基础"动画仅包含特定骨骼的关键帧，而接下来的轨迹包含其他骨骼的关键帧。
Note that the string returned is not the same as the resource ID and cannot be used to access the resource itself, so should only be used for displaying or error checking.
注意，返回的字符串与资源ID不相同，不能用于访问资源本身，因此应该只用于显示或错误检查。
Note that the timeout does not generate any type of event, so you will need to deal with timeouts yourself using alarms (for example).
注意，超时不会生成任何类型的事件，因此您需要使用告警(例如)自己处理超时。
Note that the value can be an array, which you can check with the function is_array().
注意，该值可以是一个数组，可以用函数is_array()来检查。
Note that there are a few things you cannot do with the buffer when accessing from an extension:
注意，从扩展访问时，有几件事你不能用缓冲区做:

Note that there is no time limit on this function, so you will need to use a variable or an alarm to switch off the vibration (set motors to 0) after a given time has passed otherwise the gamepad will continue to vibrate indefinitely.
注意此函数没有时间限制，所以你需要在特定时间过后使用一个变量或警报来关闭震动(将马达设置为0)，否则游戏手柄将继续无限地震动。

Note that there isn't much difference between the default quality of 2, and the highest of 3, and using 3 will significantly slow down the creation of the GIF so care should be taken when using the maximum value.
注意，默认质量2和最高质量3之间没有太大区别，使用3会显著降低GIF的创建速度，因此在使用最大值时应该小心。

Note that there may be a slight delay between the user connecting the gamepad and GameMaker detecting it as being connected (this is especially the case when dealing with bluetooth connected controllers).
注意，在用户连接游戏手柄和GameMaker检测到它已连接之间可能会有一点延迟(尤其是在处理蓝牙连接控制器时)。

Note that this can be quite useful for avoiding bleeding artifacts when rendering textures, for example, setting the texture page border to 8px and then setting the max mipmap level to 3 will ensure you don't get any bleeding problems at greater render distances.
注意，这对于在渲染纹理时避免出血现象非常有用，例如，将纹理页面边框设置为8px，然后将最大小中见大贴图级别设置为3，将确保在更大的渲染距离时不会出现出血问题。
Note that this can only be done on sequence instances (not sequence objects) and must be done before the sequence starts to play, otherwise it won't work.
注意，这只能在序列实例(而不是序列对象)上执行，并且必须在序列开始播放之前执行，否则将无法工作。
Note that this can return negative values too, in which case rendered textures will be sharper over a greater distance the lower the value.
注意，这也可能返回负值，在这种情况下，值越低，渲染的纹理在更大的距离上会更清晰。
Note that this can return negative values too, in which case shader textures will be sharper over a greater distance the lower the value.
注意，这也可能会返回负值，在这种情况下，值越低，着色器纹理在更大的距离上会更清晰。
Note that this checks to see if an object is present in the Asset Browser, and not actually in the game room.
注意，这将检查对象是否出现在资源浏览器中，而不是实际出现在游戏房间中。

Note that this data refers to the current pose for the skeleton, depending on the animation set used, and the function requires a previously created DS map, which will then have the following keys and their equivalent values after calling the function:
注意，该数据指的是骨骼的当前姿势，具体取决于所使用的动画集，并且此函数需要先前创建的DS贴图，在调用此函数后，该贴图将具有以下关键点及其等效的值:

Note that this data refers to the default pose for the skeleton, and not the current pose that is being drawn (for that use the function skeleton_bone_state_set()), and must be set from a previously created DS map, which should have the following keys and their equivalent values:
注意，该数据指的是骨骼的默认姿势，而不是正在绘制的当前姿势(使用skeleton_bone_state_set()函数)，并且必须从以前创建的DS贴图中设置，该贴图应具有以下关键点及其等效值:
Note that this data refers to the default pose for the skeleton, and not the current pose that is being drawn.
注意，该数据指的是骨骼的默认姿势，而不是正在绘制的当前姿势。

Note that this data will set the current pose for the skeleton, depending on the animation set used, and the function requires a previously created DS map, which should have the following keys and their required values:
注意，该数据将设置骨骼的当前姿势，具体取决于所使用的动画集，并且此函数需要先前创建的DS贴图，该贴图应具有以下关键点及其所需的值:

Note that this does NOT change the camera ID value, only the settings for that camera, and that if you use this function on the default camera (ie: the internal camera GameMaker uses when no view cameras are active) the changes will be overwritten the very next game frame by the internal settings for drawing the room.
注意，这不会改变相机ID值，只会改变该相机的设置，并且如果您在默认相机上使用此函数(即，GameMaker在没有视图相机活动时使用的内部相机)，这些更改将在下一个游戏帧被绘制房间的内部设置覆盖。
Note that this does NOT remove the contents from the original priority queue, nor does it destroy the original priority queue.
注意，这不会从原始优先队列中删除内容，也不会破坏原始优先队列。
Note that this does NOT remove the contents from the original queue, nor does it destroy the original queue.
注意，这不会从原始队列中删除内容，也不会销毁原始队列。
Note that this does NOT remove the contents from the original stack, nor does it destroy the original stack.
注意，这不会从原始堆栈中删除内容，也不会破坏原始堆栈。
Note that this does not add to the instances current speed and direction (for that you would use motion_add()) but rather forces it to the new settings.
注意，这不会添加到实例的当前速度和方向(为此您将使用motion_add())，而是强制它到新的设置。

Note that this does not remove the layer, only the background from it, and if the background is one that has been added in the room editor, then the next time you leave the room and then return, the background will be recreated again.
注意，这不会删除层，只会删除层中的背景，如果背景是在房间编辑器中添加的，那么下次您离开房间然后返回时，将会再次创建背景。

Note that this does not remove the layer, only the sprite from it, and if the sprite is one that has been added in the room editor, then the next time you leave the room and then return, the sprite will be recreated again.
注意，这并不会移除该层，只会移除其中的精灵，如果精灵是添加在房间编辑器中的精灵，那么当你下次离开房间并返回时，精灵将再次被重新创建。

Note that this does not remove the layer, only the tile map from it, and if the tile map is one that has been added in the room editor, then the next time you leave the room and then return, the tile map will be recreated again.
注意，这并没有删除该层，只是从其中删除了tile map，如果tile map是在房间编辑器中添加的，那么下次您离开房间并返回时，将再次重新创建tile map。
Note that this does not start the time line - for that use the variable timeline_running.
注意，这并没有开始时间线-为此使用变量timeline_running。

Note that this doesn't just prevent instances drawing to the screen, it suppresses the draw event completely meaning that care should be taken since any game logic that is present in that event will not be run either.
注意，这不仅仅是阻止实例绘制到屏幕上，它还完全抑制了绘制事件，这意味着应该小心，因为在该事件中出现的任何游戏逻辑也不会运行。
Note that this file is temporary and read only, and as such it will be removed from memory the moment it is closed.
注意，此文件是临时的且只读的，因此它将在关闭时从内存中删除。
Note that this function can also take negative values too, in which case shader textures will be sharper over a greater distance the lower the value.
注意，此函数也可以取负值，在这种情况下，值越低，着色器纹理在越远的距离上越清晰。

Note that this function can only be used on rooms other than the current room, and is designed so that you can add/remove layers and layer elements to rooms other than the room that is currently running.
注意，此函数只能在当前房间以外的房间上使用，它的设计目的是为了向当前运行的房间以外的房间添加/删除层和层元素。
Note that this function can take a variable number of arguments with only the x/y position and width/height arguments being obligatory.
注意，此函数可以接受可变数量的参数，只有x/y位置和宽度/高度参数是必需的。
Note that this function can take negative values too, in which case rendered textures will be sharper over a greater distance the lower the value.
注意，此函数也可以取负值，在这种情况下，越远的距离渲染的纹理越清晰。
Note that this function does not remove any particles currently visible in the room from the screen, for that you should be using part_particles_clear().
注意，此函数不会从屏幕上删除房间中当前可见的任何粒子，因此应该使用part_particles_clear()。
Note that this function is asynchronous, generating an Asynchronous Networking event of the type network_type_non_blocking_connect.
注意，此函数是异步的，生成类型为network_type_non_blocking_connect的异步网络事件。
Note that this function is designed for resizing an array down to a smaller length as you can resize up by simply setting a new index in the array.
注意，此函数设计用于将数组大小调整到更小的长度，因为您可以通过简单地在数组中设置一个新索引来调整大小。
Note that this function is for use with the HTML5 module only.
注意，此函数仅用于HTML5模块。

Note that this function is generally for use with cameras created using camera_create(), but it can also be used on those created in the room editor (or with camera_create_view()) - in which case the returned matrix will only be valid after the given camera is used in a view port for the first time.
注意，此函数通常用于使用camera_create()创建的相机，但它也可以用于在房间编辑器(或使用camera_create_view())中创建的相机，在这种情况下，返回的矩阵仅在给定相机第一次在视图端口中使用后才有效。
Note that this function is only valid for cameras created using camera_create_view() or for those added in the room editor.
注意，此函数仅对使用camera_create_view()创建的相机或在房间编辑器中添加的相机有效。

Note that this function is specifically designed for use with backgrounds that have been added in the IDE, as if you add a background to a layer through code using the function layer_background_create(), then it will return the unique ID for the background element added.
注意，此函数是专门为在IDE中添加的背景而设计的，就像您通过使用layer_background_create()函数的代码向层添加背景一样，那么它将返回添加的背景元素的唯一ID。

Note that this function is specifically designed for use with tile maps that have been added in the IDE, as if you add a tile map to a layer through code using the function layer_tilemap_create(), then it will return the unique ID for the tile map element added.
注意，此函数是专门设计用于已添加到IDE中的tilemap的，就像您通过使用layer_tilemap_create()函数的代码将tilemap添加到一个层中，那么它将返回添加的tilemap元素的唯一ID。
Note that this function may not correctly detect the orientation of the device when used in the HTML5 target module.
注意，在HTML5目标模块中使用时，此函数可能无法正确检测设备的方向。

Note that this function on prepares the fixture to accept the points required to make the chain, and these should be added after calling this function using physics_fixture_add_point(), much as you would when building a polygon fixture.
注意，上的此函数准备夹具以接受制作链所需的点，这些点应在使用physics_fixture_add_point()调用此函数后添加，就像构建多边形夹具一样。

Note that this function will affect the check, pressed and released states for analogue buttons, but will not affect the value returned by the function gamepad_button_check(), which will always return the raw value for the button.
注意，此函数将影响模拟按钮的检查、按下和释放状态，但不会影响函数gamepad_button_check()返回的值，此函数将始终返回按钮的原始值。
Note that this function will be affected by the time zone set (default is local time) which you can change using the date_set_timezone() function.
注意，此函数将受时区设置的影响(默认为本地时间)，您可以使用date_set_timezone()函数更改该设置。
Note that this function will have no visible effect if the path has not been set to smooth in the path editor or using the function path_set_kind().
注意，如果没有在路径编辑器中或使用函数path_set_kind()将路径设置为平滑，此函数将没有可见效果。
Note that this function will not recognise or take into consideration rooms that have been added dynamically using room_add() or room_duplicate().
注意，此函数不会识别或考虑使用room_add()或room_duplicate()动态添加的房间。
Note that this function will only consider a valid datetime as being after 1/1/1970 and anything before that will return false, so the earliest you can check would be:
注意，此函数只会将1970年1月1日之后视为有效的日期时间，在此之前的任何日期都将返回false，因此您可以检查的最早日期是:
Note that this function will only trigger once for the button the first time it is pressed.
注意，此函数只会在按钮第一次被按下时触发一次。
Note that this function will only trigger once for the button the moment it has been released.
注意，此函数只会在按钮被释放时触发一次。
Note that this function will still return true if the sound being checked has previously been paused using the audio_pause_sound() function.
注意，如果被检查的声音之前已经使用audio_pause_sound()函数暂停过，那么此函数仍然会返回true。

Note that this ini file is temporary and will be removed from memory the moment it is closed, losing any information that was stored in it, however the ini_close() function returns a string of the full ini file which can then be saved to a server or to disk.
注意，这个ini文件是临时的，当它被关闭时将从内存中删除，并丢失存储在其中的任何信息，但是ini_close()函数返回完整ini文件的字符串，然后可以保存到服务器或磁盘。
Note that this is a global setting that will affect all axis of all joysticks connected to the device slot specified.
注意，这是一个全局设置，将影响连接到指定设备插槽的所有操纵杆的所有轴。
Note that this is dependent on the layer visibility, and even if the background element is flagged as visible, it will not be drawn if the layer it is on is flagged as not visible.
注意，这取决于图层的可见性，即使背景元素被标记为可见，如果它所在的图层被标记为不可见，它也不会被绘制。
Note that this is enabled by default.
注意，这是默认启用的。
Note that this is generally only for use with legacy projects from previous version of GameMaker where you could have draw depths higher or lower than the permitted layer range.
注意，这通常只用于GameMaker上一个版本的遗留项目，在这些项目中，你可以绘制高于或低于允许的层范围的深度。

Note that this is not necessarily the same as the OS of the device running it, since - for example - your game could be running on an Amazon Fire OS, but will have been built for the Android platform (in which case os_type will be os_android).
注意，这并不一定与运行它的设备的操作系统相同，因为——例如——你的游戏可以运行在Amazon Fire操作系统上，但将为Android平台构建(在这种情况下，os_type将为os_android)。

Note that this is not the actual running speed FPS value (for that use the fps_real variable) but rather the number of game frames (FPS) that the game will attempt to maintain each second, or the length of each game frame in microseconds that the game will try to maintain (MPF).
注意，这不是实际的运行速度FPS值(使用fps_real变量)，而是游戏每秒钟将试图维持的游戏帧数(FPS)，或游戏将试图维持的每个游戏帧的长度(MPF)。

Note that this is not the same as checking if two arrays are the same using ==, which will not check to see if the two arrays hold equivalent values, but only to see if the arrays are referencing the same initial array.
注意，这与使用==检查两个数组是否相同不同，使用==不会检查两个数组是否拥有等价的值，而只是检查数组是否引用了相同的初始数组。
Note that this is only applicable when the sequence is not set to loop or ping-pong in the playback mode.
注意，这只适用于在播放模式中序列没有被设置为循环或乒乓时。
Note that this is the default behaviour, but you can change this by changing the type of comparison used for z-buffer testing (see the function gpu_set_zfunc().
注意，这是默认行为，但您可以通过更改用于z-buffer测试的比较类型来改变这一点(参见函数gpu_set_zfunc())。
Note that this return value is not affected by whether the layer the element is on is visible or not.
注意，这个返回值不受元素所在的层是否可见的影响。
Note that this value only affects the sending and receiving of data, and should you wish to change the connection timeout value then you should be using the function network_set_config().
注意，这个值只影响数据的发送和接收，如果您希望更改连接超时值，那么应该使用函数network_set_config()。
Note that this variable will not recognise or take into consideration rooms that have been added dynamically using room_add() or room_duplicate().
注意，该变量不会识别或考虑使用room_add()或room_duplicate()动态添加的房间。

Note that this variable will only give you the number of instances at the start of the step, so any changes to the instances in the room made after the step has started will not be taken into consideration.
注意，这个变量只会在步骤开始时给出实例的数量，因此在步骤启动后对房间中实例的任何更改都不会被考虑在内。

Note that this will have no effect on fonts that have been added before the function was called, and the function only needs to be called once when the font is added, and not every draw/step that the font is being used.
注意，这对在调用此函数之前添加的字体没有影响，在添加字体时只需要调用此函数一次，而不是在使用该字体的每一幅画/步骤中都需要调用此函数。

Note that this will neither crop nor stretch the contents of the surface, but rather it destroys the current surface and recreates it with the same handle (surface_id) with the new dimensions, meaning that it will need to be cleared and drawn to again (unless it is the application_surface in which case GameMaker will do this automatically).
注意，这既不会裁剪也不会拉伸表面的内容，而是会破坏当前表面，并使用具有新维度的相同句柄(surface_id)重新创建它，这意味着它将需要被清除并再次绘制到(除非它是application_surface，在这种情况下GameMaker将自动执行此操作)。
Note that this will not return any alpha values, for that you should use draw_getpixel_ext().
注意，这不会返回任何透明度(Alpha)值，因为您应该使用draw_getpixel_ext()。
Note that this will simply draw the tilemap at the specified point, using the layer depth of the instance that is calling the function.
注意，这将只是在指定点绘制tilemap，使用调用此函数的实例的图层深度。
Note that to see this effect, you must first have enabled AA using the function draw_enable_swf_aa().
注意，要看到这种效果，您必须首先使用函数 draw_enable_swf_aa() 启用 AA。
Note that trying to parse an invalid value (ie: not a string) will throw an exception error.
注意，试图解析无效值(即:不是字符串)将抛出异常错误。

Note that using code to work with layers means that you can assign different element types to the same layer - so you can have sprite assets along with instances, for example - in which case you can then use the function layer_get_element_type() to get the type of element the ID relates to.
注意，使用代码处理层意味着您可以将不同的元素类型分配到同一层—因此您可以将精灵资源与实例一起使用—在这种情况下，您可以使用函数layer_get_element_type()来获取ID相关的元素类型。

Note that we are using x/y cell positions based on the size of the tile map grid and not as a position in the room, so "cell_x" is a value from 0 to tile map width, and "cell_y" is a value from 0 to tile map height.
注意，我们使用的x/y单元格位置是基于瓦片地图网格的大小，而不是作为房间中的位置，因此"cell_x"是一个从0到瓦片地图宽度的值，"cell_y"是一个从0到瓦片地图高度的值。
Note that what happens in the next step after calling this function will depend on what is being checked and the platform it is being checked on.
注意，调用此函数后的下一步中发生的事情将取决于正在检查的内容和正在检查的平台。

Note that when creating sequence objects in this way you should remove them again by calling the function sequence_destroy() when they are no longer required, otherwise you will have a memory leak which can slow down and eventually crash your game.
注意，当以这种方式创建序列对象时，您应该在不再需要它们时通过调用函数sequence_destroy()再次删除它们，否则您将会遇到内存泄漏，这会降低速度并最终使您的游戏崩溃。
Note that when dealing with priority, the higher the number the higher the priority, such that a sound with priority 100 will be favoured over a sound with priority 1.
注意，当处理优先级时，数字越高优先级越高，例如优先级为100的声音将优先于优先级为1的声音。
Note that when no instances are on the same depth then this temporary layer will be removed from memory (unlike regular layers which will remain even if they have nothing on them).
注意，当没有实例在相同的深度上时，这个临时层将从内存中删除(不像常规层，即使它们上面没有任何东西也会保留)。
Note that when set to "use-credentials" you no longer need to give an absolute path to the sprite being loaded, but instead would give a relative path (as shown in the example below).
注意，当设置为"use-credentials"时，你不再需要提供被加载精灵的绝对路径，而是提供一个相对路径(如下例所示)。
Note that when used with the keyboard_check* functions, the input string can only be one character in length and can only be a number from 0 to 9 or a capitalised Roman character from A to Z.
注意，当与keyboard_check*函数一起使用时，输入字符串的长度只能是一个字符，并且只能是从0到9的数字或从A到z的大写罗马字符。
Note that when using the on-screen Virtual Keyboard, only this variable will be updated with the keyboard input.
注意，当使用屏幕虚拟键盘时，只有这个变量会随着键盘输入而更新。

Note that when you create a sync group, you will need to free the memory and sounds associated with it when not in use using the audio_destroy_sync_group() function - for example, in the Room End or Destroy events.
注意，在创建同步组时，需要在不使用时使用audio_destroy_sync_group()函数释放与其相关的内存和声音—例如，在Room End或Destroy事件中。
Note that you can also send a buffer (see the section on Buffers for more details), in which case the last argument would be the "handle" of the buffer to send.
注意，您也可以发送一个缓冲区(有关更多细节，请参阅缓冲区一节)，在这种情况下，最后一个参数将是要发送的缓冲区的"句柄"。
Note that you can assign a value of -1 as the new sprite index and no sprite will be shown, although the element will still exist and can still be changed again later.
注意，你可以指定一个值-1作为新的精灵索引，但不会显示任何精灵，尽管元素仍然存在，并可以在以后再次更改。
Note that you can have as many as you require (note that more arguments will mean that the function will be slower to parse).
注意，您可以有您需要的任意数量的参数(注意，更多的参数将意味着函数解析会更慢)。
Note that you can use the function audio_get_recorder_info() to get information on each device connected.
注意，您可以使用函数audio_get_recorder_info()来获取每个连接设备的信息。
Note that you cannot copy to a game resource.
注意，您不能复制到游戏资源。
Note that you cannot destroy any animation curves created in the asset browser, only those created at runtime.
注意，您不能破坏在资源浏览器中创建的任何动画曲线，只能破坏在运行时创建的动画曲线。
Note that you likely want to confirm the orientation is as desired before locking.
注意，您可能希望在锁定之前确认方向是否符合要求。
Note that you must have created the particle system and the particle type previously for this function to be used.
注意，要使用此函数，您必须已经创建了粒子系统和粒子类型。
Note this variable is deprecated in favour of the function os_get_info() which returns more accurate information on the device running the game.
注意这个变量已被弃用，取而代之的是函数os_get_info()，它返回关于运行游戏的设备的更准确的信息。
Note too that activation is not instantaneous, and an instance that has been activated in this way will not be considered to be active until the end of the event in which the function was called.
还要注意，激活不是瞬时的，以这种方式激活的实例在调用函数的事件结束之前不会被认为是活动的。

Note too that deactivation is not instantaneous, and an instance that has been deactivated in this way will not be considered to be inactive until the end of the event in which the function was called.
还要注意，停用不是瞬时的，以这种方式去激活的实例在调用函数的事件结束之前不会被认为是不活动的。
Note too that the friction is applied to positive and negative speeds equally with the net result always being that the object has a speed of 0 after a given time.
还要注意的是，摩擦力同样作用于正速度和负速度，最终的结果总是物体在给定时间后的速度为0。
Note too that the zip must be either part of the game bundle (ie: an Included File) or have been downloaded to the storage area using http_get_file().
还要注意，zip必须是游戏包的一部分(即:一个包含的文件)，或者已经使用http_get_file()下载到存储区域。

Note, that this is not a string, but rather the asset name which holds the unique index for each script (as it would appear in the IDE) or the script function name variable, as defined within the script asset (note that this will not work for method variables).
注意，这不是一个字符串，而是保存每个脚本的惟一索引的资源名称(就像它在IDE中出现的那样)或脚本函数名变量(如脚本资源中定义的那样)(注意，这不适用于方法变量)。

Now, it should be noted that for this to work, the instance running the code must have a valid collision mask (either for the sprite itself, or through the mask_index) and it will only register collisions with those solid flagged instances that also have a valid mask.
现在，应该注意的是，为了实现这一点，运行代码的实例必须有一个有效的碰撞掩码(或者是对于sprite本身，或者是通过mask_index ),并且它将只注册与那些也有有效掩码的实体标志实例的碰撞。
Now, normally you work in x/y room coordinates, and not in MP grid cell coordinates.
现在，通常您在x/y房间坐标中工作，而不是在MP网格单元坐标中工作。

Now, the default for GameMaker is that the game window (or background canvas) is the same size as the room, however when you activate view ports and cameras, this behaviour changes and the total size of the bounding box for all view ports is used.
现在，GameMaker的默认设置是游戏窗口(或背景画布)与房间大小相同，但是当您激活视口和相机时，这种行为会发生变化，所有视口的边界框的总大小都会被使用。
Number of available audio channels (default is 128).
可用音频通道的数量(默认为128)。
Number of frames to use for local input frame delay
用于本地输入帧延迟的帧数
Number of horizontal cells that the mp_grid will contain
mp_grid将包含的水平单元格的数量
Number of ms of latency to add
要添加的延迟毫秒数
Number of vertical cells that the mp_grid will contain
mp_grid将包含的垂直单元格的数量
OPTIONAL!
可选！
Object index, or instance id, of the instances to be added into the mp_grid
要使用的mp_grid的索引
Older iPhone/iPod Touch (480 x 320 screen) or Android phone
老式iPhone/iPod Touch (480 x 320屏幕)或Android手机

On Android you will need the the ID of the achievement as a string (this is the unique achievement ID that got assigned when you set up the achievement), while on all other platforms you supply the achievement name as a string, and then you give the percentage that you have completed towards getting the achievement (0 - None, 100 - Completed).
在Android上，你需要一个字符串形式的成就id(这是你设置成就时分配的唯一成就ID)，而在所有其他平台上，你以字符串形式提供成就名称，然后给出你已完成成就的百分比(0 -无，100 -已完成)。

On Android, you send the ID of the achievement as a string (this is the unique achievement ID that got assigned when you set up the achievement), while on all other platforms you supply the defined achievement name as a string, and then you give the actual achievement value to increment by.
在Android上，你将成就ID作为字符串发送(这是当你设置成就时所分配的唯一成就ID)，而在所有其他平台上，你将以字符串的形式提供已定义的成就名称，然后你将给出实际的成就值。

On Android, you send the ID of the score table as a string (this is the unique leaderboard ID that got assigned when you set up the leaderboard), while on all other platforms you supply the defined leaderboard name as a string, and then you give the actual score value.
在Android平台上，你需要以字符串形式发送积分表ID(这是当你设置积分排行榜时所分配的唯一积分ID)，而在其他平台上，你需要以字符串形式提供已定义的积分排行榜名称，然后再给出实际的积分值。

On Opera GX and HTML5, the audio context status can change at any time depending on user input, the browser being used, and its version, so this function can be used to check and see if audio can be played or not.
在Opera GX和HTML5上，音频上下文状态可以根据用户输入、正在使用的浏览器及其版本随时改变，因此此函数可以用于检查和查看音频是否可以播放。
On adding a font using that function, GameMaker will create a texture page cache of the required glyphs up to the size defined by this variable.
在使用此函数添加字体时，GameMaker将创建所需字形的纹理页面缓存，其大小由该变量定义。
On all platforms, this function will return true immediately after Game Start when the audio engine is initialised, except on the Opera GX and HTML5 targets.
在所有平台上，当音频引擎初始化时，此函数将在游戏开始后立即返回true，除了在Opera GX和HTML5目标上。
On how many entries should the function be executed.
函数应该执行多少个条目。
On the HTML5 target, we use the HTML5 Local Storage API for client side saving, and the functions does not support binary file operations, so assumes you are copying a text file.
在HTML5目标上，我们使用HTML5本地存储API进行客户端保存，并且函数不支持二进制文件操作，所以假设您正在复制一个文本文件。

Once called, the slot index will need to be remapped using the gamepad_test_mapping() function if you want to be able to be able to use the gamepad constants to detect input correctly (direct input can always be retrieved using the gamepad_axis/button/hat_count() and gamepad_axis/button/hat_value() functions together).
一旦被调用，如果您希望能够使用gamepad常量来正确检测输入，就需要使用gamepad_test_mapping()函数重新映射插槽索引(直接输入总是可以使用gamepad_axis/button/hat_count()和gamepad_axis/button/hat_value()函数一起检索)。

Once paired, particles do not change "partners" , and the farther an external force pulls them from one another, the greater the power with which they will collide when that external force is removed.
一旦配对，粒子不会改变"伙伴"，外力将它们拉得越远，当外力移除时，它们碰撞的力量就越大。

Once the fixture has been bound to all the instances that you need, it can be deleted if no longer necessary and the instances with that fixtures properties will not be affected and maintain those properties.
一旦夹具被绑定到您需要的所有实例，如果不再需要，可以将其删除，具有该夹具属性的实例将不会受到影响并保持这些属性。
Once the tension is broken, the particles bounce as if they were elastic, but also continue to attract each other.
一旦张力被打破，粒子就像有弹性一样反弹，但也会继续相互吸引。

Once the user has input the details and pressed the "Okay" button, an asynchronous User Interaction event is triggered which, for the duration of that event only, will have a DS map stored in the variable async_load.
一旦用户输入了详细信息并按下了"ok"按钮，就会触发一个异步用户交互事件，在该事件持续期间，该事件的DS map将存储在变量async_load中。
Once the user has pressed the "Okay" button, an asynchronous Dialog event is triggered which, for the duration of that event only, will have a ds_map stored in the variable async_load.
一旦用户按下"ok"按钮，一个异步对话框事件被触发，在该事件持续期间，该事件将有一个ds_map存储在变量async_load中。

Once the user has typed out their string and pressed the "Okay" button, an asynchronous Dialog event is triggered which, for the duration of that event only, will have a DS map stored in the variable async_load.
一旦用户输入字符串并按下"ok"按钮，就会触发一个异步对话框事件，在该事件持续期间，该事件的DS map将存储在变量async_load中。

Once the user has typed out their string and pressed the "Okay" button, an asynchronous Dialog event is triggered which, for the duration of that event only, will have a DS map stored in the variable async_load.
一旦用户输入字符串并按下"ok"按钮，就会触发一个异步对话框事件，在该事件持续期间，该事件的DS map将存储在变量async_load中。
Once two instances with physics representations have been bound by a joint, this can be deleted again at any time.
一旦具有物理表示的两个实例被关节绑定，就可以随时再次删除。
Once we have defined our fixture it has to be bound to an instance.
一旦我们定义了我们的夹具，它必须被绑定到一个实例。
Once you are happy with things it is recommended that you create and place your own graphic in its area.
一旦你对事物感到满意，建议你在它的区域创建并放置你自己的图形。

Once you call this command the primitive can be used in the vertex_submit() function for use in a shader or you can freeze the buffer (making the vertex buffer used read-only and much faster) using vertex_freeze().
一旦你调用了这个命令，图元就可以在vertex_submit()函数中使用，或者你可以使用vertex_freeze()来冻结缓冲区(使顶点缓冲区只读并且更快)。

Once you have added audio from a buffer to a queue, the buffer cannot be deleted until you have first freed the queue using the function audio_free_play_queue(), and the buffer properties should match those of the the queue that you are adding the sound to.
一旦将音频从缓冲区添加到队列中，在使用函数audio_free_play_queue()释放队列之前，不能删除缓冲区，并且缓冲区属性应该与要添加声音的队列的属性相匹配。
Once you have assigned a skeletal animation sprite to your instance, you can then define which animation set it should use at any given time with this function.
一旦你给你的实例分配了一个骨骼动画精灵，你就可以用此函数定义它在任何给定的时间应该使用哪个动画集。
Once you have created the camera you can then use the different matrix functions to set the view and projection matrices.
一旦你创建了相机，你就可以使用不同的矩阵函数来设置视图和投影矩阵。
Once you have created your fixture you can define it as being part of a collision group.
创建了夹具之后，可以将其定义为碰撞组的一部分。

Once you have created your virtual key for your devices, you may need to debug and test that it is correctly positioned and working properly and for that you would call the function virtual_key_show().
一旦为设备创建了虚拟键，您可能需要调试并测试它是否正确定位并正常工作，为此您可以调用函数virtual_key_show()。
Once you have created your virtual key for your devices, you may need to debug and test that it is correctly positioned and working properly.
一旦您为设备创建了虚拟键，您可能需要调试和测试它的位置是否正确以及工作是否正常。
Once you have done your calculations using sin, or cos etc... the result is in radians.
一旦你用sin或cos等完成了计算...结果以弧度表示。

Once you have finished using the path, or wish to create a new one and store its index in the same variable you should first delete the old path with path_delete to prevent memory leaks which can eventually crash your game.
一旦你使用完了路径，或者想创建一个新的路径并把它的索引存储在同一个变量中，你应该首先用path_delete删除旧的路径，以防止内存泄漏，这最终会使你的游戏崩溃。
Once you have finished working with a given file (whether reading from it or writing to it), you must close the file again, or else you risk losing the information contained within.
一旦您完成了对给定文件的操作(无论是从其中读取还是写入)，您必须再次关闭该文件，否则您可能会丢失其中所包含的信息。

One important thing to understand about this function is that if you call it right at the start of the game, before the initial frame is rendered (ie: the Create Event of the first object in the first room of the game), then the game window will not be rendered.
关于此函数需要理解的一件重要的事情是，如果你在游戏开始时调用它，在初始帧被渲染之前(例如:在游戏的第一个房间中第一个对象的创建事件)，那么游戏窗口将不会被渲染。
One of the 16 available user events.
16个可用用户事件之一。
One of the actions listed under 'Other'
"其他"下列出的操作之一
One of the constants listed below will be returned.
将返回下面列出的常量之一。
One of the simplest joint is a distance joint which says that the distance between two points on two instances must be constant.
最简单的连接之一是距离连接，它表示两个实例上两点之间的距离必须是常量。
One use for this is for filtering words that may be considered offensive, or for finding the correct place to insert some text into another string.
它的一个用途是过滤可能被认为是冒犯性的单词，或者找到将一些文本插入另一个字符串的正确位置。
Only triggered at the end of a room
仅在房间尽头触发
Only triggered at the end of the game
仅在游戏结束时触发
Only triggered at the start of a room
仅在房间开始时触发
Only triggered at the start of the game
仅在游戏开始时触发
Opera
欧朋 Opera
Opera GX
Opera GX
Optional flags to affect how the data is sent.
影响数据发送方式的可选标志。
Optional!
可选！
Optionally a 4th w parameter can be passed in.
可选地，可以传入第4个w参数。
Or if you perform an alarm event, the alarm counter will not be set to -1 but rather continue to count down.
或者，如果您执行一个警报事件，警报计数器将不会被设置为-1，而是继续倒计时。

Packets sent with this function are formatted such that the GameMaker game receiving the data can "split" the packets correctly, and the function will return the number of bytes of data sent, or a number less than 0 if the send has failed.
使用此函数发送的数据包被格式化，以便接收数据的GameMaker游戏能够正确地"分割"数据包，函数将返回发送的数据的字节数，如果发送失败，则返回小于0的数字。
Parameters not specified will fall back to their default values/behaviour.
未指定的参数将回退到其默认值/行为。
Particles created with this flag are "connected" in pairs, with each particle being connected to the one that was closest to it at the time of creation.
使用此标志创建的粒子成对"连接",每个粒子都连接到创建时离它最近的粒子。
Path points are numbered from 0 so the first point is always the 0th point and the last path point will be path_get_number() - 1.
路径点从0开始编号，因此第一个点始终是第0个点，最后一个路径点将是path_get_number() - 1。
Paths can be either smooth or straight (a smooth path calculates a curved path around the defining points, whereas a straight path just goes straight from one point to another).
路径可以是平滑的，也可以是直的(平滑的路径计算定义点周围的曲线路径，而直的路径只是从一个点到另一个点的直线)。
Pauses the time source and all of its children.
暂停时间源及其所有子级。
Player id
玩家id
Player preferences
玩家偏好

Please note that although this function can be used to reference assets from strings (see example below) you should always make sure that the asset exists before using it otherwise you may get errors that will crash your game.
注意，尽管此函数可以用于从字符串中引用资源(参见下面的例子)，但在使用它之前，你应该始终确保资源存在，否则你可能会出现错误，导致游戏崩溃。
Please note that as instances are sorted in an arbitrary manner, there is no specific order to how the instances are checked by this function, and any instance can be in any position.
注意，由于实例是按任意方式排序的，因此此函数对实例的检查方式没有特定的顺序，任何实例都可以位于任何位置。

Please note that failure to remove fixtures after they are no longer needed may cause a memory leak which will slow down and eventually crash your game, so you should take care to clean up properly after defining and binding fixtures.
注意，在它们不再需要后，如果不能删除它们，可能会导致内存泄漏，从而减慢速度并最终崩溃你的游戏，所以你应该注意在定义和绑定夹具后正确清理。

Please note that for changes in this variable to be visible, the instance should have either no draw event (and so GameMaker will default draw the sprite) or be drawn using one of the drawing functions like draw_self() or draw_sprite_ext() (by supplying the image_index into the appropriate argument).
注意，要使该变量的变化可见，实例要么没有绘制事件(所以GameMaker将默认绘制精灵)，要么使用绘制函数之一绘制，如draw_self()或draw_sprite_ext()(通过向适当的参数提供image_index)。

Please note that for changes in this variable to be visible, the instance should have either no draw event (and so GameMaker will default draw the sprite) or be drawn using one of the extended drawing functions like draw_self() or draw_sprite_ext().
注意，为了使这个变量的变化可见，实例应该没有绘制事件(所以GameMaker将默认绘制精灵)，或者使用一个扩展的绘制函数(如draw_self()或draw_sprite_ext())绘制。
Please note that for functions with 4 or more arguments, all of them must be of type ty_real.
注意，对于具有4个或更多参数的函数，所有参数都必须为ty_real类型。

Please note that for the macOS target, you must have unchecked the "Start In Fullscreen" option and checked the "Allow the player to resize the game window" option in the Game Options, otherwise this function will fail.
注意，对于macOS目标，你必须勾选"全屏开始"选项，并勾选"游戏选项"中的"允许玩家调整游戏窗口的大小"选项，否则此函数将失败。

Please note that if the instance running the code has the same object index as the object being checked, then it will be included in the check (this includes checks for parent objects if the calling instance is also a child of the parent).
注意，如果运行代码的实例具有与被检查对象相同的对象索引，那么它将被包含在检查中(如果调用实例也是父对象的子对象，则这包括对父对象的检查)。
Please note that if you do not call surface_reset_target() after you have finished, nothing will be drawn on the screen as all further drawing (even in other instances) will be done on the surface.
注意，如果在完成后不调用surface_reset_target()，屏幕上将不会绘制任何东西，因为所有进一步的绘制(甚至在其他实例中)都将在表面上完成。
Please note that should you need to get the unique instance id of the object being collided with, you should use instance_place().
注意，如果您需要获得被碰撞对象的唯一实例id，您应该使用instance_place()。
Please note that the "x" value (the number to change) cannot be a negative value.
注意，"x"值(要更改的数字)不能为负值。

Please note that the created path is empty ie: it has no points defined, so you will then have to use the other available functions to add points to the path or be using MP grids to generate the path.
注意，创建的路径是空的，即:它没有定义点，因此您将必须使用其他可用的函数来添加点到路径或使用MP网格来生成路径。
Please note that the function may also return the constant pointer_null, in which case the current self is being used at the time of the call.
注意，此函数还可能返回常量pointer_null，在这种情况下，调用时正在使用当前的self。
Please note that the line being drawn may need different values (+/-1 on the x, y) to be drawn with the desired dimensions due to differences across the various supported platforms.
注意，由于各种支持平台之间的差异，绘制的线可能需要不同的值(x，y上的+/-1)来绘制所需的尺寸。
Please note that the physics world may present errors when instances are moved by directly setting this variable as it will interrupt the continuous simulation.
注意，当通过直接设置此变量来移动实例时，物理世界可能会出现错误，因为这将中断连续模拟。
Please note that the position is based on the window, not the canvas, (0,0) position and that the sprite must be referenced directly from the texture page (see: sprite_get_tpe()).
注意，位置是基于窗口，而不是画布(0,0)的位置，精灵必须直接从纹理页面引用(参见:sprite_get_tpe())。

Please note that the rectangle being drawn may need different values (+/-1 on the x, y, or width or height) to be drawn with the desired dimensions due to differences across the various supported platforms.
使用此函数，您可以绘制矩形或填充矩形的轮廓，其中(x1,y1)位置是左上角，(x2,y2)位置是右下角。
Please note that there is no way to control the animation speed or image_index, so if the sprite has sub-images, these will be cycled at the same speed as the room speed.
注意，没有办法控制动画速度或image_index，所以如果精灵有子图像，这些将以与房间速度相同的速度循环。
Please note that these are coordinates based on the surface size and not on the position at which the surface is being drawn in the room.
注意，这些是基于表面大小的坐标，而不是基于房间中绘制表面的位置。
Please note that this function has the following restrictions:
注意，此函数有以下限制:
Please note that this function is mainly for use with Android devices
注意，此函数主要用于Android设备
Please note that this is an asynchronous function, ie: your game will continue to run in the background while the achievements page is being shown.
注意，这是一个异步功能，即:你的游戏将继续在后台运行，而成就页面显示。
Please note that this is an asynchronous function, ie: your game will continue to run in the background while the leaderboards page is being shown.
注意，这是一个异步功能，即:当排行榜页面显示时，你的游戏将继续在后台运行。
Please note that this is not an instance function!
请注意，这不是实例函数！

Please note that this is not the same as deactivating the instance, as the instance is still visible on the screen and can still be changed through code, rather this function just prevents it from participating in the physics simulation
注意，这与禁用实例不同，因为实例仍然在屏幕上可见，仍然可以通过代码进行更改，而此函数只是阻止它参与物理模拟
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the font directly - for that you would need the font index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能被用来直接引用字体-因为你需要字体索引。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the object directly - for that you would need the object index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能被用来直接引用对象——因此你需要对象索引。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the path directly - for that you would need the path index ID.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能用来直接引用路径——为此，您需要路径索引ID。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the room directly - for that you would need the room index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能被用来直接引用房间-因为你需要房间索引。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the sprite directly - for that you would need the sprite index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能用来直接引用精灵-为此，你需要精灵索引。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the tile set directly - for that you would need the tile set index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能用来直接引用图块集——为此，您需要图块集索引。
Please note that this is only a string and cannot be used to reference the timeline directly - for that you would need the timeline index.
注意，这只是一个字符串，不能用来直接引用时间线，因为你需要时间线索引。
Please note that this will have no visible effect in-game if the instance following the path being shifted follows it relatively (rather than absolutely) as the path's position is disregarded then.
注意，这在游戏中没有明显的效果，如果跟随路径移动的实例相对地(而不是绝对地)跟随它，因为路径的位置被忽略了。

Please note that to start drawing to a surface you must first have called the function surface_set_target() and then this one after you have finished, for each surface target that you have set or else nothing will be drawn on the screen as all further drawing (even in other instances) will be done on the surface.
注意，要开始绘制一个表面，你必须首先调用函数surface_set_target()，然后在你完成之后调用此函数，对于你设置的每个表面目标，否则屏幕上不会绘制任何东西，因为所有进一步的绘制(甚至在其他实例中)都将在表面上完成。
Please note that when the instance has no sprite assigned the value returned will be the same as the instance X position.
注意，当实例没有分配精灵时，返回值将与实例X位置相同。
Please note that when the instance has no sprite assigned the value returned will be the same as the instance Y position.
注意，当实例没有分配精灵时，返回值将与实例Y位置相同。
Please note that when there is (for example) 1 sub-image this variable will return "1" but the image_index of that sub-image is 0.
注意，当有(例如)一个子图像时，该变量将返回"1"，但该子图像的image_index为0。
Please note the following:
注意以下几点:

Please note, that if you choose not to perform the Destroy, Clean Up and Create events, any instance created that uses a variable normally defined in the create event will crash the game as that variable will no longer exist.
注意，如果你选择不执行销毁，清理和创建事件，任何使用创建事件中正常定义的变量创建的实例将使游戏崩溃，因为该变量将不再存在。
Please note, that the value used for checking must have been initialised previously or else you will get an error causing GameMaker to close.
注意，用于检查的值必须在之前初始化，否则你会得到一个错误，导致GameMaker关闭。
Please note, that when using the random number functions in GameMaker the initial seed is always the same, as this makes tracing errors and debugging far easier.
注意，当在GameMaker中使用随机数函数时，初始种子总是相同的，因为这使得跟踪错误和调试更加容易。
Powder particles produce a scattering effect such as you might see with sand or dust.
粉末颗粒产生散射效果，就像你在沙子或灰尘中看到的那样。
Preferences can only be set after joining or creating a game, but before starting the game.
只能在加入或创建游戏之后，但在开始游戏之前设置首选项。
Push Notification event
推送通知事件
Read-only files
只读文件
Real numbers can also be used as input arguments.
实数也可以用作输入参数。
Reducing this value means that the instance will start changing direction later as it doesn't "see" as far ahead, and increasing it means it will start changing direction earlier.
减小该值意味着实例将在稍后开始改变方向，因为它不会"看到"很远的距离，增加它意味着它将更早开始改变方向。

Regardless of the sprite being replaced, this function will create a new texture page for the sprite and so care should be taken when using it as it may adversely affect performance by increasing the number of required texture swaps for rendering.
不管子画面被替换，此函数将为子画面创建一个新的纹理页面，所以使用它时要小心，因为它可能会增加渲染所需的纹理交换次数，从而对性能产生负面影响。
Remember that in GameMaker (unless you are using physics) the angles are calculated counter-clockwise, so rotating the path by 90 degrees would rotate the path to the left.
记住，在GameMaker中(除非你使用的是物理)角度是逆时针计算的，所以将路径旋转90度将使路径向左旋转。
Remember that in GameMaker (unless you are using physics) the angles are calculated counter-clockwise, so setting the path orientation to 90° would rotate the path to the left.
请记住，在GameMaker中(除非您使用物理)，角度是逆时针计算的，因此将路径方向设置为90°会将路径向左旋转。
Remember that this is different to string_width() in that it measures the number of characters in the string, not its width as drawn on the screen in pixels.
请记住，这与string_width()不同，它度量的是字符串中的字符数，而不是它在屏幕上以像素为单位绘制的宽度。
Remember, a sprite sub-image starts being numbered from 0, so if this function returns 3 (the sprite being checked has 3 sub-images) they will be numbered 0, 1 and 2.
记住，一个精灵子图像从0开始编号，所以如果此函数返回3(被检查的精灵有3个子图像)，它们将被编号为0、1和2。
Removes empty entries from the output array.
从输出数组中删除空项。
Resets and reconfigures the time source.
重置和重新配置时间源。
Resets the time source and all of its children.
重置时间源及其所有子节点。
Restitution is usually set as a value between 0 and 1, but you can use higher values if required, although the results may be unpredictable.
恢复通常设置为0到1之间的值，但是如果需要，您可以使用更高的值，尽管结果可能是不可预测的。
Resumes a time source and all of its children.
恢复一个时间源及其所有子级。
Returns a handle which can be used to cancel the call.
返回可用于取消调用的句柄。
Returns an array containing all of the indexes of the children of this time source.
返回一个数组，该数组包含此时间源的所有子对象的索引。
Returns an array of instances that it has collided with.
返回与其发生冲突的实例数组。
Returns if the filter or effect is forced on a single layer.
返回如果滤镜或效果被强加在一个层上。。
Returns the current active state of the time source.
返回时间源的当前活动状态。
Returns the date value of the given datetime.
返回给定日期时间的日期值。
Returns the date-time value of the current moment.
返回当前时刻的日期时间值。
Returns the floor of n, that is, n rounded down to an integer.
返回n的底数，也就是说，将n四舍五入到整数。
Returns the height of the texture with the given id, which is always a value within the range 0 - 1.
用给定的id返回纹理的高度，它总是在0 - 1范围内的值。
Returns the index of the parent of this time source.
返回此时间源的父对象的索引。
Returns the inverse cosine of x, in that if cos(val)=n, arccos(n)=val, and the resulting number will be between pi and 0.
返回x的反余弦函数，如果cos(val)=n, arccos(n)=val，则得到的值将在pi和0之间。
Returns the inverse cosine of x, in that if dcos(val)=n, darccos(n)=val, and the resulting number will be between 180 and 0.
返回x的反余弦值，因为如果dcos(val)=n，darccos(n)=val，则结果数将介于180和0之间。
Returns the inverse sine of x, in that if dsin(x)=n, darcsin(n)=x, and the resulting number will be between -90 and 90.
返回x的反正弦值，因为如果dsin(x)=n，darcsin(n)=x，则得到的数字将介于-90和90之间。
Returns the inverse sine of x, in that if sin(x)=n, arcsin(n)=x, and the resulting number will be between -pi/2 and pi/2.
返回x的反正弦值，如果sin(x)=n, arcsin(n)=x，则得到的数值将在-pi/2 和 pi/2之间。
Returns the inverse tangent of x.
返回x的反正切值。
Returns the number of repetitions the time source has completed so far.
返回时间源到目前为止已完成的重复次数。
Returns the number of repetitions the time source has left to complete.
返回时间源还未完成的重复次数。
Returns the period of the time source, measured in its own units.
返回时间源的周期，以其自身的单位度量。
Returns the raw byte value as a real value at a given position in the given string.
在给定字符串中的给定位置，将原始字节值作为实数值返回。
Returns the time left before the next expiry of the time source, measured in its own units.
返回时间源下一次到期前剩下的时间，以其自身的单位度量。
Returns the time value of the given datetime.
返回给定日期时间的时间值。
Returns the units that the time source is measuring in.
返回时间源的度量单位。
Returns the width of the texture with the given id, which is always a value within the range 0 - 1.
用给定的id返回纹理的宽度，它总是在0 - 1范围内的值。
Returns true if successful, false if the current frame will be rerun.
如果成功，则返回true如果将重新运行当前帧，则返回false。
Returns true if the given index corresponds to an existing time source.
如果给定的索引对应于现有的时间源，则返回true。
Reverberation, an echo.
混响，回声。
