Set as proportional font or not.
是否设置成比例字体。
Set double-click detection on (true) or off (false).
设置双击检测为开启(true)或关闭(false)。
Set loop enable or disable.
设置循环启用或禁用。
Set the channel priority for the sound.
为声音设置通道优先级。
Set the cohesion strength between particles in the group.
设置组中粒子之间的内聚强度。
Set the inertia for the fixture.
设置夹具的惯性。
Set the path or url to the video.
设置视频的路径或url。
Set the position in milliseconds.
以毫秒为单位设置位置。
Set the protocol to use on websocket upgrade message, protocol is a string as 3rd parameter
设置websocket升级消息使用的协议，协议是一个字符串作为第三个参数
Set the value to true to enable or false to disable.
将该值设置为true可启用，设置为false可禁用。
Set the velocity ratio between the two joints
设置两个关节之间的速度比
Set the velocity ratio between two instances
设置两个实例之间的速度比
Set this to true for "on" and false for "off"
将on设为真，off设为假
Set this variable to 0 to reset the sprite to be drawn as was defined in the sprite editor.
将此变量设置为0将重置要绘制的精灵，就像在精灵编辑器中定义的那样。
Set to enable (true) or disable (false) the application surface.
设置启用(true)或禁用(false)应用程序表面。
Set to false to disable this output again.
设置为false将再次禁用此输出。
Set to true or false to enable or disable orientation locking.
设定true或false以启用或禁用方向锁定。
Set to true or false to enable or disable powersave functions.
设置为true或false以启用或禁用节电功能。
Set to true or false to perform the destroy event or not (optional, default is true)
设置为true或false以执行或不执行销毁事件(可选，默认为true)
Set to true or false.
设置为true或false。
Set to true to attempt an OS level connection when called.
设置为true以在被调用时尝试操作系统级连接。
Set to true to flip and false to leave it as-is
设定为true以翻转，设定为false以保持原样
Set to true to mirror and false to leave it as-is
设置为true以镜像，设置为false以保持原样
Set to true to rotate and false to leave it as-is
设置为true以镜像，设置为false以保持原样
Set to true to turn on drawing, and false to turn it off.
设定true以打开绘制，设定false以关闭绘制。
Set to true/false to enable/disable predictive text input.
设置为true/false可启用/禁用预测性文本输入。
Sets the base time zone to use for all the rest of the date and time functions.
设置基准时区，以用于所有其他日期和时间函数。
Sets the gain of the sound played.
设置所播放声音的增益。
Sets the listener mask of the sound played.
设置所播放声音的侦听器掩码(mask)。
Sets the maximum motor torque used to achieve the desired motor speed (in Newtons per meter)
设置实现所需马达速度所需的最大马达转矩(牛顿/米)
Sets the maximum movement speed for the motor
设置马达的最大运动速度
Sets the pitch of the sound played.
设置播放的声音的音高。
Sets the reference value for alpha testing from 0 to 255 (default value is 0)
将alpha测试的参考值从0设置为255(默认值为0)
Sets the sound to loop or not.
设置声音是否循环。
Sets the start offset (in seconds) of the sound played.
设置播放的声音的开始偏移量(以秒为单位)。
Sets the SO_LINGER timeout value to 0 for an exisiting TCP socket
将现有TCP套接字的SO_LINGER超时值设置为0
Setting it to false will prevent the instance from participating in the physics world, and setting it to true will have it participating again.
将其设置为false将阻止实例参与物理世界，将其设置为true将使其再次参与。
Setting it to true will repeat the texture if the uv coordinates are out with the 0-1 range, while a setting of false will mean no repeating.
如果uv坐标在0-1范围之外，将其设置为true将重复纹理，而设置为false将意味着不重复。

Setting the density of the particle will have a direct impact on how much inertia it has as well as how it reacts to collisions, so if you make a small particle with a high density it will have a very large mass, but if you define a large particle with a low density it will have a much smaller mass.
设置粒子的密度将直接影响它的惯性以及它对碰撞的反应，因此如果你制造一个高密度的小粒子，它将具有非常大的质量，但是如果你定义一个低密度的大粒子，它将具有小得多的质量。
Setting the mask index means that you can have, for example, a sprite for the instance with an irregular shape, yet give it a circular collision mask that is gotten from a different sprite.
设置掩码索引意味着，例如，你可以拥有一个不规则形状的精灵实例，但给它一个从不同的精灵获得的圆形碰撞掩码。

Setting the persistence of the object means that all instances of this object that are created after the persistence has been changed will be created persistent, while instances that are already in the room may not be affected.
设置对象的持久性意味着在更改持久性之后创建的该对象的所有实例将被创建为持久性，而已经在房间中的实例可能不会受到影响。
Setting this to true will connect the last point to the first point with an edge, while setting it to false will not.
将此项设置为true会用边将最后一个点连接到第一个点，而将其设置为false则不会。
Setting this variable will instruct GameMaker to use the designated sprite as a cursor (basically setting it to the current mouse x/y position every step).
设置此变量将指示GameMaker使用指定的精灵作为光标(基本上是将其设置为每一步的当前鼠标x/y位置)。
Short message for this exception.
此异常的短消息。
Should anything penetrate it, the solid particle group pushes the offending fixture back out to its surface, making a a solid particle group possess an especially strong repulsive force.
如果有任何东西穿透它，固体粒子群会将违规的固定物推回其表面，使固体粒子群具有特别强的排斥力。
Should you need more control over what is being saved, you should use the function screen_save_part().
如果需要对保存的内容进行更多控制，则应该使用函数screen_save_part()。
Should you need the name as it appears in the Asset Browser, you should use font_get_name().
如果您需要资源浏览器中显示的名称，您应该使用font_get_name()。
Should you need the particles to appear all at once rather than every step, you should be using the function part_emitter_burst().
如果你需要粒子一次出现，而不是每一步都出现，你应该使用函数part_emitter_burst()。
Should you need the particles to appear every step, you should be using the function part_emitter_stream() rather than calling this function every step.
如果你需要粒子在每一步都出现，你应该使用函数part_emitter_stream()而不是每一步都调用此函数。
Should you need to change the corner radius you should use the function draw_roundrect_colour_ext().
如果你需要改变角的半径，你应该使用函数draw_roundrect_colour_ext()。
Should you need to change this value, you must do so by changing the x and y vectors using the variables phy_speed_x and phy_speed_y.
如果需要改变该值，必须使用变量phy_speed_x和phy_speed_y改变x和y矢量。
Should you need to keep a consistent value over a number of runs of a game, you should be using random_set_seed().
如果你需要在游戏的多次运行中保持一个一致的值，你应该使用random_set_seed()。

Should you need to use both the parent object event and the child object event of the same type, you should use this function as it will run the parent object event before continuing with the rest of the code or actions that the child event contains.
如果需要同时使用同一类型的父对象事件和子对象事件，则应该使用此函数，因为它将在继续处理子事件所包含的其余代码或操作之前运行父对象事件。
Should you need truly random results for everything, you should be using the randomise() function.
如果你需要真正随机的结果，你应该使用randomise()函数。
Should you wish to test with true random, you should call this function at the start of your game.
如果你想用真随机测试，你应该在游戏开始时调用此函数。
Show challenges received pop-up (true) or not (false).
显示收到的挑战弹出(true)或不弹出(false)。
Show completed local challenges pop-up (true) or not (false).
显示已完成的本地挑战弹出(true)或不弹出(false)。
Show completed remote challenges pop-up (true) or not (false).
显示完成的远程挑战弹出(true)或不弹出(false)。
Similar to additive blending.
类似于叠加混合。

Since once a fixture has been bound to an instance that instance maintains the fixtures properties, we can remove the fixture from memory with this function, particularly if we no longer plan to use it again.
因为一旦一个fixture被绑定到一个实例，该实例维护了夹具的属性，我们可以使用此函数从内存中删除该fixture，特别是在我们不再计划使用它的时候。

Since the GUI layer can be set to be a different size independently of the screen resolution and the room size, it can sometimes be complicated to get the exact point on the GUI layer that a user has touched the screen.
由于GUI层可以独立于屏幕分辨率和房间大小而被设置为不同的大小，因此获取用户触摸屏幕的GUI层上的确切点有时会很复杂。

Since this function modifies the view matrix and not the projection matrix, you should first initialize the projection matrix using the other matrix function matrix_build_projection_perspective(), then use this function to move the view camera around within the projection.
由于此函数修改视图矩阵，而不是投影矩阵，因此您应该首先使用另一个矩阵函数matrix _ build _ projection _ perspective()初始化投影矩阵，然后使用此函数在投影内移动视图相机。

Since tiles can be animated, it can sometimes be useful to know which frame is currently being drawn and react accordingly, so with this function you can retrieve the current frame index for a given tile map.
由于tiles可以被动画化，因此知道当前正在绘制哪一帧并做出相应的反应有时会很有用，因此使用此函数可以检索给定tile map的当前帧索引。
Since you cannot change the value of a shader constant within the shader itself, you have to set it before calling the shader using one of the available uniform set functions.
因为你不能在着色器本身中改变着色器常量的值，你必须在使用一个可用的统一(uniform)设置函数调用着色器之前设置它。
Since you cannot change the value of a shader sampler within the shader itself, you have to set it before calling the shader using one of the available uniform set functions.
因为你不能在着色器本身中改变着色器采样器的值，你必须在使用一个可用的统一设置函数调用着色器之前设置它。
Slowing these particles down by reducing gravity scale can stabilize their behaviour.
通过减少重力比例来减缓这些粒子的速度可以稳定它们的行为。
So a string formatted as:
因此，字符串格式为:
So a typical ini file would look something like this:
所以一个典型的ini文件应该是这样的:
So a value of 2 for a texture width or height would draw the texture in half the space and leave the other half empty).
因此纹理宽度或高度的值为2将在一半的空间中绘制纹理，而让另一半为空)。
So a value of 32 for the hsnap and vsnap will set the instance to a random position that is aligned to a grid of 32x32 squares.
因此，hsnap和vsnap的值为32会将实例设置为随机位置，该位置与32x32个正方形的网格对齐。
So exp(3) would return 20.08, which means that after 3 time units we have 20.08 times the amount we started with.
所以 exp(3) 将返回 20.08，这意味着在 3 个时间单位之后，我们的数量是开始数量的 20.08 倍。
So if we want to find out how many time units we need to get 20 growth we would use ln(20) which returns 2.99 units of time to get that amount of growth.
因此，如果我们想知道我们需要多少时间单位来获得20的增长，我们将使用ln(20 ),它返回2.99个时间单位来获得该数量的增长。
So if you do, for example:
所以如果你这样做了，举个例子:
So if your physics object is meant to represent a person, their mass would be approximately 70 kilos.
因此，如果你的物理对象代表一个人，他们的质量大约是70公斤。
So let's consider the following image which shows how the two can correlate:
因此，让我们考虑下图，该图显示了这两者之间的关系:
So log10(100) returns 2, as multiplying 10 by itself gives 100, log10(1000) returns 3 as 10x10x10=1000 etc...
So to find what number has been multiplied with itself to get any given positive value we use this function.
因此，为了找出哪个数与自身相乘得到任何给定的正值，我们使用此函数。
So we need 7 bits to represent 100.
所以我们需要7位来代表100。

So when (for example) you are using view port[0] and view port[1] in your game room, the draw event for ALL instances will be run twice, once for each port, and with this variable you can check to see what view is currently being drawn.
因此，当(例如)您在游戏房间中使用view port[0]和view port[1]时，所有实例的draw事件将运行两次，每个端口一次，使用此变量您可以查看当前正在绘制的视图。
So, a balloon would have a low density as it has little mass that occupies a large space, while a lead bar would have a high density as it has a great mass, yet occupies little space.
因此，气球的密度低，因为它的质量小，但占用的空间大;而铅条的密度高，因为它的质量大，但占用的空间小。
So, a vspeed of 3 means 3 pixels of movement to the bottom (+y) every step, and a vspeed of -3 would mean 3 pixels of movement to the top (-y) every step.
因此，vspeed为3意味着每步向底部(+y)移动3个像素，vspeed为-3意味着每步向顶部(-y)移动3个像素。
So, an hspeed of 3 means 3 pixels of movement to the right (+x) every step, and an hspeed of -3 would mean 3 pixels of movement to the left (-x) every step.
所以，hspeed为3意味着每一步向右移动3个像素(+x)，而hspeed为-3则意味着每一步向左移动3个像素(-x)。

So, both arguments need to be object indices and not the instance ids, and the first one is always the object that you want to find out if it is a child of the second argument, which is always the object that want to check as the ancestor (parent).
因此，两个参数都需要是对象索引而不是实例id，第一个参数总是您想要查明它是否是第二个参数的子对象，第二个参数总是想要检查为祖先(父)的对象。
So, for example, if the room is 480px in height and you set it to 640px, the room will be expanded downwards with an extra 180px added to the bottom.
例如，如果房间的高度为480像素，而您将其设置为640像素，则房间将向下扩展，底部增加180像素。
So, for example, if you have a string-map of "AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHh", your sprite font must have the sub-images ordered in this way.
因此，例如，如果你有一个字符串映射"AaBbCcDdEeFfGgHh"，你的sprite字体必须有这样排序的子图像。
So, for example, to get a random number from 0 to 9 you can use irandom(9) and it will return a number from 0 to 9 inclusive.
例如，要得到一个从0到9的随机数，你可以使用irandom(9 ),它将返回一个从0到9的数。
So, if you have a path point set to 50 in the path editor, this function would return 50 when used.
因此，如果在路径编辑器中将路径点设置为50，那么此函数在使用时将返回50。

So, if you have a return value of, for example, four, then you will have audio input on the sources 0, 1, 2 and 3, with one of these values being that which you use to start recording from using the function audio_start_recording().
因此，如果您有一个返回值，例如4，那么您将在源0、1、2和3上有音频输入，其中一个值是您使用函数audio_start_recording()开始记录的值。
So, if you have a stationary instance and a moving instance then connect them with a friction joint, the moving instance will gradually slow down until it too is stationary.
因此，如果您有一个静止的实例和一个移动的实例，然后用摩擦关节将它们连接起来，移动的实例将逐渐减速，直到它也静止。
So, if you have a timeline with 8 different actions placed 20 moments apart, this function would return the moment value of the last action in that timeline, which would be 160.
因此，如果您有一个时间线，其中8个不同的动作相隔20个时刻，此函数将返回该时间线中最后一个动作的时刻值，即160。
So, if you have two different view ports at two different positions, the total area that they cover defines the size of the game window.
因此，如果你在两个不同的位置有两个不同的观察口，它们覆盖的总面积决定了游戏窗口的大小。

So, to make an instance kinematic, you would first create a static instance and then set one or more of the instance variables related to movement (ie: phy_speed_x, phy_speed_y, or phy_angular_velocity)
因此，要使实例运动，首先要创建一个静态实例，然后设置一个或多个与运动相关的实例变量(即:phy_speed_x、phy_speed_y或phy_angular_velocity)
So, what to do?
那么，该怎么办呢?
So, when two instances collide, their motion is affected by this value, with a high friction causing a larger loss of momentum than a lower value.
因此，当两个实例碰撞时，它们的运动受到这个值的影响，与较低的值相比，高的摩擦会导致更大的动量损失。
So, you can have a persistent object and a non-persistent instance of the same object and vice-versa.
因此，您可以拥有同一个对象的一个持久对象和一个非持久实例，反之亦然。
So, you can have a solid object and a normal instance of the same object and vice-versa.
所以，你可以有一个实体对象和同一个对象的一个普通实例，反之亦然。
So, you can have a visible object and an invisible instance of the same object and vice-versa.
因此，您可以拥有同一个对象的可见对象和不可见实例，反之亦然。
So, you supply the input string and the start and end position within that string to remove characters (index starts at 1) and the function will return a new string without that section in it.
因此，您提供输入字符串以及该字符串中的开始和结束位置来删除字符(索引从1开始)，函数将返回一个不包含该部分的新字符串。
So, you would have your "main" canvas, and then your secondary surface canvas elements, which will be assigned using this function to the correct surfaces.
因此，您将拥有您的"主"画布，然后是您的辅助表面画布元素，这些元素将使用此函数分配给正确的表面。
Social event
社交事件
Some of the available commands require an optional argument or arguments.
一些可用的命令需要一个或多个可选参数。
Some times you will want your game to detect and recognise when two instances with fixtures collide, but not have any physical reaction to the collision.
有时候你会希望你的游戏能够检测和识别两个有夹具的实例发生碰撞，但不会对碰撞有任何物理反应。

Sometimes the problem can be in the rendering part of your game, for example a sprite may be drawn at the wrong position or rotation, giving the appearance of incorrect physics, or it may be that your calculations are not correct.
有时问题可能出在你游戏的渲染部分，例如一个精灵可能被画在错误的位置或旋转，给人不正确的物理外观，或者可能是你的计算不正确。
Sometimes when making a game you may wish one key to do the same as another.
有时候在制作游戏时，你可能希望一个键和另一个键做同样的事情。

Sometimes you may wish to get the ascii code for a mapped key (to see if it is already mapped, for example) which is what this function returns. The function will take a keycode value as returned by the function ord() (only capital letters from A-Z or numbers from 0-9), or any of the vk_* constants listed on the main Keyboard Input page.
有时，您可能希望获得映射键的ascii代码(例如，查看它是否已经映射)，这就是此函数返回的内容。此函数将接受ord()函数返回的keycode值(只接受a - z中的大写字母或0-9中的数字)，或主键盘输入页面中列出的任何vk_*常量。
Sometimes you need to switch from a perspective projection to an orthographic projection which is what this function is for.
有时你需要从透视投影转换到正投影，这就是此函数的用途。
Sometimes you want to specify something other than numbers for a random selection, or the numbers you want are not in any real order or within any set range.
有时您希望为随机选择指定除数字以外的其他内容，或者您想要的数字没有任何实际顺序或在任何设置范围内。

Source blend mode factor Alpha (see constants above).

特殊的"剥离"缓冲区，读/写速度极快。
Specifies default sprite which is used for drawing when a texture group hasn't been loaded
指定在纹理组未加载时用于绘图的默认精灵
Specifies that playbackSpeed should be interpreted as frames-per-game-frame.
指定回放速度应该被解释为每帧游戏帧。

Spring particles produce the effect of being attached to one another, as if by a spring.
弹簧粒子产生相互连接的效果，就像被弹簧连接一样。
Standard browser options (see description).
标准浏览器选项(见描述)。
Starting x coordinate of the mp_grid in the room
房间中mp_grid的起始x坐标

启动/恢复时间源及其所有子源。

Steam事件

Stereo (dual channel) audio.
立体声(双声道)音频。

Strength of the gravity.

String from which sprite sub-image order is taken.
从中获取精灵子图像顺序的字符串。

Surfaces are always held in texture memory which means that they can be destroyed from one moment to the next (for example, when a screensaver starts on windows, or when minimised on an Android device), so you should always check that a surface exists before doing anything with it (this includes drawing it to the screen).
表面总是保存在纹理内存中，这意味着他们可以从一个时刻到下一个销毁(例如，当屏幕保护程序在窗口启动时，或在Android设备上最小化时)，所以你应该在对它做任何事情之前总是检查一个表面是否存在(这包括将它绘制到屏幕上)。
Surfaces take up space in memory and so need to be removed, normally at the end of a room, but it can be done at any time depending on the use you put them to.
表面占用内存空间，因此需要删除，通常是在房间的尽头，但也可以在任何时候完成，这取决于你使用它们的用途。

Switching v-sync on may give a smoother gaming experience but it will also need more processing power and so its impact must be considered careful before use, and the same goes for the anti-aliasing where the higher the number the more processing that is required.
开启垂直同步可能会带来更流畅的游戏体验，但它也需要更多的处理能力，因此在使用前必须仔细考虑其影响，抗锯齿也是如此，数值越高，需要的处理越多。
Synchronize the rollback game on the current frame.
在当前帧上同步回滚游戏。
System event
系统事件
System files
系统文件
Tell GameMaker not to block on connect.
告诉GameMaker不要阻塞连接。
Tell GameMaker to accept 2D positional data (x and y) as part of the new vertex format being created.
告诉GameMaker接受2D位置数据(x和y)作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
Tell GameMaker to accept 3D positional data (x, y and z) as part of the new vertex format being created.
告诉GameMaker接受3D位置数据(x、y和z)作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
Tell GameMaker to accept colour data as part of the new vertex format being created.
告诉GameMaker接受颜色数据作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
Tell GameMaker to accept surface normal data (nx, ny and nz) as part of the new vertex format being created.
告诉GameMaker接受表面法线数据(nx，ny和nz)作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
Tell GameMaker to accept texture position data (u and v) as part of the new vertex format being created.
告诉GameMaker接受纹理位置数据(u和v)作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
Tensile particles are used to produce the effect of surface tension, or the taut curvature on the surface of a body of liquid.
张力粒子用于产生表面张力效应，或液体表面的绷紧曲率。
Text that appears on the "no" button.
出现在"否"按钮上的文本。
Text that appears on the "yes" button.
出现在"是"按钮上的文本。
Text that appears on the dialog.
出现在对话框上的文本。

Textures are represented by arrays of texels, just as pictures are represented by arrays of pixels, and this function returns the height of a single texel from the texture page of the image asset used.
纹理由纹理数组表示，就像图片由像素数组表示一样，此函数从所使用的图像资源的纹理页面返回单个纹理的高度。

Textures are represented by arrays of texels, just as pictures are represented by arrays of pixels, and this function returns the width of a single texel from the texture page of the image asset used.
纹理由纹理数组表示，就像图片由像素数组表示一样，此函数从使用的图像资源的纹理页面返回单个纹理的宽度。
Thankfully there is a simpler method, and that is to use a gear joint.
谢天谢地，有一个更简单的方法，那就是使用齿轮关节。
That said, if you do use it to size up an array, any new indices will be set to the default value of 0.
也就是说，如果使用它来增大数组的大小，则任何新的下标都将设置为默认值0。

The "fire_time" is the date/time that the notification should be pushed to the user device (you can use the GameMaker Date and Time Functions to get this), and you can give the notification a title and a message text as well as a payload string which will be passed to your game when the users taps the notification.
"fire_time"是通知应该推送到用户设备的日期/时间(你可以使用GameMaker date and time函数来获得这个)，你可以给通知一个标题、一个消息文本以及一个载荷字符串，当用户点击通知时，它将被传递到你的游戏中。
The "flags" are the return value of a combination of the following constants:
"flags"是以下常量组合的返回值:

The "groupname" is a string and will be used as the directory name for where the files will be saved, and should be used as part of the file path when loading the files back into the IDE later (using any of the buffer_load() functions).
"groupname"是一个字符串，将用作保存文件的目录名称，并且在以后将文件加载回IDE时(使用任何buffer_load()函数)，应该将其用作文件路径的一部分。
The "index" value can be that of the resource itself (as seen in the Asset Browser) or the unique ID value that is given when you play the sound using, for example, audio_play_sound().
"index"值可以是资源本身的值(如在资源浏览器中所见)，也可以是使用 audio_play_sound() 播放声音时给出的惟一ID值。
The "offset" defines the start position within the buffer for loading (in bytes), and the "size" is the size of the buffer area to be loaded from that offset onwards (also in bytes).
"偏移量"定义了缓冲区内加载的起始位置(以字节为单位)，而"大小"是从该偏移量开始加载的缓冲区的大小(也以字节为单位)。
The "offset" defines the start position within the buffer for saving (in bytes), and the "size" is the size of the buffer area to be saved from that offset onwards (also in bytes).
"偏移量"定义了缓冲区内用于保存的起始位置(以字节为单位)，"大小"是从该偏移量开始要保存的缓冲区的大小(也以字节为单位)。
The "offset" is the position within the buffer to decode the given string (in bytes).
"偏移量"是缓冲区中解码给定字符串的位置(以字节为单位)。

The "offset" value is the offset (in bytes) to add to the given seek position, for example, if the base is relative and the offset is 4, then the buffer position will move along 4 bytes from its current position.
"偏移量"值是要添加到给定查找位置的偏移量(以字节为单位)，例如，如果基数是相对的，偏移量是4，则缓冲区位置将从其当前位置移动4个字节。
The "perf" argument is used to instruct this new instance to perform the create event or not.
"perf"参数用于指示这个新实例是否执行create事件。
The "size" is the size of the buffer (in bytes) that you wish to fill, while the offset is the offset value (also in bytes) from the start of the buffer to start the fill from.
"size"是您希望填充的缓冲区的大小(以字节为单位)，而offset是从开始填充的缓冲区开始的偏移值(也以字节为单位)。
The "surface_id" is that of a surface you have created previously, or the application_suface, and the function will resize that surface.
"surface_id"是您之前创建的表面或application_surface的表面，此函数将调整该表面的大小。

The "target" parameter that you specify is the same as the standard JavaScript "name" value when you use the open() method (be aware that all but "_self" may result in the browser blocking, or asking the user if they wish to allow it) and the "options" is the same as the JavaScript "specs" parameter for controlling what properties the new window/tab should display (not all browsers may support all features).
当你使用open()方法时，你指定的"target"参数与标准的JavaScript "name"值相同(注意除了"_self"可能导致浏览器阻塞，或询问用户是否允许)，而"options"与JavaScript "specs"参数相同，用于控制新窗口/选项卡应该显示什么属性(并非所有浏览器都可能支持所有功能)。

The "target" parameter that you specify is the same as the standard JavaScript "name" value when you use the open() method, and you should be aware that all but "_self" may result in the browser blocking, or asking the user if they wish to allow it.
当您使用open()方法时，指定的"target"参数与标准JavaScript"name"值相同，您应该注意，除了"_self"之外的所有参数都可能导致浏览器阻塞，或者询问用户是否希望允许它。

The connection uses a special protocol that ensures only GameMaker games connect to each other, however if you need to connect to a server that is not a GameMaker game, you can use network_connect_async_raw().

The damping is the amount of "resistance" to angular rotation that the physics enabled instance has, with a lower value permitting the instance to rotate faster after a collision (for example) and a higher value making it require a more forceful push and rotate slower
阻尼是物理启用实例的角度旋转"阻力"的数量，较低的值允许实例在碰撞后旋转得更快(例如)，较高的值使它需要更有力的推动和更慢的旋转

The damping is the amount of "resistance" to forward movement that the physics enabled instance has, with a lower value permitting the instance to move and accelerate faster and a higher value making it require a more forceful push
阻尼是物理启用实例向前移动的"阻力"量，较低的值允许实例更快地移动和加速，较高的值使其需要更有力的推动
The damping ratio is non-dimensional and defines the "springiness" of the joint.
阻尼比是无量纲的，定义了关节的"弹性"。
The data offset to start copying from (in bytes).
开始复制的数据偏移量(以字节为单位)。

The data sent is not formatted by GameMaker in any way and the receiving devices will get the data as a stream which means you will have to handle it yourself.
发送的数据没有被GameMaker以任何方式格式化，接收设备将以流的形式获取数据，这意味着你必须自己处理它。

The data you fill the buffer with must be in agreement with the "type" argument of this function, meaning that you can't try to fill with a string and use the unsigned 16bit integer type, for example.
你用来填充缓冲区的数据必须与此函数的"类型"参数一致，这意味着你不能试图用一个字符串来填充并使用无符号的16位整数类型。

写入的数据必须与此函数的"type"参数一致，这意味着不能尝试将字符串写成无符号的16位整数。

The debug overlay shows a graphic CPU/GPU usage bar in the actual game window itself along with the current real fps value, number of texture swaps and the number of vertex batches (note that texture swaps and vertex batches will never be zero and will normally show values of 2 or 3, since even with an empty room an no objects GameMaker still has to draw and batch things).
调试覆盖图在实际的游戏窗口中显示了一个图形CPU/GPU使用情况栏，以及当前的实际fps值、纹理交换的数量和顶点批次的数量(注意，纹理交换和顶点批次永远不会为零，通常会显示值2或3，因为即使是在一个空的房间中，没有对象的GameMaker仍然必须绘制和批处理东西)。
The default a precision of 0.0000001 is used for all data structure functions unless changed by this function.
默认精度为0.0000001，用于所有数据结构函数，除非由此函数更改。
The default colour is c_black.
默认颜色是c_black。
The default format is no extra spaces on the left, and only two decimal places on the right, eg "265.73".
默认的格式是左边没有多余的空格，右边只有两位小数，比如"265.73"。
The default listener index is 0, but you can use the function audio_get_listener_info() to get the different indices available for the target platform.
默认的侦听器索引是0，但是您可以使用函数audio_get_listener_info()来获取目标平台可用的不同索引。
The default listener index is 0, but you can use the function audio_get_listener_info() to get the different indices available for the target platform.
默认的(listener)索引是0，但是可以使用函数audio_get_listener_info()来获取目标平台可用的不同索引。

The default listener position is (0, 0, 0) so this means that if the listener has not been moved and you want the sound to come from the left (for example), you should set the x position to a negative value (for more information on setting the listener position see audio_listener_position()).
默认的位置是(0,0,0)，因此这意味着如果没有被移动，而您希望声音从左侧传来(例如)，则应该将x位置设置为负值(有关设置位置的更多信息，请参阅audio_listener_position()))。

The default number for the physics system is 10, but this can be changed to higher or lower depending how many times you want the physics to calculate each step, but it is recommended that you set this no lower than 5 and no higher than 30.
物理系统的默认数值是10，但是可以根据您希望物理计算每一步的次数将其更改为更高或更低，但是建议您将其设置为不低于5且不高于30。
The default password
默认密码
The default properties for a soft body particle.
柔体粒子的默认属性。
The default string in the text box.
文本框中的默认字符串。
The default string.
默认字符串。

The default system uses an old > new look (the function is set to true), where old particles are drawn at a higher depth than newer ones and so appear "beneath" them new particles, but by setting this function to false you can reverse this order and have the new particles drawn higher and so appear "beneath" the older ones.
默认系统使用 old > new look(此函数设置为 true)，其中旧粒子的绘制深度比新粒子更高，因此出现在新粒子"下方"，但通过将此函数设置为 false，您可以反转 这个顺序并让新粒子绘制得更高，因此出现在旧粒子的"下方"。
The default threshold for all analogue buttons is 0.5, with the range being from 0 to 1.
所有模拟按钮的默认阈值是0.5，范围从0到1。
The default user name
默认用户名

The default value for each of the components is true, and can be supplied as either four unique arguments or as a 4 element 1D array with the following elements in it which will be either true (enabled) or false (disabled):
每个组件的默认值都是true，可以作为四个唯一的参数提供，也可以作为一个包含以下元素的4元素1D数组提供，这些元素可以是true(启用)或false(禁用):

The default value for this is 100, but beware of setting this to any value lower than 1 as that will make any sound played through this emitter inaudible to the listener, however any other value will cause the sound to fade away the further that the emitter is from the listener.
默认值为100，但注意不要将其设置为任何低于1的值，因为这将使通过该发射器播放的任何声音听不到，然而任何其他值都将导致声音随着发射器远离侦听器而逐渐消失。
The default value in the text box.
文本框中的默认值。
The default value is -1 which is no sprite for the cursor, but you can assign any sprite index from the game assets or that has been imported from an external resource.
默认值是-1，即没有用于光标的精灵，但你可以从游戏资源或从外部资源导入任何精灵索引。
The default value is 0° with positive values rotating the camera counter-clockwise, ie: setting the value to 90 will rotate the camera 90° to the left.
默认值是0°，正值旋转相机逆时针，即:设置值为90将旋转相机90°向左。
The default value is 4.
缺省值为4

The default value is false but if set to true this tells GameMaker that the instance will be moving at such high speeds that it will require more expensive collision detection to ensure it doesn't pass through other instances undetected
默认值为false，但如果设置为true，这将告诉GameMaker实例将以如此高的速度移动，它将需要更昂贵的碰撞检测，以确保它不会在未检测到的情况下通过其他实例
The default value is false, and this can also be changed in the Global Game Options for individual target platforms.
默认值是false，这也可以在单个目标平台的全局游戏选项中更改。
The default value is that set by the Global Game Options for your game, or that set using the function gpu_set_texfilter().
默认值是由你的游戏的全局游戏选项设置的，或者使用函数gpu_set_texfilter()设置的。
The default value is that z-testing is disabled, so the function will return false.
默认值是禁用z-testing，因此函数将返回false。
The default value is that z-writing is enabled, so the function will return true.
默认值是启用z-write，因此函数将返回true。
The default value.
默认值。

默认值如下所示:

The delay time for the frame (in 100ths of a second)
帧的延迟时间(百分之一秒)

The delay time is calculated in 1/100ths of a second, but note that once the GIF has been created, if you use it for promotional purposes for example, different browsers may interpret the frame delay slightly differently - see here for more details.
延迟时间是以1/100秒计算的，但是注意，一旦创建了GIF，例如，如果您将它用于宣传目的，不同的浏览器可能会对帧延迟的解释略有不同——请参见此处了解更多详细信息。
The delimiter string to search for.
要搜索的分隔符字符串。
The delimiter to use when joining the values.
连接值时要使用的分隔符。
The density of something is defined as its mass per unit volume, which basically means how much mass is crammed into the space it takes up in the world.
物体的密度被定义为单位体积的质量，这基本上意味着它在世界上所占的空间中塞进了多少质量。
The density of the particle fixture.
颗粒夹具的密度。
The depth at which to set the particle system.
设定粒子系统的深度。

The depth can be any value, where the lower the depth the "nearer" to the camera things will be drawn and the higher the depth the further away, so an instance at depth -200 will be drawn over an instance at depth +300 (for example).
深度可以是任何值，深度越低，物体就越"接近"相机，深度越高，物体就越"远"，因此深度-200的实例将被绘制在深度+300的实例之上(例如)。
The depth that the layer has to be created at.
创建图层的深度。
The depth to assign the created instance to
要将创建的实例分配到的深度
The depth to check and retrieve the layer IDs from.
检查和检索层id的深度。
The description should be a short string of information that describes the save, eg: "Level2, Stage2".
描述应该是描述保存的简短信息字符串，例如:"Level2, Stage2"。
The device (from 0 - n) that is being checked
被检查的设备(从0到n)
The device (from 0 - n) that is being checked.
被检查的设备(从0到n)。

The device argument refers to the device touch number, which can be from 0 to n and note that the maximum number of touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs (most devices will support at least 4 simultaneous touches).
device参数指的是设备触摸数，可以从0到n，注意可以检测到的最大触摸数很大程度上取决于正在使用的设备及其运行的操作系统(大多数设备将支持至少4个同时触摸)。

The device argument refers to the touch number, which can be from 0 to n and the maximum number of touches that can be detected will depend very much on the device being used and the OS it runs (most devices will support at least 4 simultaneous touches).
设备参数指的是触摸次数，可以从0到n，可以检测到的最大触摸次数在很大程度上取决于所使用的设备及其运行的操作系统(大多数设备将支持至少4次同时触摸)。
The device is actually an emulator (Windows Phone or Android)
该设备实际上是一个模拟器(Windows Phone或Android)
The device is being held horizontally ie: The longest edge is from left to right, and the menu button is on the right.
设备水平放置，即:最长的边从左到右，菜单按钮在右边。
The device is being held vertically ie: The longest edge is from top to bottom, and the menu button is at the bottom.
设备是垂直握住的，即:最长的边从上到下，菜单按钮在底部。

The difference between this function and network_connect() is that this function can connect to any server and does nothing to the raw data, meaning that you have to implement the protocols yourself at the server end.
此函数和network_connect()的区别在于，此函数可以连接到任何服务器，对原始数据不做任何操作，这意味着你必须在服务器端自己实现协议。

The difference between this function and network_connect_async()is that this function can connect to any server and does nothing to the raw data, meaning that you have to implement the protocols yourself at the server end.
此函数与network_connect_async()之间的区别在于，此函数可以连接到任何服务器，而对原始数据不做任何操作，这意味着您必须自己在服务器端实现协议。
The different arguments that you want to pass through to the external function
你想传递给外部函数的不同参数
The different arguments that you want to pass through to the function/script
您想传递给函数/脚本的不同参数
The different bounding box values are always relative to the top left corner of the sprite (irrespective of the x and y origin) which is considered position (0, 0).
不同的边界框值总是相对于sprite的左上角(不考虑x和y原点),它被认为是位置(0，0)。
The different types of arguments being used
使用的不同类型的参数
The direction of the gravity.
重力的方向。
The direction of the point to return.
返回点的方向。
The direction to move in.
移动的方向。
The directory to start the search from.
开始搜索的目录。
The display name can be set in the Game Options.
显示名称可以在游戏选项中设置。
The distance (in inches) to set for double tap gesture event detection.
为双击手势事件检测设置的距离(英寸)。
The distance (in inches) to set for drag gesture event detection.
为拖动手势事件检测设置的距离(以英寸为单位)。
The distance in pixels between lines of text as if the string was being drawn.
在绘制字符串时文本行之间的像素距离。
The distance in pixels between lines of text.
文本行之间的像素距离。
The distance is measured in inches and has a default value of 0.1.
该距离以英寸为单位测量，默认值为0.1。
The distance to end the fog
结束雾的距离
The distance to start applying fog from
开始应用雾的距离
The distribution style of the particles.
粒子的分布方式。
The dot product is a value expressing the angular relationship between two vectors and is found by taking two vectors, multiplying them together and then adding the results.
点积是一个表示两个向量之间角度关系的值，通过取两个向量，将它们相乘，然后将结果相加得到。
The draw alpha affects the transparency of all draw functions, and can be set with the draw_set_alpha() function.
绘制alpha影响所有绘制函数的透明度，可以用draw_set_alpha()函数设置。
The draw begin event.
绘制开始事件
The draw end event.
绘制结束事件
The draw gui begin event.
绘制GUI开始事件
The draw gui end event.
绘制GUI结束事件
The draw gui event.
绘制GUI事件
The duration of the interpolation (from 0 to 1)
插值的持续时间(从0到1)
The element is a background.
该元素是一个背景。
The element is a legacy background tile (this is only valid for projects that have been imported from previous versions of GameMaker).
该元素是一个传统背景图块(仅对从GameMaker的早期版本导入的项目有效)。
The element is a particle system.
元素是一个粒子系统。
The element is a sequence asset.
该元素是序列资源。
The element is a sprite asset.
该元素是一个精灵资源。
The element is a tilemap.
该元素是一个tilemap。
The element is an instance.
该元素是一个实例。
The emitter to link to the audio bus.
发射器连接到音频总线。
The emitter whose audio bus should be returned.
应该返回其音频总线的发射器。
The end alpha of the particle.
粒子的末尾。
The end of the buffer
缓冲区的结束
The end result is two independent lists which contain the same information.
最终结果是包含相同信息的两个独立列表。
The ending alpha of the particle.
粒子的末尾alpha。
The error can be caused by invalid token, mismatch in client versions, mismatch in protocol versions.
错误可能是由无效的令牌、客户端版本不匹配、协议版本不匹配引起的。
The error means that client uses obsolete version of the protocol.
该错误意味着客户端使用的是该协议的过时版本。
The exact contents of the map are shown below:
map的具体内容如下:

The exact information returned will depend on the OS and the device, so it is recommended that you test this function on all platforms that you wish to target and output the returned values using a function like show_debug_message().
返回的确切信息将取决于操作系统和设备，因此建议您在希望瞄准的所有平台上测试此函数，并使用show_debug_message()之类的函数输出返回值。
The exact string format will vary depending on the target platform chosen, but it will mostly have the script/event name, then a colon : and the line number, similar to this:
确切的字符串格式将根据所选的目标平台而有所不同，但它通常包含脚本/事件名称，然后是冒号:和行号，如下所示:

The example code below shows a typical use of this command in the draw event of an instance to check for a surface and re-create it if it has been removed (note that the surface will have been originally created in the create event of the object).
下面的示例代码显示了该命令在实例的draw事件中的典型用法，用于检查表面并在表面已被删除时重新创建它(注意，表面最初是在对象的create事件中创建的)。
The example image below shows the default position for the listener in the audio space:
下面的示例图像显示了在音频空间中的默认位置:
The expiry type of the time source
时间源的到期类型
The falloff factor (default 1).
衰减乘数(默认为1)。
The falloff reference relative to the listener (clamp).
相对于(钳制)的衰减参考。
The far clipping plane.
远剪裁平面。
The file (OGG only) to stream the audio from.
用于流播放音频的文件(仅OGG)。
The file find functions open handles into the file directory and these take up a minimal amount of memory, which (over time) mounts up.
文件查找功能打开文件目录中的句柄，这些句柄只占用最小的内存量，随着时间的推移，内存会逐渐增加。
The file itself can have almost any extension (for example, *.dat, *.json, *.bin, etc...) and will be obfuscated and stored to local storage on the target platform.
文件本身几乎可以有任何扩展名(例如，*.dat, *.json, *.bin等)，并将被模糊化并存储到目标平台的本地存储中。
The file name and path to use.
要使用的文件名和路径。

The file should contain all the information that you need to save for your game as you can only store one single "data blob" to the cloud, and running this function again will overwrite any previously stored values (as will using the cloud_string_save() function).
该文件应该包含你需要为游戏保存的所有信息，因为你只能将一个"数据包"存储到云端，再次运行此函数将覆盖所有之前存储的值(如使用cloud_string_save()函数))。
The file to be uploaded (as a string).
要上传的文件(作为字符串)。
The file to generate the MD5 hash for.
要为其生成MD5哈希的文件。
The file to generate the sha1 hash for.
要为其生成sha1哈希的文件。
The file to stream the audio from.
音频流所来自的文件。
The file to use.
要使用的文件。
The file type filter and/or name.
文件类型过滤器和/或名称。

The file will be saved to the working directory of the game, which in windows is located at <drive>:/Users/YOURUSERNAME/AppData/Local/[Game Name]/ and on Mac it would be ~/Library/Application Support/[Game Name]/.
该文件将保存到游戏的工作目录中，在windows中位于:/Users/YOURUSERNAME/AppData/Local/[游戏名]/，在Mac中它将是~/Library/Application Support/[游戏名]/。
The filename for the .ini file.
.ini文件的文件名
The filename for the saved sprite strip.
保存的精灵条的文件名。
The filename for the saved sprite.
保存的精灵的文件名。
The filename for the screenshot to save
要保存的截图的文件名
The filename of the image to make the new sprite.
制作新精灵的图像的文件名。
The filename to use for the gif
用于gif的文件名
The filter has the form "name1|mask1|name2|mask2|...", where the mask may contain the different options with a semicolon between them and you can also use a "*" to mean any string.
该过滤器的形式为"名称1|掩码1|名称2|掩码2| ..."，其中掩码可能包含不同的选项，选项之间用分号隔开，您也可以使用"*"表示任何字符串。
The filtered elements will be padded to offset and order by the traversing direction.
过滤后的元素将按偏移和遍历方向排序填充。
The final argument is for making the sound loop and setting it to true will make the sound loop until it is stopped and setting it to false will play the sound once only.
最后一个参数是使声音循环，设置为true将使声音循环直到停止，设置为false将只播放一次声音。

The final look of the primitive will depend on the primitive type chosen to draw (See draw_primitive_begin() for more information), the order with which you add the vertexes to it and the position of the start point you set for the texture.
图元的最终外观取决于所选择绘制的图元类型(更多信息请参见draw_primitive_begin())、添加顶点的顺序以及为纹理设置的起始点的位置。

The final look of the primitive will depend on the primitive type chosen to draw (See draw_primitive_begin() for more information), the order with which you add the vertices to it, the position of the start and end points that you give for the texture sample and the colour and alpha values that you have set.
图元的最终外观将取决于选择绘制的图元类型(参见draw_primitive_begin()获得更多信息)，添加顶点的顺序，纹理样本的起始点和结束点的位置，以及设置的颜色和alpha值。

The final look of the primitive will depend on the primitive type chosen to draw and the order with which you add the vertexes to it (see draw_primitive_begin() for more information) and the vertexes with different colours and alphas will blend smoothly from one to the other.
图元的最终外观将取决于所选择的绘制的图元类型和添加顶点的顺序(更多信息请参阅draw_primitive_begin())，具有不同颜色和alpha的顶点将顺利地从一个顶点混合到另一个顶点。
The final look of the primitive will depend on the primitive type chosen to draw and the order with which you add the vertexes to it.
图元的最终外观将取决于所选择的绘制图元类型以及向其添加顶点的顺序。
The final value for the group volume.
最终的组的音量值。

The first alpha is that which all particles will start with, and the second alpha is the one on with which the particle will end with, and a smooth gradient change will occur to the alpha over the particles lifetime from one to the other.
第一个alpha是所有粒子开始时的alpha，第二个alpha是粒子结束时的alpha，在粒子的生命周期中，从一个粒子到另一个粒子的alpha会发生平滑的梯度变化。

The first alpha is that which all particles will start with, and the second alpha is the one that will be blended to half way through its lifetime and the third alpha is the one with which the particle will end with.
第一个是所有粒子开始时的状态，第二个是在生命周期的一半会混合的状态第三个是粒子结束时的状态。
The first anchor point is connected to instance 1, the second anchor point is connected to instance 2 and the distance and the maxlength argument sets the maximum length constraint on the joint.
第一个锚点连接到实例1，第二个锚点连接到实例2,distance和maxlength参数设置了关节的最大长度约束。
The first anchor point is connected to instance 1, the second anchor point is connected to instance 2 and the distance between these points imply the length of the distance constrain.
第一个锚点连接到实例1，第二个锚点连接到实例2，这些点之间的距离意味着距离约束的长度。
The first angle to use.
第一个角度。
The first character in a string is always indexed as 1 and not 0 as you may expect, so to copy (for example) the first five characters of string you would have string_copy(str, 1, 5).
字符串中的第一个字符总是被索引为1，而不是您所期望的0，所以要复制(例如)字符串的前五个字符，您需要string_copy(str，1，5)。
The first character to include (if you're unsure, go for 32).
第一个要包含的字符(如果不确定，可以选择32)。

The first colour is that which all particles will start with, and the second colour is the one on which the particle will end with, and a smooth gradient change will occur to the colour over the particles lifetime from one colour to the other.
第一种颜色是所有粒子开始时的颜色，第二种颜色是粒子结束时的颜色，在粒子的整个生命周期中，颜色会从一种颜色渐变到另一种颜色。

The first colour is that which all particles will start with, and the second colour is the one that will be blended to half way through its lifetime and the third colour is the one with which the particle will end with.
第一种颜色是所有粒子开始时的颜色，第二种颜色是在其生命周期的中途混合的颜色，第三种颜色是粒子结束时的颜色。
The first colour the blend will take from.
混合的第一个颜色。
The first colour to merge
要合并的第一种颜色
The first date.
第一个日期。
The first datetime.
第一个日期时间。
The first input value.
第一个输入值。
The first instance to connect with the joint
与关节连接的第一个实例
The first is from the lower bit of the red colour value, and the second is from the lower bit of the blue colour value.
第一个来自红色值的低位，第二个来自蓝色值的低位。
The first matrix index to use.
使用的第一个矩阵索引。
The first particle group to join.
要第一个加入的粒子组。
The first step in setting up a fixture is creating it with this function.
设置夹具的第一步是使用此函数创建它。
The first texture coordinate to use (0 - 1).
要使用的第一个纹理坐标(0 - 1)。

The first two arguments are the sprite to draw and the sub-image of the sprite (the same as in the function draw_sprite()) but the next ones are those that define the position of each of the four corners of the bounding box of the given sprite.
前两个参数是要绘制的sprite和sprite的子图像(与函数draw_sprite()中的相同)，但接下来的参数是定义给定sprite的边界框的四个角的位置的参数。
The first value.
第一个值。
The first x coordinate for the joint, within the game world
游戏世界中关节的第一个x坐标
The first x coordinate.
第一个x坐标。
The first y coordinate for the joint, within the game world
游戏世界中关节的第一个y坐标
The first y coordinate.
第一个y坐标。
The flag value for showing different debug features
用于显示不同调试功能的标志值
The flag will be either true (enabled, the default value) or false (disabled).
该标志将为true(启用，默认值)或false(禁用)。
The flags are set using any of the constants given below, and you would use the bitwise or "|" to create a single flag value to get the desired information.
使用下面给出的任何常量设置标志，您可以使用位或"|"创建单个标志值，以获得所需的信息。
The flags themselves are set using the constants given below, and you would use the bitwise or "|" to create a single flag value to get the desired information.
标志本身是使用下面给出的常量设置的，您可以使用位或"|"来创建单个标志值，以获得所需的信息。
The flags to set on the particle.
要在粒子上设置的标志。
The flags to use to extract data about specific particle types.
用于提取关于特定粒子类型的数据的标志。
The flags value for the particle.
粒子的标志值。
The floating point value (or values) to set the shader constant to.
要设置着色器常量的浮点值。
The fog colour
雾的颜色

The following arguments are for setting the length of the buffer data (in bytes) from the initial offset point that you wish to load and the offset point to load the data to in the buffer (again, in bytes).
以下参数用于设置缓冲区数据的长度(以字节为单位),该长度从您希望加载的初始偏移点开始，到缓冲区中要加载数据的偏移点为止(同样以字节为单位)。
The following constants are accepted:

下图是如何设置包含三个画布元素的页面的示例:

The font for which information should be retrieved.
检索信息的字体。
The font to replace.
要替换的字体。
The format of the buffer data to use (buffer_u8 or buffer_s16).
使用的缓冲区数据的格式(buffer_u8或buffer_s16)。
The format of the data in the buffer (buffer_u8 or buffer_s16).
缓冲区中数据的格式(buffer_u8或buffer_s16)。
The fourth input value.
第四个输入值。
The fourth x coordinate.
第四个x坐标。
The fourth y coordinate.
第四个y坐标。
The frame index should be an real value between 0 and the number of frames for the animation (which you can get using the function skeleton_animation_get_frames).
帧索引应该是一个介于0和动画帧数之间的实数值(可以使用skeleton_animation_get_frames函数获得)。
The frame number for the animated tile to use (default 0 for non-animated tiles)
要使用的动画图块的帧号（非动画图块的默认值为 0）
The frame value is for telling GameMaker what part of the animation to show and is a value between 0 and the image_number.
frame值是用来告诉GameMaker要显示动画的哪一部分，它的值介于0和image_number之间。

The friction joint is a bit different to all other joints in the physics simulation in that the connection created will not constrain the instances position or movement, but rather its speed and rotation.
摩擦关节与物理模拟中的所有其他关节略有不同，因为创建的连接不会约束实例的位置或移动，而是约束其速度和旋转。
The front side is said to be the side where the vertices are defined in counter-clockwise order.
前面的边就是顶点按逆时针顺序定义的边。
The full URL where the comment has to be sent.
要发送评论的完整URL。
The function can take a further 14 optional arguments (making a total of 15 possible additions), permitting you to add multiple values consecutively to the tail of the queue in a single call.
此函数还可以接受14个可选参数(总共15个可能的加法)，允许您在一次调用中向队列尾部连续添加多个值。
The function can take a further 14 optional arguments (making a total of 15 possible additions), permitting you to push multiple values consecutively to the stack in a single call.
此函数还可以接受14个可选参数(总共15个可能的加法)，允许您在一次调用中将多个值连续推入堆栈。
The function can take further optional arguments (as many as you require), permitting you to add multiple values consecutively to the list in a single call.
此函数可以接受更多的可选参数(您需要多少就有多少)，允许您在一次调用中向列表中连续添加多个值。
The function does not return anything, so if you need to check if the key value has been replaced or a new key has been created, then you should use the function ds_map_replace().
此函数不返回任何内容，因此如果需要检查键值是否已被替换或已创建新键，则应该使用函数ds_map_replace()。
The function has an optional second argument where you can supply an array that you have created, in which case the map key data will be appended onto any existing data in the array.
此函数有一个可选的第二个参数，您可以在其中提供您创建的数组，在这种情况下，映射键数据将被追加到数组中的任何现有数据上。
The function has an optional second argument where you can supply an array that you have created, in which case the map key value data will be appended onto any existing data in the array.
此函数有一个可选的第二个参数，您可以在其中提供已创建的数组，在这种情况下，映射键值数据将附加到数组中的任何现有数据。
The function has an upper bound of $7fffffffffffffffLL, so care should be taken if using very large numbers.
此函数的上限为$7fffffffffffffffLL，因此如果使用非常大的数字，就要小心了。

The function has two buttons that show "Yes" and "No", and once the user has pressed one, an asynchronous Dialog event is triggered which, for the duration of that event only, will have a DS map stored in the variable async_load.
此函数有两个按钮，分别显示"Yes"和"No"，一旦用户按下其中一个按钮，就会触发一个异步对话框事件，在该事件持续期间，该事件的DS map将存储在变量async_load中。
The function is asynchronous so your game will continue to run while the audio is loaded in the background.
此函数是异步的，所以你的游戏将继续运行，而音频在后台加载。

The function is designed to help prevent instability in the physics simulation, especially when using very small particles which may behave unpredictably (i.e. break conservation of momentum) in scenarios such as explosions.
此函数旨在帮助防止物理模拟中的不稳定性，特别是当使用非常小的粒子时，这些粒子可能会在爆炸等场景中表现出不可预测的行为(即打破动量守恒)。
The function is exclusively for the HTML5 platform and is only useful when loading sprites from a file using the sprite_add() function.
此函数仅适用于HTML5平台，仅在使用sprite_add()函数从文件加载精灵时有用。
The function itself takes the index (ID) of the fixture and can tell the fixture to loop or not.
此函数本身接受夹具的索引(ID ),并可以告诉夹具是否循环。

The function needs a buffer to store the data in and will take either a colour constant, or a hex value (using the standard GameMaker format of BGR, eg: $FF0000 for blue) as well as an alpha value from 0 (transparent) to 1 (fully opaque).
此函数需要一个缓冲区来存储数据，并将采用颜色常量或十六进制值(使用BGR的标准GameMaker格式，例如:$FF0000表示蓝色)以及从0(透明)到1(完全不透明)的alpha值。
The function requires one of the constants listed below.
此函数需要下面列出的一个常量。
The function requires that you supply the ID of the virtual key to delete - as returned by virtual_key_add().
此函数要求您提供要删除的虚拟键的ID——由virtual_key_add()返回。
The function requires the filename (which can be an included file, for example) and will return the new sound index for use.
此函数需要文件名(例如，可以是一个包含的文件)，并将返回用于使用的新声音索引。

The function requires the full IP address of the server to request from as well as the type of request to make (as a string, see the note below): "GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "TRACE", "OPTIONS", or "CONNECT".
此函数需要请求的服务器的完整IP地址以及请求的类型(作为字符串，参见下面的注释):"GET", "HEAD", "POST", "PUT", "DELETE", "TRACE", "OPTIONS", 或 "CONNECT"。
The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array and the index to get the value from within that array.
此函数要求您提供一个包含数组和索引的变量，以便从数组中获取值。

The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array as well as at least one value to push, although you can optionally provide further arguments and they will all be pushed onto the array in consecutive order.
此函数要求您提供一个保存数组的变量以及至少一个要推入的值，不过您也可以选择提供进一步的参数，它们将以连续的顺序推入数组。
The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array as well as the index to set and the value to set it to.
函数要求您提供一个变量，该变量保存数组以及要设置的索引和要设置的值。
The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array, the index (position) in the array to delete from, as well as the number of values to delete.
此函数要求您提供一个变量来保存数组、数组中要删除的索引(位置)以及要删除的值的数量。

The function requires you to provide a variable that holds the array, the index (position) in the array to insert at, as well as at least one value to insert, although you can optionally provide further arguments and they will all be inserted into the array in consecutive order from the given index.
此函数要求您提供一个保存数组的变量、要插入的数组中的下标(位置)以及至少一个要插入的值，尽管您可以选择提供进一步的参数，它们将从给定的下标依次插入到数组中。
The function requires you to provide the array to sort, and then either of the following:
此函数要求您提供要排序的数组，然后执行以下操作之一:
The function requires you to supply one or more system flags as an integer value.
此函数要求您提供一个或多个整数值形式的系统标志。
The function returns -1 if date1 is earlier, 0 if both dates are the same, and 1 if date1 is later.
如果日期1在前面，函数返回-1；如果两个日期相同，函数返回0；如果日期1在后面，函数返回1。

The function returns -1 if date1 is earlier, 1 if date1 is later and 0 if they are the same, although since this takes time into account as well, a 0 for matching is very rare (it literally has to be the same second of the same day of the same month of the same year to return a 0).
如果日期1较早，函数返回-1；如果日期1较晚，函数返回1；如果日期1和日期1相同，函数返回0，尽管这也考虑了时间因素，但匹配0的情况非常少见(实际上，必须是同一年同一月同一天的同一秒才能返回0)。
The function returns -1 if datetime1 is earlier, 1 if datetime1 is later and 0 if they are the same, and it ignores the date, so literally just which of the times is further through its given day.
如果datetime1更早，函数返回-1；如果datetime1更晚，函数返回1；如果两者相同，函数返回0，并且忽略日期，因此从字面上看，哪个时间比给定日期更早。
The function returns a 2 element 1D array with the following elements in it:
此函数返回一个包含以下元素的2元素1D数组:
The function returns a 4 element 1D array with the following elements in it which will be either true (enabled) or false (disabled).
此函数返回一个4元素的1D数组，其中包含以下元素，这些元素将为真(启用)或假(禁用)。
The function returns a 4 element 1D array with the following elements in it:
此函数返回一个4元素1D数组，其中包含以下元素:
The function returns a 4 element 1D array with the following information:
此函数返回一个包含以下信息的4元素1D数组:
The function returns a struct which you can then access to setup the new sequence you have created.
此函数返回一个结构，然后您可以访问该结构来设置所创建的新序列。
The function returns a unique buffer id that should be stored in a variable and used for all further function calls to the buffer.
此函数返回一个唯一的缓冲区id，该id应该存储在一个变量中，并用于对该缓冲区的所有进一步的函数调用。
The function returns a unique id value which would then be used in the Asynchronous Cloud Event to retrieve the relevant information from the DS map that is created.
此函数返回一个惟一的id值，然后在异步云事件中使用该值从创建的DS map中检索相关信息。
The function returns a unique id which should be used stored in a variable and used to identify the server in all further network functions, or a value of less than 0 if the connection fails.
此函数返回一个唯一的id，该id应该存储在一个变量中，用于在所有其他网络函数中标识服务器，如果连接失败，则返回一个小于0的值。
The function returns an array with the following 8 elements:
此函数返回一个包含以下8个元素的数组:
The function returns an index value that should be stored in a variable as this will be needed in all further code that refer to this font, or it will return -1 if the function fails for any reason.
此函数返回一个索引值，该索引值应该存储在一个变量中，因为在所有引用该字体的后续代码中都需要这样做，否则，如果函数因任何原因失败，则返回-1。
The function returns either true (it succeeded in finding a path) or false (it failed) as well as setting the chosen path.
此函数返回true(成功找到路径)或false(失败),并设置选择的路径。
The function returns the matrix ID value which can then be used in other matrix functions or to set the projection matrix of another camera (using camera_set_proj_mat()).
此函数返回矩阵ID值，该值可用于其他矩阵函数或设置另一台相机的投影矩阵(使用camera_set_proj_mat())。
The function returns the matrix ID value which can then be used in other matrix functions or to set the view matrix of another camera (using camera_set_view_mat()).
此函数返回矩阵ID值，该值可用于其他矩阵函数或设置另一台相机的视图矩阵(使用camera_set_view_mat())。
The function returns the new sprite index which must then be used in all further code that relates to the sprite.
此函数返回新的sprite索引，该索引必须在与sprite相关的所有后续代码中使用。
The function returns the number of instances found, or 0 if none are found.
此函数返回找到的实例数，如果没有找到，则返回0。
The function returns the unique ID value for the element, which can then be used in further layer functions for backgrounds.
此函数返回元素的唯一ID值，该值可用于背景的其他图层函数中。
The function returns the unique ID value for the element, which can then be used in further layer functions for sprites.
此函数返回元素的唯一ID值，然后可以在精灵的进一步层函数中使用。
The function returns the unique id of the instance which can then be used in further function calls to set properties etc... of that instance, but only once the game has entered the specified room.
此函数返回实例的唯一id，然后在进一步的函数调用中使用该id来设置属性等。但只有当游戏进入了指定的房间。
The function returns true if the end of the line has been reached and false otherwise.
如果到达行尾，则函数返回true，否则返回false。
The function returns whether the goal was reached or not.
此函数返回是否达到目标。

The function takes a (previously created) ds_list() containing the x/y position of each point of the polygon, with the even numbered positions in the list being the x coordinates, and odd numbered positions the y coordinates, ie: for a triangle, your list would have six entries, with entry 0, 2, and 4 being the x coordinates and 1, 3, and 5 being the y coordinates.
此函数接受一个(先前创建的)ds_list()，其中包含多边形中每个点的x/y位置，列表中偶数编号的位置是x坐标，奇数编号的位置是y坐标，例如:对于一个三角形，您的列表将有六个条目，条目0、2和4是x坐标，1、3和5是y坐标。
The function takes a time value specified in microseconds (where 1,000,000 microseconds equals one second) and the default target frame time is 100 microseconds.
此函数接受一个以微秒为单位的时间值(其中1,000,000微秒等于1秒)，默认目标帧时间为100微秒。
The function takes the id for the vertex buffer to use (as returned by the function vertex_create_buffer(), for example) with the following constants being used to define the buffer type:
此函数采用要使用的顶点缓冲区的id(例如，由函数vertex_create_buffer()返回的id ),并使用以下常量来定义缓冲区类型:

The function takes the socket id to connect through (see network_create_socket()) and requires you to give the IP address to connect to (a string) as well as the port to connect through, and if the connection fails a value of less than 0 will be returned.
此函数使用套接字id进行连接(参见network_create_socket())，并要求您提供要连接的IP地址(一个字符串)以及要连接的端口，如果连接失败，将返回小于0的值。

The function takes the socket id to connect through and then you must supply the buffer id which contains the data to be sent (for more information on buffers see Reference - Buffers) and finally the size (in bytes) of the data packet.
此函数接受套接字id进行连接，然后必须提供包含要发送的数据的缓冲区id(有关缓冲区的更多信息，请参阅参考-缓冲区)，最后是数据包的大小(以字节为单位)。
The function takes the socket id to connect through, the URL to connect to and the port to use.
函数接受要连接的套接字id、要连接的URL和要使用的端口。
The function takes the unique ID of the particle to delete, as returned by the function physics_particle_create().
此函数获取要删除的粒子的唯一ID，该ID由函数physics_particle_create()返回。
The function takes the unique group ID of the group to delete, as returned by the function physics_particle_group_end().
此函数采用要删除的组的唯一组ID，由函数physics_particle_group_end()返回。

The function takes the unique group IDs of the groups to join, as returned by the function physics_particle_group_end(), and you can use the function any number of times for a single group to join various soft bodies together.
此函数采用要加入的组的唯一组id，如函数physics_particle_group_end()所返回的，并且您可以对单个组使用此函数任意次，以将各种柔体加入到一起。
The function takes the view port index (from 0 to 7) and a boolean true if it is visible and false if it is not.
此函数接受视图端口索引(从0到7)和一个布尔值，如果可见则为true，如果不可见则为false。
The function takes the x and y position for the center of the area to delete as well as the half width and height of the rectangle (in pixels) which defines the area.
此函数获取待删除区域中心的x和y位置，以及定义该区域的矩形的半宽和高度(以像素为单位)。
The function takes the x and y position for the center of the area to delete as well as the radius (in pixels) which defines the circular area.
此函数获取待删除区域中心的x和y位置，以及定义圆形区域的半径(以像素为单位)。
The function to be executed as filter.
要作为过滤器执行的函数。
The function to be executed for each array entry.
为数组每一项执行的函数。
The function to be executed for mapping the values.
为映射值而执行的函数。
The function to be used for element initialisation.
用于元素初始化的函数。
The function used to perform the check.
用于执行检查的函数。
The function used to perform the search.
用于执行搜索的函数。
The function will also return the full line as a string, making it an easy way to read complete "chunks" of data for parsing later.
此函数还将以字符串的形式返回整行，从而使读取完整的数据"块"以供以后解析成为一种简单的方法。
The function will also return true if the file has successfully been removed, or false in any other circumstances.
如果文件已被成功删除，此函数也将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will ignore any value given that is longer than the length of the sound given for the "index" value.
此函数将忽略任何给定的比"索引"值的声音长度更长的值。
The function will only work while the game is in focus and using ALT + Tab will unlock the mouse.
此函数仅在游戏处于焦点时有效，使用ALT + Tab将解锁鼠标。
The function will only work while the game is in focus and using alt + tab will unlock the mouse.
此函数只会在游戏聚焦时工作，使用alt +标签将解锁鼠标。

The function will populate a (previously created) DS list with the unique id values of all instances of the object that are considered to be in collision with the calling instance, and you have the option to order the list based on the distance from the origin of the instance doing the checking to the origin of the instances found to be in collision.
此函数将使用被认为与调用实例碰撞的对象的所有实例的唯一id值来填充(先前创建的)DS列表，并且您可以选择根据从执行检查的实例的原点到发现碰撞的实例的原点的距离来对列表进行排序。
The function will return -1 if either the background element doesn't exist or the element doesn't have a valid sprite assigned to it.
如果背景元素不存在或者元素没有有效的精灵分配给它，此函数将返回-1。
The function will return -1 if either the sprite element doesn't exist or the element doesn't have a valid sprite assigned to it.
如果精灵元素不存在或元素没有有效的精灵分配给它，此函数将返回-1。
The function will return -1 if no animation is assigned to the specific track given.
如果指定的轨道没有动画，此函数将返回-1。
The function will return -1 if no font is set, or the ID value (a positive integer) for the font resource assigned.
如果没有设置字体，此函数将返回-1，或者为分配的字体资源返回ID值(一个正整数)。
The function will return 0 if it's not found at all, or the position of the first character of the sub-string if it is found.
如果根本没有找到，此函数将返回0;如果找到了，则返回子字符串的第一个字符的位置。
The function will return 0 if the search string is not found, or the position of the first character of the search string if it is.
如果没有找到搜索字符串，此函数将返回0；如果找到了，则返回搜索字符串的第一个字符的位置。
The function will return 0 if the specified animation does not exist.
如果指定的动画不存在，此函数将返回0。
The function will return a "Pointer" (index) for the buffer which should then be used in all further calls to it.
此函数将为缓冲区返回一个"指针"(索引)，然后在所有对它的后续调用中使用它。
The function will return a method which can be called from the variable it is assigned to (see the code example below).
函数将返回一个方法，可以从赋值给它的变量调用该方法(参见下面的代码示例)。
The function will return a modified tile-data set which can then be applied using the tilemap_set() function.
此函数将返回一个修改过的图块数据，然后可以使用tilemap_set()函数应用该数据集。
The function will return a modified tile-data set which can then be applied using the tilemap_set() function.
此函数将返回修改后的切片数据集，然后可以使用tilemap_set()函数应用该数据集。
The function will return a new buffer ID value for the compressed buffer, or a value less than 0 if it has failed for any reason.
此函数将为压缩的缓冲区返回一个新的缓冲区ID值，如果由于任何原因失败，则返回一个小于0的值。
The function will return a pointer to the struct and this is then used to add channels and other data to the animation curve.
此函数将返回指向结构的指针，然后用于向动画曲线添加通道和其他数据。

The function will return a struct which will have the following member variables (note that "objects" here refers to anything that can be garbage collected and not general object instances as defined in the Asset Browser):
此函数将返回一个结构，该结构将具有以下成员变量(注意，这里的"对象"指的是任何可以被垃圾收集的东西，而不是资源浏览器中定义的一般对象实例):
The function will return a unique ID value for the save, which can then be used in the Asynchronous Save / Load event to parse the results from the async_load DS map.
此函数将为保存返回一个惟一的ID值，然后可以在异步保存/加载事件中使用它来解析来自async_load DS map的结果。
The function will return a unique id value that should then be used in the appropriate asynchronous event to identify the DS map that is returned as a "call back" from the cloud service.
此函数将返回一个惟一的id值，然后在适当的异步事件中使用该值来标识作为云服务"回调"返回的DS map。
The function will return an array where each entry is the name (as a string) of the asset with the given tag.
此函数将返回一个数组，其中每个条目都是带有给定标签的资源的名称(作为一个字符串)。

The function will return an array with 8 values per display (ie: if you have two displays, the array will have a length of 16 indices), where the values [0 ... 3] correspond to the overlapx1, overlapy1, overlapx2, overlapy2 - defining the region of overlap on this display and will be set to 0,0,0,0 if no overlap - and the values [4 ... 7] corresponds to the monitorx1, monitory1, monitorx2, monitory2 - the coordinates of the display in the virtual display space.
此函数将返回一个数组，每个显示器有8个值(即:如果您有两个显示器，该数组将有16个索引的长度)，其中值[0...3]对应于overlapx1，overlapy1，overlapx2，overlapy2 -定义该显示器上的重叠区域，如果没有重叠，将被设置为0，0，0，0-以及值[4...7]对应于显示器1，显示器1，显示器2，显示器2 -显示器在虚拟显示空间中的坐标。
The function will return an id value which must be stored in a variable to be used in all further button functions that reference the new icon.
此函数将返回一个id值，该值必须存储在一个变量中，以便在所有引用新图标的后续按钮函数中使用。
The function will return an array of 3 (or 4 if a w is given) elements where:
此函数将返回一个包含3个元素(如果给定w则返回4个元素)的数组，其中:
The function will return one of the constants listed below, with the default setting being mip_markedonly.
此函数将返回下面列出的常量之一，默认设置为mip_markedonly。
The function will return the ID value associated with that sprite element on the layer.
此函数将返回与该层上的精灵元素相关的ID值。

The function will return the index value for the new emitter which must be stored in a variable and used in all further functions that reference the emitter, and the emitter itself must be destroyed when no longer being used to prevent memory leaks (this can be achieved using the specific emitter destroy functions or by destroying the whole particle system that the emitter belongs to).
此函数将返回新发射器的索引值，该值必须存储在一个变量中，并在引用发射器的所有其他函数中使用，并且发射器本身在不再用于防止内存泄漏时必须销毁(这可以通过使用特定的发射器销毁函数或销毁发射器所属的整个粒子系统来实现)。
The function will return the input string, or the default value if nothing has been entered.
此函数将返回输入字符串，如果没有输入任何内容，则返回默认值。
The function will return the new matrix index which should be stored in a variable for future use.
函数将返回新的矩阵索引，该索引应存储在一个变量中以备将来使用。
The function will return the new randomised seed value (an unsigned 32bit integer).
此函数将返回新的随机种子值(无符号32位整数)。
The function will return the number of bytes of data sent, or a number less than 0 if the send has failed.
此函数将返回已发送数据的字节数，如果发送失败则返回小于0的数字。
The function will return the typed in integer, or the default value if nothing has been entered.
此函数将返回键入的整数，如果没有输入任何内容，则返回默认值。

The function will return the unique ID of the sequence element, which can then be used in all further layer functions for sequences, or it can be used to retrieve the sequence instance struct using the function layer_sequence_get_instance().
此函数将返回序列元素的唯一ID，然后可以在序列的所有其他层函数中使用该ID，或者可以使用函数layer_sequence_get_instance()来检索序列实例结构。
The function will return the value held by the variable or undefined if the named variable does not exist.
如果指定的变量不存在，函数将返回变量所持有的值。
The function will return the value held by the variable, or undefined if the variable does not exist.
函数将返回变量持有的值，如果变量不存在则返回undefined。
The function will return true if AA is enabled, and false if it is not.
如果启用了AA，此函数将返回true，如果未启用则返回false。
The function will return true if a variable with the given name exists for the instance and false otherwise.
如果实例中存在具有给定名称的变量，则此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if a variable with the given name exists for the struct and false otherwise.
如果该结构存在具有给定名称的变量，则此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if it is enabled or false otherwise.
如果函数被启用，则返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if it is enabled, and false otherwise and you can enable or disable tap counting using the function gesture_tap_count().
如果启用，此函数将返回true，否则返回false，您可以使用函数gesture_tap_count()来启用或禁用点击计数。
The function will return true if it is visible and false if it is not.
如果可见，函数将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if loading is initiated and false if the group ID is invalid, or it has already been flagged for loading.
如果加载被启动，此函数将返回true，如果组ID无效或已经标记为加载，则返回false。
The function will return true if the OS virtual keyboard is visible/being shown or false if it is hidden/hiding.
如果操作系统虚拟键盘可见/显示，此函数将返回true如果隐藏，此函数将返回false。
The function will return true if the file has successfully been renamed, or false in any other circumstances.
如果文件已成功重命名，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if the given input is numeric, and false otherwise.
如果给定的输入是数值，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
The function will return true if the instance is on the layer and false if it is not.
如果实例在图层上，此函数将返回true，如果不在图层上，则返回false。
The function will return true if the key exists and the value is replaced, and false if the key does not exist and a new key was created with the value.
如果键存在且值被替换，则此函数将返回true;如果键不存在且用该值创建了一个新键，则返回false。
The function will return true if the tile was successfully set and false if there was an issue and it wasn't set.
如果贴图设置成功，此函数将返回true，如果存在问题且未设置，则返回false。
The function will return true if unloading is initiated and false if the group ID is invalid, or it has already been flagged for unloading.
如果开始卸载，此函数将返回true，如果组ID无效，或者已经标记为卸载，则返回false。
The function will return whether a path was found (true) or not (false).
此函数将返回是找到路径(true)或(false)。
The function will return whether it has reached the goal position (true) or if it has failed (false).
此函数将返回是否已到达目标位置(true)或是否已失败(false)。
The function will take a keycode value as returned by the function ord() (only capital letters from A-Z or numbers from 0-9), or any of the vk_* constants listed on the main Keyboard Input page.
此函数将接受ord()函数返回的keycode值(只接受a - z中的大写字母或0-9中的数字)，或主键盘输入页面中列出的任何vk_*常量。
The function will trigger a Social Asynchronous Event where the returned async_load DS map will have the following key/value pairs:
此函数将触发一个社交异步事件，其中返回的async_load DS map将具有以下键/值对:
The function will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs.
此函数将触发一个回调社会异步事件，其中包含用相关键/值对填充的async_load映射。
The gain value is based on a linear scale from 0 (silent) to 1 (full volume) and will affect the relative volume of all sounds and music played from within your game through that listener.
增益值基于从0(静音)到1(最大音量)的线性范围，将影响游戏中通过该播放的所有声音和音乐的相对音量。
The gain value returned is based on a linear scale from 0 (silent) to 1 (full volume).
返回的增益值基于从0(静音)到1(全音量)的线性缩放。
The game is loaded from a previously created "grow" buffer (see Buffers) and the buffer must have had a game state saved to it using game_save_buffer() function.
游戏是从先前创建的"增长"缓冲区(参见Buffers)中加载的，并且缓冲区必须已经使用game_save_buffer()函数保存了游戏状态。
The game speed (as specified in the Game Options) and the fps (frames per second).
游戏速度(在游戏选项中指定)和fps(每秒帧数)。
The gamepad's W orientation
游戏手柄的W方向
The gamepad's X orientation
游戏手柄的X方向
The gamepad's Y orientation
游戏手柄的Y方向
The gamepad's Z orientation
游戏手柄的Z方向
The gamepad's acceleration on the X axis
游戏手柄在X轴上的加速度
The gamepad's acceleration on the Y axis
游戏手柄在Y轴上的加速度
The gamepad's acceleration on the Z axis
游戏手柄在Z轴上的加速度
The gamepad's angular velocity on the X axis
游戏手柄在X轴上的角速度
The gamepad's angular velocity on the Y axis
游戏手柄在Y轴上的角速度
The gamepad's angular velocity on the Z axis
游戏手柄在Z轴上的角速度
The general rule of thumb is that if an instance has a lot of inertia, you will need a lot of torque to get it to start rotating.
一般的经验法则是，如果一个实例有很大的惯性，你将需要很大的扭矩来让它开始旋转。
The given name refers to a Sequence.
给定的名称引用了一个序列。
The given name refers to a font.
给定的名称引用了一种字体。
The given name refers to a path.
给定的名称引用了一个路径。
The given name refers to a room.
给定的名称引用了一个房间。
The given name refers to a script.
给定的名称引用了一个脚本。
The given name refers to a shader.
给定的名称引用了一个着色器。
The given name refers to a sound.
给定的名称引用了一个声音。
The given name refers to a sprite.
给定的名称引用了一个精灵。
The given name refers to a tile set.
给定的名称引用了一个图块集。
The given name refers to a time line.
给定的名称引用了时间线。
The given name refers to an Animation Curve.
给定的名称引用了动画曲线。
The given name refers to an asset that either does not exist, or is not one of the above listed.
给定的名称指的是不存在的资源，或者不是上面列出的资源之一。
The given name refers to an object.
给定的名称引用了一个对象。
The gml_pragma function affects how the given target compiles your code and should be called with the different commands to further optimise the final compilation of your project.
gml_pragma函数影响给定目标如何编译您的代码，应该使用不同的命令调用它，以进一步优化项目的最终编译。

The gravity strength value is added to the particle speed every step and is usually a small value like 0.5, while the direction is the direction of the gravity "pull" and follows the standard GameMaker directions of 0° being right, 90° being up, 180° being left and 270° being down.
重力强度值会在每一步添加到粒子速度中，通常是一个很小的值，如0.5，而方向是重力"拉动"的方向，并遵循标准的GameMaker方向，即0为右，90为上，180为左，270为下。
The green component of the colour
颜色的绿色成分
The group flags to set on the particle (see Description below).
要在粒子上设置的组标志(请参见下面的描述)。
The group index (ID) is the value that is returned when you call the function physics_particle_group_end().
组索引(ID)是调用函数physics_particle_group_end()时返回的值。
The group index (ID) of the particle group to count.
要计数的粒子组的组索引(ID)。
The group index (ID) of the particle group to get the data from.
要从中获取数据的粒子组的组索引(ID)。
The group index (its ID) is that which was returned by the function physics_particle_group_end(), and the buffer used must have been created previously using the function buffer_create().
组索引(其ID)是由函数physics_particle_group_end()返回的，并且所使用的缓冲区必须是先前使用函数buffer_create()创建的。
The group index is the value returned when you created the group using the function audio_create_sync_group(), and the return value is the time in seconds that the tracks have been playing.
组索引是当您使用函数audio_create_sync_group()创建组时返回的值，返回值是轨道已经播放的时间(以秒为单位)。

The group index is the value returned when you created the group using the function audio_create_sync_group(), and the sound index is the index of any compressed sound (*.ogg or *.mp3) from the Asset Browser.
组索引是使用函数audio_create_sync_group()创建组时返回的值，声音索引是任何压缩声音(*.)的索引。ogg或*.mp3)。
The group index is the value returned when you created the group using the function audio_create_sync_group().
组索引是使用函数audio_create_sync_group()创建组时返回的值。
The group index to assign the sound to.
将声音分配到的组索引。
The group index to be destroyed.
要销毁的组索引。
The group index to check.
要检查的组索引。
The group index to debug, or -1 to switch off the debugging.
要调试的组索引，或-1关闭调试。
The group index to get the position of.
要获取其位置的组索引。
The group index to pause.
要暂停的组的索引。
The group index to play.
要播放的组索引。
The group index to resume.
要恢复的组索引。
The group index to stop playing.
群组索引停止播放。

The group value is that which was returned when you created the group of particles using the function physics_particle_group_end(), and the function will return a value which is the combined value of the currently set flags.
组值是使用函数physics_particle_group_end()创建粒子组时返回的值，此函数将返回当前设置标志的组合值。

The group value is that which was returned when you created the group of particles using the function physics_particle_group_end(), while the flags are the return value of a combination of the following constants:
组值是使用函数physics_particle_group_end()创建粒子组时返回的值，而标志是以下常量组合的返回值:
The groups should have been created with over-lapping edges, as, if they are not already touching, they will not be joined.
这些组应该是用重叠的边创建的，因为如果它们还没有接触，它们就不会被连接。
The half height of the box.
盒子的半高。

视口的高度(以像素为单位)

要保存的部件的高度。
The height of the projection at the near Z position.
投影在Z位置附近的高度。
The height of the projection.
投影的高度。
The height of the region to activate.
要激活区域的高度。
The height of the region to deactivate.

要创建的表面的高度。
The height of the tile map (in cells)
tile map高度(以单元格为单位)

The height of the view port (or combined view ports if more than one are active) define the height of the game window or background canvas at the start of the game, so changing this value after the game has started will have no visible effect on the game window size unless called along with the function window_set_size().
视口(或组合视口，如果不止一个处于活动状态)的高度定义了游戏开始时游戏窗口或背景画布的高度，因此在游戏开始后更改该值不会对游戏窗口大小产生明显影响，除非与函数window_set_size()一起调用。
The height of the virtual key
虚拟键的高度
The height value (in "cells")
高度值(单位为"格")
The high end of the range from which the random number will be selected.
将从中选择随机数的范围的上限。

水平和垂直速度。

水平缩放(默认为1)。

横向缩放。

The horizontal scaling of the sprite, as a multiplier: 1 = normal scaling, 0.5 is half etc...
精灵的水平缩放，作为一个乘数:1 =正常缩放，0.5是一半等等……

要设置的水平速度(以每帧游戏像素为单位)

水平平铺切换，可为 true 或 false

The id is also returned (and can be stored in a variable) when an instance is created using instance_create_layer() or instance_create_depth(), as well as other instance functions.
当使用instance_create_layer()或instance_create_depth()以及其他实例函数创建实例时，id也会返回(并且可以存储在变量中)。

The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_achievement_info as well as a number of other key/value pairs for each player.
这个DS Map的id键用于标识正确的回调(对于任何给定的异步事件，可以有多个触发函数)，并且将与常量achievement_achievement_info以及每个玩家的许多其他键/值对配对。

The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_challenge_list_received as well as a number of other key/value pairs for each challenge.
这个DS Map的id键用于识别正确的回调(对于任何给定的异步事件都可以有多个触发器函数)，并将与常量achievement_challenge_list_received以及针对每个挑战的许多其他键/值对配对。

The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_friends_info as well as a number of other key/value pairs for each friend.
这个DS Map的id键用于识别正确的回调(对于任何给定的异步事件都可以有多个触发器函数)，并将与常量achievement_friends_info以及每个好友的许多其他键/值对配对。

The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_our_info as well as a number of other key/value pairs for each challenge.
这个DS Map的id键用于识别正确的回调(对于任何给定的异步事件都可以有多个触发器函数)，并将与常量achievement_our_info以及针对每个挑战的许多其他键/值对配对。

The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_pic_loaded as well as a number of other key/value pairs.
这个DS Map的id键用于识别正确的回调(对于任何给定的异步事件都可以有多个触发器函数)，并将与常量achievement_pic_loaded以及许多其他键/值对配对。

The idea is that if you have, for example, a pretty small tile set of 16 x 16 tiles then you have a total of 256 different tiles in your tile set, which only uses up 8 bits of your index in the tile data "blob" (from an available 19 bits of data).
例如，如果你有一个非常小的16 x 16瓷砖的瓷砖集，那么你的瓷砖集中总共有256个不同的瓷砖，这只使用瓷砖数据"blob"中的8位索引(从可用的19位数据)。

The idea is that if you have, for example, pretty small tile sets of 16 x 16 tiles will have a total of 256 different tiles in each tile set, which only uses up 8 bits of your index in the tile data "blob" (from an available 19 bits of data).
例如，如果你有一个很小的16 x 16瓷砖的瓷砖集，每个瓷砖集总共有256个不同的瓷砖，这只会占用瓷砖数据"blob"中索引的8位(从可用的19位数据)。
The image alpha of the icon (default 1).
图标的图像alpha(默认为1)。
The image asset to get the texture from
获取纹理的图像资源

The images below illustrate this, with the image on the left being the default value of true and the image on the right being false:
下图说明了这一点，左边的图像是默认值true，右边的图像是false:
The images themselves are NOT merged together, but rather the image indices are merged, with the sub images from sprite "ind2" appended onto those of sprite "ind1", ie: they are added on at the end.
图像本身并不合并在一起，而是图像索引被合并，来自子画面"ind2"的子图像被附加到子画面"ind1"的子图像上，即:它们被添加在末尾。
