掩码的种类，一个常量(见说明中的表格)。
The kind of primitive you are going to draw.
你要绘制的图元类型。
The kind of the path, 0 for straight or 1 for smooth.
路径的种类，0表示直线，1表示平滑。
The last character to include (if you're unsure, go for 128).
最后一个要包含的字符(如果不确定，可以选择128(英语))。
The layer ID (or name) to assign the created instance to
要将创建的实例分配到的层ID(或名称)
The layer ID string (or value) to be used
要使用的层ID字符串(或值)
The layer ID value or string to assign the particle system to (can be any layer type)
指定粒子系统的层ID值或字符串(可以是任何层类型)

The layer can be identified using the layer ID value (as returned by the function layer_create()) or by the name of the layer (as a string, for example "instance_layer") as defined in the room editor.
可以使用层ID值(由layer_create()函数返回)或房间编辑器中定义的层名(作为字符串，例如"instance_layer")来识别层。

The layer depth is defined as being higher when "further away" from the camera and lower when "closer" to the camera, so if you have three layers with depths -100, 0, 100, the layers will draw in the order 100, 0, -100, so that the "top" layer (i.e., the closest to the camera view and so drawn over everything else) will be the layer with the -100 depth.
层深度被定义为当"远离"相机时较高，当"靠近"相机时较低，因此如果有深度为-100、0、100的三个层，则这些层将按照100、0、-100的顺序绘制，因此"顶部"层(即，最靠近相机视图，因此绘制在所有其他层之上)将是深度为-100的层。
The layer name to assign the created instance to (default is "Instances")
将创建的实例指定给的层名称(默认为"实例")
The left cell column of the region.
区域的左侧单元格列。
The left edge of the rectangle to check
要检查的矩形的左边缘
The left edge slice
切片左边边缘
The left mouse button
鼠标左键
The left position in the surface of the part to be drawn.
待绘制的部分表面的左侧位置。
The left position of the region of cells to copy from the source grid.
要从源网格复制的单元格区域的左侧位置。
The left side of the bounding box
边界框的左侧
The left stick pressed (as a button)
按下左侧操纵杆(作为按钮)
The length (number of array indices) to copy.
要复制的长度(数组索引的数量)。
The length away of the point to return.
要返回的点的长度。
The length for the change in gain in milliseconds.
增益变化的长度，以毫秒为单位。
The length of the arrow in pixels.
箭头的长度，以像素为单位。
The length of the buffer (the number of bytes of audio data, excluding the header).
缓冲区的长度(音频数据的字节数，不包括头)。
The length of the buffer (the number of the bytes in the buffer).
缓冲区的长度(缓冲区中的字节数)。
The length of the change in gain in milliseconds.
增益变化的长度，以毫秒为单位。
The length of the part of the buffer to load (in bytes).
要加载的缓冲区部分的长度(以字节为单位)。

帧中序列的长度。
The level of anti-aliasing filtering (0, 2, 4 or 8).
抗锯齿过滤的级别(0、2、4或8)。
The light is a directional light
灯光是平行光
The light is a point light
灯光是点光源

光线范围(以像素为单位)
The lights can also be given a colour, which will also affect the perceived intensity of the light as certain colours appear "darker" than others.
灯光也可以被赋予一种颜色，这也会影响光的感知强度，因为某些颜色看起来比其他颜色"更深"。

The likely use case for these functions is for repeating a texture in 3D but in order for it to work and not pull images from the rest of the texture page, the sprite used will need to be marked as being on a "Separate Texture Page" in the Sprite Editor.
这些函数的可能用例是在3D中重复纹理，但是为了使它工作而不是从纹理页面的其余部分拉图像，所使用的精灵需要在精灵编辑器中被标记为在"单独的纹理页面"上。

应用于粒子夹具的线性阻尼。

要获取其数据的侦听器编号。

新质心的局部x坐标。

log基数。

关节运动允许的下限

主音频总线

要使用的映射字符串(有关更多信息，请参阅描述)。
The mapped elements will be padded to offset and order by the traversing direction.
映射的元素将按遍历方向填充偏移和排序。
The mapped elements will keep their original position on the array.
映射的元素将保持它们在数组中的原始位置。
The mask can contain a path and can contain wildchars, for example 'C:\temp\*.doc'.
掩码可以包含路径，也可以包含通配符，例如'C:\temp\*.doc'。

要与粒子标志进行比较的遮罩。

用于搜索的掩码。

掩码值

The mask value is defined in the same way as you would define the flags when creating the particle (see the function physics_particle_create() for an example), ie: using the bitwise or "|" to mask off the appropriate bits for each flag.
遮罩值的定义方式与创建粒子时定义标志的方式相同(参见函数physics_particle_create()的示例)，即:使用按位or"|"来遮罩每个标志的适当位。

The mask value is defined in the same way as you would define the flags when creating the particles (see the functions physics_particle_create() for an example), ie: using the bitwise or "|" to mask off the appropriate bits for each flag.
掩码值的定义方式与创建粒子时定义标志的方式相同(参见函数physics_particle_create()的示例)，即:使用位或"|"屏蔽每个标志的适当位。
The mask value to use
要使用的掩码值

矩阵数据作为数组

使用的矩阵索引。
The matrix itself is created as 16 value array where the first 4 elements are row 1, the second 4 elements are row 2 etc... of a 4x4 matrix.
矩阵本身被创建为16值数组，其中前4个元素是第1行，后4个元素是第2行，依此类推...一个4x4的矩阵。

The minimum and maximum direction values default at 0, which means that the particle will move to the right with no variation, but these values can be changed to limit the direction of movement following the standard GameMaker directions of 0 being right, 90 being up, 180 being left and 270 being down.
最小和最大方向值默认为0，这意味着粒子将向右移动，没有任何变化，但这些值可以更改，以限制移动方向，遵循标准的GameMaker方向:0为右，90为上，180为左，270为下。

The minimum and maximum orientation values default at 0 but these values can be changed to randomise the orientation following the standard GameMaker directions of 0 degrees being right, 90 degrees being up, 180 degrees being left and 270 degrees being down.
与其他粒子函数一样，您可以提供一个最小值和一个最大值(以步为单位),每个粒子的寿命将是指定范围内的随机步数。

The minimum and maximum size values default at 1 (meaning that the size is the same ratio as the base particle after the part_type_scale() scale has been set) and if they are set to the same value, the initial size for all particles will be the same, but if set to different values, each particle will start with a random size from within the range, for example if you have a minimum of 0.5 and a maximum of 2, all particles will be created with a size between half and double the base scale.
最小和最大尺寸值默认为 1（意味着在设置 part_type_scale() 比例后，尺寸与基本粒子的比例相同），如果它们设置为相同的值，所有粒子的初始尺寸将为 相同，但如果设置为不同的值，每个粒子将以范围内的随机大小开始，例如，如果您的最小值为 0.5，最大值为 2，则创建的所有粒子的大小将介于基本比例的一半和两倍之间。

The minimum and maximum speed values default at 1, which means that the particle will move 1 pixel each step, and if they are set to the same value, the initial speed for all particles will be the same, but if set to different values, each particle will start with a random speed from within the given range.
最小和最大速度值默认为1，这意味着粒子将每步移动1个像素，如果它们设置为相同的值，所有粒子的初始速度将相同，但如果设置为不同的值，每个粒子将以给定范围内的随机速度开始。

The mp_potential_ functions do their work using a number of parameters that can be changed using this function.

The only time this is not required is when you have flagged any items in the list as another DS list or as a DS map, in which case these items will be destroyed (not cleared!) and their memory cleaned up automatically when the parent is cleared.
唯一不需要这样做的时候是当你将列表中的任何项目标记为另一个DS列表或DS地图时，在这种情况下，这些项目将被销毁(不清除！)并且当父代被清除时，它们的内存被自动清除。

The only time this is not required is when you have flagged any items in the list as another DS list or as a DS map, in which case these items will be destroyed and their memory cleaned up automatically as well.
唯一不需要这样做的时候是当你将列表中的任何项目标记为另一个DS列表或DS地图时，在这种情况下，这些项目将被销毁，它们的内存也会自动清理。

The only time this is not required is when you have flagged any items in the map as a DS list or as another DS map, in which case these items will be destroyed (not cleared!) and their memory cleaned up automatically when the parent map is cleared.
唯一不需要这样做的情况是，当您将map中的任何项标记为DS列表或另一个DS map时，在这种情况下，这些项将被销毁(不是清除!)，并且当父映射被清除时，它们的内存将自动清除。

The only time this is not required is when you have flagged any items in the map as a DS list or as another DS map, in which case these items will be destroyed and their memory cleaned up automatically as well.

The path will be drawn as a simple line, and can be either relative to the calling instance or at the absolute position it was created at in the path editor or through code.

The perceived volume for a sound can change depending on the fall-off value and the position it has relative to the listener, but by setting the gain with this function, the full volume will never exceed the specified gain value.
声音的感知音量可以根据衰减值和它相对于听者的位置而变化，但是通过使用此函数设置增益，整个音量将永远不会超过指定的增益值。

The placeholders should follow the format "{x}" where x is the index of the value in the array that it should be replaced with.
占位符应该遵循"{x}"的格式，其中x是应该替换它的数组中值的索引。
The player id to get the info for
要获取其信息的玩家id
The player id to get the input for
要获取输入的玩家id

The playhead direction, a constant, listed above
播放头方向，一个常量，列在上面
The point identity to check.

The point will be added into the path before the point "n" that is specified in the function.
该点将被添加到函数中指定的点"n"之前的路径中。
The pointer to the curve struct to destroy.
指向要销毁的曲线结构的指针。
The polygon is closed when the fixture is bound to an instance.
当夹具绑定到实例时，多边形是闭合的。
The polygon will then be used to delete all the particles that fall within the defined area.
然后，该多边形将用于删除落在定义区域内的所有粒子。
The port that the server will use.
服务器将使用的端口。
The port to connect to.
要连接的端口。
The port to use
要使用的端口
The position along the x-axis to get the tile data from (in room pixels)
沿x轴获取图块数据的位置(以房间像素为单位)
The position along the y-axis to get the tile data from (in room pixels)
沿y轴获取图块数据的位置(以房间像素为单位)
The position in characters of the string to insert the substring.
字符串中要插入子字符串的字符位置。
The position in the file to move to.
文件中要移动到的位置。
The position in time to check (from 0 to 1).
要检查的时间位置（从0到1 ）。

The position of the edge is defined using local space, ie: the x/y position of the instance is considered (0,0), so this should be taken into consideration when creating them (in the code example below, the instance would have been placed at (0,0) in the room to avoid complications).
边缘的位置是使用局部空间定义的，例如:实例的x/y位置被认为是(0,0)，所以在创建它们时应该考虑到这一点(在下面的代码示例中，实例将被放置在房间中的(0,0)位置，以避免复杂化)。
The position of the first character in the string to copy from (numbered from 1)
字符串中要复制的第一个字符的位置(从1开始编号)
The position of the first character to remove.
要移除的第一个字符的位置。
The position should be a value between 0 and 1 (you can use path_position, for example, if you need the current position of the instance) with 0 being the start position and 1 being the end.
位置应该是0到1之间的值(例如，如果需要实例的当前位置，可以使用path_position)，其中0是开始位置，1是结束位置。
The position should be an real value between 0.0 and 1.0.
位置应该是介于0.0和1.0之间的实数值。
The position to add the value, where 0 corresponds to the very beginning of the list and the final position is ds_list_size(id)-1.
要添加值的位置，其中0对应于列表的最开始，最后一个位置是ds_list_size(id)-1。
The position to get the byte from.
从中获取字节的位置。
The position to get the character code from.
获取字符码的位置。
The position to get the character from.
从中获取字符的位置。
The position to look at, where 0 corresponds to the very beginning of the list and the final position is ds_list_size(id)-1.
要查看的位置，其中0对应于列表的最开始，最后一个位置是ds_list_size(id)-1。
The position to replace the value, where 0 corresponds to the very beginning of the list and the final position is ds_list_size(id)-1.
替换值的位置，其中0对应于列表的最开始，最后一个位置是ds_list_size(id)-1。
The position to start the iteration from (allows negative values, from end of string).
迭代开始的位置(允许负数，从字符串的末尾开始)。
The position will affect the sound in different ways depending on where the listener is positioned within the audio space too (default position is (0, 0, 0).
位置也会以不同的方式影响声音，这取决于侦听器在音频空间中的位置(默认位置是(0，0，0)。
The position within the file for writing to is set to the last line of text that the file contains.
写入到的文件中的位置设置为文件包含的最后一行文本。
The position within the list to check.
要检查的列表中的位置。
The position within the list to mark.
列表中要标记的位置。
The position within the list to set.
列表中要设置的位置。
The position within the sequence (in frames) to set the playhead position to (can be a decimal value)
将播放头位置设置为的序列(以帧为单位)中的位置(可以是一个十进制值)
The position within the string (starting at 1) to change the byte of.
要更改字节的字符串中的位置(从1开始)。

The positions are absolute values, where the (0, 0) position corresponds to the top left corner of the sprite, regardless of the offset for the sprite, any "empty" pixels the sprite may have, or where it is being drawn in the room.
位置是绝对值，其中(0,0)位置对应于精灵的左上角，而不考虑精灵的偏移量、精灵可能拥有的任何"空"像素或它在房间中的位置。
The possible return values are listed in the table below:
可能的返回值如下表所示:
The post draw event.
后绘制事件
The power of e.
e的幂。
The pre draw event.
预绘制事件
The precision of all circles drawn after this function is called.
调用此函数后绘制的所有圆的精度。
The precision of the path.
路径的精确度。
The precision value (default 0.0000001)

The precision value that you can input into this function is the number of sides the circle polygon has, and this number can be anything between 4 and 64, but must be a number divisible by 4, with a default value of 24.
您可以输入到此函数的精度值是圆多边形的边数，这个数字可以是4到64之间的任何数，但必须是能被4整除的数字，默认值为24。
The primitive base type.
图元基本类型。
The primitive vertex format to use.
要使用的图元顶点格式。
The priority of the value to add.
要添加的值的优先级。
The process is as follows:
流程如下:
The pulley joint is used to connect two instances within the physics world in such a way that moving one will directly influence the movement of the other.
滑轮连接用于连接物理世界中的两个实例，其中一个的移动将直接影响另一个的移动。
The purpose of delta timing is to eliminate the effects of the lag or slowness of computers that try to handle complex graphics or a lot of code.
增量计时的目的是消除计算机在处理复杂图形或大量代码时产生的滞后或慢的影响。
The quantity of the new particle to create at the particle death.
粒子死亡时创建的新粒子的数量。
The quantity of the new particle to create per step.
每步要创建的新粒子的数量。
The question to ask to the user.
向用户提出的问题。

The queue index is the value returned when you created the queue using the function audio_create_play_queue(), and this function should be called when the queue is no longer required to prevent memory leaks.
队列索引是使用函数audio_create_play_queue()创建队列时返回的值，当不再需要队列时应该调用此函数以防止内存泄漏。
The radians to convert.
要转换的弧度。
The radius (distance from center to edge) of the circle in pixels.
圆的半径(从中心到边缘的距离)，以像素为单位。
The radius (distance in pixels from its center to its edge).
半径(从中心到边缘的像素距离)。
The radius (in pixels) of the circle to create.
要创建的圆的半径(以像素为单位)。
The radius (in pixels) of the circular area to delete.
要删除的圆形区域的半径(以像素为单位)。
The radius (in pixels) of the particle fixture.
粒子设备的半径(以像素为单位)。
The radius around the center point in which to check for a collision.
检查碰撞的中心点周围的半径。
The radius of the circle.
圆的半径。
The radius of the curve along the x axis from the rectangle corners.
从矩形角到x轴的曲线的半径。
The radius of the curve along the y axis from the rectangle corners.
曲线的半径沿y轴从矩形的角。
The radius of the disk in the grid.
圆盘在网格中的半径。
The radius of the disk on the grid.
圆盘在网格上的半径。
The range is limited to that of the device running the server, such that if the device has an IP of 92.168.11.130, then the data will be broadcast over the range 92.168.11.*.
该范围被限制在运行服务器的设备的范围内，例如，如果该设备的IP为92.168.11.130，那么数据将在92.168.11.*范围内广播。
The raw byte value.
原始字节值。
The real number to be turned into a string.
要转换成字符串的实数。
The real value to write to the file.
写入文件的实际值。
The real value to write to the relevant destination.
写入相关目的地的实际值。
The red component of the colour
颜色的红色成分
The reference value for a struct or array to convert into a JSON string
要转换为JSON字符串的结构或数组的参考值
The release of a touch/click from a drag had enough movement for a flick event to be detected anywhere in the room
从拖动中释放触摸/点击具有足够的移动，使得在房间的任何地方都可以检测到轻击事件
The release of a touch/click from a drag had enough movement for a flick event to be detected for the instance
对于该实例，从拖动释放触摸/点击具有足够的移动来检测轻击事件
The release of one (or both) touches for a pinch has been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都可以检测到释放一次(或两次)挤压触摸
The release of one (or both) touches for a pinch has been detected for an instance
对于一个实例，已经检测到挤压的一个(或两个)触摸的释放
The release of one (or both) touches for a rotation has been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都检测到释放一个(或两个)旋转触摸
The release of one (or both) touches for a rotation has been detected for an instance
对于实例，已检测到旋转的一次(或两次)触摸的释放
The release of the touch/click from a drag has been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都检测到了从拖动释放触摸/点击
The release of the touch/click from a drag has been detected for an instance
对于一个实例，已经检测到从拖动中释放触摸/点击
The render target index to check (from 0 to 3).
要检查的渲染目标索引(从0到3)。

要使用的呈现目标索引(从0到3)。

请求方法(通常是"POST"或"GET"，但支持所有方法)
The resolution value supplied in the argument needs to be in milliseconds.
参数中提供的分辨率值需要以毫秒为单位。
The rest of the arguments are the same as those used for normal sprite drawing and will change the scale, angle, blend colour and alpha of the final animation frame being drawn.
其余的参数与用于正常精灵绘制的参数相同，并将改变所绘制的最终动画帧的比例、角度、混合颜色和alpha。

夹具的恢复(通常在0和1之间)

应用程序的返回代码将默认为0。
The return value can be an object index, an instance ID or -1 if no follow target has been set.
返回值可以是对象索引、实例ID或-1(如果没有设置follow target)。
The return value is a string, which will be the name of the set as you defined it in your skeletal animation program.
返回值是一个字符串，它将是您在框架动画程序中定义的集合的名称。
The return value is always positive and will be a whole number.
返回值总是正的，并且将是一个整数。

The return value will be between 0 and 360.
返回值将在0到360之间。

返回值将以像素为单位。

返回值将是以下常量之一:
The return value will between 0 and 1 and shows how "smooth" the edges of these sprites will be drawn.
返回值将介于 0 和 1 之间，并显示这些精灵的边缘将如何"平滑"绘制。
The return value will change during the draw event when you have various views as the draw event is called once for each view port in succession.
当您拥有不同的视图时，返回值将在绘制事件期间发生变化，因为绘制事件将连续为每个视图端口调用一次。
The return value will depend on the type of data that you are reading, which in itself is defined by the following constants:

对于每个可用的水平轴和垂直轴，返回值将介于-1和1之间。
The returned value will be one of the following constants (the default value is bm_normal):
返回值将是下列常量之一(默认值为bm_normal):
The returned value will be one of the following constants (the default value is cull_noculling):
返回值将是下列常量之一(默认值为cull_noculling):
The returned value will range between 1 and 16.
返回值将介于1和16之间。
The returning index should be stored in a variable to be used in all further functions that are used to define and use this fixture.
返回索引应该存储在一个变量中，以便用于定义和使用该夹具的所有进一步函数中使用。
The right cell column of the region.

The room to target for all further layer functions
房间的目标是所有进一步层的函数
The rotation of the image.
图像的旋转。

绘制表面所用的旋转或角度。

绘制表面的旋转或角度。

The same goes for the sub-image, as this can also be set to the instance variable image_index which will set the sub-image to that selected for the current instance sprite (note, that you can draw a different sprite and still use the sub-image value for the current instance), or you can use any other value for this to draw a specific sub-image of the chosen sprite.
子图像也是如此，因为它也可以设置为实例变量 image_index，它将子图像设置为为当前实例精灵选择的子图像（注意，您可以绘制不同的精灵并仍然使用子-当前实例的图像值），或者您可以使用任何其他值来绘制所选精灵的特定子图像。
The sample rate of the data in the buffer queue.
缓冲队列中数据的采样率。

The scale factor to use (1, no scale, 2, half scale, 4, quarter scale, etc...)
使用的缩放乘数(1、无缩放、2、缩放一半、4、缩放到四分之一，等等)
The scale of the icon (default 1).

要使用的缩放值(1表示无缩放)

The scale value you give is a multiplier that will be used to change the way the background element is displayed, where a value of 0.5 would display the element at half scale, and a value of 2 would display at double scale.
您给定的比例值是一个乘数，将用于更改背景元素的显示方式，其中值0.5将以一半比例显示元素，值2将以两倍比例显示元素。
The scaling factor to be applied to gravity for all particles.
应用于所有粒子重力的缩放倍数。

The section in the open .ini file to check a key in.

The selection coordinates are based on the absolute size of the display (or window if not fullscreen), so (0,0) is always the top left hand corner of the screen (or window).
选择坐标基于显示(或窗口，如果不是全屏)的绝对大小，因此(0,0)总是屏幕(或窗口)的左上角。
The sequence ID is the name constant that you defined in the Asset Browser for the sequence.
序列ID是您在Asset Browser中为序列定义的名称常量。
The sequence ID to create, as defined in the Asset Browser
要创建的序列ID，如Asset Browser中定义的那样
The sequence index as defined in the asset browser.
在资源浏览器中定义的序列索引。
The sequence instance struct to modify.
要修改的序列实例结构。
The sequence object struct can then be used to create instances of the sequence on a room layer using the function layer_sequence_create().
然后可以使用序列对象结构在房间层上使用layer_sequence_create()函数创建序列的实例。

要检查的序列对象结构或ID

The sequence will loop, with the playhead going back to the start when it reaches the end of the playback region.
该序列将循环，当播放头到达播放区域的末尾时返回开始。
The sequence will loop, with the playhead reversing direction when it reaches the end of the playback region.
该序列将循环，当播放头到达播放区域的末端时，它将反转方向。
The sequence will play frames in a decremental order from right to left
该序列将以从右到左递减的顺序播放帧

序列将以从左到右递增的顺序播放帧

序列将播放一次，然后结束时停止。
The setting of the config value.
配置值的设置。

要分配给图层的着色器索引

网页字体的字体大小，文件字体的像素。

The size of the step (which is how many pixels the instance should move each step) is indicated by the stepsize, and if the instance is already at the position it will stop and not move any further, contrary to other, simpler functions like move_towards_point().
步长的大小(即实例每步应该移动多少像素)由步长指示，如果实例已经在该位置，它将停止，不再移动，这与其他更简单的函数(如move _ towards _ point()相反。
The sleep margin value is the main timing method
睡眠裕度值是主要的计时方法
The slice will be repeated
切片将被重复
The slice will be repeated by mirroring
切片将通过镜像进行重复
The slice will be stretched
切片将被拉伸
The slice will not appear at all
切片根本不会出现

切片将不会被拉伸或重复，从而在其后面产生一个空白区域
The slot name (a string) to get the attachment of.
要获取附件的插槽名称(字符串)。
The slot name to check, a string
要检查的插槽名称，字符串
The slot name to set, a string
要设置的槽位名称，字符串
The sort type (true for ascending or false for descending) or a function reference to use for sorting.
排序类型（升序为 true，降序为 false）或使用函数引用用于排序。

The sound can either be a referenced from index for an individual sound being played which has been stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions, or an actual sound asset from the Asset Browser.
声音可以是正在播放的单个声音的索引引用，该索引在使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时已存储在变量中，也可以是资源浏览器中的实际声音资源。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be checked and if any of them are paused the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的单个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)，也可以是声音资源，在这种情况下，将检查给定声音的所有实例，如果其中任何一个实例被暂停，此函数将返回true，否则将返回false。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be checked and if any of them are playing the function will return true otherwise it will return false.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的单个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)或声音资源，在这种情况下，给定声音的所有实例都将被检查，如果其中任何一个正在播放此函数将返回true，否则将返回false。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be paused.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，播放的单个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)或声音资源，在这种情况下，给定声音的所有实例都将暂停。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be re-started.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的各个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)，也可以是声音资源，在这种情况下，给定声音的所有实例都将重新开始。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset, in which case all instances of the given sound will be stopped.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的各个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)，也可以是声音资源，在这种情况下，给定声音的所有实例都将停止。

The sound can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset.
声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的各个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)，也可以是声音资源。

The sound can either be one referenced from an index for an individual sound being played which has been stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions, or an actual sound asset from the Asset Browser.
声音可以是从正在播放的单个声音的索引中引用的声音，该索引在使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时已存储在变量中，也可以是来自资源浏览器的实际声音资源。
The sound can only be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions).
声音只能是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，正在播放的单个声音的索引可以存储在一个变量中)。
The sound index to be assigned to the group.
要分配给组的声音索引。

The sound to check can either be a single instance of a sound (the index for individual sounds being played can be stored in a variable when using the audio_play_sound() or audio_play_sound_at() functions) or a sound asset.
要检查的声音可以是声音的单个实例(当使用audio_play_sound()或audio_play_sound_at()函数时，播放的单个声音的索引可以存储在变量中)或声音资源。
The sound will loop when played.
播放时声音会循环播放。
The sound will only play once then stop.
声音只会播放一次，然后停止。
The space between each letter, 0 meaning the right of one letter just touches the left of the next one.
每个字母之间的空间，0表示一个字母的右边刚好碰到下一个字母的左边。
The space to leave between each letter.
每个字母之间的间隔。
The specific event constant or value, if one is necessary (otherwise, just use 0).
特定的事件常量或值(如果有必要，则使用0)。
The specific event, if one is necessary (otherwise, just use 0).
特定事件，如果需要的话(否则，使用0)。
The specific file attribute to look for.
要查找的特定文件属性。

The specified name must include the full path, not a relative path and by default you cannot access any directories from out-with the game bundle as all games are sandboxed (see the section on the File System for more information).
指定的名称必须包括完整路径，而不是相对路径，并且默认情况下，您不能从游戏捆绑包之外访问任何目录，因为所有游戏都是沙盒化的(有关更多信息，请参见文件系统一节)。
The speed (in inches per second) to set for flick gesture event detection.
为笔势事件检测设置的速度(以英寸/秒为单位)。
The speed (number of pixels per game frame) that the view should move on the horizontal (x) axis
视图应该在水平(x)轴上移动的速度(每个游戏帧的像素数)
The speed (number of pixels per game frame) that the view should move on the vertical (y) axis
视图应该在垂直(y)轴上移动的速度(每个游戏帧的像素数)
The speed factor of the point (default value is 100).
点的速度系数(默认值为100)。
The speed factor of the point.
点的速度乘数。

The speed is calculated as pixels per step and can be set to "-1" to make the camera move instantly, but if the camera is not set to follow any instance then the values set here will have no visible effect.
速度以每步像素计算，可以设置为"-1"以使相机立即移动，但如果相机没有设置为跟随任何实例，则此处设置的值将没有可见效果。
The speed is measured in inches per second and has a default value of 2.0.
速度以英寸/秒为单位，默认值为2.0。
The speed multiplier/value to use for the element
用于元素的速度乘数/值
The speed of which to follow the path in pixels per step, negative meaning going backwards.
沿路径移动的速度，单位为每帧像素，负值表示后退。
The speed scale to use (a multiplier), default is 1
要使用的速度缩放(乘数)，默认为1
The speed the instance moves in pixels per step.
实例每步移动的像素速度。
The speed to move at in pixels per step.
以像素/步为单位的移动速度。

The speed value given is a multiplier, with 1 being the default value, and setting it to 0.5 will half the animation speed - as set in the Sprite Editor or Image Editor- while setting it to 2 will double it.
给定的速度值是一个乘数，1是默认值，设置为0.5将使动画速度减半(就像在精灵编辑器或图像编辑器中设置的那样)，而设置为2将使动画速度翻倍。

The stem of the arrow is drawn along these points with the actual arrow head being drawn at the end, where the size of the arrowhead is defined by the argument "size" and is calculated as being part of the stem so that the end point is always aligned with the position defined by x2,y2.
箭头的杆沿这些点绘制，实际的箭头头被绘制在末端，箭头的大小由参数"size"定义，并被计算为杆的一部分，因此终点总是与由x2,y2定义的位置对齐。
The stepsize is also the distance "ahead" that the object will check each step for a collision, and you can choose whether the instance stops at a collision with an object or instance of your choice.
步长也是对象将检查每一步的碰撞的"前方"距离，并且您可以选择实例是否在与您选择的对象或实例发生碰撞时停止。

The stepsize is also the distance "ahead" that the object will check each step for a collision, and you can choose whether the instance stops at a collision with any instance or only those that are flagged as solid.
步长也是对象将检查每一步的碰撞的"前方"距离，并且您可以选择实例是在与任何实例发生碰撞时停止，还是仅停止那些标记为实体的实例。

The time returned is based on the default time zone for the system (ie: local time).

The value (an integer) to set the alarm to.
告警设置的数值(整数形式)。
The value for this constant is typically between 0 and 1, but can be larger, and at 1, the damping is critical meaning that all oscillations should vanish.
该常量的值通常在0和1之间，但可以更大，在1时，阻尼是关键的，这意味着所有振荡都应该消失。
The value is normalised from 0 - 1, so if you set it to, for example, 0.5, the instance will be moved to exactly the middle of the path.
该值是从0到1的标准化值，因此如果将其设置为0.5，实例将被移动到路径的正中间。
The value must be an integer value, and you can set it to -1 to stop the alarm (non integer values will be rounded to the nearest integer).
该值必须为整数值，可以设置为-1以停止告警(非整数值将四舍五入到最接近的整数)。
The value of the parameter (a real number).
参数的值(实数)。
The value returned can then be used, for example, to calculate how many frames may be drawn for different image_speed.
然后，返回的值可用于例如计算对于不同的image_speed可以绘制多少帧。
The value returned is in microseconds (where 1,000,000 microseconds equals one second) and the default target frame time is 100 microseconds.
返回的值以微秒为单位(其中1,000,000微秒等于1秒)，默认目标帧时间为100微秒。

The value returned will be one of the following constants ("s" denotes a value taken from the source while a "d" denotes a value from the destination) with only the "A" component being used when drawing:
返回的值将是下列常量之一("s"表示从源获取的值，而"d"表示从目标获取的值)，绘制时仅使用"A"部分:

返回的值将是下列常量之一("s"表示从源获取的值，"d"表示从目标获取的值):
The value returned will be one of the following constants (the default value is cmpfunc_lessequal):
返回的值将是以下常量之一(默认值是cmpfunc_lessequal):
The value returned will be one of the following constants:
返回值将是下列常量之一:

返回的值将是设置实际path_speed的乘数。

The weld joint is designed to attach two fixtures together in a strong, yet flexible bond.
焊接接头旨在将两个固定装置牢固而灵活地连接在一起。

The weld joint will permit flexing between the two joined fixtures but without the stretching associated with, for example, a distance joint, and will always try to "spring" back to the reference angle when put under any stress or load.
焊接接头将允许两个连接的夹具之间的弯曲，但没有与例如，一个距离接头相关的拉伸，并将总是试图"弹簧"回到参考角度，当受到任何应力或负载。

The width of the view port (or combined view ports if more than one are active) define the width of the game window or background canvas at the start of the game, so changing this value after the game has started will have no visible effect on the game window size unless called along with the function window_set_size().
视口(或组合视口，如果不止一个处于活动状态)的宽度定义了游戏开始时游戏窗口或背景画布的宽度，因此在游戏开始后更改该值不会对游戏窗口大小产生明显影响，除非与函数window_set_size()一起调用。

The x and y coordinates indicate the position of the top-left corner of the grid, hcells and vcells indicate the number of horizontal and vertical cells to be created within the grid, and cell width and cell height indicate the size of the cells in pixels.
x和y坐标表示网格左上角的位置，hcells和vcells表示要在网格中创建的水平和垂直单元的数量，单元宽度和单元高度表示单元的大小(以像素为单位)。

The x and y coordinates that you then input in the function should be relative to the (0,0) position of the surface (the top left corner) and not the game window (nor the view if you have one active).
然后在函数中输入的x和y坐标应该相对于表面(左上角)的(0，0)位置，而不是游戏窗口(如果你有一个活动的视图也不是)。

您可以使用以下常量定义6种图元类型:

There are a number of constants that can be used in this function and they can be found here: Physics Joint Constants, but be aware that complex calculations are done when you call these, so they should be used with care and only when necessary and note that many are unique to a specific type of joint.
物理关节常量，但注意，当你调用这些时，会进行复杂的计算，所以应该小心使用，只有在必要时，并注意，许多是特定类型的关节独有的。
There are a number of constants that can be used in this function and they can be found here: Physics Joint Constants.
在此函数中可以使用许多常量，可以在这里找到:物理关节常量。
There are a number of ways that this can be avoided, for example using distance_to_point() to see how far from the specified location the instance is before moving.
有许多方法可以避免这种情况，例如使用distance_to_point()来查看实例在移动之前离指定位置有多远。

There are many options here which allow complete simulation of all possible events, but note that this literally just performs all the code in the event and the game will not modify anything to make it trigger itself manually, for example if you choose to perform a keyboard press event, the event will be triggered but relevant key will not be recognised as having been pressed.
这里有许多允许完全模拟所有可能事件的选项，但注意，这只是执行事件中的所有代码，游戏不会修改任何内容来手动触发它自己，例如，如果你选择执行一个键盘按下事件，事件将被触发，但相关的按键不会被识别为被按下。

There are many options here which allow complete simulation of all possible events, but note that this literally just performs all the code in the event and the game will not modify anything to make it trigger itself manually, for example if you choose to perform a keyboard press event, the event will be triggered but the relevant key will not be recognised as having been pressed.
这里有许多选项，可以完全模拟所有可能的事件，但注意，这只是执行事件中的所有代码，游戏不会修改任何东西来手动触发它，例如，如果您选择执行键盘按下事件，事件将被触发，但相关的键不会被识别为已被按下。
There are twelve alarms built into each instance of an object, and each one has its own event that will run when this variable reaches 0.
在对象的每个实例中内置了12个警报，每个警报都有自己的事件，当该变量达到0时将运行该事件。
There is also no need to call the part_emitter_destroy() function as this is taken care of automatically too.
也不需要调用part_emitter_destroy()函数，因为这也是自动处理的。
There is no need to check the value to see if it is high enough to enter into the score list as GameMaker will only store those values that are greater than the tenth position stored.
没有必要检查该值是否足够高以进入分数列表，因为GameMaker只会存储那些大于第十位的值。

There will be certain instances in a physics based game which you want to move around but do not wish to be acted on by forces such as gravity, nor forces incurred by collisions with dynamic objects (think of moving platforms in a platform game, for example).
在基于物理的游戏中，会有某些情况，你想四处移动，但不希望受到重力等力的作用，也不希望受到与动态对象碰撞产生的力的作用(例如，想想平台游戏中的移动平台)。
Therefore GameMaker has to temporarily save a blended copy of the image and load it in.
因此GameMaker必须临时保存图像的混合副本并将其加载。
Therefore GameMaker has to temporarily save a blended copy of the images and load them in when needed.
因此GameMaker必须临时保存图像的混合副本，并在需要时加载它们。
Therefore the variable delta_time can be used to calculate how much faster (for example) a game character has to move to make up for a lag spike in the game.
因此，变量delta_time可以用来计算游戏角色需要移动多快才能弥补游戏中的延迟高峰。
Therefore you should always call this function after you have found the files you require to "close" these handles.
因此，您应该总是在找到所需的文件后调用此函数来"关闭"这些句柄。
These are explained below for each command.
下面将对每个命令进行解释。

这些只是从动画中分离出来的图像(精灵)，但当它们被附加时，就会随着它们所附加的骨骼一起移动。
These are simply images that are apart from the animation but when attached will move along with the bone they are attached to.
这些只是与动画分开的图像，但是当附加时，它们会随着它们所附加的骨骼一起移动。
These arguments can be set as an empty string or you can store previously entered values to use if you wish.
这些参数可以设置为空字符串，也可以存储之前输入的值，以便根据需要使用。
These bits can be "masked" and then the rest of the tile data can be used to store additional values.
这些位可以被"标记(masked)"，然后其余的tile data可以用来存储额外的值。

这些通道由以下常量之一定义:
These commands are effectively pre-processed before the game is compiled and so the function can be placed anywhere in your project and it will still be processed before the game is fully compiled.
这些命令在游戏编译之前就被有效地预处理了，所以函数可以放在项目的任何地方，在游戏完全编译之前它仍然会被处理。
These controls are the analogue direction "thumbsticks" on most controllers.
这些控件是大多数控制器上的模拟方向"拇指操纵杆"。
These events can only be called in this way, or using the event_perform function.
这些事件只能以这种方式调用，或者使用event_perform函数调用。
These internal checks cover many aspects of a games code, including ranges, parameters and some general aspects of the internal GML compiler and are what spawn the final error messages in many cases.
这些内部检查涵盖了游戏代码的许多方面，包括范围、参数和内部GML编译器的一些通用方面，并且在许多情况下是产生最终错误消息的原因。
These joints are first anchored in the world space at two points, each one connected to an instance at its center of mass.
这些关节首先锚定在世界空间的两点上，每一点都与质心的一个实例相连。
These keys are assigned on a per room basis and will be automatically removed by GameMaker when changing rooms.
这些键是按房间分配的，在换房间时会被GameMaker自动移除。
These names are defined by the animation program used, or (in the case of the attachment) when you call skeleton_attachment_create().
这些名称由使用的动画程序定义，或者(在附件的情况下)在调用skeleton_attachment_create()时定义。
These names are what you will use to tell GameMaker which animation set to use at any time in your game.
这些名称将用于告诉GameMaker在游戏中任何时候使用哪个动画集。
These should be given in clockwise order, so the first coordinate is the top left, then the top right, then bottom right and finally the bottom left.
这些应该按顺时针顺序给出，所以第一个坐标是左上角，然后是右上角，然后是右下角，最后是左下角。
These skins need to have been previously created and named in your animation program, and this name is passed into the function (as a string) to set the sprite to use that skin when being drawn.
这些皮肤需要在你的动画程序中已经被创建和命名，并且这个名字被传递到函数中(作为一个字符串)来设置sprite在被绘制时使用那个皮肤。
These strings are:
这些字符串是:

These values are often confused, but basically one is the number of game steps that GameMaker is supposed to be completing in a second (game speed), while the other is the number of CPU steps that GameMaker is actually completing in a second (the real fps), and this value is generally much higher than the game speed, but will drop as your game gets more complex and uses more processing power to maintain the set room speed.
这些值经常被混淆，但基本上一个是GameMaker在一秒钟内应该完成的游戏步骤数(游戏速度)，另一个是GameMaker在一秒钟内实际完成的CPU步骤数(实际fps)，这个值通常比游戏速度高得多，但会随着您的游戏变得更加复杂并使用更多处理能力来维持设定的房间速度而下降。

These values are often confused, but basically one is the number of game steps that GameMaker is supposed to be completing in a second, while the other (the fps) is the number of CPU steps that GameMaker is actually completing in a second up to a maximum value of the room speed itself.
这些值经常被混淆，但基本上一个是GameMaker应该在一秒钟内完成的游戏步骤数，而另一个(fps)是GameMaker在一秒钟内实际完成的CPU步骤数，最高可达房间速度本身的最大值。
These values are taken as being between 0 and 255 so you can make 16,777,216 (256*256*256) colours with this!
这些值在0到255之间，因此您可以用它来制作16，777，216 (256*256*256)种颜色！
These values can get then be recovered in the shader to work out which vertex you are dealing with (ie: which corner).
这些值可以在着色器中恢复，以计算出你正在处理的顶点(即:哪个角)。

These values will only be used when the view camera has been assigned an instance target to follow (either in the Room Editor or using the function camera_set_view_target()) and relate to how far from the border of the view the instance needs to be before the view will update its position to follow.
这些值只会在为视图相机分配了一个要跟随的实例目标(在房间编辑器中或使用camera_set_view_target()函数)时使用，并与视图更新其位置之前实例需要离视图边界多远有关。
They can be created with code, or in the Path Editor and they are assigned to an instance to use in the game.
它们可以用代码创建，或者在路径编辑器中创建，它们被分配给一个实例在游戏中使用。
They might be used, for example, to create the surface tension you would see on a drop of water.
例如，它们可能被用来产生你在一滴水上看到的表面张力。
This 1 dimension array is used to get the current value for any alarms that the instance may have, or it can be used to set those alarms.
这个一维数组用于获取实例可能具有的任何告警的当前值，也可以用于设置这些告警。
This DS map index should be stored in a variable and used for all further function calls to this map.
这个DS map索引应该存储在一个变量中，并用于对该map的所有后续函数调用。
This ID can then be used to cancel the notification using the function push_cancel_local_notification().
这个ID可以使用push_cancel_local_notification()函数来取消通知。
This ID should be stored in a variable and used in all further function calls to this buffer.
这个ID应该存储在一个变量中，并在对该缓冲区的所有后续函数调用中使用。
This allows access to the list of asset tracks on the top level of the sequence.
这允许访问序列顶层的资源轨道列表。

这允许访问序列的信息事件关键帧。
This allows access to the moment event keyframes for the sequence.
这允许访问序列的瞬间事件关键帧。
This also prevents memory leaks and makes sure that you never go over the file limit by having more than 32 files open.
这还可以防止内存泄漏，并确保打开的文件数量不会超过32个，从而不会超过文件限制。
This approach is not guaranteed to work but in most easy cases it will effectively move the instance towards the goal.
这种方法不能保证有效，但在大多数简单的情况下，它会有效地将实例移向目标。
This argument is a string that you can use to tell GameMaker what order the sub-images of the sprite font are and it will map these automatically when writing text.
这个参数是一个字符串，你可以用它来告诉GameMaker精灵字体的子图像的顺序，当你写文本的时候它会自动映射这些子图像。
This array holds the unique camera ID assigned to the given view port, and can be set to a new camera or read to get the current camera, returning -1 if no camera is assigned.
该数组保存分配给给定视图端口的唯一相机ID，可以将其设置为一个新相机或读取当前相机，如果没有分配相机则返回-1。
This asset id can be gotten from the functions sprite_get_texture(), for example (use -1 for no texture).
例如，这个资源id可以从函数sprite_get_texture()中获得(使用-1表示没有纹理)。
This basically says "how much growth do I get after n units of time (and 100% continuous growth)?".
这基本上是说"在n个单位时间内(100%持续增长)我能获得多少增长?"
This built-in variable can be used to either get or set the texture page size when using the function font_add().
当使用函数font_add()时，这个内置变量可以用来获取或设置纹理页面大小。
This built-in variable is created for every instance in a room and contains the layer ID value of the layer that the instance is assigned to.
该内置变量是为房间中的每个实例创建的，包含实例所分配到的层的层ID值。
This built-in variable returns the previous x position for the instance.
这个内置变量返回实例的前一个x位置。
This built-in variable returns the previous y position for the instance.
这个内置变量返回实例的前一个y位置。
This camera is called the default camera and can be set and manipulated (and even destroyed) just like any other camera.
这个相机被称为默认相机，可以像其他相机一样设置和操作(甚至销毁)。
This can be a handy function for things like Easter Eggs in your games, or for unlocking seasonal content.
这对于游戏中的复活节彩蛋或解锁季节性内容来说是一个非常方便的功能。
This can be a handy function for things like Easter Eggs in your games, or for unlocking special content.
对于游戏中的复活节彩蛋或解锁特殊内容来说，这是一个非常方便的功能。
This can be a positive or negative value from -128 to 127 (0 is classed as positive).
这个值可以是-128到127之间的正或负值(0被归为正)。
This can be a positive or negative value from -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647 (0 is classed as positive).
This can be a positive or negative value from -32,768 to 32,767 (0 is classed as positive).
这个值可以是-32,768到32,767之间的正或负值(0被归为正)。
This can be a positive or negative value within the range of +/- 65504.
这个值可以是+/- 65504范围内的正值或负值。
This can be a positive or negative value within the range of +/-16777216.
该值可以是+/-16777216范围内的正或负值。
This can be a real value from 0 to 1 and will "smooth" the edges of these sprites.
这可以是从 0 到 1 的真实值，并将"平滑"这些精灵的边缘。
This can be achieved by using physics_draw_debug(), which draws a schematic outline of the physical properties associated with the instance running the code.
这可以通过使用physics_draw_debug()来实现，它绘制了与运行代码的实例相关联的物理属性的示意图。
This can be achieved by using surfaces, or by creating a sprite from the screen (the code example below shows how the effect can be achieved with surfaces).
这可以通过使用表面或从屏幕上创建一个精灵来实现(下面的代码示例展示了如何使用表面实现这种效果)。
This can be changed at any time but will only affect behaviour when the instance is being controlled by a sequence.
这可以在任何时候更改，但只会影响由序列控制的实例的行为。

This can be changed by setting the local anchor x/y coordinates relative to the origin of the instance, meaning that the actual connection from the instance to the physics world anchor point can be offset somewhere other than its origin.
这可以通过设置相对于实例原点的本地锚点x/y坐标来改变，这意味着从实例到物理世界锚点的实际连接可以偏移到原点以外的其他地方。
This can be done by checking the event_type and/or the event_number (see the extended example below).
这可以通过检查event_type和/或event_number来完成(参见下面的扩展示例)。

This can be done by converting the fixture into a sensor, which basically means that they will generate a collision event but with no physical response so that you can use these instances as "triggers" for other events to happen in the game room.
这可以通过将设备转换为传感器来实现，这基本上意味着它们将产生碰撞事件，但没有物理响应，因此您可以使用这些实例作为游戏室中发生的其他事件的"触发器"。

This can be either a straight line path (set to 0) or a smoothed path (set to 1) in which case the path precision has to be taken into account too (the precision can be set too using path_set_precision()).
这可以是直线路径(设置为0)或平滑路径(设置为1)，在这种情况下，还必须考虑路径精度(也可以使用path_set_precision()设置精度)。
This can be from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
这可以从0(透明)到1(不透明)。

This can be handy when creating dynamic timelines using the timeline_moment_add_script() and timeline_moment_clear() functions, as you can check to see if a given timeline has the correct number of active moments or none at all.
这在使用timeline_moment_add_script()和timeline_moment_clear()函数创建动态时间线时非常方便，因为您可以检查给定的时间线是否具有正确的活动时刻数量，还是根本没有活动时刻。
This can be one of the following constants:
这可以是下列常量之一:
This can be set in the Game Options.
这可以在游戏选项中设置。
This can be set to true to pause the simulation, or false to start it again.
这可以设置为true以暂停模拟，或者设置为false以再次开始模拟。
This can be set with the draw_set_color() function.
这可以通过draw_set_color()函数来设置。
This can be set with the draw_set_colour() function.
这可以用draw_set_colour()函数来设置。
This can be used (for example) to combine multiple skins defining different pieces of clothing or accessories on a character sprite.
这可用于(例如)组合多个皮肤，在角色精灵上定义不同的衣服或配饰。
This can be used to return the temporary directory created for your game each time it is run (the root does not contain the final "\").
这可以用来返回游戏每次运行时创建的临时目录(根目录不包含最后的"\")。
This can be used to simulate worse network conditions for the local player.
这可以用来为本地玩家模拟更差的网络条件。

This can be used to test whether a saved window position is going to be visible or not (the user may have disconnected an external monitor or moved the window off screen which left the window position that was saved as not being valid), for example.
例如，这可用于测试保存的窗口位置是否可见(用户可能断开了外部监视器或将窗口移出屏幕，这使得保存的窗口位置无效)。
This can be useful if your have to iterate through the DS map looking for something, but should be avoided if possible as it can be slow.
如果你不得不在DS map中迭代寻找某些东西，这可能是有用的，但是如果可能的话应该避免，因为它可能会很慢。
This can be useful if your have to iterate through the DS map looking for something, but should be avoided if possible as it can be slow.
如果你不得不在DS map中迭代寻找某些东西，这可能是有用的，但是如果可能的话应该避免，因为它可能会很慢。
This can then be manipulated or even saved, and you can return this map to the GPU using the function gpu_set_state().
然后可以对其进行操作甚至保存，并且可以使用函数gpu_set_state()将该贴图返回给GPU。
This can then be used along with the function skeleton_get_bounds() to retrieve data about each of the bounding boxes.
然后，这可以与函数skeleton_get_bounds()一起使用，以检索关于每个边界框的数据。
This can then be used when mapping textures to models or primitives.
这可以在将纹理映射到模型或图元时使用。
This cannot be used to delete sprites that are included in the game as part of the assets in the Asset Browser.
这不能用于删除游戏中作为资源浏览器中资源一部分的精灵。
This caption appears at the top of the window, beside the game icon, when the game is not in full screen mode.
当游戏不是全屏模式时，这个标题出现在窗口顶部，在游戏图标旁边。
This character depends on the current drawing fonts character set code page and if no font is set, it will use the default code page for the machine.
该字符取决于当前绘图字体字符集代码页，如果没有设置字体，它将使用机器的默认代码页。
This check can be either precise or not, but for precise collisions to be enabled, the object or instance that you are checking for must also have precise collisions enabled for their sprite.
该检查可以是精确的，也可以是不精确的，但是要启用精确碰撞，您正在检查的对象或实例也必须为其精灵启用精确碰撞。
This check will be done against the bounding box of the instance or against the mask of the instance if that instance has precise collisions checked and will return the unique instance id.
如果实例检查了精确碰撞，将对实例的边界框或实例的遮罩进行检查，并将返回唯一的实例id。
This check will be done against the bounding box of the instance or against the mask of the instance if that instance has precise collisions checked.
如果实例检查了精确碰撞，将对实例的边界框或实例的遮罩进行检查。
This collision can be checked as precise or not, and you may also choose to check for the instance running the code itself or not.
可以检查这种碰撞是否精确，也可以选择检查运行代码本身的实例是否准确。
This colour represents that which will be used for those areas of the game window that are not occupied by any views.
这种颜色代表游戏窗口中未被任何视图占据的区域。
This contact normal is a unit vector that points from one instance in the collision to another, and can be used, for example, to calculate the correct "push" direction to resolve collisions
这个接触法线是一个单位向量，它从碰撞中的一个实例指向另一个实例，可以用来计算解决碰撞的正确"推"方向
This controls the rate at which the mip map is swapped and will generally make rendered textures blurrier the higher the value and the greater the "distance" being viewed.
这控制了mip贴图交换的速率，并且通常会使渲染的纹理越模糊，值越高，查看的"距离"越大。
This controls the rate at which the mip map is swapped and will generally make the shader textures blurrier the higher the value and the greater the "distance" being viewed.
这控制了mip贴图交换的速率，并且通常会使着色器纹理变得更模糊，值越高，查看的"距离"越大。
This could be useful for online projects that require a server which doesn't need to render anything.
这可能对需要不需要渲染任何东西的服务器的在线项目很有用。
This creates a pop-up window showing a custom message, with a button labelled "Ok", and prompts the user to input an integer value.
这将创建一个显示自定义消息的弹出窗口，带有一个标有"Ok"的按钮，并提示用户输入一个整数值。
This creates a pop-up window showing a standard message, with a button labelled "Ok", that prompts the user to input a string.
这将创建一个弹出窗口，显示一条标准消息，带有一个标有"Ok"的按钮，提示用户输入一个字符串。
This damping ratio for the joint
这个关节的阻尼比

This data is essentially a bit mask that contains the tile index, the flip/rotate/mirror booleans and any mask data that has been applied (see tilemap_set_mask() for details), and the resulting data value can then be used in the tile_* functions to change a tiles properties.
该数据本质上是一个位掩码，其中包含瓷砖索引、翻转/旋转/镜像布尔值和任何已应用的掩码数据(详细信息请参阅tilemap_set_mask())，然后可以在tile_*函数中使用生成的数据值来更改瓷砖属性。
This data is returned in the forum of a DS map which contains the following key/value pairs:
该数据在包含以下键/值对的DS map中返回:
This data is returned in the forum of a DS map which contains the following key/value pairs:
该数据在包含以下键/值对的DS map中返回:
This defines the particle as static, essentially creating it as an immovable object in the physics simulation, as they will remain in a fixed position no matter what collides with them.
这将粒子定义为静态，实质上是在物理模拟中将它创建为不可移动的对象，因为无论什么与它们碰撞，它们都将保持在固定的位置。
This directory may or may not be visible to other applications, depending on the platform, and on the HTML5 target it will return an empty string.
这个目录对其他应用程序可能可见，也可能不可见，这取决于平台，在HTML5目标上，它将返回一个空字符串。
This directory will hold files and can be accessed while the game is running, but it will be removed (along with all files that it contains) when the game is closed.
该目录将保存文件，在游戏运行时可以访问，但当游戏关闭时，它将被删除(连同它包含的所有文件)。
This does NOT destroy the data-structure (for that you should use ds_list_destroy()) it only wipes all data from it and makes the list empty (zero in size).
这并没有破坏数据结构(为此你应该使用ds_list_destroy())，它只是清除了所有的数据并清空了列表(大小为零)。
This does NOT destroy the data-structure (for that you should use ds_priority_destroy()) it only wipes all data from it and returns an empty priority queue.
这不会破坏数据结构(因为你应该使用ds_priority_destroy())，它只会从数据结构中擦除所有数据并返回一个空的优先级队列。
This does NOT destroy the data-structure (for that you should use ds_queue_destroy()) it only wipes all data from it and returns an empty queue.
这不会破坏数据结构(因为你应该使用ds_queue_destroy())，它只是擦除数据结构中的所有数据并返回一个空队列。
This does NOT destroy the data-structure (for that you should use ds_stack_destroy()) it only wipes all data from it and returns an empty stack.
这并不破坏数据结构(为此，您应该使用ds_stack_destroy())，它只是清除其中的所有数据并返回一个空堆栈。
This does a check of the device for a keypad and if one is available it returns true otherwise it returns false.
这将检查设备是否有键盘，如果有，则返回true，否则返回false。
This does not change the order the layers are rendered in and they'll still be drawn in depth order, it simply changes what z value is used.
这不会改变图层渲染的顺序，它们仍然会按深度顺序绘制，它只是改变了使用的z值。

This does not delete the path, for that you should use path_delete(), however it should be noted that this function changes the actual path asset, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.
这不会删除路径，因为您应该使用path_delete()，但是应该注意的是，此函数改变了实际的路径资源，因此将永久地影响游戏中所有实例从使用此函数的时刻到游戏结束使用该路径的方式。
This does not stop the sound, and calling audio_resume_sync_group(), will start it playing from the same position it was paused at again.
这不会停止声音，调用audio_resume_sync_group()将再次从暂停时的相同位置开始播放。
This event is triggered every step that recording takes place and will create the special DS map in the variable async_load with the following key/value pairs:
该事件在记录发生的每一步都会被触发，并将在变量async_load中使用以下键/值对创建特殊的DS map:
This file can be either an included file or part of an extension.
该文件可以是一个包含的文件，也可以是扩展的一部分。
This file must have been previously created using the ds_map_secure_save() function, and, when loaded, the function will return the index of the DS map that has been created from the loaded data.
这个文件必须是以前使用ds_map_secure_save()函数创建的，并且在加载时，函数将返回从加载的数据创建的DS map的索引。
This folder does not need to be included in the filename as it is added automatically by GameMaker.
这个文件夹不需要包含在文件名中，因为它是由GameMaker自动添加的。
This folder will be created if it doesn't exist or when you save a file using buffer_save_async().
如果该文件夹不存在，或者当您使用buffer_save_async()保存文件时，将会创建该文件夹。
This font must have been added into the font assets of the game or have been created using either the font_add() or font_add_sprite().
这种字体必须被添加到游戏的字体资源中，或者使用font_add()或font_add_sprite()创建。

This function Resets the display settings to the ones that were set when the game was started, but also allows you to change the current level of full screen anti-aliasing being used and whether to use vertical synchronisation.
此函数将显示设置重置为游戏开始时的设置，但也允许您更改当前使用的全屏抗锯齿级别以及是否使用垂直同步。
This function allows a custom range definition and reverse order.
此函数允许自定义范围和逆序。
This function allows a custom range definition.
此函数允许自定义范围定义。

This function allows you to attach a surface to a canvas element that already exists in your web page, meaning that you can effectively split up portions of your game to be drawn at various different places within the page.
此函数允许你将一个表面附加到一个已经存在于你的网页中的画布元素上，这意味着你可以有效地分割游戏的各个部分，并在网页的不同位置绘制。
This function allows you to control the scaling of the texture pages on load from the WAD file that is part of your final game executable.
此函数允许你从WAD文件(游戏最终可执行文件的一部分)加载时控制纹理页面的缩放。

This function allows you to set an emitter to burst a specific type of particle and is typically used in alarms and destroy events as it is a one off code that creates the number of particles specified all at once following the distribution, shape and position set by the function part_emitter_region().
此函数允许您设置发射器以爆发特定类型的粒子，通常用于警报和破坏事件，因为它是一次性代码，可根据函数part_emitter_region()设置的分布、形状和位置，一次性创建指定数量的粒子。

This function allows you to set an emitter to stream a specific type of particle and is typically used the create event as it is a one off code that sets the emitter to generate the number of particles specified every step of the game there-after.
此函数允许你设置一个发射器来流一个特定类型的粒子，通常用于创建事件，因为它是一个一次性的代码，设置发射器来生成游戏中每一步指定数量的粒子。
This function also accepts the special keywords all and other and will return the keyword noone if no collision occurs or the unique ID value of the instance found if a collision does occur.
此函数还接受特殊的关键字all和other，如果没有发生碰撞，它将返回关键字noone，如果发生碰撞，它将返回实例的唯一ID值。

This function also accepts the special keywords all and other and will return the keyword noone if no collision occurs, or the unique instance ID value of the instance found if a collision does occur.
此函数还接受特殊的关键字all和other，如果没有发生碰撞，它将返回关键字noone如果发生碰撞，它将返回找到的实例的唯一实例ID值。
This function also accepts the special keywords all and other.
此函数还接受特殊关键字all和other。

This function also permits you to change the scale of the sprite used (as a multiplier so that 1 is the default, 0.5 would be half and 2 would be double) and the alpha value from 0 (fully transparent) to 1 (fully opaque) for the final icon on the screen.
此函数还允许你改变所使用的精灵的比例(作为乘数，1是默认值，0.5是一半，2是两倍)，以及屏幕上最终图标的alpha值从0(完全透明)到1(完全不透明)。
This function also supports template format strings when using "{x}" (i.e. {0},{1},...) as placeholders and passing the correspondent values as separate arguments.
此函数还支持模板格式字符串，当使用"{x}"(即{0},{1},...)作为占位符并将对应的值作为单独的参数传递时。
This function applies an impulse locally to an instance.
). 此函数将脉冲局部应用于实例。
This function asks you to define a rectangle within the room, and then it marks all MP grid cells "touch" that rectangle as being forbidden, meaning that the path-finding functions cannot cross them.
此函数要求您在房间内定义一个矩形，然后将所有MP网格单元格“接触”该矩形标记为禁止，这意味着寻路函数不能跨越它们。
This function basically asks "how many 2's do you need to multiply to get n?".
此函数基本上是问"你需要乘以多少个2才能得到n？"
This function builds a "look-at" (view) matrix based on the specified parameters listed below.
此函数基于下面列出的指定参数构建一个"查看"矩阵。
This function builds a perspective projection matrix based on the dimensions of the near clipping plane, using the specified parameters listed below.
此函数使用下面列出的指定参数，基于近剪裁平面的尺寸构建透视投影矩阵。
This function builds a perspective projection matrix matrix based on field of view, using the specified parameters listed below.
此函数使用下面列出的指定参数，基于视场构建一个透视投影矩阵矩阵。

This function builds an orthographic projection matrix based on the specified parameters listed below (this is the default projection method used when you create a room in GameMaker without changing anything).
此函数基于下面列出的指定参数构建一个正交投影矩阵(这是在GameMaker中创建房间时使用的默认投影方法，无需更改任何内容)。
This function bypasses the need to first get the sequence instance struct and permits you to access the sequence data directly.
此函数绕过了首先获取序列实例结构的需要，并允许您直接访问序列数据。
This function calculates the distance from the edge of the bounding box of the calling instance to the nearest edge of the nearest instance of the object specified.
此函数计算从调用实例的边界框边缘到指定对象的最近实例的最近边缘的距离。
This function calculates the distance from the edge of the bounding box of the calling instance to the specified x/y position in the room, with the return value being in pixels.
此函数计算从调用实例的边界框边缘到房间中指定的x/y位置的距离，返回值以像素为单位。
This function can also be used for multi-dimension arrays, as long as you specify which dimension you want to get the length of when you supply the array index, following this pattern:
此函数也可以用于多维数组，只要你在提供数组索引时指定你想获取哪个维度的长度，遵循以下模式:
This function can also be used for multi-dimension arrays, as long as you specify which dimension you want to get when you supply the array index, following this pattern:
此函数也可以用于多维数组，只要你在提供数组索引时指定你想获得的维度，遵循以下模式:
This function can also be used for multi-dimension arrays, as long as you specify which dimension you want to set when you supply the array index, following this pattern:
此函数也可以用于多维数组，只要你在提供数组索引时指定你想设置的维度，遵循以下模式:

This function can also be used to check if a struct reference is a weak reference or not, in which case the function will return the string "weakref" instead of the name of the function that created the struct for more information, see the function weak_ref_create()).
此函数还可用于检查结构引用是否是弱引用，在这种情况下，函数将返回字符串"weakref"，而不是创建该结构的函数的名称，有关更多信息，请参阅函数weak_ref_create())。
This function can be used in two ways depending on what you wish to check.
根据您希望检查的内容，可以以两种方式使用此函数。
This function can be used to "flush" a texture page or a group of texture pages, ie: remove them from VRAM when no longer required.
此函数可以用来"刷新"一个纹理页面或一组纹理页面，即:当不再需要时将它们从VRAM中删除。
This function can be used to "freeze" a vertex buffer.
此函数可以用来"冻结"一个顶点缓冲区。
This function can be used to "prefetch" a texture page or a group of texture pages, ie: load them into VRAM when required.
此函数可以用来"预取"一个纹理页或一组纹理页，即:在需要的时候将它们加载到VRAM中。
This function can be used to add a font to your game from a font file present in the Included Files.
此函数可以用来从包含文件中的字体文件中添加字体到游戏中。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined area of a grid.
此函数可用于将给定值(实数或字符串)添加到网格中定义区域内的所有单元格的值中。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to all the values of the cells found within the defined disk area of a grid.
此函数可用于将给定的值(实数或字符串)添加到网格中定义的圆盘区域中的所有单元格的值中。
This function can be used to add a given value (real or string) to the value of the given cell within the grid.
此函数可用于向网格中给定单元格的值添加给定值(实数或字符串)。
This function can be used to add a new value (real or string) to the list, which will be added on at the end.
此函数可用于向列表中添加新值(实数或字符串),该值将添加到列表的末尾。
This function can be used to add all the values all the cells found within the defined disk area of a grid together, as shown in the image below:
此函数可以用来将网格中定义的圆盘区域内的所有单元格的所有值相加，如下图所示:
This function can be used to add all the values all the cells found within the defined region of a grid together, as shown in the image below:
此函数可以用来将网格中定义区域内的所有单元格的所有值相加，如下图所示:
This function can be used to add all the values of all the cells found within the source area of a grid to the values within the destination grid, as illustrated below:
此函数可用于将网格源区域内所有单元格的所有值添加到目标网格内的值，如下图所示:
This function can be used to change the depth of the given layer, changing the order in which its contents will be rendered to the screen.
此函数可用于改变给定层的深度，改变其内容在屏幕上的呈现顺序。
This function can be used to change the pitch of a given sound.
此函数可以用来改变给定声音的音高。
This function can be used to change the pitch of all sounds emitted from the given emitter.
此函数可用于改变给定发射器发出的所有声音的音调。
This function can be used to check a variable to see if it holds a valid buffer ID value or not.
此函数可以用来检查一个变量，看它是否包含一个有效的缓冲区id值。
This function can be used to check an object and see if it is an ancestor or not of another object.
此函数可以用来检查一个对象，看它是否是另一个对象的父级。
This function can be used to check and see if a physical body (ie: the fixture of an instance) overlaps, or will overlap, when rotated and placed at a given position in the room.
此函数可用于检查和查看物理实体(即实例的固定装置)在旋转并放置在房间中的给定位置时是否重叠或将重叠。
This function can be used to check and see if a variable holds an array (it will return true) or not (in which case it will return false).
此函数可用于检查变量是否包含数组(它将返回true)或否(在这种情况下，它将返回false)。
This function can be used to check and see if a variable is a method variable (it will return true) or not (in which case it will return false).
此函数可以用来检查一个变量是否是方法变量(它将返回true)或不是(在这种情况下它将返回false)。
This function can be used to check and see if the audio system has been initialised, or if the audio context is running.
此函数可用于检查和查看音频系统是否已初始化，或者音频环境是否正在运行。
This function can be used to check if a given instance is currently assigned to the given layer.
此函数可用于检查给定的实例当前是否被分配给给定的层。
This function can be used to check if a specific texture page has been unpacked and is ready for use, or if a group of texture pages have been unpacked and are ready for use.
此函数可以用来检查一个特定的纹理页面是否已经解包并准备使用，或者一组纹理页面是否已经解包并准备使用。
This function can be used to check if any audio in a synchronised group is paused.
此函数可用于检查同步组中的任何音频是否暂停。
This function can be used to check if any audio in a synchronised group is playing.
此函数可用于检查同步组中是否有任何音频正在播放。
This function can be used to check if the given layer exists.
此函数可以用来检查给定的层是否存在。
This function can be used to check if the given layer has a shader assigned to it.
此函数可以用来检查给定的层是否有指定的着色器。
This function can be used to check the visibility of the given view port.
此函数可用于检查给定视口的可见性。
This function can be used to check whether a given set of tile-data is for an empty tile or not.
此函数可用于检查给定的一组图块数据是否用于空图块。
This function can be used to check whether anti-aliasing (AA) is enabled for fonts added using font_add().
此函数可以用来检查使用font_add()添加的字体是否启用了抗锯齿(AA)。
This function can be used to check whether in a given set of tile-data the tile has been flipped or not.
此函数可用于检查在给定的一组图块数据中，图块是否已被翻转。
This function can be used to check whether in a given set of tile-data the tile has been mirrored or not.
此函数可用于检查在给定的图块数据集中图块是否已被镜像。
This function can be used to check whether in a given set of tile-data the tile has been rotated 90 degrees or not.
此函数可用于检查在给定的一组图块数据中，图块是否旋转了90度。
This function can be used to check whether the matrix stack is empty (returns true) or not (returns false).
此函数可用于检查矩阵堆栈是否为空(返回true)或否(返回false)。
This function can be used to checks if the given sound index can be played currently.
此函数可用于检查当前是否可以播放给定的声音索引。
This function can be used to clear a given DS grid to a specific value.
此函数可用于将给定的DS网格清除到特定值。
This function can be used to clear a specific "cell" of an MP grid.
此函数可用于清除MP网格的特定"单元"。
This function can be used to clear the entire screen (with no alpha blend) to the given colour, and is only for use in the draw event of an instance (it will not show if used in any other event).
此函数可以用来清除整个屏幕(没有alpha混合)到给定的颜色，并且只在实例的绘制事件中使用(如果在任何其他事件中使用它将不会显示)。

This function can be used to clear the entire screen with a given colour and the alpha component of the destination is set to the value you have set - this function does not do any blending as it works but any subsequent blend operations can be set up to use the destination alpha that you have set.
此函数可以用来用给定的颜色清除整个屏幕，目标的alpha组件被设置为你所设置的值-此函数在工作时不做任何混合，但任何后续的混合操作都可以设置为使用你所设置的目标alpha。
This function can be used to convert a string which has been created previously by the function ds_grid_write() back into a DS grid.
此函数可用于将先前由函数ds_grid_write()创建的字符串转换回DS网格。
This function can be used to convert the given ds_grid into a string, which can then be stored in an external file (for example).
此函数可以用来将给定的ds_grid转换成一个字符串，然后可以存储在一个外部文件中(例如)。
This function can be used to copy a segment (or all) of the data stored in one buffer to another.
此函数可用于将一个缓冲区中存储的一段(或全部)数据复制到另一个缓冲区中。
This function can be used to copy some (or all) of the vertex data stored in one vertex buffer into a previously created regular buffer.
此函数可用于将存储在一个顶点缓冲区中的一些(或全部)顶点数据复制到先前创建的常规缓冲区中。
This function can be used to copy the contents of a rectangular area of grid cells from one (previously defined) DS grid to another, or it can be used to copy a region from within the same grid.
此函数可用于将网格单元的矩形区域的内容从一个(先前定义的)DS网格复制到另一个，或者可用于从同一网格内复制一个区域。
This function can be used to copy the contents of one priority queue into another.
此函数可用于将一个优先级队列的内容复制到另一个优先级队列中。
This function can be used to copy the contents of one queue into another.
此函数可以用来将一个队列的内容复制到另一个队列中。
This function can be used to copy the contents of one stack into another.
此函数可用于将一个堆栈的内容复制到另一个堆栈中。

This function can be used to create a custom analytic to track something outside of the scope of the provider being used, and will also accept custom parameter/value pairs, where the parameter is a string and the value a real number.
此函数可用于创建自定义分析，以跟踪所使用的提供者范围之外的内容，并且还将接受自定义参数/值对，其中参数为字符串，值为实数。
This function can be used to create a custom analytic to track something outside of the scope of the provider being used.
此函数可用于创建自定义分析，以跟踪所使用的提供者范围之外的内容。
This function can be used to create a new animation curve channel struct.
此函数可用于创建新的动画曲线通道结构。
This function can be used to create a new points struct to be added to an animation curve channel.
此函数可以用来创建一个新的点结构，并添加到一个动画曲线通道中。
This function can be used to create your own custom matrix and will return an index value for this new matrix which should be stored in a variable for future reference and use.
此函数可用于创建您自己的自定义矩阵，并将返回该新矩阵的索引值，该值应存储在变量中以供将来参考和使用。
This function can be used to define an external function call to a specific dll (for Windows) or dylib (for Mac).
此函数可用于定义对特定dll (Windows)或dylib (Mac)的外部函数调用。
This function can be used to destroy all the instances assigned to the given layer.
此函数可以用来销毁分配给给定层的所有实例。
This function can be used to destroy any animation curves that have been previously created with the function animcurve_create().
此函数可以用来销毁之前用animcurve_create()函数创建的任何动画曲线。
This function can be used to detect the current threshold setting of the analogue buttons for a given device.
此函数可用于检测给定设备模拟按钮的当前阈值设置。
This function can be used to display debug information about the audio system, with true switching it on and false to switch it off.
此函数可以用来显示音频系统的调试信息，true表示打开，false表示关闭。
This function can be used to draw a given tilemap anywhere in the room.
此函数可以用来在房间的任何地方绘制给定的tilemap。
This function can be used to enable or disable anti-aliasing (AA) for fonts added using font_add().
此函数可用于启用或禁用使用font_add()添加的字体的抗锯齿(AA)。
This function can be used to enable or disable fog drawing.
此函数可用于启用或禁用拉雾。
This function can be used to enable or disable texture debug messages.
此函数可以用来启用或禁用纹理调试消息。
This function can be used to fill a previously created buffer with a given data type and value.
此函数可用于用给定的数据类型和值填充先前创建的缓冲区。
This function can be used to find out if the background element is tiled horizontally or not.
此函数可以用来确定背景元素是否水平平铺。
This function can be used to find out if the background element is tiled vertically or not.
此函数可以用来确定背景元素是否垂直平铺。
This function can be used to find out whether the given path is smooth (true) or not (false).
此函数可以用来找出给定的路径是光滑的(true)还是不光滑的(false)。
This function can be used to find the last character (as an UTF8 value) that was used when your font asset was added to your game.
此函数可以用来找到最后一个字符(作为一个UTF8值)，当你的字体资源被添加到你的游戏。

此函数可以用来找到网格中定义的圆盘区域内所有单元格的最大值，如下图所示:

此函数可以用来找到网格中定义区域内所有单元格的最大值，如下图所示:

此函数可以用来找到网格中定义的圆盘区域内所有单元格的平均值(所有的单元格值相加，然后除以组成圆盘的单元格总数)，如下图所示:

This function can be used to find the mean value for all the cells found within the defined region of a grid (all cell values are added together and then divided by the total number of cells that make the region), as shown in the image below:
此函数可以用来找到网格中定义区域内所有单元格的平均值(所有单元格的值相加，然后除以构成该区域的单元格总数)，如下图所示:
This function can be used to find the minimum value for all the cells found within the defined disk area of a grid, as shown in the image below:
此函数可以用来寻找网格中定义的圆盘区域内所有单元格的最小值，如下图所示:
This function can be used to find the minimum value for all the cells found within the defined region of a grid, as shown in the image below:
此函数可以用来寻找网格中定义区域内所有单元格的最小值，如下图所示:
This function can be used to flag a given path as being open (false) or closed (true).
此函数可以用来标记一个给定的路径是开放的(假)还是封闭的(真)。
This function can be used to get information on the named bone at any time and store the data in an empty DS map, which you must have created previously.
此函数可用于随时获取命名骨骼的信息，并将数据存储在一个空的DS贴图中，该贴图必须是您之前创建的。
This function can be used to get or to set the position of an instance along a path.
此函数可用于获取或设置实例在路径上的位置。
This function can be used to get the "dead zone" value of the joystick axis.
此函数可以用来获取操纵杆轴的"死区"值。
This function can be used to get the alpha value of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的透明度(Alpha)值。
This function can be used to get the alpha value of the sprite element.
此函数可用于获取精灵元素的透明度(Alpha)值。
This function can be used to get the anti-aliasing (AA) level for SWF format vector sprites.
此函数可用于获取 SWF 格式矢量精灵的抗锯齿 (AA) 级别。
This function can be used to get the blend colour of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的混合颜色。
This function can be used to get the blend colour of the sprite element.
此函数可以用来获取精灵元素的混合颜色。
This function can be used to get the colour of a specific pixel from a surface, using the local coordinates of the surface where (0,0) is the top left corner.
此函数可用于从表面获取特定像素的颜色，使用表面的局部坐标，其中(0,0)为左上角。
This function can be used to get the cross-origin type set for HTML5 games and will return a string (on all other platforms an empty string "" will be returned).
此函数可用于获得HTML5游戏的跨源类型设置，并将返回一个字符串(在所有其他平台上将返回空字符串"")。
This function can be used to get the current angle for the sprite element.
此函数可用于获取精灵元素的当前角度。
This function can be used to get the current image index value of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的当前图像索引值。
This function can be used to get the current image index value of the sprite element.
此函数可以用来获取精灵元素的当前图像索引值。
This function can be used to get the current scale multiplier along the x axis for the sprite element.
此函数可用于获取sprite元素沿x轴的当前缩放倍数。
This function can be used to get the current scale multiplier along the y axis for the sprite element.
此函数可用于获取sprite元素沿 y 轴的当前缩放倍数。
This function can be used to get the current scale multiplier value of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的当前缩放乘数值。
This function can be used to get the current sleep margin value used for the render timing of your game, and will return a millisecond value.
此函数可以用来获取游戏渲染时间的当前睡眠余量值，并将返回一个毫秒值。
This function can be used to get the current speed multiplier value of the background element.
此函数可用于获取背景元素的当前速度乘数值。
This function can be used to get the current speed multiplier value of the sprite element.
此函数可以用来获取sprite元素的当前速度乘数值。
This function can be used to get the current sprite index of the sprite element.
此函数可以用来获取sprite元素的当前sprite索引。
This function can be used to get the current sprite index value of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的当前精灵索引值。
This function can be used to get the current value of the given alarm.
此函数可用于获取给定告警的当前值。
This function can be used to get the game speed as either the number of game frames to run per second or as the number of micro seconds per game frame.
此函数可用于获取游戏速度，即每秒运行的游戏帧数或每帧运行的游戏微秒数。
This function can be used to get the get pitch of a given sound.
此函数可以用来获取给定声音的音高。
This function can be used to get the name (as a string) that was given to the font when it was added as an asset to the GameMaker Asset Browser.
此函数可以用来获取名称(作为字符串)，当字体作为资源添加到GameMaker资源浏览器时，它被赋予的名称。
This function can be used to get the name of a time line as a string.
此函数可以用来以字符串的形式获取时间线的名称。
This function can be used to get the name of the function that was used to create a struct when the struct was created using a constructor function and the new operator.
此函数可用于获取在使用构造函数和new操作符创建结构时用于创建结构的函数的名称。
This function can be used to get the status of the virtual keyboard on the device running the game.
此函数可用于获取运行游戏的设备上虚拟键盘的状态。
This function can be used to get the stretched state of the background element sprite.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素精灵的拉伸状态。
This function can be used to get the tile index (the position of the tile within the tile set image) from a set of tile-data.
此函数可用于从一组图块数据中获取图块索引(图块在图块集图像中的位置)。
This function can be used to get the unique ID value for a given layer.
此函数可以用来获取给定层的唯一ID值。
This function can be used to get the unique instance ID of the given instance element.
此函数可用于获取给定实例元素的唯一实例ID。
This function can be used to get the value (either a real number or a string) from any cell within the given DS grid.
此函数可用于从给定DS网格中的任何单元格中获取值(实数或字符串)。
This function can be used to get the value at a specific point in time from a channel struct.
此函数可用于从通道结构获取特定时间点的值。
This function can be used to get the visible state of the background element.
此函数可以用来获取背景元素的可见状态。
This function can be used to get the x position of the sprite element in the room.
此函数可以用来获取sprite元素在房间中的x位置。
This function can be used to get the y position of the sprite element in the room.
此函数可以用来获取sprite元素在房间中的y位置。
This function can be used to give an emitter Doppler effects and simulate audio motion based on the vector that is resolved from the given relative x, y and z positions.
此函数可用于给出发射器多普勒效应，并基于从给定的相对x、y和z位置解析的矢量模拟音频运动。
This function can be used to give the given listener Doppler effects and simulate audio motion based on the vector that is resolved from the given relative x, y and z positions.
此函数可用于给出给定的听者多普勒效应，并基于从给定的相对x、y和z位置解析的矢量模拟音频运动。
This function can be used to give the listener Doppler effects and simulate audio motion based on the vector that is resolved from the given relative x, y and z positions.
此函数可用于给出听者多普勒效应，并基于从给定的相对x、y和z位置解析的矢量模拟音频运动。
This function can be used to hide the virtual keyboard on the device running the game.
此函数可用于隐藏运行游戏的设备上的虚拟键盘。
This function can be used to indicate to GameMaker whether textures should repeat (true) or not (false) when used for models and primitives.
此函数可以用来向GameMaker指示纹理在用于模型和图元时是应该重复(true)还是不重复(false)。
This function can be used to make your particle burst another type of particle at the end of its lifetime.
此函数可用于使您的粒子在其寿命结束时爆发另一种类型的粒子。
This function can be used to make your particle type stream another type each step until the end of its lifetime.
此函数可用于将粒子类型流的每一步设置为另一种类型，直到其生命周期结束。
This function can be used to move a given instance from the layer it is currently on to another layer.
此函数可用于将给定实例从其当前所在的层移动到另一层。
This function can be used to move through a buffer, finding the start, the end, or a position relative to that which was last used when reading or writing data.
此函数可用于在缓冲区中移动，查找开始、结束或相对于读取或写入数据时最后一次使用的位置。

This function can be used to parse a JSON string (either previously created using json_stringify or from any valid source), and convert it into a collection of arrays or structs, where an array is the equivalent of a JSON array and a struct is the equivalent of a JSON object.
此函数可用于解析JSON字符串(可以是以前使用json_stringify创建的，也可以是从任何有效的源创建的)，并将其转换为数组或结构的集合，其中数组相当于JSON数组，结构相当于JSON对象。
This function can be used to prefetch (place into texture memory) a number of texture pages that contain the sprites given.
此函数可以用来预取(放入纹理存储器)一些包含给定精灵的纹理页面。
This function can be used to prefetch (place into texture memory) a texture page with the given sprite.
此函数可以用来预取一个给定精灵的纹理页面。
This function can be used to randomise the positions of all values in all cells within a grid.
此函数可用于随机化网格内所有单元格中所有值的位置。

This function can be used to re-scale the given path along both (or either) the vertical and horizontal axis, basically moving each of the path points to a new position corresponding to this scale around the centre of the path.
此函数可以用于沿着垂直和水平轴重新缩放给定的路径，基本上是将每个路径点移动到一个新的位置，对应于围绕路径中心的这个缩放。
This function can be used to read data from a previously created buffer.
此函数可用于从先前创建的缓冲区中读取数据。
This function can be used to remove a previously created vertex buffer (see vertex_create_buffer()) from system memory.
此函数可用于从系统内存中删除先前创建的顶点缓冲区(参见vertex_create_buffer())。
This function can be used to remove the current device mapping from the given gamepad slot index.
此函数可用于从给定的游戏手柄插槽索引中移除当前设备映射。
This function can be used to resize a tile map element.
此函数可用于调整tile map元素的大小。
This function can be used to retrieve the ID of the script function assigned as the update script for the given camera.
此函数可用于检索指定为给定相机的更新脚本的脚本函数的ID。
This function can be used to retrieve the ID of the script function assigned as the begin script for the given camera.
此函数可用于检索脚本函数的ID，此函数被指定为给定相机的开始脚本。
This function can be used to retrieve the ID of the script function assigned as the end function for the given camera.
此函数可用于检索脚本函数的ID，该脚本函数被指定为给定相机的结束函数。
This function can be used to retrieve the Z depth set for rendering layers within the room.
此函数可用于检索渲染房间内层的Z深度集。
This function can be used to retrieve the alpha-blending state.
此函数可用于检索alpha混合状态。
This function can be used to retrieve the angle of the given camera.
此函数可用于检索给定相机的角度。
This function can be used to retrieve the backface culling mode.
此函数可用于检索背面剔除模式。
This function can be used to retrieve the bit mask value for all tile maps, returning the current mask value or -1 if there is an error or 0 if no mask is specified.
此函数可用于检索所有tile maps的位掩码值，如果有错误，则返回当前掩码值或-1，如果未指定掩码，则返回0。
This function can be used to retrieve the bit mask value for the given tile map.
此函数可用于检索给定tile map的位掩码值。
This function can be used to retrieve the border value for object/instance following of the given camera along the x axis (horizontal border).
此函数可用于检索给定相机沿x轴(水平边界)的对象/实例跟随的边界值。
This function can be used to retrieve the border value for object/instance following of the given camera along the y axis (vertical border).
此函数可用于检索给定相机沿y轴(垂直边界)跟随的对象/实例的边界值。

此函数可用于以字符串形式返回指定房间的名称。

此函数可以用来返回路径上的点数。

此函数可用于返回路径是否被标记为封闭(true)或开放(false)，即路径是否循环或是否有明确的起点和终点。

此函数可以用来保存一个精灵的任何子图像到磁盘，给它指定的文件名。

此函数可用于将层上tile map元素中的单元格设置为一个新的tile，使用tile在房间内的实际位置进行更改。

此函数可用于将给定网格的矩形区域设置为指定值(可以是实数或字符串)，如下图所示:
This function can be used to set a script function that will be called at the beginning of every game frame that the camera is assigned to a visible and active view port.
此函数可用于设置一个脚本函数，此函数将在相机被分配到可见且活动的视口的每个游戏帧开始时被调用。

此函数可用于设置一个脚本函数，此函数将在相机被分配到一个可见且活动的视口的每个游戏帧结束时调用，在该视口的所有内容都已被渲染之后。
This function can be used to set a script function that will be called every game frame that the camera is assigned to a visible and active view port.
此函数可用于设置一个脚本函数，该脚本函数将被调用每一个游戏帧，相机被分配到一个可见和活动的视图端口。

此函数可用于为给定类型的每个粒子设置三种颜色的渐变。

此函数可用于为给定类型的每个粒子设置alpha值(透明度)渐变。

此函数可以用来设置游戏速度。

当在GameMaker中使用着色器时，此函数可以用来设置单个采样器"槽"的线性插值。
This function can be used to set the scale along the x-axis of a background element.
此函数可以用来设置背景元素x轴上的比例。

This function can be used to set the sleep margin value used for the render timing of your game, and requires a millisecond value.
