This function can be used to set the the bit-mask for a sound so that it will play only from those listeners specified.
此函数可用于设置声音的位掩码，以便只从特定侦听器那里播放。
This function can be used to set the the bit-mask for an emitter so that all sounds played through the emitter will play only from those listeners specified.
此函数可用于设置发射器的位掩码，以便通过发射器播放的所有声音仅从指定的收听者处播放。

此函数可用于设置游戏中所有tile maps的tile位掩码。

此函数可用于设置单个图块地图的图块位掩码。

此函数可用于为一组图块数据设置图块索引(图块在图块集图像中的位置)。

此函数可以用来设置渲染游戏的计时方法。

此函数可用于设置给定视图端口的可见性。

此函数可用于设置精灵的x和y原点，并基于精灵左上角的(0，0)位置获取相对值。

此函数可以用来设置给定视图端口的x位置。

此函数可用于设置z-buffer测试比较模式(有关更多信息，请参阅gpu_set_ztestenable())。
This function can be used to set whether a single sampler "slot" repeats the given texture when using Shaders in GameMaker .
此函数可用于设置在GameMaker中使用着色器时，单个采样器"槽"是否重复给定的纹理。
This function can be used to show or hide the system UI on Android only.
此函数只能用于显示或隐藏Android上的系统UI。
This function can be used to show the virtual keyboard on the device running the game.
此函数可用于在运行游戏的设备上显示虚拟键盘。
This function can be used to sort a DS grid based on the values from a given column (much as you would sort files by date, size etc... in the OS file explorer).
此函数可以用来根据给定列中的值对DS网格进行排序(就像根据日期、大小等对文件进行排序一样)...在OS文件资源管理器中)。
This function can be used to switch a particle system from its current layer to a new one.
此函数可以用来将粒子系统从当前层切换到新层。
This function can be used to switch off the drawing of a particle system so that any updates done to the system (automatic or otherwise) will not be seen.
此函数可用于关闭粒子系统的绘制，这样对系统所做的任何更新（自动或其他）都不会被看到。
This function can be used to switch on and off the standard debug overlay when testing your game and is disabled by default.
此函数可以用来在测试你的游戏时打开和关闭标准的调试覆盖，默认情况下是禁用的。
This function can be used to toggle alpha-blending on and off.
此函数可以用来打开和关闭alpha混合。
This function can be used to toggle on (true) and off (false) depth ordering using the z-buffer.
此函数可用于使用z-buffer切换深度排序(true)和关闭(false)。
This function can be used to toggle z-buffer testing on or off, affecting how things will be drawn (in general only of use when working with 3D projects).
此函数可以用来打开或关闭z-buffer测试，影响物体的绘制方式(通常只在处理3D项目时使用)。
This function can be used to turn a given string into a real number.
此函数可以用来把一个给定的字符串变成一个实数。
This function can be used to write data to a previously created buffer.
此函数可用于将数据写入先前创建的缓冲区。
This function can give some beautiful particle effects but may not always be necessary.
此函数可以提供一些漂亮的粒子效果，但并不总是必要的。
This function can set the background colour of the game window.
此函数可以设置游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function cancels the given push notification.
此函数取消给定的推送通知。
This function changes the actual path asset, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.
此函数改变了实际的路径资源，因此将永久地影响游戏中所有实例从使用此函数的时刻到游戏结束时使用该路径的方式。

This function changes the actual path asset, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.If this is not what you require, then you should use a function like path_duplicate() to create a copy of the path first, then call this function on the duplicated asset (don't forget to call path_delete() on the asset when it is no longer required).
此函数改变了实际的路径资源，因此将永久地影响游戏中所有实例如何使用路径，从函数被使用的时刻直到游戏结束。如果这不是您所需要的，那么您应该首先使用一个类似path_duplicate()的函数来创建路径的副本，然后在复制的资源上调用此函数(不要忘记在不再需要它时在资源上调用path_delete())。

This function changes the actual path asset, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game. If this is not what you require, then you should use a function like path_duplicate() to create a copy of the path first, then call this function on the duplicated asset (don't forget to call path_delete() on the asset when it is no longer required).
此函数会改变实际的路径资源，因此会永久地影响游戏中所有实例使用路径的方式(从函数被使用到游戏结束)。如果这不是您所需要的，那么您应该首先使用像path_duplicate()这样的函数来创建路径的副本，然后在复制的资源上调用此函数(不要忘记在不再需要资源时调用path_delete())。
This function changes the actual path resource, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.
此函数会改变实际的路径资源，因此会永久地影响游戏中所有实例使用路径的方式(从函数被使用到游戏结束)。

This function changes the actual path resource, and so will permanently affect how the path is used by all instances in the game from the moment the function is used until the end of the game.If this is not what you require, then you should use a function like path_duplicate() to create a copy of the path first, then call this function on the duplicated asset (don't forget to call path_delete() on the asset when it is no longer required).
此函数改变了实际的路径资源，因此将永久地影响游戏中所有实例使用路径的方式，从函数被使用的时刻开始，直到游戏结束。如果这不是您所需要的，那么您应该首先使用一个类似path_duplicate()的函数来创建路径的副本，然后在复制的资源上调用此函数(不要忘记在不再需要它时在资源上调用path_delete())。
This function checks if a custom attachment has been created using the skeleton_attachment_create() or skeleton_attachment_replace() functions.
此函数检查是否已经使用skeleton_attachment_create()或skeleton_attachment_replace()函数创建了自定义附件。
This function checks if the game was started via an invite to a GXC game and if so joins it.
此函数检查游戏是否是通过GXC游戏的邀请开始的，如果是，就加入游戏。
This function checks if the supplied value is a struct.
此函数检查所提供的值是否为结构。
This function checks to see if a key exists in the currently open ini and will return true if it does or false otherwise.
此函数检查当前打开的ini中是否存在一个键，如果存在，将返回true，否则返回false。
This function checks to see if a section exists in the currently open ini and will return true if it does or false otherwise.
此函数检查当前打开的 ini 中是否存在某个节，如果存在则返回 true，否则返回 false。
This function checks to see if the automatic depth buffer generation for surfaces is enabled.
此函数检查是否启用了表面的自动深度缓冲生成。
This function clears the matrix stack.
此函数清除矩阵堆栈。

This function combines the function draw_sprite_ext() with the function draw_sprite_part(), adding in some additional blending options so that each corner of the final sprite part can be blended with an individual colour.
此函数将函数 draw_sprite_ext() 与函数 draw_sprite_part() 结合在一起，添加了一些额外的混合选项，以便最终精灵部分的每个角都可以与单独的颜色混合。

This function combines the function draw_surface_ext() with the function draw_surface_part(), adding in some additional blending options so that each corner of the final surface part can be blended with an individual colour.
此函数将函数 draw_surface_ext() 与函数 draw_surface_part() 结合在一起，添加了一些额外的混合选项，以便最终表面部分的每个角都可以与单独的颜色混合。
This function computes a path for the instance from its current position and orientation to the position specified by the xgoal, ygoal arguments.
此函数计算实例从其当前位置和方向到xgoal、ygoal参数指定位置的路径。
This function computes a path for the instance from its current position and orientation to the position specified by the xgoal,ygoal arguments.
此函数计算实例从其当前位置和方向到xgoal、ygoal参数指定位置的路径。
This function computes a straight line path from the current instance position to the point specified by the "xgoal" and "ygoal" values.
此函数计算从当前实例位置到由"xgoal"和"ygoal"值指定的点的直线路径。
This function concatenates a range of elements in an array, non-string values will be converted to string.
此函数连接数组中的一系列元素，非字符串值将被转换为字符串。
This function concatenates a set of arguments, non-string values will be converted to string.
此函数连接一组参数，非字符串值将被转换为字符串。
This function connects to GXC and creates a game instance of the specified size.
此函数连接到GXC并创建一个指定大小的游戏实例。
This function controls the alpha (transparency) of the background sprite.
此函数控制背景精灵的alpha(透明度)。
This function controls the alpha (transparency) of the sprite on the asset layer.
此函数控制资源层精灵的alpha(透明度)。
This function controls the blending (or "tinting") of the background sprite and the default value is -1 (which represents the constant c_white, which can also be used).
此函数控制背景精灵的混合(或"着色")，默认值为-1(表示常量c_white，也可以使用)。
This function controls the blending (or "tinting") of the sprite sprite and the default value is -1 (which represents the constant c_white, which can also be used).
此函数控制精灵的混合(或"着色")，默认值是-1(代表常量c_white，也可以使用)。
This function controls the position along the x-axis of the room of the asset sprite element on the layer.
此函数控制资源精灵元素在图层上房间的x轴位置。
This function controls the position along the x-axis of the room of the asset tile map element on the layer.
此函数控制层上资源单幅图块地图元素沿房间x轴的位置。
This function controls the position along the y-axis of the room of the asset sprite element on the layer.
此函数控制资源精灵元素在图层上房间的y轴位置。
This function controls the position along the y-axis of the room of the asset tile map element on the layer.
此函数控制层上资源单幅图块地图元素沿房间y轴的位置。

This function controls whether GameMaker should update the particle system automatically or not, and normally you would not need to use this function as the default value of true (automatic update is on) is what you wish to happen.
此函数控制 GameMaker 是否应该自动更新粒子系统，通常您不需要使用此函数，因为默认值 true（自动更新开启）是您希望发生的。
This function creates a new audio emitter and returns the index for it.
此函数创建一个新的音频发射器并返回它的索引。
This function creates a pop-up message box which displays the given string and a button marked "Ok" to close it.
此函数创建一个弹出消息框，显示给定的字符串和一个标有"Ok"的按钮来关闭它。
This function creates a pop-up message box with two buttons for "Yes" and "No".
此函数创建一个带有"Yes"和"No"两个按钮的弹出消息框。
This function creates and returns a new audio bus struct, which can be modified to configure the bus' properties and to add audio effects to it.
此函数创建并返回一个新的音频总线结构，可以修改这个结构来配置总线的属性并添加音频效果。
This function creates and returns a new audio effect struct, which can be modified to configure the effect's properties.
此函数创建并返回一个新的音频效果结构，可以修改该结构来配置效果的属性。
This function defines a "chain" fixture shape.
此函数定义了一个"链式"夹具形状。
This function defines a box shape for your fixture.
此函数为您的夹具定义了一个盒子形状。
This function defines a circle shape for your fixture with a radius defined by the argument "rad".
此函数为夹具定义一个圆形，其半径由参数"rad"定义。
This function defines an "edge" fixture shape.
此函数定义了一个"边缘"夹具形状。
This function defines the input to be used by the rollback system.
此函数定义了回滚系统要使用的输入。
This function defines the mocked input to be used by the rollback system during sync test.
此函数定义了回滚系统在同步测试期间使用的模拟输入。
This function defines the object to use for players in rollback multiplayer.
此函数定义了回滚多人游戏中玩家使用的对象。

This function defines the points of a polygon which has previously been set to the fixture using either physics_fixture_set_polygon_shape() or it can be used to add points to a chain of edge fixtures using the function physics_fixture_set_chain_shape().
此函数定义了先前使用physics_fixture_set_polygon_shape()设置为夹具的多边形的点，也可以使用physics_fixture_set_chain_shape()函数将点添加到边缘夹具链中。
This function defines the position of a textured vertex for a primitive.
此函数定义了图元的纹理顶点的位置。
This function defines the position of a vertex for a primitive, with its own colour and alpha setting.
此函数定义了一个图元顶点的位置，有自己的颜色和alpha设置。
This function defines the position of a vertex for a primitive.
此函数定义了图元顶点的位置。
This function destroys a custom attachment previously created using the skeleton_attachment_create() or skeleton_attachment_replace() functions.
此函数销毁先前使用skeleton_attachment_create()或skeleton_attachment_replace()函数创建的自定义附件。
This function determines whether a string begins with the characters of a specified string, returning true or false as appropriate.
此函数确定字符串是否以指定字符串的字符开头，并根据需要返回true或false。
This function determines whether a string ends with the characters of a specified string, returning true or false as appropriate.
此函数确定字符串是否以指定字符串的字符结束，并根据需要返回true或false。
This function disables the automatic depth buffer generation for all surfaces that are created after it has been disabled.
此函数禁用在禁用后创建的所有表面的自动深度缓冲区生成。

This function does exactly the same as the draw_sprite_stretched() function with the added ability to set the colour blending and alpha value for the sprite when it is drawn (similar to the function draw_sprite_ext()).
此函数与 draw_sprite_stretched() 函数完全相同，并增加了在绘制精灵时为精灵设置颜色混合和 alpha 值的功能（类似于函数 draw_sprite_ext()）。

This function does exactly the same as the draw_surface_stretched() function with the added ability to set the colour blending and alpha value for the surface when it is drawn (similar to the function draw_surface_ext()).
此函数的功能与draw_surface_stretched()函数完全相同，只是增加了在绘制表面时设置颜色混合和alpha值的功能(类似于draw_surface_ext())。
This function does just that.
此函数就是这样做的。
This function draws the given sprite and sub-image at a position within the game room.
此函数在游戏房间内的某个位置绘制给定的精灵和子图像。

This function draws the sprite assigned to the instance exactly as it would be drawn if the draw event held no code or actions, and will reflect and changes that have been made to the sprite variables in other events.
此函数绘制分配给实例的精灵，就像绘制事件不包含任何代码或动作时所绘制的一样，并将反映和更改其他事件中对精灵变量所做的更改。
This function enables manual start, meaning that the game will not automatically start once everyone is connected and instead wait for rollback_start_game to be called.
此函数支持手动启动，这意味着一旦所有人都连接上了，游戏就不会自动启动，而是等待rollback_start_game被调用。
This function enables you to map "touches" of a screen area to keyboard events.
此函数使您能够将屏幕区域的"触摸"映射到键盘事件。
This function finishes the definition of a buffer save group.
此函数完成了缓冲存储组的定义。
This function forces all layers to be drawn at the specified z depth.
此函数强制在指定的z深度绘制所有层。
This function frees the memory associated with the dll or dylib with the given name.
此函数释放与给定名称的dll或dylib相关的内存。
This function generates a custom debug event that will be shown in the Graph View of the debugger when a game is being run in Debug Mode.
当游戏在调试模式下运行时，此函数生成一个自定义的调试事件，该事件将显示在调试器的图形视图中。
This function generates an array of strings as the "callstack" where the current script is listed first, and then all the other scripts that were run in order for the current script to be executed.
此函数生成一个字符串数组作为"callstack ",其中首先列出当前脚本，然后是为了执行当前脚本而运行的所有其他脚本。
This function has no effect on any other device.
此函数对任何其他设备都没有影响。

This function is a combination of the base draw_text() function with the draw_text_ext() and draw_text_colour() functions, permitting you to define gradient colours for text as well as the line spacing and maximum width per line all together.
此函数是基本的draw_text()函数与draw_text_ext()和draw_text_colour()函数的组合，允许你定义文本的渐变颜色以及行间距和每行的最大宽度。

This function is a combination of the base draw_text() function with the draw_text_ext() and draw_text_transformed() functions, permitting you to scale and rotate text while maintaining a specific line spacing and maximum width per line.
此函数是基础draw_text()函数与draw_text_ext()和draw_text_transformed()函数的组合，允许您缩放和旋转文本，同时保持特定的行距和每行的最大宽度。
This function is a combination of the base draw_text() function with the draw_text_ext(), draw_text_transformed() and draw_text_colour() functions.
此函数是基本draw_text()函数与draw_text_ext()、draw_text_transformed()和draw_text_colour()函数的组合。

This function is a combination of the base draw_text() function with the draw_text_transformed() and draw_text_colour() functions, permitting you to scale and rotate text as well as colour it with a gradient fill and change its alpha value, ignoring the base alpha and colour settings for drawing.
此函数是基础draw_text()函数与draw_text_transforms()和draw_text_color()函数的组合，允许您缩放和旋转文本，并使用渐变填充为其着色，并更改其alpha值，忽略绘图的基本alpha和颜色设置。

This function is a good way to test whether a timeline has passed the last active moment when running, since the timeline position will continue incrementing every step of the game whether there are further actions or not.
此函数是测试运行时时间线是否已经过了最后一个活跃时刻的好方法，因为时间线的位置将在游戏的每一步继续增加，无论是否有进一步的动作。
This function is called when you want to begin the saving out of multiple buffers to multiple files.
当您希望开始从多个缓冲区保存到多个文件时，将调用此函数。
This function is currently only useful for Google Play on the Android platform.
此函数目前仅对Android平台上的谷歌Play有用。
This function is designed for creating JSON compatible maps which you would then encode using json_encode() and should only be used in conjunction with that functionality.
此函数旨在创建JSON兼容的映射，然后使用json_encode()对其进行编码，并且只应与此函数结合使用。

This function is essential as a debug tool but it should be noted that it is very slow and only works when used in the draw event of the instance, and that you can set the draw alpha to change the opacity of the grid, permitting you to draw it as an overlay and see what is actually in the room at the same time.
此函数作为一个调试工具是必不可少的，但是应该注意的是，它非常慢，并且只有在实例的draw事件中使用时才起作用，并且您可以设置draw alpha来改变网格的不透明度，允许您将它绘制为一个覆盖图，同时查看房间中实际上有什么。
This function is essential when working with surfaces due to their volatile nature.
由于表面的易挥发性，此函数在处理表面时是必不可少的。
This function is extremely useful when debugging dynamic paths (for example, those created for instances with the mp_grid_path() function).
此函数在调试动态路径时非常有用(例如，那些用mp_grid_path()函数为实例创建的路径)。
This function is for 2D (orthographic) projections only, and will not work correctly when a 3D camera projection is used.
此函数仅适用于 2D（正交）投影，在使用 3D 相机投影时无法正常工作。
This function is for 2D projects only, and will not work correctly when a 3D camera projection is used.
此函数仅适用于2D项目，当使用3D相机投影时将无法正常工作。

This function is for defining a directional light, where the direction and intensity are set by the values input for the x, y and z unit vector (meaning that they must be between -1 and 1, where 1 or -1 is full intensity, and 0 is no intensity).
此函数用于定义方向光，其中方向和强度由x、y和z单位向量的输入值设置(意味着它们必须在-1和1之间，其中1或-1是全强度，0是无强度)。

This function is for defining a positional light, where you can define the x, y and z position of the light, the light range and its colour (which will also affect the perceived intensity of the light as certain colours appear "darker" than others).
此函数是用来定义位置光的，在这里你可以定义光的x, y和z位置，光的范围和它的颜色(这也会影响光的感知强度，因为某些颜色看起来比其他颜色"更深")。
This function is for use with the Shader Functions and sets the MRT (0 - 3) for native level shaders (DX9, DX11, OpenGL).
此函数与着色器函数一起使用，并设置本机级别着色器(DX9, DX11, OpenGL)的MRT(0 - 3)。
This function is global in scope, in that it will change the damping not just for new particles created after the change, but also for those already present in the simulation.
此函数的作用范围是全局的，因为它不仅会为变化后产生的新粒子改变阻尼，还会为模拟中已经存在的粒子改变阻尼。
This function is global in scope, in that it will change the density not just for new particles created after the change, but also for those already present in the simulation.
此函数在范围上是全局的，因为它不仅会更改更改后创建的新粒子的密度，还会更改模拟中已经存在的粒子的密度。
This function is global in scope, in that it will change the gravity scale not just for new particles created after the change, but also for those already present in the simulation.
此函数在范围上是全局的，因为它不仅会更改更改后创建的新粒子的重力比例，还会更改模拟中已经存在的粒子的重力比例。
This function is global in scope, in that it will change the radius not just for new particles created after the change, but also for those already present in the simulation.
此函数在范围上是全局的，因为它不仅会更改更改后创建的新粒子的半径，还会更改模拟中已经存在的粒子的半径。
This function is good for probabilities where returning an integer (whole number) is not necessary.
此函数适用于不需要返回整数(整数)的概率。

This function is ideal for those effects that do not require any of the functionality offered by particle emitters (for example, to create smoke from a missile, or a simple explosion effect) as it permits you to quickly and easily create particles at any position in the game room.
此函数非常适合那些不需要粒子发射器提供的任何功能的效果(例如，创建导弹烟雾或简单的爆炸效果)，因为它允许您在游戏房间的任何位置快速轻松地创建粒子。

This function is most useful when you are creating rooms dynamically using the function room_add(), but you can also use the read only variables room_first and room_last or the functions room_next() and room_previous() to get a specific room index, or provide a variable that has stored the index of any other room in your game.
当你使用函数room_add()动态创建房间时，此函数是最有用的，但你也可以使用只读变量room_first和room_last或函数room_next()和room_previous()来获取特定的房间索引，或提供存储游戏中任何其他房间索引的变量。
This function is of particular interest to those that wish to create buttons and other interactive media outside of the GameMaker canvas element on their host page using the function clickable_add().
对于那些希望使用clickable_add()函数在主机页面的GameMaker画布元素之外创建按钮和其他交互媒体的人来说，此函数特别有趣。
This function is of vital importance when creating save/load mechanisms for your game.
在为你的游戏创建保存/加载机制时，此函数是至关重要的。
This function is only for use with instances which have sprites assigned to them created using the skeletal animation program Spine.
此函数仅用于使用实例，这些实例使用骨骼动画程序Spine创建了分配给它们的精灵。
This function is only for use with sprites that have been created using a skeletal animation program like Spine.
此函数仅用于使用使用骨骼动画程序(如Spine)创建的精灵。

This function is only for use with the buffer_save_async() function and you must also finish the save definition by calling buffer_async_group_end() function otherwise the files will not be saved out.
此函数仅用于与buffer_save_async()函数一起使用，您还必须通过调用buffer_async_group_end()函数来完成保存定义，否则文件将不会被保存。
This function is only triggered once by the actual pressing action, and the constants listed on this page can be used to check for the mouse buttons.
此函数仅由实际的按压动作触发一次，并且本页列出的常量可用于检查鼠标按键。
This function is only triggered once by the actual releasing action, and the constants listed on this page can be used to check for the mouse buttons.
此函数只会被实际的释放动作触发一次，并且这个页面上列出的常量可以用来检查鼠标按钮。
This function is primarily for use within extensions, and allows you to set the "used" size of the given buffer, which is the number of bytes that have been written to it.
此函数主要用于扩展中，允许您设置给定缓冲区的"已使用"大小，即已写入缓冲区的字节数。
This function is provided as a debug function and it is not recommended that you permit the end-user to do this in your games.
此函数是作为调试功能提供的，不建议你允许最终用户在你的游戏中这样做。

This function is really only useful for extension writers who need the window handle to call Windows API's in DLL code (the returned pointer should be cast into a string and then in the C++ just cast it to an HWND).
此函数实际上只对那些需要窗口句柄来在DLL代码中调用Windows API的扩展编写者有用(返回的指针应该转换为字符串，然后在c++中仅仅转换为HWND)。
This function is similar to random_range() only with integer values as the input.
此函数类似于random_range()，只是输入的是整数值。
This function is similar to the log2(n) and log10(n) functions, only you stipulate the log base value.
此函数类似于log2(n)和log10(n)函数，只是您规定了log的底值。
This function is similar to the log2(n) function, only that log10(n) gets the number of 10's that we need to multiply together to get n.
此函数类似于log2(n)函数，只是log10(n)得到的是10的个数，我们需要将这些数相乘才能得到n。
This function is the same as the collision_circle() function, only instead of just detecting one instance in collision at a time, it will detect multiple instances.
此函数与collision_circle()函数相同，只是它不是一次只检测一个碰撞实例，而是检测多个实例。
This function is the same as the collision_ellipse() function, only instead of just detecting one instance in collision at a time, it will detect multiple instances.
此函数与collision_ellipse()函数相同，只是它不是一次只检测碰撞中的一个实例，而是检测多个实例。
This function is the same as the collision_line() function, only instead of just detecting one instance in collision at a time, it will detect multiple instances.
此函数与collision_line()函数相同，只是它不是一次只检测一个碰撞实例，而是检测多个实例。
This function is the same as the collision_point() function, only instead of just detecting one instance in collision at a time, it will detect multiple instances.
此函数与collision_point()函数相同，只是它不是一次只检测一个碰撞实例，而是检测多个实例。
This function is the same as the collision_rectangle() function, only instead of just detecting one instance in collision at a time, it will detect multiple instances.
此函数与collision_rectangle()函数相同，只是它不是一次只检测一个碰撞实例，而是检测多个实例。
This function is the same as using the DS list accessor.
此函数与使用DS list访问器相同。
This function is the same as using the DS map accessor to set/create a map key/value pair.
此函数与使用DS map访问器设置/创建映射键/值对相同。
This function is used to "snap" the instance to a grid of a given size.
此函数用于将实例"捕捉"到给定大小的网格。

This function is used to align text along the horizontal axis and changing the horizontal alignment will change the position and direction in which all further text is drawn with the default value being fa_left.
此函数用于将文本沿水平轴对齐，改变水平对齐将改变所有后续文本绘制的位置和方向，默认值为fa_left。

This function is used to align text along the vertical axis and changing the vertical alignment will change the position and direction in which all further text is drawn, with the default value being fa_top.
此函数用于沿垂直轴对齐文本，更改垂直对齐将更改所有后续文本绘制的位置和方向，默认值为fa_top。
This function is used to apply a Nine Slice struct to a sprite.
此函数用于将九宫格结构应用到sprite。
This function is used to assign an FX struct to a Room Layer.
此函数用于将FX结构分配给房间层。
This function is used to change the parameters of a filter/effect.
此函数用于更改过滤器/效果的参数。
This function is used to change the resolution of the Windows thread scheduler.
此函数用于改变Windows线程调度器的分辨率。
This function is used to change the value of a parameter in the given FX struct.
此函数用于改变给定FX结构中的参数值。
This function is used to check if FX is enabled for a specified layer.
此函数用于检查指定图层是否启用了FX。
This function is used to check whether tap counting is enabled or disabled.
此函数用于检查tap计数是启用还是禁用。
This function is used to clear the FX struct that is applied to the specified layer.
此函数用于清除应用于指定层的FX结构。
This function is used to close the video file and free up any memory associated with it.
此函数用于关闭视频文件并释放与之相关的所有内存。
This function is used to control the ambient light of a scene, which is the light that you have in a scene even without having defined any point or directional light sources.
此函数用来控制场景的环境光，它是你在场景中即使没有定义任何点或方向光源的光。
This function is used to create a new FX Struct for a given effect type, which contains information on the effect and the values for its parameters.
此函数用于为给定的效果类型创建一个新的FX Struct，其中包含关于效果的信息及其参数值。
This function is used to create a new client socket for your game to communicate over the network.
此函数用来为你的游戏创建一个新的客户端套接字，以便通过网络进行通信。
This function is used to create a new layer within the current room.
此函数用于在当前房间内创建一个新层。
This function is used to create a new network server for your game, using one of the permitted connection protocols (see the constants listed below).
此函数用来为你的游戏创建一个新的网络服务器，使用一个允许的连接协议(参见下面列出的常量)。
This function is used to create a new particle system and will return a unique index number that should be stored and used in all further functions relating to that system.
此函数用于创建一个新的粒子系统，并将返回一个唯一的索引编号，该索编号应存储在与该系统相关的所有进一步函数中。
This function is used to create a new, empty, DS map and will return its id which is then used to access the data structure in all other DS map functions.
此函数用于创建一个新的空DS map，并将返回它的id，然后用于访问所有其他DS map函数中的数据结构。
This function is used to create a surface and will return the index of the surface which should be stored in a variable for future function calls.
此函数用于创建一个表面，并将返回该表面的索引，该索引应存储在一个变量中以供将来的函数调用。
This function is used to determine the direction of the particle when it is created and can also be used to make the particle increase or decrease its direction over its lifetime.
此函数用于确定粒子创建时的方向，也可用于使粒子在其生命周期内增加或减少其方向。
This function is used to determine the orientation of the particle sprite when it is created and can also be used to make the particle orientation increase or decrease over its lifetime.
这是控制指定类型的每个粒子在屏幕上停留多长时间的函数。
This function is used to determine the size of the particle when it is created and can also be used to make the particle increase or decrease in size over its lifetime.
此函数用于确定粒子创建时的大小，也可用于使粒子在其生命周期内增大或减小大小。
This function is used to enable FX for a specified layer.
此函数用于启用指定图层的FX。
This function is used to enable a defined light.
此函数用于启用定义的灯。
This function is used to enable all lighting effects.
此函数用于启用所有照明效果。
This function is used to enable player preferences and needs to be called before joining or creating a rollback game.
此函数用于启用玩家偏好，需要在加入或创建回滚游戏前调用。
This function is used to end the definition of a particle group shape.
此函数用于结束粒子组形状的定义。
This function is used to force a filter or effect onto a single layer.
此函数用于将滤镜或效果强制应用到单个图层上。
This function is used to free up the memory associated with the given audio queue.
此函数用来释放与给定音频队列相关的内存。
This function is used to get the angle which a pair of touches must exceed in order to trigger a Rotate Start Gesture.
此函数用于获取一对触摸必须超过的角度，以触发旋转开始手势。
This function is used to get the angle within which a touch must be moving away from another touch before a Pinch Out Gesture may potentially be started.
此函数用于获得在张开手势可能开始之前，一个触摸必须远离另一个触摸的角度。
This function is used to get the angle within which a touch must be moving towards another touch before a Pinch In Gesture may potentially be started.
此函数用于获得一个触摸必须向另一个触摸移动的角度，在该角度内，手势中的收缩可能开始。
This function is used to get the distance it takes for a Dragging Gesture event to be triggered by the movement of a touch or click.
此函数用于获取触摸或点击动作触发拖动手势事件所需的距离。
This function is used to get the distance within which you have to touch/click the screen again after a single tap in order to trigger a Double Tap Gesture.
此函数用于获取点击一次后再次触摸/点击屏幕的距离，以触发双击手势。
This function is used to get the distance within which you have to touch/click the screen and move with two fingers before you trigger a Pinch Gesture.
此函数用于获取在触发挤压手势之前，您必须用两个手指触摸/点击屏幕并移动的距离。
This function is used to get the preferences for a given player.
此函数用于获取给定玩家的偏好。
This function is used to get the speed required for a Flick Gesture event to be triggered when a touch or click is released.
此函数用于获取释放触摸或点击时触发轻击手势事件所需的速度。
This function is used to get the text alignment setting along the horizontal axis, and will return one of the constants listed below.
此函数用于获得沿水平轴的文本对齐设置，并将返回下面列出的常量之一。
This function is used to get the text alignment setting along the vertical axis, and will return one of the constants listed below.
此函数用于获得沿垂直轴的文本对齐设置，并将返回下面列出的常量之一。
This function is used to get the time it takes between two touches/clicks to trigger a Double Tap Gesture event.
此函数用于获取两次触摸/点击之间触发双击手势事件所需的时间。
This function is used to get the time it takes for a Drag Start Gesture event to be triggered by a touch or click.
此函数用于获取触摸或点击触发拖动开始手势事件所需的时间。
This function is used to get the x component of a position "len" pixels from the starting point and in direction "dir".
此函数用于从起点和方向"dir"获得位置"len"像素的x分量。
This function is used to get the y component of a position "len" pixels from the starting point and in direction "dir".
此函数用于从起点和方向"dir"获得位置"len"像素的y分量。
This function is used to load a buffer that was previously saved using the buffer_save() functions, as well as any Included Files or files loaded externally.
此函数用于加载先前使用buffer_save()函数保存的缓冲区，以及任何包含的文件或外部加载的文件。
This function is used to perform any one of the Asynchronous Events provided in GameMaker.
此函数用于执行GameMaker中提供的任何一个异步事件。
This function is used to reset the layer target to the current room.
此函数用来重置图层目标到当前房间。
This function is used to retrieve a struct containing all the parameters for the given FX struct.
此函数用于检索包含给定FX结构的所有参数的结构。
This function is used to retrieve information for the given sprite.
此函数用于检索给定精灵的信息。
This function is used to retrieve information for the given tileset.
此函数用于检索给定tileset的信息。
This function is used to retrieve information for the given font.
此函数用于检索给定字体的信息。
This function is used to retrieve the FX struct for a layer.
此函数用于检索层的FX结构。
This function is used to retrieve the name of a filter/effect from its struct.
此函数用于从其结构中检索过滤器/效果的名称。
This function is used to retrieve the resolution of the Windows thread scheduler in milliseconds.
此函数用于检索Windows线程计划程序的分辨率(以毫秒为单位)。
This function is used to retrieve the value of a parameter from an FX Struct.
此函数用于从 FX 结构中检索参数的值。
This function is used to retrieve this ID by using the name (a string) of the layer (as written in the IDE).
此函数通过使用层的名称(字符串)(在IDE中写入)来检索这个ID。
This function is used to set a particle type to be a single colour for the total duration of the lifetime of each individual particle.
此函数用于将粒子类型设置为单个粒子生命周期的总持续时间内的单一颜色。

This function is used to set a particle type to have a single alpha value (transparency) for the total duration of the lifetime of each individual particle, and this can be from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
此函数用于设置粒子类型，使每个粒子的生命周期的总持续时间只有一个alpha值(透明)，这个值可以从0(透明)到1(不透明)。
This function is used to set the angle which a pair of touches must exceed in order to trigger a Rotate Start Gesture.
此函数用于设置一对触摸必须超过的角度，以触发旋转开始手势。
This function is used to set the angle within which a touch must be moving away from another touch before a Pinch Out Gesture may potentially be started.
此函数用于设置在张开手势可能开始之前，一个触摸必须远离另一个触摸的角度。
This function is used to set the angle within which a touch must be moving towards another touch before a Pinch In Gesture may potentially be started.
此函数用于设置一个触摸向另一个触摸移动的角度，在此角度范围内，手势中的收缩可能会开始。
This function is used to set the distance it takes for a Dragging Gesture event to be triggered by the movement of a touch or click.
此函数用于设置触摸或点击的移动触发拖动手势事件所需的距离。
This function is used to set the distance within which you have to touch/click the screen again after a single tap in order to trigger a Double Tap Gesture.
此函数用于设置在单次点击后，为了触发双击手势，你必须再次触摸/点击屏幕的距离。
This function is used to set the distance within which you have to touch/click the screen and move with two fingers before you trigger a Pinch Gesture.
此函数用于设置在触发挤压手势之前，您必须用两个手指触摸/点击屏幕并移动的距离。
This function is used to set the movement speed of the particle when it is created and can also be used to make the particle increase or decrease its speed over its lifetime.
此函数用于设置粒子创建时的移动速度，也可用于使粒子在其生命周期内增加或减少速度。
This function is used to set the speed required for a Flick Gesture event to be triggered when a touch or click is released.
此函数用于设置释放触摸或点击时触发轻击手势事件所需的速度。
This function is used to set the time it takes between two touches/clicks to trigger a Double Tap Gesture event.
此函数用来设置两次触摸/点击之间触发双击手势事件的时间间隔。
This function is used to set the time it takes for a Drag Gesture event to be triggered by a touch or click.
此函数用于设置触摸或点击触发拖动手势事件所需的时间。
This function is used to set the time within which a pair of touches must be rotating in a consistent direction for a Rotate Start Gesture to be triggered.
此函数用于设置一对触摸必须在一致的方向上旋转的时间，以触发旋转开始手势。
This function is used to set their position of a particle emitter within the current room.
此函数用于设置粒子发射器在当前房间内的位置。
This function is used to set whether tap counting is enabled or disabled.
此函数用于设置是否启用或禁用敲击计数。
This function is used to update the local player preferences.
此函数用于更新本地玩家偏好。
This function is very useful to prevent the browser creating a pop-up window when clicking on the button as it is all done through GameMaker itself.
此函数对于防止浏览器在点击按钮时弹出窗口非常有用，因为这一切都是通过GameMaker本身完成的。
This function iterates over each character of a string calling a provided function.
此函数迭代调用所提供函数的字符串的每个字符。
This function joins a set of arguments using the provided delimiter, non-string values will be converted to string.
此函数使用提供的分隔符连接一组参数，非字符串值将被转换为字符串。
This function joins the elements of an array using the provided delimiter, non-string values will be converted to string.
此函数使用提供的分隔符连接数组的元素，非字符串值将被转换为字符串。
This function leaves the current game.
此函数将退出当前游戏。
This function lets the instance take a step towards a particular position defined by xgoal/ygoal, all the while trying to avoid obstacles.
此函数让实例朝着由 xgoal/ygoal 定义的特定位置迈出一步，同时试图避开障碍物。
This function lets you set the CSS style properties for the given button via the key/value pairs in the provided DS Map.
此函数允许您通过提供的DS Map中的键/值对为给定的按钮设置CSS样式属性。
This function links an emitter to an audio bus.
此函数将发射器链接到音频总线。
This function logs the user into appropriate leaderboard and achievement service.
此函数将用户登录到适当的排行榜和成就服务。
This function logs the user out of the chosen leaderboard and achievement service.
此函数会让用户退出所选的排行榜和成就服务。
This function moves the current read position within the file to the indicated position.
此函数将文件中的当前读取位置移动到指定位置。
This function must be called after defining any new vertex format.
此函数必须在定义任何新的顶点格式后被调用。
This function must be called before you can define any primitives.
在定义任何图元之前，必须调用此函数。
This function must be called before you define the vertices of a textured primitive.
在定义纹理图元的顶点之前，必须调用此函数。
This function must be called when you have finished defining the points of your primitive.
在完成定义图元的点时，必须调用此函数。
This function must be called whenever you are finished using any created vector formats.
每当您使用完任何已创建的矢量格式时，都必须调用此函数。
This function must be used to copy any sprites from the original assets before any transformations can be done on them.
必须使用此函数从原始资源中复制任何精灵，然后才能对其进行任何变换。
This function must be used to create a new emitter and assign it to a given particle system.
此函数必须用来创建一个新的发射器，并将其分配给一个给定的粒子系统。
This function must be used to remove a clickable icon previously created with clickable_add() from the game window.
此函数必须用于从游戏窗口中删除之前用clickable_add()创建的可点击图标。
This function needs to be called before you add any fonts and setting it to true will enable AA, and setting it to false will disable it.
在添加任何字体之前需要调用此函数，将其设置为true将启用AA，将其设置为false将禁用AA。

This function only adds the sound to the group, but it does not play the sound, and will be a value > -1 if it succeeds and -1 if it fails, where a successful value indicates the sounds order in the sync group (so 0 would be the first sound added, 1 would be the second, etc...).
此函数只将声音添加到组中，但不播放声音，如果成功，则值为> -1，如果失败，则值为-1，其中成功值表示同步组中声音的顺序(因此0将是第一个添加的声音，1将是第二个，等等)。
This function opens a dialogue and asks the player for a filename to open with the given filter.
此函数打开一个对话框，要求玩家输入一个文件名，用给定的过滤器打开。
This function opens a dialogue and asks the player for a filename to save to with the given filter.
此函数打开一个对话框，要求玩家用给定的过滤器保存文件名。
This function opens a window and displays message as well as a space for the user to input a string (which will contain the supplied default string to start with).
此函数打开一个窗口并显示消息和一个空格，供用户输入字符串(其中将包含提供的默认字符串作为开始)。
This function opens a window and displays message as well as a space for the user to input a value (which will contain the supplied default value to start with).
此函数打开一个窗口并显示消息和一个空格，供用户输入值(其中将包含提供的初始默认值)。
This function opens a window and displays the message you define in the function to the user.
此函数打开一个窗口，并将您在函数中定义的消息显示给用户。
This function opens a window and displays the question you define in the function to the user.
此函数打开一个窗口，并向用户显示在函数中定义的问题。
This function opens a window that asks the user to input a username and password.
此函数打开一个窗口，要求用户输入用户名和密码。

This function opens the text file with the indicated filename for reading only, returning the unique id of the file that which should be stored in a variable as it will be used for all further actions to do with that file.
此函数使用指定的文件名打开文本文件以供只读，返回文件的唯一id，该id应存储在一个变量中，因为它将用于对该文件进行的所有进一步操作。

This function opens the text file with the indicated filename for writing (if the file does not exist, it is created), returning the unique id of the file that which should be stored in a variable as it will be used for all further actions to do with that file.
此函数打开带有指定的写入文件名的文本文件(如果文件不存在，则创建它)，返回文件的唯一id，该id应该存储在一个变量中，因为它将用于对该文件进行的所有进一步操作。

This function opens the text file with the indicated filename for writing only (if the file does not exist, it is created), returning the unique id of the file that which should be stored in a variable as it will be used for all further actions to do with that file.
此函数打开带有指定文件名的文本文件，只用于写入(如果文件不存在，则创建它)，返回文件的唯一id，该id应该存储在一个变量中，因为它将用于对该文件进行的所有进一步操作。
This function opens up an OS dependent dialog where you can ask the user to post a rating or comment to a particular page.
此函数打开一个依赖于操作系统的对话框，在这个对话框中，您可以要求用户对特定的页面发布评分或评论。
This function overwrites the current top of the matrix stack with the specified matrix.
此函数用指定的矩阵覆盖矩阵堆栈的当前顶部。
This function permits you to go to any room in your game project, whether created using code or in the Asset Browser.
此函数允许你进入游戏项目中的任何房间，无论是用代码创建的还是在资源浏览器中创建的。
This function permits you to use a custom data type for specific vertex format attributes as part of the new vertex format being created.
此函数允许您使用特定顶点格式属性的自定义数据类型，作为正在创建的新顶点格式的一部分。
This function pops the current top matrix off the stack.
此函数从堆栈中弹出当前的顶矩阵。
This function pops the previous GPU state from the stack and applies it.
此函数从堆栈中弹出之前的GPU状态并应用它。
This function prepares a buffer queue for audio.
此函数为音频准备了一个缓冲队列。
This function pushes the specified matrix onto the matrix stack.
此函数将指定的矩阵推入到矩阵堆栈中。
This function removes (or "un-binds") a fixture from an instance or instances.
此函数从一个或多个实例中删除(或"取消绑定")一个夹具。
This function removes whitespace from both ends of a string and returns a new string, without modifying the original string.
此函数删除字符串两端的空格并返回一个新字符串，而不修改原始字符串。
This function removes whitespace from the beginning of a string (left).
此函数删除字符串开头(左)的空格。
This function removes whitespace from the end of a string (right).
此函数从字符串的末尾(右)删除空白。
This function requires a format string using "{x}" (i.e. {0},{1},...) as placeholders and passing the correspondent values as and array of values.
这个函数需要一个使用“{x}”(即{0}，{1}，…)作为占位符的格式字符串，并将相应的值作为一个值数组传递。
This function requires that you supply the pointer to a previously created regular buffer, and a vertex format that should be applied to the copied data.
此函数要求您提供指向先前创建的常规缓冲区的指针，以及应应用于复制数据的顶点格式。
This function resets the draw target and should be called when you no longer wish to use the current shader (set using shader_set()).
此函数重置绘制目标，当你不再希望使用当前着色器(使用shader_set()设置)时应该调用它。
This function returns a 1D array with 4 elements representing the UV coordinates for the image on the texture page, filling in the array with the following values:
此函数返回一个一维数组，其中有4个元素代表纹理页面上图像的UV坐标，用以下值填充数组:
This function returns a DS Map with detailed information about the OS that the game is running on.
此函数返回一个DS Map，其中包含游戏所运行的操作系统的详细信息。
This function returns a new string using a format string with placeholder information and an array of values.
此函数使用带有占位符信息的格式字符串和一个值数组，返回一个新字符串。
This function returns a random number between the specified range, and this return value does not need to be an integer.
此函数返回指定范围内的随机数，这个返回值不需要是整数。
This function returns a special pointer for the font texture page.
此函数返回字体纹理页面的一个特殊指针。
This function returns a special pointer for the sprite texture page.
此函数返回一个精灵纹理页面的特殊指针。
This function returns a special pointer for the surface texture.
此函数返回一个用于表面纹理的特殊指针。
This function returns a special pointer for the tile set texture page.
此函数返回一个特殊的指针用于平铺设置纹理页面。
This function returns a string and not an index, and the name returned will depend on the font being used.
此函数返回一个字符串而不是一个索引，返回的名称将取决于所使用的字体。
This function returns a string containing the character which relates to the input Unicode code for displaying.
此函数返回一个字符串，该字符串包含与要显示的输入Unicode代码相关的字符。
This function returns a string containing the character with raw BYTE value set.
此函数返回一个字符串，该字符串包含设置了原始字节值的字符。
This function returns a string where the "#" symbol has been converted into a new line.
此函数返回一个字符串，其中的"#"符号已被转换为一个新行。
This function returns a string which can then be stored or transferred to another data structure using the ds_list_read() function.
此函数返回一个字符串，然后可以使用ds_list_read()函数将该字符串存储或传输到另一个数据结构。
This function returns a string which can then be stored or transferred to another data structure using the ds_priority_read() function.
此函数返回一个字符串，然后可以使用ds_priority_read()函数将该字符串存储或传输到另一个数据结构。
This function returns a string which can then be stored or transferred to another data structure using the ds_queue_read() function.
此函数返回一个字符串，然后可以使用ds_queue_read()函数将该字符串存储或传输到另一个数据结构中。
This function returns a string which can then be stored or transferred to another data structure using the ds_stack_read() function.
此函数返回一个字符串，然后可以使用ds_stack_read()函数将该字符串存储或传输到另一个数据结构中。
This function returns a string with the two letter Language Code for the OS that is running the game, as set by the ISO639 standard.
此函数返回一个字符串，包含运行游戏的操作系统的两个字母的语言代码(Language Code)，由ISO639标准设置。
This function returns a string with the two or three letter Regional Code for the OS that is running the game, as set by the ISO3166-1 standard.
此函数返回一个字符串，其中包含运行游戏的操作系统的两到三个字母的地区代码，这是由ISO3166-1标准设置的。
This function returns a struct containing fields w,a,s,d,z,x,c,space,up,left,down,right and the corresponding last_?
此函数返回一个struct，包含字段w,a,s,d,z,x,c,space,up,left,down,right和对应的last_？
This function returns a struct containing player_name and avatar_url for the player.
此函数返回一个包含玩家名字和头像url的结构。
This function returns a value between -1 and 1 depending upon the angle of "tilt" of the device.
此函数根据设备的"倾斜"角度返回一个介于-1到1之间的值。
This function returns an array of 16 values, corresponding to the given 4x4 matrix type, where row 1 is elements [0 - 3], row 2 is elements [4 -7], etc... (see the image on the main page).
此函数返回一个包含16个值的数组，对应于给定的4x4矩阵类型，其中第一行是元素[0 - 3]，第2行是元素[4 -7]，等等……(见主页图片)。
This function returns an array of all of the audio emitters linked to a given audio bus.
此函数返回链接到给定音频总线的所有音频发射器的数组。
This function returns an array with the UV coordinates and other data for the texture of the given tile set on the texture page.
此函数返回一个数组，其中包含纹理页面上给定图块集的UV坐标和其他纹理数据。
This function returns an array with the UV coordinates and other data for the texture of the sprite sub-image on the texture page.
此函数返回纹理页面上精灵子图像纹理的UV坐标和其他数据数组。
This function returns an array with the UV coordinates for the font texture on the texture page, filling in the array with the following values:
此函数返回纹理页面上字体纹理的UV坐标数组，用以下值填充数组:
This function returns an id which must be used in all further functions that deal with this DS grid.
此函数返回一个id，该id必须在所有处理此DS网格的后续函数中使用。
This function returns raw y position of the touch on a device.
此函数返回触摸在设备上的原始y位置。
This function returns the Nine Slice struct for a sprite, containing all its Nine Slice properties as set in the Sprite Editor or using sprite_set_nineslice().
此函数返回sprite的九宫格结构，包含Sprite编辑器中或使用sprite_set_nineslice()设置的所有九宫格属性。
This function returns the absolute value of the input argument, so if it's a positive value then it will remain the same, but if it's negative it will be multiplied by -1 to make it positive.
此函数返回输入参数的绝对值，所以如果它是正的，那么它将保持不变，但如果它是负的，它将乘以-1使其为正。
This function returns the amount of blue used to make the given color, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no blue and 255 is all blue.
此函数返回用于制作给定颜色的蓝色的数值，值在0到255之间，其中0表示无蓝色，255表示全蓝色。
This function returns the amount of blue used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no blue and 255 is all blue.
此函数返回用于制作给定颜色的蓝色的数量，值在0到255之间，其中0表示无蓝色，255表示全蓝色。
This function returns the amount of green used to make the given color, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no green and 255 is all green.
此函数返回用于制作给定颜色的绿色的数值，值在0到255之间，其中0表示不绿色，255表示全绿色。
This function returns the amount of green used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no green and 255 is all green.
此函数返回用于制作给定颜色的绿色的数量，值在0到255之间，其中0表示不绿色，255表示全绿色。
This function returns the amount of red used to make the given color, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no red and 255 is all red.
这个函数返回用于制作给定颜色的红色的数值，值在0到255之间，其中0表示不红，255表示全红。
This function returns the amount of red used to make the given colour, with the value being between 0 and 255, where 0 is no red and 255 is all red.
此函数返回用于制作给定颜色的红色的数量，值在0到255之间，其中0表示不红，255表示全红。
This function returns the audio bus that an emitter is linked to.
此函数返回发射器链接到的音频总线。
This function returns the background colour of the game window.
此函数返回游戏窗口的背景颜色。
This function returns the caption of the window (this is the text that appears on the top of the window, beside its icon) and by default this shows the caption of the room you're currently in.
此函数返回窗口的标题(这是显示在窗口顶部图标旁边的文本)，默认情况下，它显示您当前所在房间的标题。
This function returns the current draw colour which is used for drawing forms, text, primitives and un-textured 3D models.
此函数返回当前的绘制颜色，用于绘制表单、文本、图元和无纹理的3D模型。
This function returns the current gain (volume) set for the given audio emitter, normally between 0 and 1, where 0 is silent and 1 is full volume.
此函数返回给定音频发射器的当前增益(音量)设置，通常在0和1之间，其中0表示静音，1表示最大音量。
This function returns the current pitch value set for the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器的当前音高值。
This function returns the current play position of the given sync group.
此函数返回给定同步组的当前播放位置。
This function returns the current top matrix of the stack, but does not remove it (for that use matrix_stack_pop()).
此函数返回堆栈的当前顶矩阵，但不删除它(为此使用matrix_stack_pop())。
This function returns the current value of the draw alpha, which will range between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).
此函数返回绘制alpha的当前值，范围在0(完全透明)和1(完全不透明)之间。
This function returns the current velocity along the x axis for the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器沿x轴的当前速度。
This function returns the current velocity along the y axis for the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器沿y轴的当前速度。
This function returns the current velocity along the z axis for the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器沿z轴的当前速度。
This function returns the current x position of the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器的当前x位置。
This function returns the current y position of the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器的当前y位置。
This function returns the current z position of the given audio emitter.
此函数返回给定音频发射器的当前z位置。
This function returns the data type of any given variable as a string.
此函数将任意给定变量的数据类型作为字符串返回。
This function returns the day (from 1 to 31) of the given datetime.
此函数返回给定datetime的日期(从1到31)。
This function returns the day (from 1 to 366) within the year of the given datetime.
此函数返回给定datetime的年份内的日期(从1到366)。
This function returns the direction of a vector formed by the specified components [x1,y1] and [x2,y2] in relation to the fixed x/y coordinates of the room.
此函数返回由指定分量[x1，y1]和[x2，y2]形成的向量相对于房间的固定x/y坐标的方向。
This function returns the directory part of the indicated file name, which normally is the same as the path except for the final backslash.
此函数返回指定文件名的目录部分，除了最后一个反斜杠之外，它通常与路径相同。
This function returns the drive information of the filename.
此函数返回文件名的驱动器信息。
This function returns the extension part of the indicated file name, including the leading dot.
此函数返回指定文件名的扩展名部分，包括前导点。
This function returns the first index at which a given element can be found in the array (or subsection).
此函数返回可以在数组(或子数组)中找到给定元素的第一个索引。
This function returns the first key stored in the DS map.
此函数返回存储在DS map中的第一个键。
This function returns the fractional part of n, that is, the part behind the decimal dot.
此函数返回n的小数部分，也就是小数点后面的那部分。
This function returns the hour of the given datetime value within the year (from the total number of hours for the year, taking into account leap years).
此函数返回给定datetime值在年内的小时数(从一年的总小时数计算，考虑到闰年)。
This function returns the hour of the given datetime value.
此函数返回给定datetime值的小时值。
This function returns the id of the new instance which can then be stored in a variable or used to access that instance.
此函数返回新实例的id，然后将其存储在变量中或用于访问该实例。
This function returns the indicated file name with the extension (including the dot) changed to the new extension.
此函数返回指定的文件名，其扩展名(包括点)被更改为新的扩展名。
This function returns the inverse tangent of an angle y/x, where y = Opposite side of triangle and x = Adjacent side of triangle.
此函数返回角度y/x的反正切值，其中y =三角形的对边，x =三角形的邻边。
This function returns the last key stored in the DS map.
此函数返回存储在DS map中的最后一个键。
This function returns the length of a vector formed by the specified components [x1,y1] and [x2,y2].
此函数返回由指定分量[x1，y1]和[x2，y2]组成的向量的长度。
This function returns the maximum of the input values, of which it can have up to 16.
此函数返回输入值的最大值，最多可以有16个输入值。
This function returns the median of the input values, that is, the middle value.
此函数返回输入值的中值，也就是中间值。
This function returns the minimum of the input values, of which it can have as many as you require (note that more arguments will mean that the function will be slower to parse).
此函数返回输入值的最小值，它可以有您需要的任意数量的输入值(注意，参数越多意味着函数解析的速度越慢)。
This function returns the minute of the given datetime value within the year (from the total number of minutes for the year, taking into account leap years).
此函数返回给定datetime值在年内的分钟数(从一年的总分钟数计算，考虑到闰年)。
This function returns the minute of the given datetime value.
此函数返回给定datetime值的分钟数。
This function returns the month of the given datetime value.
此函数返回给定datetime值的月份。
This function returns the name (as a string) of the currently selected configuration for your game.
此函数返回当前选择的游戏配置的名称(以字符串形式)。
This function returns the name of the next file that satisfies the previously given mask and the attributes (defined by file_find_first()).
此函数返回满足前面给定的掩码和属性(由file_find_first()定义)的下一个文件的名称。
This function returns the next key stored in the DS map after the one specified in the function.
此函数返回存储在DS map中的下一个密钥，该密钥在函数中指定。
This function returns the number of bytes in a string, but you should note that due to their being held as UTF8, this will not be equal to their string length.
此函数返回一个字符串中的字节数，但是你应该注意到，由于它们被保存为UTF8格式，这将不等于它们的字符串长度。
This function returns the number of characters comprising a given string.
此函数返回组成给定字符串的字符数。
This function returns the number of filtered elements.
此函数返回经过筛选的元素的数量。
This function returns the number of mapped elements.
此函数返回映射元素的数量。
This function returns the number of reversed elements.
此函数返回反转元素的数量。
This function returns the number of unique elements.
此函数返回唯一元素的数量。
This function returns the previous key stored in the DS map before the one specified in the function.
此函数返回存储在DS map中的上一个密钥，该键在函数中指定的键之前。
This function returns the raw x position of a touch on the device.
此函数返回触摸在设备上的原始x位置。
This function returns the relative offset for the x-axis of the origin based on the upper left corner being the 0,0 position, with a +x being right and a -x being left of this.
此函数基于左上角为0，0位置，返回原点x轴的相对偏移量，其中a +x在此位置的右侧，a -x在此位置的左侧。
This function returns the relative offset for the y-axis of the origin based on the upper left corner being the 0,0 position, with a +y being down and a -y being up from this.
此函数基于左上角为0，0位置，返回原点的y轴的相对偏移量，其中+y向下，a -y向上。
This function returns the relative position of the bottom of the sprite bounding box.
此函数返回精灵边界框底部的相对位置。
This function returns the relative position of the left of the sprite bounding box.
此函数返回精灵边界框左边的相对位置。
This function returns the relative position of the right of the sprite bounding box.
此函数返回精灵边界框右边的相对位置。
This function returns the relative position of the top of the sprite bounding box.
此函数返回精灵边界框顶部的相对位置。
This function returns the script function index of the function assigned to run at the end of rendering the given layer, or it will return -1 if no function is assigned.
此函数返回指定在渲染给定层结束时运行的函数的脚本函数索引，如果没有指定函数，则返回-1。
This function returns the second of the given datetime value within the year (from the total number of seconds for the year, taking into account leap years).
此函数返回一年中给定日期时间值的秒(从一年的总秒数中，考虑闰年)。
This function returns the second of the given datetime value.
此函数返回给定日期时间值的秒。
This function returns the speed factor of any given position on a path.
此函数返回路径上任何给定位置的速度乘数。
This function returns the time that your game has been running on the chosen platform in microseconds (there are 1 million microseconds per second).
此函数返回游戏在所选平台上运行的时间，单位为微秒(每秒一百万微秒)。
This function returns the value (a string) of the environment variable with the given name (also a string).
此函数返回具有给定名称(也是字符串)的环境变量的值(字符串)。
This function returns the week day value of the given datetime.
此函数返回给定日期时间的星期值。
This function returns the week of the given datetime value within the year.
此函数返回一年中给定日期时间值的星期。
This function returns the x position of a touch on the device.
此函数返回触摸在设备上的x位置。
This function returns the x position of the touch on the device in relation to the GUI layer.
此函数返回设备上触摸相对于GUI层的x位置。
This function returns the x-coordinate of the mouse with respect to all the active views and returns the same value mouse_x.
此函数返回鼠标相对于所有活动视图的x坐标，并返回相同的值mouse_x。
This function returns the y position of a touch on the device.
此函数返回设备上触摸的y位置。
This function returns the y position of the touch on the device in relation to the GUI layer.
此函数返回设备上触摸相对于GUI层的y位置。
This function returns the y-coordinate of the mouse with respect to all the active views and returns the same value mouse_y.
此函数返回鼠标相对于所有活动视图的y坐标，并返回相同的值mouse_y。
This function returns the year of the given datetime.
此函数返回给定日期时间的年份。
This function returns true if the mouse wheel is being rotated downwards and false otherwise.
如果鼠标滚轮向下旋转，此函数返回true，否则返回false。
This function returns true if the mouse wheel is being rotated upwards and false otherwise.
如果鼠标滚轮向上旋转，此函数返回true，否则返回false。
This function returns true or false depending on whether the device that you specify has been "touched" (clicked) or not.
此函数根据您指定的设备是否被"触摸"(点击)返回true或false。
This function returns true or false depending on whether the device touch that you specify has been released or not.
此函数根据指定的设备触摸是否被释放返回true或false。
This function returns true when the end of a given opened text file has been reached or false if not.
当到达给定打开文本文件的末尾时，此函数返回true，否则返回false。
This function returns true or false depending on whether the given mouse button is being held down on the given device.
此函数根据给定设备上的给定鼠标按钮是否被按住而返回true或false。
This function returns various pieces of information about a group of particles in the physics simulation using the given flags checked.
此函数使用检查的给定标志返回物理模拟中一组粒子的各种信息。
This function returns various pieces of information about a single particle in the physics simulation using the given flags checked.
此函数使用选中的给定标志返回物理模拟中单个粒子的各种信息。
This function returns various pieces of information about each particle in the physics simulation using the given flags checked.
此函数返回关于物理模拟中每个粒子的不同信息片段，使用给定的标记。
This function returns whether a clickable DOM icon has been created with the specified index exists or not.
此函数返回可点击的DOM图标是否已经创建了指定的索引。
This function returns whether a font with the specified index exists or not.
此函数返回具有指定索引的字体是否存在。
This function returns whether a given variable is NaN (not a number) or not, returning true if it is, and false if it is not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为NaN(不是数字)，如果是则返回true，如果不是则返回false。
This function returns whether a given variable is a 32bit integer or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为32位整数。
This function returns whether a given variable is a 64bit integer or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为64位整数。
This function returns whether a given variable is a boolean (true ior false) or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为布尔值(true或false)。
This function returns whether a given variable is a numeric value (real, int32, int64 or boolean) or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为数值(real, int32, int64 or boolean)。
This function returns whether a given variable is a pointer or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否是指针。
This function returns whether a given variable is a real number (single, double or integer) or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为实数(single, double or integer)。
This function returns whether a given variable is a string number or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为字符串数字。
This function returns whether a given variable is defined or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否定义。
This function returns whether a given variable is infinity (an infinite number) or not, returning true if it is, and false if it is not.
此函数返回给定变量是否为无穷大(一个无限的数字)，如果是则返回true，如果不是则返回false。
This function returns whether a given variable refers to a matrix or not.
此函数返回给定变量是否引用矩阵。
This function returns whether a number is positive, negative or neither and returns 1, -1, 0 respectively.
此函数返回一个数字是正数、负数还是两者都不是，并分别返回1、-1、0。
This function returns whether a sound exists (true) or not (false).
此函数返回声音是否存在(true)或不存在(false)。
This function returns whether a sprite with the specified index exists or not in the project being run.
此函数返回具有指定索引的sprite是否存在于正在运行的项目中。
This function returns whether an audio emitter exists (true) or not (false).
此函数返回音频发射器是否存在(真)或不存在(假)。
This function returns whether an object with the specified index exists or not.
此函数返回具有指定索引的对象是否存在。
This function returns whether the game window is in fullscreen mode (true) or not (false).
此函数返回游戏窗口是全屏模式(true)还是非全屏模式(false)。
This function returns with what precision the given path has been "smoothed", and will be an integer value from 1 to 8.
此函数返回给定路径被"平滑"的精度，它将是一个从1到8的整数值。
This function sends a chat message.
此函数发送聊天消息。
This function sets a byte directly in a string (based on the UTF8 format) and returns a copy of the string with the changes.
此函数直接在字符串中设置一个字节(基于UTF8格式)，并返回更改后的字符串副本。
This function sets a fixed local input frame delay.
此函数设置固定的本地输入帧延迟。
This function sets a new direction of movement and a new speed to the instance running the code.
此函数为运行代码的实例设置了新的移动方向和新的速度。
This function sets a point in the room to define the shape of a polygon which will be used to create a group of soft body particles.
此函数在房间中设置一个点来定义多边形的形状，该多边形将用于创建一组软体粒子。
This function sets a polygon shape for your fixture, but you will need to use physics_fixture_add_point() to actually define the shape of this polygon relative to the origin of the fixture.
此函数为您的夹具设置一个多边形形状，但是您将需要使用physics_fixture_add_point()来实际定义该多边形相对于夹具原点的形状。
This function sets an extra latency to be added to all sent and received network messages.
此函数设置了一个额外的等待时间，添加到所有发送和接收的网络消息中。
This function sets how many blended copies of the given font can be cached before old ones are overwritten.
此函数设置在覆盖旧字体之前，可以缓存给定字体的混合副本的数量。
This function sets how many blended copies of the given sprite can be cached before old ones are overwritten.
此函数设置在旧的精灵被覆盖之前，可以缓存多少给定精灵的混合副本。
This function sets if the default display of rollback events should be used or not.
此函数设置是否应该使用回滚事件的默认显示。
This function sets the maximum gain (volume) for the sound.
此函数设置声音的最大增益(音量)。
This function sets the seed to a random value.
此函数将种子设置为一个随机值。
This function should always be called when the emitters are no longer needed for the system to prevent memory leaks and errors.
当系统不再需要发射器时，应该总是调用此函数，以防止内存泄漏和错误。
This function should always be called when the given emitter is no longer needed for the system to prevent memory leaks and errors.
当系统不再需要给定的发射器时，应该总是调用此函数，以防止内存泄漏和错误。
This function should always be used when you are finished using the DS grid to prevent memory leaks that can slow down and crash your game.
当你使用完DS网格时，应该总是使用此函数，以防止内存泄漏，这会导致游戏变慢和崩溃。
This function should always be used when you are finished using the DS priority queue to prevent memory leaks that can slow down and crash your game.
当你使用完DS优先队列时，应该总是使用此函数，以防止内存泄漏，这会导致游戏变慢和崩溃。
This function should always be used when you are finished using the DS queue to prevent memory leaks that can slow down and crash your game.
当你使用完DS队列时，应该使用此函数来防止内存泄漏，因为内存泄漏会降低游戏速度并使游戏崩溃。
This function should always be used when you are finished using the DS stack to prevent memory leaks that can slow down and crash your game.
当你使用完DS堆栈后，应该总是使用此函数来防止内存泄漏，这会导致游戏变慢和崩溃。
This function should always be used when you are finished using the ds_list to prevent memory leaks that can slow down and crash your game.
当你使用完ds_list的时候，应该使用此函数来防止内存泄漏，因为内存泄漏会降低游戏速度并使游戏崩溃。
This function should be called the moment you are finished reading or writing to any open ini file.
当你读完或写完任何打开的ini文件时，应该调用此函数。

This function should be used at the start of the game to make sure that the platform running your game has successfully compiled any shaders used (particularly on Windows where some computers may be using DX9 with Shader Level 2.0 and not a later version using shader level 3.0).
此函数应该在游戏开始时使用，以确保运行你的游戏的平台已经成功编译了任何使用的着色器(特别是在Windows上，一些计算机可能使用DX9着色器级别2.0，而不是使用着色器级别3.0的更高版本)。
This function should be used to add sets of key/value pairs into the specified DS map.
此函数应用于向指定的DS map添加键/值对集。
This function should be used whenever a dynamically created sequence is no longer required to free up the memory associated with it.
当动态创建的序列不再需要释放与其关联的内存时，应该使用此函数。
This function should not be used very often as it is extremely slow and may cause a pause in your game.
此函数不应该经常使用，因为它非常慢，可能会导致游戏暂停。
This function simply destroys all instances that are found to be in collision with the specified position.
此函数只是销毁所有与指定位置碰撞的实例。
This function simply returns the height, in pixels, of the indexed surface.
此函数只返回索引表面的高度(以像素为单位)。
This function simply returns the same string repeated a given number of times over itself.
此函数只是返回重复给定次数的相同字符串。
This function simply returns the width, in pixels, of the indexed surface.
此函数仅返回索引表面的宽度(以像素为单位)。
This function simply takes a sprite resource and stretches it over the given width and height so that it occupies that area.
此函数简单地获取一个sprite资源，并将其拉伸到给定的宽度和高度，这样它就占据了那个区域。
This function simply takes a surface and stretches it over the given width and height so that it occupies the area.
此函数简单地获取一个表面，并将其拉伸到给定的宽度和高度，使其占据该区域。

This function simply takes the image from one surface and copies it onto another one at the specified local position within that surface (where the (0,0) position is the top left corner of the destination surface).
此函数简单地从一个表面获取图像，并将其复制到另一个表面中指定的局部位置(其中(0，0)位置是目标表面的左上角)。
This function simply tells the instance running the code to move towards a set point at a set speed.
此函数只是告诉运行代码的实例以设定的速度向设定的点移动。
This function splits string into an ordered list of substrings by searching for the delimiter, puts these substrings into an array, and returns the array.
此函数通过搜索分隔符将字符串拆分为有序的子字符串列表，将这些子字符串放入数组中，并返回数组。
This function splits string into an ordered list of substrings by searching from an array of delimiters, puts these substrings into an array, and returns the array.
此函数通过从分隔符数组中搜索将字符串拆分为有序的子字符串列表，将这些子字符串放入数组中，并返回数组。
This function starts the current game.
此函数启动当前游戏。
This function switches random input for other players in sync test.
此函数在同步测试中为其他玩家切换随机输入。
This function takes a path and copies it into a new path.
此函数获取一个路径，并将其复制到一个新路径中。
This function takes a single character input string and returns the Unicode (UTF8) value for that character.
此函数接受单个字符输入字符串，并返回该字符的Unicode (UTF8)值。
This function takes all the path points and flips them along the horizontal axis.
此函数获取所有路径点，并沿水平轴翻转它们。
This function takes all the path points and mirrors them along the vertical axis.
此函数取所有的路径点，并沿垂直轴将它们镜像。
This function takes any real number and rounds it up to the nearest integer.
此函数接受任何实数并取四舍五入到最接近的整数。
This function takes an array of 16 values, corresponding to a given 4x4 matrix type, where elements [0 - 3] would be row 1, elements [4 -7] would be row 2, etc... (see the image on the main page).
此函数接受一个16个值的数组，对应于一个给定的4x4矩阵类型，其中元素[0 - 3]将是第一行，元素[4 -7]将是第2行，等等……(见主页图片)。
This function takes the filename handle as returned by the function file_bin_open() and then rewrites the file, clearing it of all previous data to start writing from the beginning of the file.
此函数获取函数file_bin_open()返回的文件名句柄，然后重写文件，清除所有以前的数据，从文件的开头开始写。
This function takes the room index (a real number) and not the room name (a string).
此函数接受房间索引(一个实数)而不是房间名(一个字符串)。
This function takes the supplied components of the vector and returns the length (distance) of the vector.
此函数获取所提供的向量分量，并返回向量的长度(距离)。
This function takes two previously created (or included) sprite indexes, and copies the image from one to the other.
此函数采用两个先前创建的(或包含的)sprite索引，并将图像从一个复制到另一个。
This function transforms a vector by a matrix.
此函数用矩阵变换一个向量。
This function translates degrees into radians using the formula:
此函数使用以下公式将角度转换为弧度:
This function translates radians into degrees using the formula:
此函数使用以下公式将弧度转换为度数:

This function uses the instance collision mask (decided by the sprite properties or the mask index of the calling instance) to mark cells as forbidden or not in an MP grid, where forbidden cells cannot be crossed by any of the pathfinding functions.
此函数使用实例碰撞掩码(由sprite属性或调用实例的掩码索引决定)将MP网格中的单元标记为禁止或不禁止，其中禁止的单元不能被任何寻路函数跨越。
This function uses the value/saturation of one sprite and multiplies it with the alpha of the target sprite.
此函数使用一个精灵的值/饱和度，并将其与目标精灵的alpha相乘。
This function was originally designed for calling script assets in a dynamic way, but with the introduction of user-defined functions it can now be used in two ways:
此函数可用于设置给定的一组图块数据，以将图块旋转90度或不旋转。
This function will "mark" (or "flag") a given position within a previously created DS list as holding a DS map.
此函数将把先前创建的DS列表中的给定位置"mark"(或"flag")为保存DS map。
This function will "mark" (or "flag") a given position within a previously created DS list as holding another DS list.
此函数将把先前创建的DS列表中的给定位置"标记"(或"标志")为持有另一个DS列表。
This function will add 2D position data to the vertex currently being defined for the custom primitive.
此函数将2D位置数据添加到当前为自定义图元定义的顶点。
This function will add 3D position data to the vertex currently being defined for the custom primitive.
此函数将向当前为自定义图元定义的顶点添加3D位置数据。
This function will add a floating point value to the vertex data.
此函数将向顶点数据添加一个浮点值。
This function will add a value (real or string) onto the tail of the DS queue.
此函数将在DS队列的尾部添加一个值(实数或字符串)。
This function will add four floating point values to the vertex data.
此函数将向顶点数据添加四个浮点值。
This function will add four unsigned byte values (0 - 255) to the vertex data.
此函数将向顶点数据添加四个无符号字节值(0 - 255)。
This function will add surface normal data to the vertex currently being defined for the custom primitive.
此函数将把表面法线数据添加到当前为自定义图元定义的顶点。
This function will add the data from a buffer into the audio queue that you previously created using the function audio_create_play_queue().
此函数会将缓冲区中的数据添加到您之前使用函数audio_create_play_queue()创建的音频队列中。
This function will add the given value into the list at the given position.
此函数将给定的值添加到列表的给定位置。
This function will add three floating point values to the vertex data.
此函数将向顶点数据添加三个浮点值。
This function will add two floating point values to the vertex data.
此函数将把两个浮点值加到顶点数据上。
This function will affect the relative volume of all sounds and music played from within your game.
此函数会影响游戏中播放的所有声音和音乐的相对音量。
This function will also trigger the Room End event.
此函数还将触发房间结束(Room End)事件。
This function will always return a number between 1 and -1.
此函数将始终返回一个介于1和-1之间的数字。
This function will apply the given camera settings to the current camera view being rendered immediately.
此函数将给定的相机设置应用到当前正在渲染的相机视图。
This function will associate a physics "world" with the room and all instances created in the room will behave using the physics that has been defined for them and the world itself.
此函数将物理"世界"与房间相关联，在房间中创建的所有实例将使用为它们和世界本身定义的物理行为。
This function will attempt to convert a given value into a 64bit integer, where the value must be either a real, a string, an int64, an int32, or a ptr.
此函数将尝试将给定值转换为64位整数，其中值必须是实数、字符串、int64、int32或ptr。
This function will attempt to convert a given value into a boolean data type, where the value will be returned as true if it is greater than 0.5 and false otherwise.
此函数将尝试将给定值转换为布尔型数据类型，如果该值大于0.5则返回true，否则返回false。
This function will attempt to convert a given value into a pointer data type, where the value must be either a real, a string, an int64, an int32, or a ptr.
此函数将尝试将给定值转换为指针数据类型，其中值必须是实数、字符串、int64、int32或ptr。
This function will automatically "wrap" an instance that has left the room on either the horizontal or vertical (or both) axis.
此函数将自动"包装"在水平或垂直(或两者)轴上离开房间的实例。
This function will call the current event of the parent object of the instance.
此函数将调用实例的父对象的当前事件。
This function will check a position for a collision with any instances at the given point, and if there is one, it will change all instances in collision to be instances of the chosen object.
此函数将检查在给定点与任何实例的碰撞位置，如果有，它会将碰撞中的所有实例更改为所选对象的实例。
This function will check a rectangular area that you define to see if it is either not in collision, completely within the destination bounds, or if it is simply touching, a defined circular area.
此函数将检查您定义的矩形区域，以查看它是否不在碰撞中，是否完全在目标边界内，或者它是否只是接触一个定义的圆形区域。
This function will check a rectangular area that you define to see if it is either not in collision, completely within the destination bounds, or if it is simply touching, a defined triangular area.
此函数将检查您定义的矩形区域，以查看它是否不在碰撞中，是否完全在目标边界内，或者它是否只是接触一个定义的三角形区域。
This function will check a shader at run-time to make sure that it has been successfully compiled.
此函数将在运行时检查着色器，以确保它已成功编译。
This function will check a specific audio group to see if it has been loaded into memory, ready for use.
此函数将检查一个特定的音频组，看它是否已经加载到内存中，准备使用。
This function will check all the instances of the given object to see which is furthest from the given x/y point.
此函数将检查给定对象的所有实例，以查看哪个实例距离给定的 x / y 点最远。
This function will check all the instances of the given object to see which is nearest to the given x/y point.
此函数将检查给定对象的所有实例，看哪个最接近给定的 x / y 点。
This function will check the given sound to see if it is currently paused.
这个函数将检查给定的声音，看它当前是否处于暂停状态。
This function will check the given sound to see if it is currently playing.
此函数将检查给定的声音，看它是否正在播放。
This function will check the loading progress for an audio group and return an (approximate) value between 0 and 100.
此函数将检查音频组的加载进度，并返回一个介于0到100之间的(近似)值。
This function will check to see if a given position enters into collision with any instance with a valid collision mask at the given position.
此函数将检查给定位置是否与在给定位置具有有效碰撞遮罩的任何实例发生碰撞。

This function will check two rectangular areas that you define to see if the source rectangle is either not in collision, completely within the destination rectangles bounds, or if they are simply touching.
此函数将检查您定义的两个矩形区域，以查看源矩形是否没有碰撞，是否完全在目标矩形的边界内，或者它们是否只是相互接触。
This function will clear a room of all instances (no destroy events shall be called for the instances that are being removed).
此函数将清除一个房间中的所有实例(对于正在被移除的实例，不应调用销毁事件)。
This function will clear the (previously created) DS map of all key/value pairs, but it will not delete the DS map itself from memory.
此函数将清除(以前创建的)所有键/值对(key/value)的DS map，但它不会从内存中删除DS map本身。
This function will clear the current keyboard and mouse states.
此函数将清除当前的键盘和鼠标状态。
This function will clear the current state of the given mouse button.
此函数将清除给定鼠标按钮的当前状态。
This function will clear the specified animation track of all animations, ready to be re-assigned.
此函数将清除所有动画的指定动画轨道，以便重新分配。
This function will commit a file to the chosen cloud service for storage.
此函数将提交一个文件到所选的云服务进行存储。
This function will commit a string to the chosen cloud service for storage.
此函数将提交一个字符串到所选的云服务进行存储。
This function will convert a string encoded previously using base64 format, into standard text.
此函数将先前使用base64格式编码的字符串转换为标准文本。
This function will convert a string into a base64 format encoded string.
此函数将字符串转换为base64格式编码的字符串。
This function will convert the data from the given buffer into a base64 format encoded string.
此函数将把来自给定缓冲区的数据转换成base64格式的编码字符串。
This function will copy one room to another, removing all instances, tiles etc... from the room that is being copied to and replacing them completely with the new room contents.
此函数将复制一个房间到另一个房间，删除所有实例，瓷砖等…从被复制到的房间，并完全用新的房间内容替换它们。
This function will copy the specified file, giving it the new name that you choose.
此函数将复制指定的文件，给它一个你选择的新名字。
This function will create a DS map and populate it with information for the given listener.
此函数将创建一个DS map，并用给定的信息填充它。
This function will create a custom debug message that is shown in the compiler window at runtime.
此函数将创建一个定制的调试消息，在运行时显示在编译器窗口中。
This function will create a datetime value from the component given as the arguments.
此函数将从作为参数给出的组件中创建一个日期时间值。
This function will create a new camera and then set its view into the room, before return the unique ID value to identify the camera in future function calls.
此函数将创建一个新的相机，然后将其视图设置到房间中，之后返回唯一的ID值，以便在将来的函数调用中识别该相机。
This function will create a new list data-structure and return the index value.
此函数将创建一个新的列表数据结构并返回索引值。
This function will create a new particle system on a given layer.
此函数将在给定的层上创建一个新的粒子系统。
This function will create a new priority queue data-structure and return the index value.
此函数将创建一个新的优先级队列数据结构并返回索引值。
This function will create a new queue data-structure and return the index value.
此函数将创建一个新的队列数据结构并返回索引值。
This function will create a new stack data-structure and return the index value.
此函数将创建一个新的堆栈数据结构并返回索引值。
This function will create a new, empty, room and add it to your game, returning its index to be stored in a variable for all further codes that deal with this room.
此函数将创建一个新的空房间，并将其添加到游戏中，返回其索引，并将其存储在一个变量中，用于处理该房间的所有后续代码。
This function will create a strip image from all the sub-images in a sprite, saving it to disc with the specified filename.
此函数将从一个sprite中的所有子图像创建一个条形图像，并以指定的文件名保存到磁盘上。
This function will create a text file from a string and open it for reading, returning the file "handle" that should be used in all further file function calls to read from this file.
此函数将从字符串创建一个文本文件，并打开它进行读取，返回文件"句柄"，该句柄应用于从该文件读取的所有后续文件函数调用。
This function will create an "empty" camera, ie: a camera with no view or projection settings defined.
此函数将创建一个"空"相机，即没有定义视图或投影设置的相机。
This function will create an empty animation curve struct, ready for you to populate with channel data.
此函数将创建一个空的动画曲线结构，为您填充通道数据做好准备。
This function will create an ini file from a string and open it for reading/writing.
此函数将从一个字符串创建一个ini文件，并打开它进行读/写。
This function will create a DS map and populate it with the position, velocity and orientation values for the given listener.
此函数将创建一个DS map，并用给定的位置、速度和方向值填充它。
This function will create the buffer (as a 1 byte aligned "grow" buffer") and return the unique index for the buffer which should be used in all further function calls.
此函数将创建缓冲区(作为一个1字节对齐的"grow"缓冲区)，并返回缓冲区的唯一索引，该索引应在所有后续函数调用中使用。
This function will creates a directory with the given name in the save area.
此函数将在保存区域创建一个给定名称的目录。
This function will deactivate all instances that are in the room at the moment that the code is run.
此函数将在代码运行时停用房间中的所有实例。
This function will delete a sprite from the game, freeing any memory that was reserved for it.
此函数将从游戏中删除一个精灵，释放所有为它保留的内存。
This function will delete the specified file from the system.
此函数将从系统中删除指定的文件。
This function will dequeue the head value off of the DS queue, removing it from the queue and returning the value to be stored in a variable.
此函数将使头值从DS队列中出队，从队列中删除它，并返回要存储在变量中的值。
This function will destroy the given background element.
此函数将破坏给定的背景元素。
This function will destroy the given layer.
此函数将破坏给定的层。
This function will destroy the given sprite element.
此函数将破坏给定的精灵元素。
This function will destroy the given tile map element.
此函数将销毁给定的tile map元素。
This function will do a check to see if the chosen target platform supports shaders, returning true if they do, and false if they do not.
此函数将检查所选的目标平台是否支持着色器，如果支持则返回true，如果不支持则返回false。

This function will draw a part of the chosen sprite at the given position following the same rules as per draw_sprite_part(), only now you can scale the part, blend a colour with it, or change its alpha when drawing it to the screen (the same as when drawing a sprite with draw_sprite_ext()).
此函数将根据draw_sprite_part()的相同规则在给定位置绘制所选精灵的一部分，只是现在你可以缩放该部分，与之混合颜色，或在将其绘制到屏幕时更改其alpha值(与使用draw_sprite_ext()绘制精灵时相同)。

This function will draw a part of the chosen surface at the given position following the same rules as per draw_surface_part(), only now you can scale the part, blend a colour with it, or change its alpha when drawing it to the screen (the same as when drawing a surface with draw_surface_ext()).
此函数将按照与 draw_surface_part() 相同的规则在给定位置绘制所选表面的一部分，只是现在您可以缩放该部分，与它混合颜色，或在将其绘制到屏幕时更改其 alpha（ 与使用 draw_surface_ext()) 绘制表面时相同。
This function will draw a representation of the physics world system of the room to help with debugging when you are having trouble getting the physics scene to work right.
此函数将绘制一个房间的物理世界系统的表示，当你在让物理场景正常工作时有困难时，可以帮助你进行调试。
This function will draw a sprite at the position of all the particles that share the same user defined category value, and that have flags which coincide with those set for the mask.
此函数将在所有粒子的位置绘制一个精灵，这些粒子共享相同的用户定义的类别值，并且具有与为遮罩设置的标志一致的标志。

This function will draw a very simple, rectangular "button" using the currently selected draw colour and alpha where the up argument defines how the beveled edge effect looks, as shown in the image below:
此函数将使用当前选择的绘制颜色和alpha绘制一个非常简单的矩形"按钮"，其中up参数定义了斜边效果的外观，如下图所示:
This function will draw an arrow from point (x1,y1) to point (x2,y2).
此函数将从点(x1,y1)到点(x2,y2)画一个箭头。

This function will draw text in a similar way to draw_text() only now you can choose the colours to use for colouring the text as well as the alpha value, and these new values will be used instead of the base drawing colour and alpha.
此函数将以类似于draw_text()的方式绘制文本，只是现在您可以选择用于为文本着色的颜色以及alpha值，这些新值将用来代替基本的绘制颜色和alpha值。

This function will draw text in a similar way to draw_text() only now you can choose to scale the text along the horizontal or vertical axis (effectively stretching or shrinking it) and also have GameMaker draw it at an angle (where 0 is normal and every degree over 0 rotates the text anti-clockwise).
此函数将以与draw_text()相似的方式绘制文本，只是现在您可以选择沿水平轴或垂直轴缩放文本(有效地拉伸或收缩文本)，并且还可以让GameMaker以某个角度绘制文本(其中0°为正常，超过0°的每一度都逆时针旋转文本)。
