This function will draw text in a similar way to draw_text() only now you can set the space between each line of text - should the text occupy more than one line - and limit the width (in pixels) of the string per line so that should any line exceed this value, GameMaker will automatically split the text to the next line at the nearest available white-space (if the text has no white-spaces then it will overrun this maximum width value).
此函数将以与draw_text()相似的方式绘制文本，只是现在您可以设置每行文本之间的间距(如果文本占用多行)并限制每行字符串的宽度(以像素为单位),这样，如果任何一行超出该值，GameMaker将自动在最近的可用空格处将文本拆分到下一行(如果文本没有空格，则它将超出该最大宽度值)。
This function will draw the collision masks associated with the given skeletal animation.
此函数将绘制与给定骨骼动画相关的碰撞遮罩。
This function will draw the currently selected video to surfaces which will then be used to draw the video
此函数将把当前选择的视频绘制到表面，这些表面将被用来绘制视频
This function will draw the given animation using the given skin at a specific time in the animation.
此函数将在动画中的特定时间使用给定的皮肤绘制给定的动画。
This function will draw the given sprite as in the function draw_sprite() but with additional options to change the scale, blending, rotation and alpha of the sprite being drawn.
此函数将像draw_sprite()函数一样绘制给定的精灵，但有额外的选项来更改所绘制精灵的比例、混合、旋转和alpha。
This function will draw the given surface as in the function draw_surface() but with additional options to change the scale, blending, rotation and alpha of the surface being drawn.
此函数将像函数draw_surface()一样绘制给定的表面，但是有额外的选项来改变所绘制表面的比例、混合、旋转和alpha。
This function will draw the specified MP grid (as defined by mp_grid_create()), marking free cells as green and forbidden cells as red.
此函数将绘制指定的MP网格(由mp_grid_create()定义)，将自由单元格标记为绿色，将禁止单元格标记为红色。
This function will enable or disable alpha testing for your game (by default this is disabled).
此函数将为你的游戏启用或禁用alpha测试(默认是禁用的)。
This function will enable or disable the loop
此函数将启用或禁用循环
This function will get the current GPU state, returning it as a DS Map.
此函数将获取当前的GPU状态，并以DS Map的形式返回。
This function will get the font currently assigned for drawing text.
此函数将获取当前分配给绘图文本的字体。
This function will get the position (in seconds) within the sound file for the sound to play from.
此函数将获得声音文件中播放声音的位置(以秒为单位)。
This function will get the specified light parameters as an array with the following 6 elements -
此函数将指定的灯光参数作为一个数组，包含以下6个元素-

This function will get you the object_index of any parent that has been assigned to the specified object, or else return -100 to show that the object has no parent assigned to it, or -1 if the object being checked does not exist.
此函数将为您获取已被分配给指定对象的任何父对象的object_index，或者返回-100表示对象没有被分配给它，或者返回-1表示正在检查的对象不存在。
This function will give an angular impulse to a physics enabled instance.
此函数将为启用物理的实例提供一个角度脉冲。
This function will load a CSV format file and convert it into a DS grid, returning the unique ID value for the grid created.
此函数将加载CSV格式文件并将其转换为DS网格，返回创建的网格的惟一ID值。
This function will load a previously saved DS map from the given file.
此函数将从给定文件加载以前保存的DS map。
This function will load a secure saved DS map from a buffer.
此函数将从缓冲区加载一个安全的已保存DS map。
This function will load all the sounds that are flagged as belonging to the given Audio Group into memory.
此函数将加载所有标记为属于给定音频组的声音到内存中。
This function will load some of the buffer data that was previously saved using the buffer_save() functions into an already created buffer.
此函数将把以前使用buffer_save()函数保存的一些缓冲区数据加载到已经创建的缓冲区中。
This function will load the buffer data that was previously saved using the buffer_save() functions into an already created buffer.
此函数将把之前使用buffer_save()函数保存的缓冲区数据加载到一个已经创建的缓冲区中。
This function will merge the sprite indexed in argument 1 ("ind2") with that which is indexed in argument 0 ("ind1").
此函数将把参数1("ind2")中索引的sprite与参数0("ind1")中索引的sprite合并。
This function will modify the current direction and speed of the instance running the code, combining the values given with the current values.
此函数将结合给定值和当前值，修改运行代码的实例的当前方向和速度。
This function will move the instance running the code a set number of pixels in the specified direction until it meets an instance with solid flagged as true.
此函数会将运行代码的实例向指定的方向移动一组像素，直到遇到一个solid标记为true的实例。
This function will move the instance running the code a set number of pixels in the specified direction until it meets any other instance with a valid mask.
此函数将运行代码的实例向指定方向移动一组像素，直到它遇到任何其他具有有效掩码的实例。
This function will move the position of the video in milliseconds
此函数将以毫秒为单位移动视频的位置
This function will multiply the value of a the given grid cell by the specified amount.
此函数将给定网格单元格的值乘以指定的数量。
This function will not alter the original buffer.
此函数不会改变原始缓冲区。

This function will only affect things drawn in the Draw GUI Event and can be used to set a specific width and height for all GUI components in that event, and no matter what size of display or window is used to display the GUI, it will be scaled to fit correctly.
此函数将仅影响在Draw GUI事件中绘制的内容，并且可用于为该事件中的所有GUI组件设置特定的宽度和高度，并且无论使用何种大小的显示器或窗口来显示GUI，都将对其进行缩放以正确适应。
This function will only be triggered once for any mouse button when it is first pressed and to trigger it again the button will need to have been released and pressed again.
当鼠标按钮第一次被按下时，此函数只会被触发一次，而要再次触发该按钮，则需要释放并再次按下该按钮。
This function will only be triggered once for any mouse button when it is released and to trigger it again the button will need to have been pressed and released again.
对于任何鼠标按钮，此函数仅在释放时触发一次，要再次触发此函数，需要再次按下并释放该按钮。
This function will only read the first value of the queue (that which is "at the head").
此函数将只读取队列的第一个值(即"在头部"的值)。
This function will only read the first value of the stack (that which is "on top").
此函数将只读取堆栈的第一个值(即"在顶部"的值)。
This function will only read the last value of the queue (that which is "at the tail").
此函数将只读取队列的最后一个值(即"在尾部"的值)。
This function will open a stored zip file and extract its contents to the given directory.
此函数将打开一个存储的zip文件，并将其内容提取到给定的目录中。
This function will open the achievements page for the chosen platform.
此函数将打开所选平台的成就页面。
This function will open the binary file with the indicated name.
此函数将用指定的名称打开二进制文件。
This function will open the leaderboards page for the chosen platform.
此函数将打开所选平台的排行榜页面。
This function will pause the video
此函数将暂停视频
This function will perform the specified event, with the designated argument, for the instance running the code.
此函数将使用指定的参数为运行代码的实例执行指定的事件。
This function will pop the top value off of the DS stack , removing it from the stack and returning the value to be stored in a variable.
此函数将从DS堆栈中弹出顶部的值，从堆栈中删除它，并返回要存储在变量中的值。
This function will populate a pre-made DS map with a series of key/value pairs for the first local push notification in the queue to be shown.
此函数将使用一系列键/值对填充一个预先制作的DS map，用于显示队列中的第一个本地推送通知。
This function will populate a pre-made DS map with a series of key/value pairs for the next local push notification in the queue to be shown.
此函数将使用一系列键/值对填充一个预先制作的DS map，以便显示队列中的下一个本地推送通知。
This function will push (add) a value, which can be of any data type, onto the top of the stack.
此函数将把一个值(可以是任何数据类型)推到堆栈的顶部。
This function will remove a directory with the given name in the save area.
此函数将删除保存区域中具有给定名称的目录。

This function will remove all defined emitters from the given system and clear them from memory (this will also stop any particles from being produced by the given emitter, but it does NOT remove them from the room).
此函数将从给定系统中移除所有已定义的发射器，并将其从内存中清除(这也将阻止给定发射器产生任何粒子，但不会将它们从房间中移除)。
This function will remove the given grid data-structure from memory, freeing up the resources it was using and removing all values that it contained.
此函数将从内存中删除给定的网格数据结构，释放它正在使用的资源并删除其中包含的所有值。
This function will remove the given list data-structure from memory, freeing up the resources it was using and removing all values that it contained.
此函数将从内存中删除给定的列表数据结构，释放它正在使用的资源，并删除它包含的所有值。
This function will remove the given priority queue data-structure from memory, freeing up the resources it was using and removing all values that it contained.
此函数将从内存中删除给定的优先级队列数据结构，释放它正在使用的资源并删除它所包含的所有值。
This function will remove the given queue data-structure from memory, freeing up the resources it was using and removing all values that it contained.
此函数将从内存中删除给定的队列数据结构，释放它正在使用的资源，并删除它包含的所有值。
This function will remove the given stack data-structure from memory, freeing up the resources it was using and removing all values that it contained.
此函数将从内存中删除给定的堆栈数据结构，释放它正在使用的资源并删除它所包含的所有值。

This function will remove the specified emitter from the given system and clear it from memory (this will also stop any particles from being produced by the given emitter, but it does NOT remove them from the room).
此函数将从给定系统中移除指定的发射器，并将其从内存中清除(这也将阻止给定发射器产生任何粒子，但不会将它们从房间中移除)。
This function will rename the specified file with the specified name.
此函数将用指定的名字重命名指定的文件。
This function will replace a sprite font that you created previously using the function font_add_sprite_ext().
此函数将取代您之前使用函数font_add_sprite_ext()创建的精灵字体。
This function will replace the value at the given position for another one.
此函数将把给定位置的值替换为另一个值。
This function will reset all achievements back to their initial values for the game.
此函数会将游戏中的所有成就重置回初始值。
This function will resize a surface to the given dimensions (in pixels).
此函数将调整表面的大小到给定的尺寸(以像素为单位)。
This function will restart the current room, as if it had just been entered.
此函数将重新启动当前房间，就像刚刚进入一样。
This function will resume the given sync group if it is playing and has previously been paused (using the function audio_pause_sync_group).
此函数将恢复给定的同步组，如果它正在播放并且之前已经暂停过(使用函数audio_pause_sync_group)。
This function will resume the video
此函数将恢复视频
This function will retrieve the surface ID assigned to one of the 4 render targets available to surfaces.
此函数将检索分配给表面可用的4个渲染目标之一的表面ID。
This function will return a DS Map with information about the given recorder source index.
此函数将返回一个DS map，其中包含关于给定录音机源索引的信息。
This function will return a byte of data from current position within the file with the given file ID.
此函数将从给定文件ID的文件中的当前位置返回一个字节的数据。

This function will return a copy of a given string with everything but its letters and digits removed, which means it can be used to remove any unwanted characters (like "#" or "?") from, for example, a login name or a password.
此函数将返回一个给定字符串的副本，除了字母和数字以外的所有内容都被删除，这意味着它可以用于从例如登录名或密码中删除任何不需要的字符(如"#"或"?")。
This function will return a special value that relates to the position of the given sprite and sub-image on the texture page used by your game.
此函数将返回一个特殊的值，该值与给定的精灵和子图像在游戏使用的纹理页面上的位置有关。
This function will return a string containing the name of the given audio group for displaying or checking.
此函数将返回一个字符串，其中包含用于显示或检查的给定音频组的名称。
This function will return a string of the text contained on the clipboard.
此函数将返回剪贴板上包含的文本字符串。

This function will return a string with the description of the given gamepad, for example, a PS3 controller may return a string similar to "PLAYSTATION(R)3 Controller", or an XBox360 controller could return "Xbox 360 Controller (XInput STANDARD GAMEPAD)".
此函数将返回一个带有给定手柄描述的字符串，例如，PS3控制器可能返回一个类似于"PLAYSTATION(R)3控制器"的字符串，或者XBox360控制器可能返回"Xbox 360控制器(XInput STANDARD gamepad)"。
This function will return a struct containing all the data for the given animation curve.
此函数将返回一个包含给定动画曲线的所有数据的结构。
This function will return an array of values associated with any given bounding box for the currently assigned skeleton animation sprite.
此函数将返回与当前指定的骨骼动画精灵的任何给定边界框相关联的值数组。
This function will return an array populated with the unique ID values of each layer in the room.
此函数将返回一个数组，数组中填充了房间中每个层的惟一ID值。
This function will return an array with the total bounding box value for all the individual bounding boxes assigned to a skeleton animation sprite.
此函数将返回一个数组，其中包含分配给骨骼动画精灵的所有单个边界框的总边界框值。
This function will return one of two constants GameMaker has to tell you whether the device running the game is being held in landscape or portrait mode (see the table below).
此函数将返回两个常量之一，GameMaker将告诉您运行游戏的设备是处于横向模式还是纵向模式(见下表)。
This function will return the "size" of the list, ie: the number of items that have been added into it.
此函数将返回列表的"大小",即:已经添加到列表中的项目数。
This function will return the "size" of the priority queue, ie: the number of items that have been prioritized in it.
此函数将返回优先队列的"大小"，即:队列中已优先排序的项目的数量。
This function will return the "size" of the queue, ie: the number of items that have been queued onto it.
此函数将返回队列的"大小",即:队列中的项目数。
This function will return the "size" of the stack, ie: the number of items that have been pushed onto it.
此函数将返回堆栈的"大小",即:已经被推到堆栈上的项目的数量。
This function will return the IP address of the given URL.
此函数将返回给定URL的IP地址。
This function will return the amount of times the given substring appears within a specific string.
此函数将返回给定子串在特定字符串中出现的次数。
This function will return the bit-mask data that defines the current default (global) mask for the audio listeners.
此函数将返回位掩码数据，该数据定义了音频的当前默认(全局)屏蔽。
This function will return the bit-mask data that defines which audio listeners a sound should be played from.
此函数将返回位掩码(bit-mask)数据，该数据定义了声音应该从哪个音频播放。
This function will return the bit-mask data that defines which audio listeners an emitter should play sounds from.
此函数将返回位掩码数据，该数据定义了发射器应该从哪个音频播放声音。
This function will return the character position of an instance of a sub-string within a string, searching backwards through the string from the position given as the starting position.
此函数将返回一个字符串中子字符串实例的字符位置，从给定的起始位置开始向后搜索整个字符串。
This function will return the character position of an instance of a sub-string within a string, searching forwards through the string from the position given as the starting position.
此函数将返回一个字符串中子字符串实例的字符位置，从给定的起始位置开始向前搜索整个字符串。

This function will return the character position of an instance of a sub-string within a string, searching from the beginning of the string (to search from the end, use the function string_last_pos()).
此函数将返回字符串中子字符串实例的字符位置，从字符串的开始搜索(要从末尾搜索，使用函数string_last_pos())。
This function will return the character position of an instance of a sub-string within a string, searching from the end of the string to the beginning (so the reverse of string_pos().
此函数将返回一个子字符串的实例在一个字符串中的字符位置，从字符串的末尾搜索到开头(与string_pos()相反)。
This function will return the current "mode" for the bounding box calculations.
此函数将返回边界框计算的当前"模式"。
This function will return the current colour used for ambient lighting.
此函数将返回环境照明的当前颜色。
This function will return the current d3d device pointer, which you can then (for example) pass through to a DLL or Dylib on Windows and macOS.
此函数将返回当前的d3d设备指针，然后(举例来说)您可以将它传递给Windows和macOS上的DLL或Dylib。
This function will return the current epsilon value for the target platform.
此函数将返回目标平台的当前epsilon值。
This function will return the current gain value for the given sound.
此函数将返回给定声音的当前增益值。
This function will return the current height in pixels of the virtual keyboard, based on the size of the display.
此函数将根据显示器的大小返回虚拟键盘的当前高度(以像素为单位)。
This function will return the current position of the specified animation track in the range (0.0 to 1.0).
此函数将返回指定动画轨道在0.0到1.0范围内的当前位置。
This function will return the current room being targeted by the layer functions.
此函数将返回层函数所针对的当前房间。
This function will return the duration of video in milliseconds
此函数将以毫秒为单位返回视频的持续时间
This function will return the format of the surface
此函数将返回表面的格式
This function will return the frame number of the animation on the specified animation track.
此函数将返回指定动画轨道上动画的帧号。
This function will return the group gain of a given audio group.
这个函数将返回给定音频组的组增益。
This function will return the height (in pixels) of the input string, taking into account the line separation and any line-breaks the text may have.
此函数将返回输入字符串的高度(以像素为单位),考虑到文本的行间距和任何换行符。

This function will return the height (in pixels) of the input string, taking into account the line separation and line-break width (which is defined as the number of pixels that the string can occupy before a line break is inserted).
此函数将返回输入字符串的高度(以像素为单位),其中考虑了行间距和换行符宽度(定义为在插入换行符之前字符串可以占据的像素数)。
This function will return the height of the display (in pixels).
此函数将返回显示的高度(以像素为单位)。
This function will return the height of the given grid.
此函数将返回给定网格的高度。
This function will return the hue of the given color.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的色调。
This function will return the hue of the given colour.
此函数将返回给定颜色的色调。
This function will return the index ID value of the shader currently being used for rendering, or it will return -1 if no shader is being used.
此函数将返回当前用于渲染的着色器的索引ID值，如果没有使用着色器，它将返回-1。
This function will return the index of a newly created sprite that is a duplicate (copy) of the one input as the "index" argument.
此函数将返回一个新创建的精灵的索引，这个精灵是一个输入的副本。
This function will return the index value for any given animation curve channel.
此函数将返回任何给定动画曲线通道的索引值。
This function will return the length of the given sound in seconds.
此函数将以秒为单位返回给定声音的长度。

This function will return the maximum width (in pixels) of the input string, taking into account the line separation and line-break width (which is defined as the number of pixels that the string can occupy before a line break is inserted).
此函数将返回输入字符串的最大宽度(以像素为单位)，考虑到行分隔和换行宽度(定义为插入换行之前字符串可以占用的像素数)。
This function will return the mouse x position relative to the view selected.
此函数将返回相对于所选视图的鼠标x位置。
This function will return the mouse x position within the screen.
此函数将返回鼠标在屏幕中的x位置。
This function will return the mouse y position relative to the view selected.
此函数将返回相对于所选视图的鼠标y位置。
This function will return the mouse y position within the screen.
此函数将返回鼠标在屏幕中的y位置。
This function will return the name as a string of the specified object.
此函数将返回指定对象的字符串形式的名称。
This function will return the name as a string of the specified script.
此函数将以指定脚本的字符串形式返回名称。
This function will return the name as a string of the specified sprite.
此函数将以指定精灵的字符串形式返回名称。
This function will return the name as a string of the specified tile set.
此函数将以指定图块集的字符串形式返回名称。
This function will return the name of a given audio resource as a string.
此函数将以字符串形式返回给定音频资源的名称。
This function will return the name of the animation set currently used by the given track number (as set by the function skeleton_animation_set_ext).
此函数将返回给定轨道编号当前使用的动画集的名称(由函数skeleton_animation_set_ext设置)。
This function will return the name of the first file that satisfies the mask and the attributes.
此函数将返回满足掩码和属性的第一个文件的名称。
This function will return the name of the path that is referenced as a string.
此函数将返回被引用为字符串的路径名。
This function will return the name of the skin (as a string) that is currently assigned to the skeletal animation sprite your instance is using.
此函数将返回当前分配给实例正在使用的骨骼动画精灵的皮肤名称(作为字符串)。
This function will return the number of "axis" controls on the device being checked.
此函数将返回被检查设备上"轴"控件的数量。
This function will return the number of audio recording sources (like microphones, etc...) currently available to your game.
此函数将返回当前游戏中可用的音频记录源(如麦克风等)的数量。
This function will return the number of bounding boxes associated with the skeleton animation sprite assigned to the instance running the code.
此函数将返回与分配给运行代码的实例的骨架动画精灵相关联的边界框的数量。
This function will return the number of listeners available.
此函数将返回可用侦听器的数量。
This function will return the number of particles that are active in a physics enabled room.
此函数将返回物理房间中活跃的粒子数量。
This function will return the number of particles that are active in a single group.
此函数将返回单个组中活动的粒子数。
This function will return the position of video in milliseconds
此函数将以毫秒为单位返回视频的位置
This function will return the saturation of the given color.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的饱和度。
This function will return the saturation of the given colour.
此函数将返回给定颜色的饱和度。
This function will return the size (in bytes) of a file that has been opened for reading and/or writing.
此函数将返回一个文件的大小(以字节为单位),这个文件已经被打开进行读取和/或写入。
This function will return the size (in bytes) of any of the given data constants (listed here).
此函数将返回任何给定数据常量(此处列出)的大小(以字节为单位)。
This function will return the smallest angle difference between two angles as a value between -180 and 180 degrees (where a positive angle is anti-clockwise and a negative angle clockwise).
此函数将返回两个角之间的最小角差，即-180度到180度之间的值(其中正角为逆时针，负角为顺时针)。
This function will return the status of the video
此函数将返回视频的状态
This function will return the struct containing the channel data for the channel specified in an animation curve asset.
此函数将返回包含动画曲线资源中指定的通道数据的结构。
This function will return the time required for the given animation set to run before looping back to the beginning.
此函数将返回给定动画集在循环返回开始之前运行所需的时间。
This function will return the total number of buttons available for the gamepad connected to the given device "slot".
此函数将返回连接到给定设备"插槽"的手柄的可用按钮总数。
This function will return the total number of hats available for the gamepad connected to the given device "slot".
此函数将返回连接到给定设备"插槽"的手柄上可用的帽子(hats)总数。
This function will return the value (luminosity) of the given color.
这个函数将返回给定颜色的值(亮度)。
This function will return the value (luminosity) of the given colour.
此函数将返回给定颜色的值(光度)。
This function will return the value of the moment in which the timeline performs its final action.
此函数将返回时间轴执行其最终动作的时刻的值。
This function will return the value that has the highest priority in the queue and then remove the value (and priority) from the data structure.
此函数将返回队列中优先级最高的值，然后从数据结构中删除该值(和优先级)。
This function will return the value that has the lowest priority in the queue and then remove the value (and priority) from the data structure.
此函数将返回队列中优先级最低的值，然后从数据结构中删除该值(和优先级)。
This function will return the volume 0-1
此函数将返回音量0-1
This function will return the width (in pixels) of the input string, taking into account any line-breaks the text may have.
此函数将返回输入字符串的宽度(以像素为单位)，考虑到文本中可能存在的任何换行符。
This function will return the width of the display (in pixels).
此函数将返回显示的宽度(以像素为单位)。
This function will return the width of the given grid.
此函数将返回给定网格的宽度。
This function will return the x position (in room coordinates) of the point that you input for the path that you index.
此函数将返回为索引路径输入的点的x位置(在房间坐标中)。
This function will return the y position (in room coordinates) of the point that you input for the path that you index.
此函数将返回为索引路径输入的点的y位置(在房间坐标中)。
This function will return true if loop is enabled
如果启用了循环，此函数将返回true
This function will return true if the animation on the given track has finished.
如果给定轨道上的动画已经完成，此函数将返回true。
This function will return true if the animation on the given track is looping.
如果给定轨道上的动画是循环的，此函数将返回true。
This function will return true if the application surface is being used for drawing, or false if the screen buffer is being used.
如果应用程序表面正用于绘制，则此函数将返回true，如果屏幕缓冲区正被使用，则返回false。
This function will return true if the clipboard contains text or false if it does not.
如果剪贴板包含文本，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
This function will return true if the given datetime value is the day it is being checked on (ie: today), or false otherwise.
如果给定的datetime值是被检查的当天(例如:今天)，则此函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
This function will return true if the indicated directory exists or false if it does not.
如果指定的目录存在，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
This function will return true if the key with the particular keycode is pressed, or false if it is not, by checking the hardware directly.
如果按下具有特定键码的键，则此函数将返回true;如果没有，则通过直接检查硬件返回false。
This function will return true if the mouse button being checked has been pressed or false if it has not.
如果被选中的鼠标按钮被按下，此函数将返回true;如果未按下，则返回false。
This function will return true if the mouse button being checked has been released or false if it has not.
如果被检查的鼠标按钮已经被释放，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
This function will return true if the mouse button being checked is held down or false if it is not.
如果被选中的鼠标按钮被按住，此函数将返回true;如果没有被按住，则返回false。
This function will return true if the platform compiles outside of the virtual machine, such as for the YYC and JS platforms.
如果平台在虚拟机之外编译，例如对于YYC和JS平台，此函数将返回true。
This function will return true if the specified file exists and false if it does not.
如果指定的文件存在，此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
This function will return true if the specified key exists in the (previously created) DS map , and false if it does not.
如果指定的键存在于(先前创建的)DS map中，此函数将返回true，如果不存在，则返回false。
This function will return true if the user is currently connected to the internet and the chosen leaderboard and achievement system is available, otherwise it will return false.
如果用户当前连接到互联网，并且所选的排行榜和成就系统可用，此函数将返回true，否则将返回false。
This function will return true if the year component of the given datetime value is a leap year or false otherwise.
如果给定datetime值的年份部分是闰年，则此函数将返回true，否则返回false。
This function will return true or false depending on whether the given gamepad button is detected as being held down or not.
此函数将根据是否检测到给定的手柄按钮被按下而返回true或false。
This function will return true or false depending on whether the given gamepad button is detected as having been pressed or not.
此函数将根据是否检测到给定的手柄按钮被按下而返回true或false。
This function will return true or false depending on whether the given gamepad button is detected as having been released or not.
此函数将返回true或false，取决于是否检测到给定的手柄按钮已被释放。
This function will return true or false depending on whether the script or script function with the given index exists.
此函数将返回true或false，这取决于具有给定索引的脚本或脚本函数是否存在。
This function will return whether a gamepad is connected to the given "slot" (returns true) or not (returns false).
此函数将返回一个游戏手柄是否连接到给定的"插槽"(返回true)或者不连接(返回false)。
This function will return whether lighting is enabled (true) or not (false) for the whole scene.
此函数将返回整个场景的照明是否启用(true)或未启用(false)。
This function will returns the current position in bytes, where 0 is the first position, of the file with the given file id.
此函数将返回具有给定文件id的文件的当前位置(以字节为单位)，其中0是第一个位置。
This function will save a part of a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名将表面的一部分保存到磁盘上。
This function will save a previously created DS map to a buffer.
此函数将把之前创建的DS map保存到缓冲区中。
This function will save a surface to disc using the given filename.
此函数将使用给定的文件名将表面保存到磁盘。
This function will save the contents of the given DS map to a file that is linked to the device it was created on (meaning it can't be read if transferred to any other device).
此函数将把给定DS map的内容保存到一个文件中，该文件链接到创建它的设备上(这意味着如果传输到任何其他设备，就不能读取它)。
This function will send a challenge across the network to the chosen player.
此函数将通过网络向选定的玩家发送挑战。
This function will send a request to the server for information on all available achievements.
此函数将向服务器发送一个请求，以获取所有可用成就的信息。

This function will send a request to the server for information on all current challenges and will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs.
此函数将向服务器发送一个请求，以获取当前所有挑战的信息，并将触发一个回调Social Asynchronous Event，其中包含用相关键/值对填充的async_load映射。

This function will send a request to the server for information on all the logged in users friends and will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs.
此函数将向服务器发送一个请求，以获取所有登录的用户好友的信息，并触发一个回调Social Asynchronous Event，其中包含用相关键/值对填充的async_load映射。

This function will send a request to the server for the image of a player or a friend and will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs.
此函数将向服务器发送一个请求，请求玩家或朋友的图像，并触发一个回调Social Asynchronous Event，其中包含用相关键/值对填充的async_load映射。
This function will send the specified text to the analytics provider that you have set up through the HTML5 Game Options.
此函数将将指定的文本发送到您通过HTML5游戏选项设置的分析提供程序。
This function will set a camera to a specific view port.
此函数将把相机设置到特定的视图端口。
This function will set the ARGB values for the vertex currently being defined for the custom primitive.
此函数将为当前为自定义图元定义的顶点设置ARGB值。
This function will set the animation assigned to the given track to the frame you supply.
此函数将指定给给定轨迹的动画设置为您提供的帧。
This function will set the animation assigned to the given track to the proportional position you supply.
此函数会将指定给给定轨迹的动画设置为您提供的比例位置。
This function will set the clipboard to hold the defined string.
此函数将设置剪贴板来保存定义的字符串。
This function will set the current GPU state using the passed-in DS Map.
此函数将使用传入的DS Map设置当前的GPU状态。
This function will set the font to be used for all further text drawing.
此函数将设置用于所有后续文本绘图的字体。
This function will set the given stage "slot" a texture to be used.
此函数将为给定的舞台"槽"设置一个要使用的纹理。
This function will set the gravity that is to affect each particle of the given type that is created.
此函数将设置影响所创建的给定类型的每个粒子的重力。
This function will set the horizontal and vertical scale of the particle before any other size changes are made.
此函数将在进行任何其他大小更改之前设置粒子的水平和垂直比例。
This function will set the position (in seconds) within the sound file for the sound to play from.
此函数将设置声音在声音文件中的播放位置(以秒为单位)。
This function will set the projection matrix for a given camera.
此函数将为给定的相机设置投影矩阵。
This function will set the reference value for the alpha testing (when it has been enabled using the gpu_set_alphatestenable()).
此函数将为alpha测试设置参考值(当它已经使用gpu_set_alphatestenable()启用时)。
This function will set the shape of the particle group that is being created.
此函数将设置正在创建的粒子组的形状。
This function will set the texture coordinates to use for the vertex currently being defined for the custom primitive.
此函数将设置纹理坐标，用于当前为自定义图元定义的顶点。
This function will set the total permitted number of particles in a physics simulation.
此函数将设置物理模拟中允许的粒子总数。
This function will set the view matrix for a given camera.
此函数将为给定的相机设置视图矩阵。
This function will set the volume for any video that you play
此函数将为您播放的任何视频设置音量
This function will show a custom string as an error message.
此函数将显示一个自定义字符串作为错误信息。
This function will simply delete the given value, along with its priority, from the indexed priority queue.
此函数将简单地从索引优先级队列中删除给定值及其优先级。
This function will simply return false if the specified (previously created) DS map contains any key/value pairs, or true if it does not.
如果指定的(先前创建的)DS map包含任何键/值对，此函数将返回false，如果不包含则返回true。
This function will start recording audio from the recorder source indexed.
此函数将开始从录制源索引录制音频。
This function will stop all sounds from the given audio group that are currently playing.
此函数将停止给定音频组中当前正在播放的所有声音。
This function will stop all sounds that are currently playing.
此函数将停止当前正在播放的所有声音。
This function will stop recording on the given recorder channel (the channel index is returned when you call the function audio_start_recording()).
此函数将在给定的录音机通道上停止记录(当您调用函数audio_start_recording()时，将返回频道索引)。
This function will stop the given sound if it is currently playing.
此函数将停止给定的正在播放的声音。
This function will stop the given sync group if it is playing, with the group index being the value returned when you created the group using the function audio_create_sync_group().
如果给定的同步组正在播放，此函数将停止该同步组，组索引是使用audio_create_sync_group()函数创建组时返回的值。
This function will take a given value and change its priority within the referenced priority queue.
此函数将接受一个给定值，并在引用的优先级队列中更改其优先级。

This function will take a sprite and then repeatedly tile it across the whole view (or room if no view is defined), starting from the coordinates that you give in the function and with each tile scaled, colour blended and with the alpha that you define (these properties are the same as those used in draw_sprite_ext()).
此函数将获取一个精灵，然后在整个视图（如果未定义视图，则为房间）重复平铺它，从您在函数中提供的坐标开始，每个平铺缩放、颜色混合以及您定义的 alpha （这些属性与 draw_sprite_ext() 中使用的属性相同）。
This function will take a sprite and then repeatedly tile it across the whole view (or room if no view is defined), starting from the coordinates that you give in the function.
此函数将获取一个精灵，然后从您在函数中提供的坐标开始，将其重复地平铺在整个视图（或房间，如果没有定义视图）上。
This function will take a string that has previously been created by the function ds_map_write() and then read it into a previously created DS map.
此函数将获取一个先前由函数ds_map_write()创建的字符串，然后将它读入先前创建的DS map。

This function will take a surface and then repeatedly tile it across the whole room, starting from the coordinates that you give in the function and with each tile scaled, colour blended and with the alpha that you define (these properties are the same as those used in draw_surface_ext()).
此函数将获取一个表面，然后从函数中给出的坐标开始，使用您定义的alpha缩放、混合颜色并重复平铺整个房间(这些属性与draw_surface_ext()中使用的属性相同)。
This function will take a surface and then repeatedly tile it across the whole room, starting from the coordinates that you give in the function.
此函数将获取一个表面，然后从你在函数中给定的坐标开始，在整个房间重复平铺它。
This function will take all the values in a given disc-shaped region of the DS grid, and multiply each one by the given amount.
此函数将取DS网格中一个给定的圆盘形区域中的所有值，并将每个值乘以给定的量。
This function will take an input UTF-8 string (which has a variable number of bytes per character) and return the 32-character hexadecimal MD5 hash that is unique to that string.
此函数将接受一个输入的UTF-8字符串(每个字符的字节数是可变的)，并返回该字符串唯一的32个字符的十六进制MD5散列。
This function will take an input UTF-8 string (which has a variable number of bytes per character) and returns a 160 bit message digest in ASCII format, for example:
此函数将接受一个输入的UTF-8字符串(每个字符的字节数可变)，并返回一个ASCII格式的160位消息摘要，例如:
This function will take an input file and return a 160 bit message digest in ASCII format unique to that file to be used for integrity verification at any later date.
此函数将获取一个输入文件，并返回一个160位的ASCII格式的消息摘要，该摘要对于该文件是唯一的，用于以后的完整性验证。
This function will take an input unicode string (which is 16bits for each char) and return the 32-character hexadecimal MD5 hash that is unique to that string.
此函数将接受一个输入unicode字符串(每个字符为16位)，并返回该字符串唯一的32位十六进制MD5哈希值。
This function will take an input unicode string and returns a 160 bit message digest in ASCII format, for example:
此函数将接受一个输入unicode字符串，并返回一个ASCII格式的160位消息摘要，例如:
This function will take input data from a buffer and returns a 160 bit message digest in ASCII format.
此函数将从缓冲区获取输入数据，并以ASCII格式返回一个160位的消息摘要。
This function will take input data from a buffer and returns a crc32 checksum hash.
此函数将从缓冲区获取输入数据，并返回crc32校验和散列。
This function will take the given file and generate a unique MD5 for that file which can then be stored for later use.
此函数将接受给定的文件并为该文件生成唯一的MD5，然后将其存储起来供以后使用。
This function will take the input data from a given buffer (or part of the buffer) and return the 32-character hexadecimal MD5 hash that is unique to that data.
此函数将从给定的缓冲区(或缓冲区的一部分)获取输入数据，并返回该数据特有的32个字符的十六进制MD5散列。
This function will tell you one of two things; Either the number of game pads connected, or the number of available "slots" for game pads to be connected to.
此函数会告诉你两件事中的一件;要么是连接的游戏板的数量，要么是可供游戏板连接的可用"插槽"的数量。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has a mask index or not, and if it does then it will return the index of that mask, or -1 if it does not.
此函数将告诉您所检查的对象是否有掩码索引，如果有，则返回掩码的索引，如果没有，则返回-1。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has a sprite or not, and if it does then it will return the index of that sprite, or -1 if it does not.
此函数会告诉你所检查的对象是否有精灵，如果有，它将返回精灵的索引，如果没有，则返回-1。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "persistent" or not.
此函数将告诉您正在检查的对象是否被标记为"持久(persistent)"。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "physics enabled" - in which case it'll return true, - or not - in which case it will return false.
此函数会告诉你你正在检查的对象是否被标记为"物理启用"——在这种情况下它将返回true，或者不是——在这种情况下它将返回false。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "solid" or not.
此函数将告诉您正在检查的对象是否被标记为"固体(solid)"。
This function will tell you whether the object you are checking has been flagged as "visible" (runs its draw event) or not (does not run its draw event).
此函数会告诉你正在检查的对象是否被标记为"可见"(运行它的绘制事件)或不运行它的绘制事件)。
This function will trigger an Audio Playback Asynchronous Event, and in this event a special DS map will be created in the variable async_load with the following key/value pairs:
此函数将触发一个音频播放异步事件，在这个事件中，一个特殊的DS map将在变量async_load中创建，包含以下键/值对:
This function will turn the DS map data of the specified map into string format which can then be written to an *.ini or a *.txt file for easy storage.
此函数将将指定映射的DS map数据转换为字符串格式，然后可以将其写入*.ini或*.txt文件以方便存储。
This function will unload all the sounds that are flagged as belonging to the given Audio Group into memory.
此函数会将所有标记为属于给定音频组的声音卸载到内存中。
This function will write a byte of data to the file identified by the file ID at the current write position.
此函数将在当前写入位置向文件ID所标识的文件中写入一个字节的数据。
This function works asynchronously, and so the game will continue running while being saved, and all files saved using this function will be placed in a "default" folder.
此函数是异步运行的，所以游戏在保存的时候会继续运行，所有使用此函数保存的文件都会被放在一个"默认"文件夹中。
This function works by adding up all the input values and then dividing them by their own number.
此函数的工作原理是将所有输入值相加，然后除以它们本身的数。
This function works in almost the exact same manner as sprite_add(), only instead of returning the index of the sprite you are importing, it overwrites a previously created sprite index.
此函数的工作方式与sprite_add()几乎完全相同，只是它不返回正在导入的sprite的索引，而是覆盖先前创建的sprite索引。

This function works in exactly the same way as sprite_create_from_surface() only instead of creating a new sprite from the area of the indexed surface that you select, it adds the defined area of the surface as a new sub-image to a previously created sprite (this means that you cannot add it directly to a sprite from the resource tree, but rather only to one previously created from a surface, or one that has been duplicated from a resource sprite using sprite_duplicate()).
此函数的工作方式与sprite_create_from_surface()完全相同，只是它不是从您选择的索引表面区域创建新的sprite，而是将表面的定义区域作为新子图像添加到以前创建的sprite中(这意味着您不能从资源树中将它直接添加到sprite中，而只能添加到以前从表面创建的sprite中，或者使用sprite_duplicate()从资源sprite中复制的sprite中)。
This function works on the ratio of the sprite size, so a value of 1 (the default value) is a 1:1 ratio, meaning that 0.5 would be half and 2 double.
此函数作用于精灵大小的比率，因此值1(默认值)是1:1的比率，这意味着0.5是一半，2是双精度的。
This function works similarly to the function script_execute() only you can supply an array that contains the arguments required for the function/script being called.
此函数的工作原理类似于script_execute()函数，只是您可以提供一个数组，其中包含被调用函数/脚本所需的参数。
This function works similarly to the function script_execute_ext() only you can supply an array that contains the arguments required for the function/script being called.
此函数的工作原理类似于script_execute_ext()函数，只是您可以提供一个数组，其中包含被调用函数/脚本所需的参数。
This function would normally be called at the start of a new game and is used to retrieve the current status of the cloud service at game start up.
此函数通常在新游戏开始时被调用，用于在游戏启动时检索云服务的当前状态。

This functionality is required when encoding JSON strings (which you can create using json_encode()), but can also be useful when nesting data-structures, as items marked in this way will automatically be garbage collected (destroyed) when the parent DS list is destroyed.
在对JSON字符串进行编码时，此函数是必需的(可以使用json_encode()来创建)，但是在嵌套数据结构时，此函数也很有用，因为当父DS列表被销毁时，以这种方式标记的项将被自动垃圾收集(销毁)。
This functions works the same as event_perform() except that this time you can specify events from another object.
此函数的工作原理与event_perform()相同，只是这次您可以从另一个对象指定事件。
This gain can be between 0 (silent) and 1 (full volume) and the scale is linear, such that a value of 0.5 would be half volume.
该增益可以在0(静音)和1(全音量)之间，并且比例是线性的，因此值0.5将是一半音量。
This gain can be between 0 (silent) and any value greater than 0, although normally you'd consider the maximum volume as 1.
这个增益可以在0(无声)和任何大于0的值之间，尽管通常你会认为最大音量为1。
This global scope, built-in variable can be used to access the application surface using any of the surface functions.
这个全局范围的内置变量可用于使用任何表面函数访问应用程序表面。
This global variable contains a struct with parameters for the last event that was fired
这个全局变量包含一个结构，该结构带有最后一个被触发事件的参数
This global variable contains the flag if the game is currently running
如果游戏正在运行，这个全局变量包含标志
This global variable contains the frame number for which we have confirmed input for all players
这个全局变量包含帧数，我们已经为所有玩家确认了输入
This global variable contains the gx games API url
这个全局变量包含gx游戏API url
This global variable contains the last event id that was fired
这个全局变量包含最后触发的事件id
This global variable contains the network tick and can be used in rollback networking instead of wall clock time
这个全局变量包含network tick，可以在回滚网络中代替时钟时间使用
This group folder asset track.
这是组文件夹资源轨道。
This has important implications for memory use and so you should use this function with care.
这对于内存使用有重要的含义，因此您应该谨慎使用此函数。
This height is returned in pixels and will be dependent on the image_yscale.
这个高度以像素为单位返回，将取决于image_yscale。
This id can then be used in other functions as you would any other index value, like the sprite_index or the path_index, for example.
然后，可以在其他函数中使用这个id，就像使用任何其他索引值一样，例如sprite_index或path_index。
This identifies if this instance belongs a Guest or User account in the rollback networking system.
这标识该实例属于回滚网络系统中的来宾帐户还是用户帐户。
This identifies if this instance belongs to the local player in the rollback networking system.
这标识该实例是否属于回滚网络系统中的本地播放器。
This identifies which player the instance belongs to in the rollback networking system.
这标识了该实例属于回滚网络系统中的哪个玩家。
This illustration demonstrates how a local force works:
下图展示了局部力的工作方式:
This image illustrates this behaviour:
这张图片说明了这种行为:
This impulse will set the angular rotation by the amount given, ignoring the current torque, essentially setting the amount of "spin" that a fixture has.
该脉冲将通过给定的量来设置角度旋转，忽略当前扭矩，本质上设置夹具的"旋转"量。
This index of the grid to clear.
要清除的网格的索引。
This index of the grid to copy from.
要从中复制的网格的索引。
This index of the grid to copy to.
要复制到的网格的索引。
This index of the grid to destroy.
要销毁的网格的索引。
This index of the grid to find the height of.
这个网格的索引要找的高度。
This index of the grid to find the width of.
要查找宽度的网格的索引。
This index of the grid to resize.
要调整大小的网格的索引。
This index of the grid.
网格的索引。

This index should be stored in a variable for all further functions that relate to this emitter, and then when it is no longer needed it should be removed from memory using the function audio_emitter_free() to prevent memory leaks which may eventually crash your game.
该索引应该存储在一个变量中，用于与该发射器相关的所有其他函数，然后当不再需要它时，应该使用函数audio_emitter_free()将其从内存中删除，以防止最终可能导致游戏崩溃的内存泄漏。
This indicates that the permission has been granted
这表示已经授予了权限
This indicates that the permission has either been blocked by the phone settings, or that the user has previously denied the request and selected "Don't ask again".
这表明权限要么被电话设置阻止了，要么用户之前拒绝了请求并选择了"不再询问"。
This indicates that the permission has not been granted
这表示未授予权限
This information will be in the form of a string and will trigger an Async Event in any instance that has one defined in their object properties.
该信息将以字符串的形式出现，并将在任何在其对象属性中定义了Async Event的实例中触发Async Event。
This is a broadcast message track.
这是一个广播消息轨道。
This is a clip mask group asset track.
这是一个片段遮罩组资源轨道。
This is a clip mask sprite asset track that is being masked.
这是一个被遮罩的剪切蒙版精灵资源轨道。
This is a clip mask sprite asset track used for generating the clip mask.
这是用于生成剪切蒙版的剪切蒙版精灵资源轨道。
This is a colour data parameter track.
这是一个颜色数据参数轨道。
This is a commonly used encoding scheme that is often used for any media that needs to be stored or transferred over the internet as text, and renders the output unreadable to the human eye.
这是一种常用的编码方案，通常用于需要以文本形式存储或通过互联网传输的任何媒体，并使输出对人眼不可读。

This is a debug only function and in general it should not be used unless indicated by a member of the YoYo Games Support staff, as indiscriminate use will cause serious performance issues with your game.
这是一个调试功能，一般情况下，除非YoYo Games Support人员指示，否则不应该使用它，因为任意使用会导致你的游戏出现严重的性能问题。
This is a graphics (sprite) asset track.
这是一个图像(精灵)资源轨道。
This is a legacy function that can be used to save the current state of the game, and is not recommended for use anymore.
这是一个遗留功能，可以用来保存游戏的当前状态，不建议再使用。
This is a permanent removal, and changing rooms, or restarting the game will not bring the removed font back.
这是一个永久删除，改变房间，或重新启动游戏将不会恢复被删除的字体。
This is a positive value from 0 - 65,535.
这是0到65,535之间的一个正数值。
This is a positive value from 0 to 255.
这是一个从0到255的正值。
This is a positive value from 0 to 4,294,967,295.
这是一个从0到4294967295的正数值。

This is a purely visual option and when set to false you will not be able to see the particles as they are not drawn, but they still exists and are changing position, colour etc... as they would normally.
这是一个纯粹的视觉选项，当设置为 false 时，您将无法看到粒子，因为它们没有被绘制，但它们仍然存在并且正在改变位置、颜色等......像往常一样。
This is a real number value parameter track.
这是一个实数值参数轨道。
This is a scalar value from 0 to 1 that is used to scale the volume of all audio tracks in the sequence.
这是一个从0到1的标量值，用于缩放序列中所有音频轨道的音量。
This is a scalar value, so 1 is a scale of 1:1, while setting it to 2, for example, will be double the scale and setting it to 0.5 would be halving the scale.
这是一个标量值，因此1是1:1的比例，例如，将其设置为2将是比例的两倍，而将其设置为0.5将是比例的一半。
This is a sequence asset track.
这是一个序列资源轨道。
This is a special grow buffer created by GameMaker which is pre-formatted for use when building primitives (for use with shaders, for example).
这是由GameMaker创建的一个特殊的增长缓冲区，它是预先格式化的，以便在构建图元时使用(例如与着色器一起使用)。
This is a special grow buffer created by GameMaker which is pre-formatted for use when building primitives for use with shaders.
这是由GameMaker创建的一个特殊的增长缓冲区，它是预先格式化的，以便在构建与着色器一起使用的图元时使用。
This is a text track.
这是一个文本轨道。
This is a variant of the game_save() function, so please read its page first as it contains important information related to its use and to this function's as well.
这是game_save()函数的一个变种，所以请先阅读它的页面，因为它包含了与它的使用以及此函数的使用相关的重要信息。

This is a very important function for those moments when you need to create and change sprites from external sources (like loading a sprite from a file with sprite_add(), or duplicating a sprite using sprite_duplicate()) and should always be used to remove those assets that are no longer needed by a game, or to clear an indexed asset from a variable before re-assigning another asset to that variable.
这是一个非常重要的功能，当您需要从外部来源创建和更改精灵时(如使用sprite_add()从文件中加载精灵，或使用sprite_duplicate()复制精灵)，并且应该总是用于删除游戏不再需要的资源，或在将另一个资源重新分配给变量之前从变量中清除索引资源。

This is achieved in GameMaker by using the read only variable delta_time every step as it measures the time that has passed between one step and the next in microseconds (1microsecond is 1,000,000th of a second).
这在GameMaker中是通过使用每个步骤的只读变量delta_time来实现的，因为它以微秒为单位衡量一个步骤和下一个步骤之间所经过的时间(1微秒是1,000,000分之一秒)。
This is an RGB value (no alpha component), and will clear the gif to this colour before anything is added to it.
这是一个RGB值(没有alpha组件)，在添加任何东西之前将gif清除为这种颜色。
This is an alternative method to getting the alarm array value directly.
这是直接获取告警数组值的另一种方法。
This is an alternative method to setting the alarm array directly.
这是直接设置告警阵列的另一种方法。
This is an asynchronous function, and as such GameMaker does not block the device it is being run on while waiting for an answer, but rather keeps on running events as normal.
这是一个异步函数，因此GameMaker在等待响应时不会阻塞正在运行的设备，而是像正常一样运行事件。
This is an audio asset track.
这是一个音频资源轨道。
This is an event/moment track.
这是一个事件/时刻轨道。
This is an instance asset track.
这是一个实例资源轨道。
This is applied to all sub-images of the sprite.
这适用于精灵的所有子图像。
This is applied to one single given sub-image of the sprite.
这适用于精灵的单个给定子图像。
This is a built-in variable that is part of the instance variables created for every object instance in your game.
这是一个内置变量，是为游戏中每个对象实例创建的实例变量的一部分。
This is because GameMaker pools memory resources to prevent memory allocation overhead, and so the memory will remain allocated until required for something else or re-used for a new stream.
这是因为GameMaker将内存资源池化，以防止内存分配开销，因此内存将保持分配，直到需要其他内容或重新用于新流。
This is because GameMaker will draw the application surface without alpha blending when the automatic drawing is on.
这是因为当自动绘制打开时，GameMaker将绘制没有alpha混合的应用程序表面。

This is because the font itself is not actually included with your game (for legal reasons) but an image of the font is included on a texture page and that is what your game will use (just like any other graphics asset).
这是因为字体本身并不包含在你的游戏中(因为法律原因)，但字体的图像却包含在纹理页面中，这是你的游戏将使用的内容(就像其他图像资源一样)。

This is because when you create the list, internally the first few entries in the list are set to 0 to minimize performance issues when initially adding items to the list (although the ds_list_size() function will still return 0 on a newly created list).
这是因为当您创建列表时，在内部列表中的前几个条目被设置为0，以最小化最初向列表中添加项目时的性能问题(尽管ds_list_size()函数在新创建的列表中仍将返回0)。
This is calculated automatically based on the density, inertia and mass of the instance as defined by the appropriate functions
这是根据适当函数定义的实例的密度、惯性和质量自动计算的
This is calculated using the physics world coordinates ( not the GameMaker room coordinates) in radians.
这是使用物理世界坐标(而不是GameMaker房间坐标)以弧度计算的。
This is essentially the same as running the game for the first time and so the Game Start Event will be triggered, as well as the Game End Event.
这与第一次运行游戏基本相同，因此游戏开始事件和游戏结束事件都会被触发。
This is handy for preventing people from entering unwanted characters into a text entry (like entering "#" to force a new line).
这可以方便地防止人们在文本条目中输入不需要的字符(比如输入"#"强制换行)。
This is ideal for those games that have aspect ratio correction set in the global Game Settings.
这对于那些在全局游戏设置中设置了纵横比校正的游戏来说非常理想。
This is important as certain games (for example those that use the tilt functions) may not generate events that the OS can interpret as being user input and so shut down the screen or exit the game.
这一点很重要，因为某些游戏(例如使用倾斜功能的游戏)可能不会生成操作系统可以解释为用户输入的事件，因此会关闭屏幕或退出游戏。
This is needed due to the different ways streamed and unstreamed sound playback is handled on the HTML5 target platform, and will return true if the sound can be played and false if it can't.
这是必要的，因为在HTML5目标平台上处理流式和非流式声音播放的方式不同，如果声音可以播放，将返回true，如果不能播放，将返回false。
This is normally set in the Sprite Editor, but there may be moments when you are required to set this manually for a given sprite resource.
这通常是在精灵编辑器中设置的，但有时可能需要您为给定的精灵资源手动设置。
This is not a necessary check to prevent errors as, when a key does not exist, reading from a non-existent key will just return a default value.
这不是防止错误的必要检查，因为当一个键不存在时，从不存在的键中读取将只返回一个默认值。

This is not a necessary check to prevent errors as, when a section does not exist, reading from a non-existent section will just return a default value, however it can be useful to see if an ini file has saved specific data.
这不是防止错误的必要检查，因为当节不存在时，从不存在的节读取只会返回默认值，但是查看 ini 文件是否保存了特定数据可能很有用。
This is not a read only variable, however changing this will not change the index value for the current room, but rather change the room to match the index that you have set the variable to.
这不是一个只读变量，但是更改它不会更改当前房间的索引值，而是会更改房间以匹配您已设置变量的索引。
This is not a read-only variable and can be set as well as read.
这不是一个只读变量，可以设置和读取。
This is not the first key in the order you added them!
这不是您添加顺序中的第一个键！
This is not the last key in the order that you have added them!
这不是您添加顺序中的最后一个键！

This is not the same as the object name, which is a string and can be found using object_get_name(), as this function returns the index number, which is a unique value that GameMaker assigns to every object at the time of creation.
这与对象名称不同，对象名称是一个字符串，可以使用object_get_name()找到，因为此函数返回索引号，这是GameMaker在创建时分配给每个对象的唯一值。
This is only for use in the draw event of an instance (it will not show if used in any other event), and it can also be very useful for clearing surfaces when they are newly created.
这只用于实例的绘制事件中(如果在任何其他事件中使用，它将不会显示)，而且当新创建的表面被清除时，它也非常有用。

This is particularly useful when creating Timelines dynamically using the timeline_add() function, but you should note that if you search for an uninitialised variable (that would otherwise be assigned to a time line's index) an error will be thrown.
这在使用timeline_add()函数动态创建时间线时特别有用，但是您应该注意，如果您搜索一个未初始化的变量(否则该变量将被分配给时间线的索引),将会抛出一个错误。
This is primarily for use with extensions as you can pass this value through to them, allowing them to access the buffer data.
这主要用于扩展，因为您可以将该值传递给它们，允许它们访问缓冲区数据。
This is similar to the round() function, but it only rounds down, no matter what the decimal value, so floor(5.99999) will return 5, as will floor(5.2), floor(5.6457) etc...
这类似于round()函数，但它只向下舍入，不管十进制值是多少，所以floor(5.99999)将返回5,floor(5.2)、floor(5.6457)等也是如此……

This is slightly different to a force in that when it is applied it will immediately affect the speed, and, potentially the torque (or "spin") of the object, particularly if the point chosen to apply the impulse has a vector that is not aligned with the centre of mass (note: the center of mass is not necessarily the same as the origin!).
这与力略有不同，因为当施加力时，它会立即影响物体的速度，并可能影响物体的扭矩(或"旋转")，特别是如果选择施加冲量的点具有与质心不对齐的矢量(注意:质心不一定与原点相同！

This is slightly different to a force in that when it is applied it will immediately affect the speed, and, potentially the torque (or "spin") of the object, particularly if the point chosen to apply the impulse is not aligned with the center of mass (note: the center of mass is not necessarily the same as the origin!).
这与力略有不同，因为当施加力时，它会立即影响物体的速度，并可能影响物体的扭矩(或"旋转")，特别是如果选择施加冲力的点与质心不对齐(注意:质心不一定与原点相同！
This is the "cut-off" threshold at which pixels with alpha will not be drawn.
这是一个"截止"阈值，带有alpha的像素将绘制时将不会越过。
This is the "pure" color tone which is part of the hue, saturation and value (luminosity) method for defining a color.
这是“纯”色调，它是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值(亮度)方法的一部分。
This is the "pure" colour tone which is part of the hue, saturation and value (luminosity) method for defining a colour.
这是"纯"色调，它是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值(光度)方法的一部分。
This is the amount of the "light" that is mixed into the final color and is part of the hue, saturation and value method for defining a color.
这是混合到最终颜色中的“光”量，是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值方法的一部分。
This is the amount of the "light" that is mixed into the final colour and is part of the hue, saturation and value method for defining a colour.
这是混合到最终颜色中的"光"量，是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值方法的一部分。
This is the amount of the color tone that is mixed into the final color and is part of the hue, saturation and value (luminosity) method for defining a color.
这是混合到最终颜色的颜色色调的数量，是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值(亮度)方法的一部分。
This is the amount of the colour tone that is mixed into the final colour and is part of the hue, saturation and value (luminosity) method for defining a colour.
这是混合到最终颜色的颜色色调的数量，是定义颜色的色调、饱和度和值(光度)方法的一部分。
This is the default C, C++ call
这是默认的 C, C++ 调用
This is the distance from the listener the emitter has to be before the sound will have "fallen off" to a volume of 0.
这是声音"衰减"到音量为0之前，发射器与侦听器之间的距离。
This is the function power(e,n), where e is approximately 2.718281828 (also known as Euler's Number), and n is the number of times it should be multiplied by itself.
这是函数的幂(e,n)，其中e约为2.718281828(也称为欧拉数)，n是它自身相乘的次数。
This is the function that governs how long each individual particle of the indicated type remains on the screen.
这是控制指定类型的每个粒子在屏幕上停留多长时间的函数。
This is the key that is to be mapped
这是要映射的键
This is the key that key1 is to be mapped to
这是key1要映射到的键
This is the key that you wish to get the mapped value from
这是您希望从中获取映射值的键
This is the multiplier value used to slow down or speed up the playback speed.
这是用于减慢或加快播放速度的乘数值。
This is the name of the sequence as a string and you can get or set this value as required.
这是字符串形式的序列名称，您可以根据需要获取或设置该值。
This is the number of frames that the sequence will run for.
这是序列将运行的帧数。

This is the only effective way to manage video memory when you have multiple texture pages for a game, and you should flush the texture memory between levels on your game and organise the graphics using the texture group feature to ensure that the minimum number of textures are used.
当你的游戏拥有多个纹理页面时，这是管理视频内存的唯一有效方法，你应该在游戏关卡间刷新纹理内存，并使用纹理组功能组织图像，以确保使用的纹理数量最少。
This is the origin of the sequence along the X axis.
这是X轴上序列的原点。
This is the origin of the sequence along the Y axis.
这是Y轴上序列的原点。
This is the oscillation frequency for the joint, in hertz
这是关节的振荡频率，单位为赫兹
This is the playback mode of the sequence object and can be get or set.
这是序列对象的回放模式，可以获取或设置。
This is the point at which the sprite will be "attached" or "drawn" when used with an instance.
这是精灵与实例一起使用时将被"附加"或"绘制"的点。
This is the position of the instance within the physics world in the previous step to the current one
这是物理世界中实例在当前步骤之前的位置
This is the position of the instance within the physics world in the previous step to the current one.
这是上一步到当前步的物理世界中实例的位置。
This is the reaction force being applied to the second instance in a joint at the x anchor position
这是在关节x锚点处施加到第二个实例上的反作用力
This is the reaction force being applied to the second instance in a joint at the y anchor position
这是在y锚位置的关节上施加到第二个实例上的反作用力
This is the speed at which the motor should move
这是马达应该移动的速度
This is the speed at which the motor should rotate
这是马达应该旋转的速度
This is the standard WinAPI call (Windows dll only)
这是标准的WinAPI调用(仅限Windows dll)
This is the target area to open the URL in (see description).
这是打开URL的目标区域(参见描述)。
This is the target area to open the URL in.
这是打开URL的目标。
This is the torque being applied to the second instance in a joint at the anchor position
这是在锚固位置的关节中应用到第二个实例的扭矩
This is the user id in Opera GX in the rollback networking system.
这是回滚网络系统中Opera GX的用户id。
This is very useful as it gives you the ability to delete joints or change an instances behaviour depending on whatever your needs are at the time.
这非常有用，因为它使您能够根据您当时的需求删除关节或更改实例的行为。

This last part means that it either starts and follows the path exactly as you designed and placed it in the Path Editor (absolute), or it starts and follows the path from the position at which the instance was created (relative).
这最后一部分意味着它要么完全按照您在路径编辑器中设计和放置的路径开始并跟随路径(absolute绝对)，要么从创建实例的位置开始并跟随路径(relative相对)。
This mask will over-ride the default mask or that which you may have set using the function audio_set_listener_mask().
该掩码将覆盖默认掩码或您使用函数audio_set_listener_mask()设置的掩码。
This may include the instance running the code if the "notme" flag is set to false, but normally you would want that instance to be active, in which case the "notme" flag should be set to true.
如果"notme"标志设置为false，这可能包括运行代码的实例，但通常情况下，您希望该实例是活动的，在这种情况下，"notme"标志应该设置为true。
This may not always be what you want and so to turn the radians into degrees we use this function.
这可能不总是你想要的，所以我们用此函数把弧度转换成度数。
This means that a left position of 0 and a top position of 0 would be the top left corner of the sprite and all further coordinates should be taken from that position.
这意味着左边的位置为0，顶部的位置为0将是精灵的左上角，所有进一步的坐标都应该从该位置获得。
This means that a left position of 0 and a top position of 0 would be the top left corner of the surface and all further coordinates should be taken from that position.
这意味着0的左侧位置和0的顶部位置将是表面的左上角，并且所有进一步的坐标将从该位置获取。
This means that all instances of this object that are created after solid has been changed will be created with this new state, while instances that are already in the room may not be affected.
这意味着在solid被更改后创建的该对象的所有实例都将以这种新状态创建，而已经在房间中的实例可能不会受到影响。
This means that all instances of this object that are created after the mask has been changed will be created with this new mask, while instances that are already in the room may not be affected.
这意味着在掩码被更改之后创建的该对象的所有实例都将使用这个新掩码创建，而已经在房间中的实例可能不会受到影响。

This means that all instances of this object that are created after the sprite_index has been changed will be created with this new sprite_index, while instances that are already in the room may not be affected.
这意味着在sprite_index被更改之后创建的该对象的所有实例都将使用这个新的sprite_index创建，而已经在房间中的实例可能不会受到影响。
This means that all instances of this object that are created after visible has been changed will be created with this new state, while instances that are already in the room may not be affected.
这意味着在更改了visible之后创建的该对象的所有实例都将以这种新状态创建，而已经在房间中的实例可能不会受到影响。

This means that anisotropic filtering is enabled, which greatly improves texture transition quality and can reduce the blurring visible with other filtering modes, but it has the highest hit on performance.
这意味着启用了各向异性过滤，这大大提高了纹理过渡质量，并可以减少其他过滤模式下可见的模糊，但它对性能的影响最大。
This means that blending between mipmap levels is disabled, which can cause visible texture transitions, but gives the best performance.
这意味着禁用mipmap级别之间的混合，这可能会导致可见的纹理过渡，但会提供最佳性能。
This means that blending between mipmap levels is enabled (this is also known as trilinear filtering), which smooths the texture transitions, but it will give a minor hit to performance.
这意味着启用了mipmap贴图级别之间的混合(也称为三线性过滤)，这可以平滑纹理过渡，但会对性能造成轻微影响。

This means that checks for it being held down will not return true until the player releases the button and presses it again (but the release state will still be detected if the clear is done while the mouse button is being held down).
这意味着对它被按住的检查将不会返回true，直到玩家释放按钮并再次按下它(但是如果清除是在鼠标按钮被按住时完成的，释放状态仍然会被检测到)。

This means that everything that is shown in the chosen view port will now be drawn to the assigned surface and the contents of that view port will no longer be displayed, meaning that you will need to either:
这意味着在选择的视图端口中显示的所有内容现在将被绘制到指定的表面，该视图端口的内容将不再显示，这意味着你将需要:
This means that everything that is shown in the chosen view will now be drawn to the assigned surface.
这意味着在所选视图中显示的所有内容都将被绘制到指定的表面上。

This means that if you have used any of the Instance Deactivate functions those instances that have been deactivated will not be included in this array (if you have used a value from this array previously, it will now return the keyword noone).
这意味着，如果您使用了任何实例取消激活函数，那么已经取消激活的实例将不会包含在该数组中(如果您以前使用了该数组中的值，那么它现在将返回关键字noone)。
This means that it will also trigger an Asynchronous Load/Save Event to inform you that the whole group has been loaded into memory and the sounds can now be used.
这意味着它还将触发一个异步加载/保存事件，以通知您整个组已经加载到内存中，现在可以使用声音了。
This means that its properties are transferred to the selected instance, not the actual fixture itself, so that one fixture can be bound to multiple instances if all are to have the same properties.
这意味着它的属性被传递到选定的实例，而不是实际的夹具本身，这样，如果所有实例都具有相同的属性，一个夹具可以绑定到多个实例。
This means that once you have assigned an area to a virtual key, all touches on that area will trigger the keyboard event corresponding to the key you have mapped to the area.
这意味着，一旦您将一个区域分配给一个虚拟键，该区域上的所有触摸都将触发与您映射到该区域的键相对应的键盘事件。
This means that the results will depend on the event in which the function is called, and also on the target surface being used.
这意味着结果将取决于调用此函数的事件，也取决于正在使用的目标表面。
This means that we will only proceed past the current frame if all inputs are confirmed.
这意味着，只有在所有输入都得到确认的情况下，我们才会继续越过当前帧。
This means that you also need to free this memory when the DS map is not needed to prevent errors, memory leaks and loss of performance when running your game.
这意味着当DS map不需要时，你也需要释放这个内存，以防止错误，内存泄漏和运行游戏时的性能损失。

This means that you can get a "vibrating" instance as it moves (for example) 3 pixels forward, overshoots the x/y target position by 2, then moves 3 pixels back again, overshooting the target point by one and so on...
这意味着，当它向前移动(例如)3个像素，超出x/y目标位置2个像素，然后再次向后移动3个像素，超出目标点1个像素等等时，您可以获得一个"振动"实例...
This means that you can tell instances with that fixture to always collide or never collide with other instance that have fixtures bound to them with the same collision group.
这意味着您可以告诉带有该夹具的实例总是与其他具有相同碰撞组的夹具绑定到它们的实例碰撞或永不碰撞。

This means that you could have a room speed of 30, but set the physics to 60, effectively doubling the speed at which the physics system updates and performs its calculations compared to the speed at which the step are updated.
这意味着您可以将房间速度设置为30，但将物理设置为60，与步骤更新的速度相比，物理系统更新和执行计算的速度实际上是两倍。
This means that you do not have to manually go through the list contents and destroy the marked data structures individually before destroying the "parent" list.
这意味着在销毁"父"列表之前，您不必手动检查列表内容并单独销毁标记的数据结构。
This means that you must create two completely new sprites "on the fly" in some way for the function to work correctly.
这意味着你必须以某种方式"动态地"创建两个全新的精灵，才能让函数正确工作。

This means that you will want to keep the number of characters that you use to a minimum and specify only the range of characters that your game will need so as to keep texture memory as optimised as possible.
这意味着你将希望保持你所使用的字符数量最少，并且只指定你的游戏所需要的字符范围，以便尽可能的优化纹理内存。
This means that, for example, median(43, 12, 25, 19, 6) would return 19 as it is the middle value between all the rest.
这意味着，例如，median(43, 12, 25, 19, 6)将返回19，因为它是所有其他值的中间值。

This model will be used for all the audio functions in the game or app, and so you should make sure that the model you choose is the correct one, as each one will affect how the listener perceives the sounds you play through emitters or with the function audio_play_sound_at.
这个模型将用于游戏或应用中的所有音频功能，所以你应该确保你选择的模型是正确的，因为每个模型都会影响听者如何通过发射器或函数audio_play_sound_at来感知你播放的声音。
This name is the one that has been specified for the object in the Asset Browser of the main GameMaker window.
这个名称是在主GameMaker窗口的资源浏览器中为对象指定的名称。
This name is the one that has been specified for the script in the Asset Browser of the main GameMaker window.
这个名称是在主GameMaker窗口的资源浏览器中为脚本指定的名称。
This name is the one that has been specified for the sprite in the resource tree of the main GameMaker window.
该名称是在GameMaker主窗口的资源树中为精灵指定的名称。
This name is the one that has been specified for the tile set in the Asset Browser of the main GameMaker window.
该名称是在GameMaker主窗口的资源浏览器中为图块集指定的名称。
This needn't be a defining point of the path, it can be anywhere on it.
这不必是路径的一个定义点，它可以在路径上的任何地方。
This number is used to prevent an infinite loop.
这个数字用于防止无限循环。
This only works on fonts added using font_add().
这仅适用于使用font_add()添加的字体。
This opens an ini_file for reading and/writing.
这将打开一个ini文件进行读写。
This particular function takes three component parts, the hue, the saturation and the value (also know as "luminosity") to create the colour desired.
这个特殊的函数有三个组成部分，色调、饱和度和值(也称为"亮度")来创建所需的颜色。
This particular function takes three component parts, the red, the green and the blue components of the colour that you wish to make.
这个特殊的函数有三个组成部分，即你想要的颜色的红、绿、蓝分量。

This point is added onto the end of the path, irrespective of the position of the point, and the factor is equal to the percentage of path_speed that the following instance actually goes at when it reaches this point in the path.
该点被添加到路径的末端，与该点的位置无关，并且该乘数等于以下实例在到达路径中的该点时实际达到的path_speed的百分比。
This position should be between 0 and 1, and the function will return the curve value at that position, or it will return 0 if the channel struct supplied is invalid.
此位置应该在0到1之间，函数将返回该位置的曲线值，或者如果提供的通道结构无效，它将返回0。
This read only array holds all the ids of every active instance within the room.
这个只读数组保存房间中每个活动实例的所有id。

This read only variable can be used to get the number of sub-images in a sprite that has been assigned to an instance (if you need the number of sub-images for a sprite other than the one assigned to the instance you should use sprite_get_number()).
这个只读变量可用于获取已分配给实例的精灵中的子图像数量(如果您需要为一个非分配给实例的精灵获取子图像数量，则应该使用sprite_get_number()))。
This read only variable is only valid in the Draw Event and returns the current view port being rendered.
这个只读变量只在Draw Event中有效，并返回正在呈现的当前视图端口。
This read only variable returns the current month as a numeric value where 1 is January and 12 is December.
这个只读变量以数值形式返回当前月份，其中1是一月，12是十二月。
This read only variable returns the display name of your game for the target platform in a "save-friendly" format for the target platform.
这个只读变量在目标平台以"保存友好"的格式返回游戏的显示名称。
This read only variable returns the display name of your game for the target platform, as set in the Game Options.
这个只读变量返回目标平台上游戏的显示名称，就像在game Options中设置的那样。
This read only variable returns the height of the sprite that has been assigned to the instance.
这个只读变量返回已分配给实例的精灵的高度。
This read only variable returns the index of the object that the instance has been created from.
这个只读变量返回创建实例的对象的索引。

This read only variable returns the index of the very first room in the game (this is defined by the order in which the rooms appear in the Room Manager and not by the order in which they were created).
这个只读变量返回游戏中第一个房间的索引(这是由房间在房间管理器中出现的顺序定义的，而不是由它们被创建的顺序定义的)。

This read only variable returns the index of the very last room in the game (this is defined by the order in which the rooms appear in the Room Manager and not by the order in which they were created).
这个只读变量返回游戏中最后一个房间的索引(这是由房间在房间管理器中出现的顺序定义的，而不是由它们被创建的顺序定义的)。
This read only variable returns the local xoffset (the x component of the origin as defined in the sprite editor) of the sprite that has been assigned to the instance.
这个只读变量返回分配给实例的精灵的本地xoffset(精灵编辑器中定义的原点x组件)。
This read only variable returns the local yoffset (the y component of the origin as defined in the sprite editor) of the sprite that has been assigned to the instance.
这个只读变量返回分配给实例的精灵的本地yoffset(精灵编辑器中定义的原点的y组件)。
This read only variable returns the mouse button that is currently being pressed (currently, as in, this step) and can return any of the special mouse constants except mb_any.
这个只读变量返回当前被按下的鼠标按钮(当前，在这个步骤中),并且可以返回除mb_any之外的任何特殊鼠标常量。

This read only variable returns the position (along the x-axis) within the room of the left hand bounding box for the instance, where the bounding box is defined by the maximum width and height of the mask for the instance (as set by the sprite_index or by the mask_index).
这个只读变量返回实例的左侧边界框的位置(沿x轴)，其中边界框由实例的掩码的最大宽度和高度定义(由sprite_index或mask_index设置)。

This read only variable returns the position within the room (along the x-axis) of the right hand side of the bounding box for the instance, where the bounding box is defined by the maximum width and height of the mask for the instance (as set by the sprite_index or by the mask_index).
这个只读变量返回实例的边界框右侧在房间内(沿x轴)的位置，其中边界框由实例的掩码的最大宽度和高度定义(由sprite_index或mask_index设置)。

This read only variable returns the position within the room (along the y-axis) of the top of the bounding box for the instance, where the bounding box is defined by the maximum width and height of the mask for the instance (as set by the sprite_index or by the mask_index).
这个只读变量返回实例的边界框顶部在房间内(沿y轴)的位置，其中边界框由实例的掩码的最大宽度和高度定义(由sprite_index或mask_index设置)。
This read only variable returns the unique identifier for the game you have created.
这个只读变量返回你所创建的游戏的唯一标识符。
This read only variable returns the width of the sprite that has been assigned to the instance.
这个只读变量返回已分配给实例的精灵的宽度。

This read only variable returns the y position (within the room) of the bottom of the bounding box for the instance, where the bounding box is defined by the maximum width and height of the mask for the instance (as set by the sprite_index or by the mask_index).
这个只读变量返回实例的边界框底部的y位置(在房间内)，其中边界框由实例的掩码的最大宽度和高度定义(由sprite_index或mask_index设置)。
This read only variable returns true when the game is being played in debug mode and false when being played as normal.
当游戏在调试模式下运行时，这个只读变量返回true，当正常运行时返回false。
This read only variable will return the current year.
这个只读变量将返回当前年份。
This read only variable will return the day as a value from 1 to 31, depending on the month.
这个只读变量将返回1到31之间的值，具体取决于月份。
This read only variable will return the hour that corresponds to the current moment based on the default time zone for the system (ie: local time).
这个只读变量将根据系统的默认时区(即:本地时间)返回与当前时刻对应的小时。
This read only variable will return the minutes that correspond to the current moment.
这个只读变量将返回与当前时刻对应的分钟数。
This read only variable will return the number of milliseconds that have passed since the game was started.
这个只读变量将返回自游戏启动以来所经过的毫秒数。
This read only variable will return the seconds that correspond to the current moment.
这个只读变量将返回与当前时刻对应的秒数。
This read only variable will return the weekday as a value, where Sunday is 0 and Saturday is 6.
这个只读变量将返回工作日作为值，其中Sunday为0,Saturday为6。
This read-only array returns the x position of all points detected in a collision between two physics enabled instances.
这个只读数组返回在两个启用物理的实例之间的碰撞中检测到的所有点的x位置。
This read-only array returns the y position of all points detected in a collision between two physics enabled instances.
这个只读数组返回在两个启用物理的实例之间的碰撞中检测到的所有点的y位置。
This read-only variable holds one of various constant GameMaker has to tell you which operating system the game has been created for.
这个只读变量包含各种常量之一，GameMaker必须告诉你游戏是针对哪个操作系统创建的。
This read-only variable holds one of various constant values listed below to tell you which device you are currently running the game on.
这个只读变量包含下面列出的各种常量值之一，告诉你当前在哪个设备上运行游戏。
This read-only variable holds one of various constants (listed below) that GameMaker has to tell you which browser you are currently running the game in (if any).
这个只读变量包含GameMaker告诉你当前游戏运行在哪个浏览器(如果有的话)的各种常量之一(如下所示)。
This read-only variable holds the unique identifying number for the instance.
这个只读变量保存实例的唯一标识号。
This read-only variable indicates whether the object is managed by the rollback multiplayer system or not.
此只读变量指示该对象是否由回滚多人游戏系统管理。
This read-only variable returns object index of the instance which is running the event being checked.
这个只读变量返回运行被检查事件的实例的对象索引。
This read-only variable returns the current speed of the physics enabled instance, defined in pixels per step.
此只读变量返回启用物理的实例的当前速度，以每步像素为单位定义。
This read-only variable returns the current x axis position of the mouse within the room.
这个只读变量返回鼠标在房间内的当前x轴位置。
This read-only variable returns the current y axis position of the mouse within the room.
这个只读变量返回鼠标在房间内的当前y轴位置。
This read-only variable returns the mass of the instance in kilograms.
此只读变量以千克为单位返回实例的质量。
This read-only variable returns the number of points of collision detected between the two objects in the collision
这个只读变量返回碰撞中两个对象之间检测到的碰撞点的数量

This read-only variable returns the number of the event currently being called, where the number is actually referring to the "sub event" of the event, ie: for the step event the event number could be any one of the constants ev_step_normal, ev_step_begin, or ev_step_end.
这个只读变量返回当前正在调用的事件的编号，其中该编号实际上是指事件的"子事件",即:对于step事件，事件编号可以是常量ev_step_normal、ev_step_begin或ev_step_end中的任何一个。
This read-only variable returns the type of event currently being executed, which can be one of the following constants:
此只读变量返回当前正在执行的事件类型，可以是下列常量之一:
This read-only variable returns the x component of the collision normal corresponding to the phy_collision_x array value.
这个只读变量返回与phy_collision_x数组值对应的碰撞法线的x分量。
This read-only variable returns the y component of the collision normal corresponding to the phy_collision_y array value.
这个只读变量返回与phy_collision_y数组值对应的碰撞法线的y分量。
This read-only variable returns whether or not the instance is currently "sleeping" (true) or not (false), A "sleeping" instance is one that is not actively engaged in any physical simulation.
该只读变量返回实例当前是否"休眠"(true)或"非休眠"(false)，"休眠"实例是不主动参与任何物理模拟的实例。
This read-only variable will return the full path ID of the directory that is used by your game to save files to.
这个只读变量将返回你的游戏用来保存文件的目录的完整路径ID。
This read-only variable will return the x position of the instance's center of mass.
这个只读变量将返回实例重心的x位置。
This read-only variable will return the y position of the instance's center of mass.
这个只读变量将返回实例重心的y位置。
This read-only variable will return true if the instance is classed as being a kinematic object, or false if it is not.
如果实例被归类为运动学对象，则该只读变量将返回true，否则返回false。
This read-only variable will return whether WebGL is enabled (true) or not (false) for your game.
这个只读变量将返回你的游戏是否启用了WebGL。
This region can either be flagged as "inside" or "outside" as demonstrated in the following image:
这个区域可以被标记为"内部"或"外部"，如下图所示:
This runtime function can be used to "take over" the default GameMaker error message when a runtime exception occurs.
当运行时异常发生时，这个运行时函数可以用来"接管"默认的GameMaker错误消息。

This setting will affect how much an object "bounces" when it collides with other objects and is co-dependent on other forces that act on the instance like gravity and friction, and is usually a value between 0 and 1 (higher values can be used but may give unpredictable results).
该设置将影响对象与其他对象碰撞时"反弹"的程度，并与作用在实例上的其他力(如重力和摩擦力)相关，通常为0到1之间的值(可以使用更高的值，但可能会产生不可预测的结果)。

This should always be called when the system is no longer needed, like at the end of a room, or in the destroy event of an instance, otherwise you could end up with particles appearing in later rooms and no way to remove them as well as a memory leak which will eventually crash your game.
当系统不再被需要时，比如在一个房间的尽头，或者在一个实例的销毁事件中，应该总是调用此函数，否则你可能会在后面的房间中出现粒子，没有办法移除它们，以及最终会使你的游戏崩溃的内存泄漏。

This should always be done whenever the emitter is not going to be used further in the room or the game, ie: in the Destroy Event of the instance or in the Room End Event, otherwise you may end up with a memory leak that will slow down and eventually crash your game.
这应该总是在发射器不打算在房间或游戏中进一步使用时进行，例如:在实例的Destroy事件或在房间结束事件中，否则你可能会以内存泄漏结束，从而减慢速度并最终崩溃你的游戏。
This should be done whenever the file in question is no longer needed in the game, normally (for example) in a Game End event.
当有问题的文件在游戏中不再需要时，这应该被执行，通常(例如)在游戏结束事件中。
This should normally go in the step event of an instance, but can be used selectively in a collision event too, as illustrated by the code example below.
这通常应该放在实例的步骤事件中，但也可以选择性地在碰撞事件中使用，如下面的代码示例所示。
This should normally go in the step event of an instance, but can be used selectively in a collision event too.
这通常应该放在实例的步骤事件中，但也可以选择性地在碰撞事件中使用。
This simple function will draw the current list of internally stored high scores using the currently set font, colour and alpha values within the specified rectangle.
这个简单的函数将在指定的矩形内使用当前设置的字体、颜色和alpha值绘制内部存储的当前高分列表。
This specifies how the playbackSpeed should be interpreted and you can get or set this value.
这指定了应该如何解释playbackSpeed，并且您可以获取或设置该值。
This specifies the playback speed of the sequence, which is interpreted as either frames-per-second or frames-per-game-frame depending on the playbackSpeedType (see below).
这指定了序列的回放速度，根据playbackSpeedType(见下文)，该速度被解释为每秒帧数或每游戏帧帧数。
This string can then be later read back into a new ds_map using ds_map_read().
之后可以使用ds_map_read()将该字符串读回新的ds_map。
This string is hardware dependant and the returned value will depend on the gamepad plugged into the device "slot" that is being checked.
该字符串依赖于硬件，返回值将依赖于插入正在检查的设备"插槽"的手柄。
This string will be either:
这个字符串可以是:
This string will only contain printable characters typed, but it will correctly respond to pressing the backspace key by erasing the last character.
该字符串将只包含键入的可打印字符，但它将通过擦除最后一个字符来正确响应按退格键。
This surface is permanently available and is where the bulk of drawing is done by GameMaker.
这个表面是永久可用的，也是GameMaker完成大部分绘图的地方。
This time will also affect how the Tap Event is triggered as a touch/click and release before this time is up will be considered a Tap.
该时间还将影响点击事件的触发方式，因为在该时间结束之前的触摸/点击和释放将被视为点击。
This time zone can either be local (as set by the system) or UTC, and the function will return one of the following constants:
该时区可以是本地时区(由系统设置)或UTC时区，此函数将返回以下常量之一:
This time zone can either be local (as set by the system) or UTC, and you would use one of the following constants to define which is being used (by default this is local time):
该时区可以是本地(由系统设置)或UTC，您可以使用以下常量之一来定义使用的是哪一个(默认情况下是本地时间):
This type of buffer is to be used as a vertex buffer only.
这种类型的缓冲区仅用作顶点缓冲区。

This type of rounding is called bankers rounding and over large numbers of iterations or when using floating point maths, it gives a statistically better rounding than the more traditional "round up if over .5 and round down otherwise" approach.
这种类型的舍入被称为银行家舍入，在大量迭代或使用浮点数学时，它比更传统的"如果超过. 5则向上舍入，否则向下舍入"方法在统计上给出更好的舍入。

This value can be either 0, positive or minus, where 0 is the left hand side of the room and moving right increases x, moving left decreases x (a negative value for x means that the instance has gone outside the left side of the room).
该值可以是0、正数或负数，其中0是房间的左侧，向右移动增加x，向左移动减少x(x的负值意味着实例已经超出了房间的左侧)。

This value can be either 0, positive or minus, where 0 is the top of the room and moving down increases y, moving up decreases y (a negative value for y means that the instance has gone outside the top of the room).
该值可以是0、正数或负数，其中0是房间的顶部，向下移动增加y，向上移动减少y(y的负值表示实例已经超出房间的顶部)。

This value can be set from 0 to 1 with 0 being fully transparent and 1 being fully opaque (the default value), and will affect all further drawing, including backgrounds, sprites, fonts, primitives and 3D.
该值可以在0到1之间设置，0表示完全透明，1表示完全不透明(默认值)，并将影响所有进一步的绘制，包括背景、精灵、字体、图元和3D。
This value can be used to get or to set the scale of the currently assigned path for the instance (as set by the function path_start()) with a default value of 1.
该值可用于获取或设置实例当前分配路径的比例(由函数path_start()设置)，默认值为1。
This value can change at any time as people plug/unplug microphones or other input sources to the device.
当插入/拔出麦克风或设备的其他输入源时，该值可以随时改变。
This value can then be used in other draw functions, particularly in general 3D and some of the 2D primitive functions.
这个值可以在其他绘图函数中使用，特别是在一般的3D和一些2D图元函数中。
This value can then be used in other draw functions, particularly in general drawing when using primitives as well as the Shader functions.
这个值可以在其他绘图函数中使用，特别是在使用图元和Shader函数时的一般绘图中。
