This value can then be used in other draw functions, particularly in the 2D primitive functions, as well as the Shader functions.
然后，该值可用于其他绘制函数，尤其是2D原始函数以及着色器函数。

This value can then be used in other functions like layer_get_depth() or it can be changed to move the instance to another layer, but note that if the layer being assigned does not exist in the current room, then you will get an error that will force your game to close.
然后，这个值可以用于其他函数，如layer_get_depth()，或者可以更改它以将实例移动到另一个层，但注意，如果正在分配的层在当前房间中不存在，那么您将会得到一个错误，该错误将强制您的游戏关闭。

This value is a multiplier, where 1 is the default playback speed and values less than 1 will slow the playback and values larger than 1 will speed it up, eg: a value of 0.5 would be half playback speed, while a value of 2 would be double playback speed.
这个值是一个乘数，其中1是默认播放速度，值小于1将减慢播放速度，值大于1将加快播放速度，例如:值0.5将是播放速度的一半，而值2将是播放速度的两倍。
This value is always positive, and incomplete days will be returned as a fraction.
这个值总是正的，不完整的天数将作为一个分数返回。
This value is always positive, and incomplete hours will be returned as a fraction.
该值始终为正值，未完成的小时数将以分数形式返回。
This value is always positive, and incomplete minutes will be returned as a fraction.
该值总是正的，不完整的分钟将作为分数返回。
This value is always positive, and incomplete months will be returned as a fraction.
这个值总是正的，不完整的月份将作为分数返回。
This value is always positive, and incomplete weeks will be returned as a fraction.
该值始终为正值，未完成的周数将以分数形式返回。
This value is always positive, and incomplete years will be returned as a fraction.
该值始终为正值，不完整的年份将以分数形式返回。
This value is calculated automatically based on the surface area of the assigned fixtures and their density values, but it can be changed using the function physics_mass_properties().
该值是根据指定装置的表面积及其密度值自动计算的，但可以使用函数physics_mass_properties()进行更改。
This value is given as a relative value based on the upper left corner of the base sprite asset being (0,0).
该值是基于基础sprite资源左上角(0，0)的相对值。
This value is the number of cells the grid has along the x-axis and is always an integer, as shown in the image below:
该值是网格在x轴上的单元数，并且始终是一个整数，如下图所示:
This value is the number of cells the grid has along the y-axis and is always an integer, as shown in the image below:
这个值是网格沿y轴的单元格数，总是一个整数，如下图所示:
This value must be between 1 and 8, with a low value creating straighter edges with sharper curves between points, while a higher value will round the points and make the path a lot more "curvy".
该值必须介于1和8之间，低值会创建更直的边缘，点与点之间的曲线更尖锐，而高值会使点变圆，使路径更加"弯曲"。
This value needn't be a defining point of the path, it can be anywhere on it.
这个值不必是路径的定义点，它可以是路径上的任何位置。
This value sets the angle (rotation) of the sprite and is measured in degrees, with the right being 0º, up being 90º, left being 180º and down being 270º.
这个值设置了精灵的角度(旋转)，以角度来衡量，右为0º，上为90º，左为180º，下为270º。
This value sets the horizontal scaling applied to the sprite that has been assigned to the current instance.
该值设置应用于已分配给当前实例的精灵的水平缩放。
This value sets the vertical scaling (along the y-axis) applied to the sprite that has been assigned to the current instance.
该值设置应用于已分配给当前实例的精灵的垂直缩放(沿y轴)。
This value should be stored in a variable and used in all further function calls relating to the list.
这个值应该存储在一个变量中，并在所有与列表相关的函数调用中使用。
This value should be stored in a variable and used in all further function calls relating to the priority queue.
这个值应该存储在一个变量中，并在与优先队列相关的所有进一步函数调用中使用。
This value should be stored in a variable and used in all further function calls relating to the queue.
这个值应该存储在一个变量中，并在所有与队列相关的函数调用中使用。
This value should be stored in a variable and used in all further function calls relating to the stack.
这个值应该存储在一个变量中，并在与堆栈相关的所有后续函数调用中使用。
This value will affect all further drawing where appropriate, including fonts, forms, primitives and 3D.
该值将影响所有适当的后续绘图，包括字体、表单、图元和3D。
This value will be between 0 and 360, where 0 represents right, 90 up, 180 left and 270 down.
这个值将在0到360之间，其中0表示右，90表示上，180表示左，270表示下。
This variable can be read to find out if the instance is flagged as persistent or not, or it can used to set persistence to true (persistent) or false (not persistent) for the instance.
可以读取该变量，以确定实例是否被标记为持久，或者可以使用该变量将实例的持久性设置为true(持久)或false(非持久)。
This variable can be used to find out if a particular view port is currently visible or not.
该变量可用于确定特定的视口当前是否可见。
This variable can be used to find the sprite_index of that mask (or it will return -1 if no sprite has been assigned) or to set the mask for an instance to the chosen sprite.
这个变量可以用来找到该掩码的sprite_index(或者如果没有分配精灵，它将返回-1)，或者为一个实例设置所选精灵的掩码。
This variable can be used to get (or to set) the angle of the instances fixture in degrees, similar to setting or getting the image_angle.
该变量可用于获取(或设置)实例夹具的角度，单位为度，类似于设置或获取image_angle。
This variable can be used to get (or to set) the previous x position of the instance within the game room physics world.
该变量可用于获取(或设置)游戏房间物理世界中实例的前一个x位置。
This variable can be used to get (or to set) the previous y position of the instance within the game room physics world.
该变量可用于获取(或设置)游戏房间物理世界中实例的前一个y位置。
This variable can be used to get (or to set) the x position of the instance within the game room physics world.
该变量可用于获取(或设置)游戏房间物理世界中实例的x位置。
This variable can be used to get (or to set) the y position of the instance within the game room physics world.
该变量可用于获取(或设置)游戏房间物理世界中实例的y位置。
This variable can be used to get and to set the persistent flag for the current room.
该变量可用于获取和设置当前房间的永久标志。
This variable can be used to get or change the x component of the instance's linear speed vector and is defined in pixels per step (for pixels per second, see phy_linear_velocity_x).
该变量可用于获取或更改实例的线速度向量的x分量，并以每步像素数定义(有关每秒像素数，请参见phy_linear_velocity_x)。
This variable can be used to get or change the x component of the instance's linear velocity vector and is defined in pixels per second (for pixels per step, see phy_speed_x).
该变量可用于获取或更改实例的线速度向量的x分量，并以每秒像素数定义(有关每步像素数，请参见phy_speed_x)。
This variable can be used to get or change the y component of the instance's linear speed vector and is defined in pixels per step (for pixels per second, see phy_linear_velocity_y).
该变量可用于获取或更改实例的线速度向量的y分量，并以每步像素数定义(有关每秒像素数，请参见phy_linear_velocity_y)。
This variable can be used to get or change the y component of the instance's linear velocity vector and is defined in pixels per second (for pixels per step, see phy_speed_y).
该变量可用于获取或更改实例的线速度向量的y分量，并以每秒像素数定义(有关每步像素数，请参见phy_speed_y)。
This variable can be used to get or to change the reaction of an instance when it reaches the end of the current path.
此变量可用于获取或更改实例到达当前路径末尾时的反应。
This variable can be used to get or to set the height of the specified view port.
此变量可用于获取或设置指定视图端口的高度。

This variable can be used to get or to set the position of an instance along its current path in the previous step, and is a normalised value between 0 and 1 ie: 0 is the start position of the path and 1 would be the end position.
该变量可用于获取或设置实例在上一步中沿其当前路径的位置，是一个介于0和1之间的标准化值，即:0是路径的起始位置，1是结束位置。
This variable can be used to get or to set the width of the specified view port.
此变量可用于获取或设置指定视口的宽度。
This variable can be used to set the angular damping of the instance, or it can be used to get the current angular damping.
这个变量可以用来设置实例的角阻尼，也可以用来获取当前的角阻尼。

This variable can be used to set the angular velocity of the instance, or it can be used to get the current angular velocity, in degrees per second and the value used can be either positive (for clockwise rotation) or negative (for anticlockwise rotation).
该变量可用于设置实例的角速度，也可用于获取当前角速度，单位为度/秒，使用的值可以为正(用于顺时针旋转)或负(用于逆时针旋转)。
This variable can be used to set the linear damping of the instance, or it can be used to get the current linear damping.
此变量可用于设置实例的线性阻尼，也可用于获取当前的线性阻尼。
This variable can be used to set whether or not the instance can be affected by rotational forces (default is false).
此变量可用于设置实例是否会受到旋转力的影响(默认值为false)。
This variable controls the "tinting" of the instance sprite and the default value is -1 (but can also be c_white).
这个变量控制实例精灵的"着色"，默认值是-1(也可以是c_white)。
This variable controls whether any view ports that are visible within the room are enabled or not.
此变量控制是否启用房间内可见的任何视图端口。
This variable controls whether or not the instance is currently "active".
该变量控制实例当前是否"激活(active)"。
This variable defines whether or not the instance is extremely fast moving (for example a bullet).
这个变量定义实例是否快速移动(例如子弹)。
This variable determines the speed in which GameMaker will cycle through the sub-images for the current instance sprite.
这个变量决定了GameMaker在当前实例精灵的子图像中循环的速度。
This variable holds a string containing the last (at most) 1024 characters typed on the keyboard.
该变量保存一个字符串，该字符串包含键盘上输入的最后(最多)1024个字符。
This variable holds current state of the assigned time line and will return true if it is running and false if it is not.
该变量保存所分配时间线的当前状态，如果正在运行则返回true，如果没有运行则返回false。
This variable holds the current orientation of the path that has been assigned to the instance when the function path_start() was called.
该变量保存调用函数path_start()时分配给实例的路径的当前方向。
This variable holds the current position (moment) a time line is currently at.
该变量保存时间线当前所处的当前位置(时刻)。
This variable holds the height (in pixels) of the browser the game is being run in.
这个变量保存游戏运行时浏览器的高度(以像素为单位)。
This variable holds the height of the current room in pixels.
该变量以像素为单位保存当前房间的高度。
This variable holds the index of the time line currently associated with the instance.
此变量保存当前与实例关联的时间线的索引。
This variable holds the room index for the current room that your game is running.
这个变量保存了你的游戏正在运行的当前房间的房间索引。
This variable holds the width (in pixels) of the browser the game is being run in.
这个变量保存游戏运行时浏览器的宽度(以像素为单位)。
This variable holds the width of the current room in pixels.
这个变量保存当前房间的宽度(以像素为单位)。
This variable is global in scope and is used to hold a DS Map when used in the Gesture Events, and -1 at all other times.
该变量在范围上是全局的，当在手势事件中使用时用于保存DS map，在所有其他时间为-1。
This variable is not read only and you can change it, for example to set it to "" (an empty string) if you handled it already, and you can use the String Functions to manipulate it.
此变量不是只读的，您可以更改它，例如，如果您已经处理过它，可以将其设置为""(空字符串)，并且您可以使用字符串函数来操作它。
This variable is not read only and you can change it, for example to set it to "" (an empty string) if you handled it already.
此变量不是只读的，您可以更改它，例如，如果您已经处理过它，可以将其设置为""(空字符串)。
This variable is not read only and you can change it, for example to set it to -1 if you handled it already.
这个变量不是只读的，您可以更改它，例如，如果您已经处理了它，就将其设置为-1。
This variable is the physics equivalent of the instance variable x.
这个变量是实例变量x的物理等价物。
This variable is the physics equivalent of the instance variable y.
这个变量是实例变量y的物理等价物。
This variable is used to get or to set the alpha value for the sprite.
该变量用于获取或设置精灵的透明度(Alpha)值。
This variable refers to the value that keyboard_key was in the previous frame, returning the keycode of that key (all standard keycode constants are returned).
这个变量指的是keyboard_key在前一帧中的值，返回那个键的键码(返回所有标准的键码常量)。
This variable returns the index of the current sprite for the instance, or -1 if the instance has no sprite associated with it.
该变量返回实例的当前精灵的索引，如果实例没有与之关联的精灵，则返回-1。
This variable returns the last mouse button that was pressed and can return any of the special mouse constants except mb_any (you may also set this variable to one of the constants).
该变量返回最后一次按下的鼠标按钮，并且可以返回除mb_any之外的任何特殊鼠标常量(您也可以将该变量设置为其中一个常量)。
This variable stores a string of the last key pressed.
该变量存储最后一次按键的字符串。
This variable stores the initial x position of the instance when it is first created in the room.
此变量存储实例在房间中首次创建时的初始x位置。
This variable stores the initial y position of the instance when it is first created in the room.
此变量存储实例在房间中首次创建时的初始y位置。
This variable will be set just before the start of the begin step event but it can also be set through code at any time, meaning you can give it your own custom value should that be necessary.
该变量将在begin step事件开始之前设置，但也可以在任何时候通过代码设置，这意味着如果有必要，您可以给它自己的自定义值。

This variable will be set to the current x position just before the start of the begin step event but it can also be set through code at any time, meaning you can give it your own custom value should that be necessary.
这个变量将在begin step事件开始之前被设置为当前的x位置，但是它也可以在任何时候通过代码来设置，这意味着如果有必要的话，您可以给它自己的自定义值。
This variable will return whether the time line is looping (true) or not (false).
这个变量将返回时间线是否循环(true)或非循环(false)。
This variable will tell you the version number for the OS that is running your game.
这个变量会告诉你运行游戏的操作系统的版本号。
This very useful function only returns integers (whole numbers).
这个非常有用的函数只返回整数(整数)。
This width is returned in pixels and will be dependent on the image_xscale.
该宽度以像素为单位返回，并将依赖于image_xscale。
This will accept any number as, unlike dtan(), darctan() asymptotes are on the y axis so it just means you'll never get returned a number greater than 90 or less than -90.
这将接受任何数字，因为与dtan()不同，darctan()渐近线在y轴上，所以这意味着您永远不会返回大于90或小于-90的数字。
This will accept any number as, unlike tan(), arctan() asymptotes are on the y axis so it just means you'll never get returned a number greater than pi/2 or less than -pi/2.
这将接受任何数字，不像tan()，arctan()渐近线在y轴上，所以这意味着你永远不会返回大于 pi/2 或小于 -pi/2 的数字。
This will also remove all vertex data for any custom primitives that it contained.
这也将删除它所包含的任何自定义图元的所有顶点数据。

This will also stop any particles that are being streamed from the emitter at the time, and if you wish to use the emitter again you will need to set the region position and particle type using the part_emitter_region() function.
这也将停止当时从发射器流出的任何粒子，如果您希望再次使用发射器，您将需要使用part_emitter_region()函数设置区域位置和粒子类型。
This will be a value from 0 to 6.
这将是一个从0到6的值。
This will build a 4x4 identity matrix with the following structure:
这将构建一个具有以下结构的4x4标识矩阵:
This will clear all particles that are currently visible in the room which have been made using either effect_create_above() or effect_create_below().
这将清除房间中当前可见的所有使用effect_create_above()或effect_create_below()制作的粒子。
This will duplicate a given room and return the duplicates index to be used in all further calls to reference the new room.
这将复制给定的房间并返回重复索引，以便在引用新房间的所有后续调用中使用。
This will include the instance running the code, but does not include those instances that have been deactivated using the instance deactivate functions.
这将包括运行代码的实例，但不包括那些已使用实例停用函数停用的实例。
This will not happen instantaneously, but rather at the end of the current step, so any code you have in the same step after this function has been called will still run.
这不会立即发生，而是在当前步骤的末尾发生，因此调用此函数后在同一步骤中的任何代码仍将运行。
This will not, and should not, be displayed, but it will save correctly to disk for use in encoding.
这不会也不应该显示出来，但是它会正确地保存到磁盘上，以便在编码时使用。
This will open the specified URL on the browser of the chosen target device, or, if you are using the HTML5 module, in the currently open browser.
这将在所选目标设备的浏览器上打开指定的URL，或者(如果使用HTML5模块)在当前打开的浏览器中打开。
This will remove it from the room until the room is restarted (unless the room is persistent).
这将从房间中删除它，直到重新启动房间(除非房间是持久的)。

This will return (or set) the oscillation frequency for the joint, in hertz, and typically the frequency should be less than a half the frequency of the time step, as set by the function physics_world_update_speed().
这将返回(或设置)关节的振荡频率，单位为赫兹，通常该频率应小于时间步长频率的一半，由函数physics_world_update_speed()设置。
This will return the directory where the game executable is stored.
这将返回存储游戏可执行文件的目录。
This will return the length of the joint from the first local x/y coordinates to the first anchor x/y coordinates (Distance joints only, can only be read from)
这将返回从第一个局部x/y坐标到第一个锚点x/y坐标的关节长度(仅关节距离，只能从读取)
This will return the length of the joint from the second local x/y coordinates to the second anchor x/y coordinates (Distance joints only, can only be written to)
这将返回关节从第二个局部x/y坐标到第二个锚点x/y坐标的长度(仅关节距离，只能写入)
This will return the value of a number multiplied by itself "n" number of times.
这将返回一个数字乘以自身"n"次的值。
This will stop all further achievements and scores from being recorded.
这将阻止所有进一步的成就和分数被记录。

This will work for precise collisions, but only if both the instance and the instances of the object being checked for have precise collision masks selected, otherwise only bounding box collisions are applied.
这将适用于精确碰撞，但仅当实例和被检查对象的实例都选择了精确碰撞遮罩时，否则仅应用边界框碰撞。
This will work for precise collisions, but only if both the instance and the object being checked for have precise collision masks selected otherwise only bounding box collisions are applied.
这将适用于精确碰撞，但只有在实例和正在检查的对象都选择了精确碰撞遮罩的情况下，否则仅应用边界框碰撞。

This works by taking the maximum input values for force and torque and applying those to the second fixture to bring the speed and angular momentum down to the same values as that of the first instance.
其工作原理是，取力和扭矩的最大输入值，并将其应用于第二个夹具，使速度和角动量下降到与第一个实例相同的值。

This works by telling GameMaker to skip the draw event for this instance, so care must be taken when using this as it means that no code placed in the draw event will be run while the instance is not visible.
这是通过告诉GameMaker跳过这个实例的draw事件来实现的，所以在使用时必须小心，因为这意味着当实例不可见时，放置在draw事件中的任何代码都不会运行。

This xoffset is returned in pixels and will be dependent on the image_xscale, so that (for example) if a square 32x32 sprite is defined as having the x origin at 16, when that sprite is scaled by 2 this variable will return 32.
这个xoffset以像素为单位返回，并将依赖于image_xscale，因此(例如)如果一个正方形的32x32精灵被定义为x原点为16，当这个精灵被缩放2时，这个变量将返回32。

This yoffset is returned in pixels and will be dependent on the image_yscale, so that (for example) if a square 32x32 sprite is defined as having the y origin at 16, when that sprite is scaled by 2 this variable will return 32.
这个yoffset以像素为单位返回，并将依赖于image_yscale，因此(例如)如果一个正方形的32x32精灵被定义为y原点为16，当这个精灵被缩放2时，这个变量将返回32。
Three floating point values
三个浮点值
Tiling is based on the width and height of the sprite as defined by the sprite variables of the instance running the code.
平铺基于运行代码的实例的精灵变量所定义的精灵的宽度和高度。
Tizen mobile device browser
Tizen移动设备浏览器
To add moments to a timeline created in this way, see the function timeline_moment_add_script().
要向以这种方式创建的时间轴添加时刻，请参见函数timeline_moment_add_script()。
To add more versatility to the audio engine, GameMaker permits you to select the falloff model that suits your game.
为了给音频引擎添加更多的功能，GameMaker允许你选择适合你的游戏的衰减模型。

To combine strings you can use + (see example below) and you can also use \n within a string to add a line break so it is drawn over multiple lines (for information on how to properly format a string and what escape characters you can use, please see here).
要组合字符串，可以使用+(参见下面的例子)，也可以在字符串中使用\n来添加换行符，这样就可以在多行上绘制换行符(有关如何正确格式化字符串以及可以使用哪些转义字符的信息，请参阅这里)。
To do this we calculate the log2(x) of the number, round it down and add 1 - for example log2(100) returns 6.643856, which rounded down is 6, to which we add one and it gives us 7.
为此，我们计算该数字的log2(x ),将其向下舍入并加1 -例如，log2(100)得出6.643856，向下舍入后为6，再加1，得到7。
To do this you choose a key that you want to map (key2 - this will be the key that you write the code for) and a key that you want it to be mapped to (key1).
为此，您需要选择一个想要映射的键(key 2——这将是您编写代码的键)和一个想要映射到的键(key1)。
To do this, you need tell it which part of the system to draw, and this is done by passing a value created from the bits stored in various "flag" constants:
为此，您需要告诉它要绘制系统的哪一部分，这是通过传递由存储在各种"标志"常量中的位创建的值来完成的:
To end and draw the primitive you must call draw_primitive_end().
要结束并绘制图元，必须调用draw_primitive_end()。
To generate a random number GameMaker starts with a random seed number.
为了生成随机数，GameMaker从一个随机种子数开始。
To get the true fps, ie.
以获得真实的fps，即。
To have all particles with the same lifetime, set the two values to be the same.
要使所有粒子具有相同的寿命，请将这两个值设置为相同。
To help avoid this, a precision value is used on all real number functions, and when the difference between two numbers is smaller than this precision they are considered equal.
为了避免这种情况，对所有实数函数都使用一个精度值，当两个数之间的差小于这个精度时，它们被认为是相等的。
To instantly change the gain, simply set the time argument to 0.
要立即更改增益，只需将time参数设置为0。
To maintain the texture appearance while changing only the alpha, a value of -1 (or c_white) may be used for the colour argument.
为了在只改变alpha值的情况下保持纹理外观，color参数可以使用-1(或c_white)值。

To make one you need to have previously defined your fixtures and created the two basic joints that are going to comprise your gear - these must be made up of one revolute joint and either a prismatic joint or another revolute joint.
要做一个你需要预先定义你的夹具和创建两个基本的关节，将组成你的齿轮 -这些必须由一个转动关节和一个移动关节或另一个转动关节组成。
To optimise performance when drawing circles, GameMaker basically draws a polygon shape with enough sides to make it appear circular.
为了优化绘制圆形时的性能，GameMaker基本上绘制了一个具有足够边的多边形形状，使其看起来像圆形。
To prevent this, you can set the mix value between two animation sets and the sprite will interpolate between them.
为了防止这种情况，你可以在两个动画集之间设置混合值，然后精灵就会在它们之间进行插值。
To remove the cursor sprite, you can set this variable to -1 again.
要删除光标精灵，您可以再次将此变量设置为-1。
To resolve this issue, you will need to set the texture page settings (in the Texture Group Editor) to disable the Automatic Crop.
要解决这个问题，你需要设置纹理页面设置(在纹理组编辑器中)禁用自动裁剪。
To specify a revolute you need to provide two instances and a single anchor point in the room, as you can see in the image provided:
要指定一个旋转，你需要在房间中提供两个实例和一个锚点，如图所示:
To that end we use the function physics_world_update_speed() which sets the update speed for the physics system independently of the room speed.
为此，我们使用函数physics_world_update_speed()来设置物理系统的更新速度，与房间速度无关。
To that end, you must have defined the canvas element correctly within the *.html page of your game using the correct sizes and names that correspond to the surfaces you wish to create.
为此，你必须在游戏的*.html页面中正确定义canvas元素，使用与你想要创建的表面相对应的正确大小和名称。

To use this you need to specify an already created buffer, the offset value (which is the point within the buffer at which you wish to start encoding) as well as the size, in bytes, of the buffer memory to encode.
要使用它，您需要指定一个已经创建的缓冲区、偏移值(缓冲区中您希望开始编码的点)以及要编码的缓冲区内存的大小(以字节为单位)。
Toggle vertical synchronisation to on (true) or off (false).
将垂直同步切换到开(true)或关(false)。
Top button 1 (this maps to the "A" on an Xbox 360 controller and the cross on a PS controller)
顶部按钮1(对应Xbox 360控制器上的"A"和PS控制器上的"十字")
Top button 2 (this maps to the "B" on an Xbox 360 controller and the circle on a PS controller)
顶部按钮2(对应Xbox 360控制器上的"B"和PS控制器上的圆)
Top button 3 (this maps to the "X" on an Xbox 360 controller and the square on a PS controller)
顶部按钮3(对应Xbox 360控制器上的"X"和PS控制器上的方块)
Top button 4 (this maps to the "Y" on an Xbox 360 controller and the triangle on a PS controller)
顶部按钮4(对应Xbox 360控制器上的"Y"和PS控制器上的三角形)
Turns a real number into a string using your own formatting, where you can choose how many "places" are saved to the string and how many decimal places are saved also.
使用您自己的格式将一个实数转换成一个字符串，您可以选择将多少位保存到字符串中，以及将多少位小数保存到字符串中。
Two floating point values
两个浮点值
Two quick touches/clicks and releases have been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都检测到两次快速触摸/点击和释放
Two quick touches/clicks and releases have been detected for an instance
对一个实例检测到两个快速触摸/单击和释放
Two touches and a straight movement have been detected anywhere in the room
在房间的任何地方都检测到两次触摸和直线运动
Two touches and a straight movement have been detected for an instance
对于一个实例，检测到两次触摸和直线运动
UDP is "connectionless" in that you don't actually do a connect, you just send a packet directly to an IP, and the server gets incoming data from an IP address and has to deal with it "as is".
UDP是"无连接"的，因为你实际上不进行连接，你只是直接向一个IP发送数据包，服务器从一个IP地址获得传入的数据，并必须"按原样"处理它。
UV coordinates (u, v)
UV坐标 (u, v)
Undefined will be returned if no preferences have been set.
如果没有设置首选项，将返回Undefined。
Unknown OS
未知的系统
Unknown browser
未知的浏览器
Unknown or not iOS
未知 或 非 iOS

Unlike arctan() the function arctan2(y, x) is valid for all angles and so may be used to convert a vector to an angle without risking division by zero, and it also returns a result in the correct quadrant.
与arctan()不同，函数arctan2(y，x)对所有角度都有效，因此可用于将向量转换为角度，而不会有被零除的风险，并且它还会返回正确象限中的结果。

Unlike darctan() the function darctan2() is valid for all angles and so may be used to convert a vector to an angle without risking division by zero, and it also returns a result in the correct quadrant.
与darctan()不同，函数darctan2()对所有角度都有效，因此可用于将向量转换为角度，而不会有被零除的风险，并且它还会返回正确象限中的结果。

Unlike hspeed and vspeed, speed has no direction associated with it as this is governed by the direction value of the instance, but it can have a negative value, in which case the instance will travel in the opposite direction to that set by the direction function (ie: direction - 180°).
与hspeed和vspeed不同，speed没有关联的方向，因为它由实例的方向值控制，但它可以有负值，在这种情况下，实例将沿与方向函数设置的方向相反的方向移动(即:方向- 180)。

Unlike the function buffer_base64_decode(), this will not create a buffer for you, but rather you should already have created the buffer (see buffer_create()), the id of which you would then use with this function.
与buffer_base64_decode()函数不同，它不会为您创建缓冲区，而是您应该已经创建了缓冲区(请参见buffer_create())，然后您将在此函数中使用该缓冲区的id。
Unlike the keyboard_check() function, this function will only run once for every time the key is lifted, so for it to trigger again, the key must be first pressed and then released again.
与keyboard_check()函数不同，此函数在每次举起键时只会运行一次，因此要再次触发它，必须先按下键，然后再释放键。
Unlike the keyboard_check() function, this function will only run once for every time the key is pressed down, so for it to trigger again, the key must be first released and then pressed again.
与keyboard_check()函数不同，此函数在每次按下键时只会运行一次，因此要再次触发该键，必须先释放该键，然后再按一次。

Unlike the keyboard_check_pressed() or keyboard_check_released() functions which are only triggered once when the key is pressed or released, this function is triggered every step that the key is held down for.
与keyboard_check_pressed()或keyboard_check_released()函数不同，这两个函数只在按键被按下或释放时触发一次，此函数在按键被按下的每一步都会被触发。
Unlike the normal font_add_sprite() which has a specific order for the sub-images of the sprite, this function will map the sprite sub-images based on the argument "string_map" of the function.
与普通的font_add_sprite()不同，它对子画面的子图像有特定的顺序，此函数将根据函数的参数"string_map"映射子画面。
Use multiple to create a smoke cloud.
使用多个来创建烟雾云。
Use the File functions instead to create a custom save system where you only save and load specific game data.
使用File函数来创建一个自定义的保存系统，只保存和加载特定的游戏数据。
Use this to allow the instance to rotate on the spot when no path is found (true) or not (false)
使用它来允许实例在找不到路径时原地旋转 (true) 或未找到 (false)
Use to indicate the number of sub-images (1 for a single image or for a *.gif).
用于指示子图像的数量(1表示单个图像，1表示*。gif)。
Used to set/get the flip bit of a tile data blob.
用于设置/获取图块数据blob翻转位。
Used to set/get the mirror bit of a tile data blob.
用于设置/获取图块数据blob镜像位。
Used to set/get the rotate bit of a tile data blob.
用于设置/获取图块数据blob旋转位。
Using it in any other event may not work as expected, and may give different results across different targets and even devices.
在任何其他事件中使用它可能不会像预期的那样工作，并且可能在不同的目标甚至设备上给出不同的结果。
Using this function returns the name part of the indicated file, with the extension but without the path
使用此函数返回指定文件的名称部分，带扩展名，不带路径
Using this function returns the path part of the indicated file path, including the final backslash.
使用此函数返回指定文件路径的路径部分，包括最后一个反斜杠。
Using this function you can change the angle for the given sprite element on a layer.
使用此函数，你可以改变一个层上给定精灵元素的角度。
Using this function you can change the sprite resource assigned to a given sprite element on a layer.
使用此函数，你可以改变分配给特定层上精灵元素的精灵资源。
Using this function you can change the tile set resource assigned to a given tile map element on a layer.
通过此函数，您可以更改分配给图层上给定切片地图元素的切片集资源。
Using this function you can change whether the given background element on a layer should be tiled horizontally or not.
使用此函数，你可以改变一个图层上的背景元素是否应该水平平铺。
Using this function you can change whether the given background element on a layer should be tiled vertically or not.
使用此函数，你可以改变一个图层上的背景元素是否应该垂直平铺。
Using this function you can change whether the given sprite element on a layer should be scaled along the x axis or not.
使用此函数，你可以改变一个层上的精灵元素是否应该沿着x轴缩放。
Using this function you can change whether the given sprite element on a layer should be scaled along the y axis or not.
使用此函数你可以改变一个层上给定的精灵元素是否应该沿着y轴缩放。
Using this function you can clear/set all the tiles on a given tile-map.
使用此函数你可以清除/设置一个给定tiles上的所有tile-map。
Using this function you can retrieve the height (in cells) of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以检索tile map元素的高度(以单元格为单位)。
Using this function you can retrieve the height (in pixels) of each tile cell of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以检索tile map元素的每个图格的高度(以像素为单位)。
Using this function you can retrieve the index value of the tile set resource assigned to a given tile map element on a layer.
使用此函数，您可以检索分配给图层上给定tile map元素的图块集资源的索引值。
Using this function you can retrieve the tile data from a cell of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以从 tile map 元素的单元中检索数据。
Using this function you can retrieve the tile data from a position (within the room) of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以从tile map元素的某个位置(在房间内)检索tile数据。
Using this function you can retrieve the width (in cells) of the tile map element.
使用此函数可以检索tile map元素的宽度(以单元格为单位)。
Using this function you can retrieve the width (in pixels) of each tile cell of the tile map element.
使用此函数，可以检索tile map元素的每个图格的宽度(以像素为单位)。
Using this function you can retrieve the x position (within the room) of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以检索tile map元素的x位置(在房间内)。
Using this function you can retrieve the x-axis position of an individual tile map cell by giving the relative x-axis position within the room.
通过此函数，您可以通过给出房间内的相对x轴位置来检索单个图块地图单元的x轴位置。
Using this function you can retrieve the y position (within the room) of the tile map element.
使用此函数，您可以检索tile map元素的y位置(在房间内)。
Using this function you can retrieve the y-axis position of an individual tile map cell by giving the relative y-axis position within the room.
使用此函数，您可以通过给出房间内的相对y轴位置来检索单个瓷砖地图单元格的y轴位置。
Using this function you can set the sprite index of the background element.
使用此函数你可以设置背景元素的精灵索引。
Using this function you can toggle a background element sprite to stretch to fit the room or remain at 1:1 with the resolution.
通过此函数，您可以切换背景元素精灵，以拉伸到适合房间或保持1:1的分辨率。
Using this function you can toggle a background elements visibility.
通过此函数，您可以切换背景元素的可见性。
Usually this event means that clients are in inconsistent state.
通常，此事件意味着客户端处于不一致状态。
Value for the global volume (0 to 1).
全局音量的值(0到1)。
Value for the music volume.
音乐音量的值。
Values to be replaced on the format string (non-strings will be converted to strings).
要在格式字符串上替换的值（非字符串将转换为字符串）。
Values to replace the placeholders with.
替换占位符的值。
Vertical alignment.
垂直对齐。
Vertical position of the cell in the grid
网格中单元格的垂直位置
Viscous particles will clump and stick together more.
粘性颗粒将更容易结块和粘在一起。
Visibility toggle (true is visible and false is invisible)
可见性切换(true为可见，false为不可见)
Volume-id files
Volume-id 文件
Vsync timing is the main timing method (default for all supported platforms)
垂直同步计时是主要的计时方法(所有支持的平台默认)

We can use the function physics_fixture_set_angular_damping() in GameMaker to simulate this effect and reduce the velocity of rotation of instances in the physics world, as, without it, any rotating instance would continue to rotate infinitely.
我们可以使用GameMaker中的physics_fixture_set_angular_damping()函数来模拟这种效果，并减少物理世界中实例的旋转速度，因为如果没有它，任何旋转实例都将继续无限旋转。
Web event
Web事件

Well, at the start of each area, you can store the random seed with this function and so every time you need to go back there, you can use random_set_seed() to set the seed to what it was previously and so force GameMaker to reproduce the same set of "random" functions that it used previously.
在每个区域的开始，你可以使用此函数存储随机种子，所以每次你需要回到那里，你可以使用random_set_seed()设置种子为它之前的样子，从而迫使GameMaker重新生成它之前使用的相同的"随机"函数集。

Well, you could code the movement system twice, but that is a bit complicated and thankfully redundant as this function permits you to "map" one key to another and so any input from either key will be interpreted as the same.
好吧，你可以编写两次移动系统代码，但这有点复杂，谢天谢地，因为此函数允许你将一个键"映射"到另一个键，所以来自两个键的任何输入都将被解释为相同的。
What kind of bounding box to use.
使用什么样的边界框。

What this basically means is that you give the number of simultaneous sounds that can be played at any one time, and if the number exceeds the amount, those sounds with a lower priority are stopped to free up a channel for the sounds with a higher priority.
这基本上意味着，你给出了可以在任何时间播放的同时播放的声音的数量，如果数量超过了这个数量，那些优先级较低的声音就会停止，为优先级较高的声音腾出通道。
What this means is that it returns the actual device definition of the x position that is being touched, not the GameMaker one, and as such will ignore things like view position and scaling.
这意味着它返回被触摸的x位置的实际设备定义，而不是GameMaker的定义，因此将忽略视图位置和缩放等内容。
What this means is that it returns the actual device definition of the y position that is being touched, not the GameMaker one, and as such will ignore things like view position and scaling.
这意味着它返回被触摸的y位置的实际设备定义，而不是GameMaker的定义，因此将忽略视图位置和缩放等内容。

What this means is that the strength and direction of the force are calculated based on the origin (or the position if it has no sprite) of the instance, without taking into consideration the direction or rotation it may have in the game room or physics world.
这意味着力的强度和方向是基于实例的原点(或者位置，如果它没有精灵)计算的，而不考虑它在游戏室或物理世界中可能具有的方向或旋转。

What this means is that the strength and direction of the impulse are calculated based on the origin (or the position if it has no sprite) of the instance, without taking into consideration the direction or rotation it may have in the game room or physics world.
这意味着脉冲的强度和方向是基于实例的原点(或者位置，如果它没有精灵的话)计算的，而不考虑它在游戏室或物理世界中可能具有的方向或旋转。
What to do when the end of the path is reached (see the constants listed below).
到达路径末尾时要做什么(参见下面列出的常量)。
What to multiply the current horizontal scale by.
用什么乘以当前的横向缩放。
What to multiply the current vertical scale by.
用什么乘以当前的纵向缩放。

When GameMaker goes to draw a pixel there is a source colour (the colour of the pixel we're going to draw) and a destination colour(the colour that's already in the pixel we're drawing to), so when determining the new colour of the pixel, the source and destination colours are calculated according to the chosen blend mode.
当GameMaker绘制一个像素时，有一个源颜色(我们将要绘制的像素的颜色)和一个目标颜色(我们要绘制的像素中的已经存在的颜色)，所以当确定像素的新颜色时，源和目标颜色将根据所选择的混合模式计算。

When GameMaker goes to draw a pixel there is a source colour (the colour of the pixel we're going to draw) and a destination colour (the colour that's already in the pixel we're drawing to), so when determining the new colour of the pixel, the source and destination colours are calculated according to the chosen blend mode.
当GameMaker绘制一个像素时，有一个源颜色(我们将要绘制的像素的颜色)和一个目标颜色(我们要绘制的像素中的已经存在的颜色)，所以当确定像素的新颜色时，源和目标颜色将根据所选择的混合模式计算。
When a path is created, its orientation is the default 0 degrees, but you can set this value to anything you wish using this.
创建路径时，它的方向是默认的0度，但是您可以使用它将这个值设置为您想要的任何值。

When adding a function to a layer, in this way it will be run at the start of each of the different draw events so you may want to check in the function assigned which event is currently rendering and adapt the code to suit.
当添加一个函数到一个层时，这样它将在每个不同的绘制事件开始时运行，所以你可能想要检查当前渲染的事件所分配的函数，并修改代码以适应它。

When adding a function to a layer in this way, it will be run at the end of each of the different draw events so you may want to check in the function assigned which event is currently finished rendering and adapt the code to suit.
当以这种方式添加一个函数到一个层时，它将在每个不同的绘制事件结束时运行，所以你可能想要检入分配给函数的哪个事件当前完成渲染并调整代码以适应。
When adding audio to GameMaker it can be either streamed or in memory.
当向GameMaker添加音频时，它既可以是流音频也可以是内存音频。

When an instance is rendered in GameMaker , the depth of a generated pixel (its z coordinate) is stored in the z-buffer, then, if another instance of the scene must be rendered at the same pixel, the two depths are compared (z-testing - see gpu_set_ztestenable()) and the one "closer" to the observer is then saved to the z-buffer, replacing the old one.
当一个实例在GameMaker中渲染时，生成的像素的深度(它的z坐标)被存储在z缓冲区中，然后，如果场景的另一个实例必须在相同的像素上渲染，两个深度将被比较(z测试-参见gpu_set_ztestenable())，然后"更接近"观察者的那个被保存到z缓冲区中，取代旧的那个。

When applying this to buffers using this function you must specify the buffer id of the buffer to use, then an offset value (in bytes) for where to begin, and then a size (again in bytes) for the region to be hashed.
当使用此函数将它应用到缓冲区时，您必须指定要使用的缓冲区的缓冲区id，然后指定开始位置的偏移值(以字节为单位)，然后指定要散列的区域的大小(也是以字节为单位)。

When assigning a layer, you must supply the unique layer ID as returned by the function layer_get_id() (when using named room layers), or as returned by the function layer_create() (when you create your own layers at run time).
指定层时，必须提供由函数layer_get_id()返回的唯一层id(使用命名的房间层时)，或由函数layer_create()返回的唯一层ID(在运行时创建自己的层时)。

When automatic drawing is off, you can explicitly order GameMaker to draw the current state of the particle system using the function part_system_drawit(), and if you set this function to true again you can switch automatic drawing back on.
当自动绘图关闭时，您可以使用函数 part_system_drawit() 显式命令 GameMaker 绘制粒子系统的当前状态，如果再次将此函数设置为 true，您可以重新打开自动绘图。

When calling the function you supply the unique camera ID value, which you get from the camera_create_* functions or from the view_camera array if using the Room Editor to set up the view port and view.
调用此函数时，您需要提供唯一的相机ID值，该值可以从camera_create_*函数或view_camera数组(如果使用房间编辑器来设置视口和视图)中获得。

When changing rooms, if there is another layer in the following rooms with the same name, then the persisted instance will be assigned to the layer with the that name regardless of the depth of the layer.
在更改房间时，如果以下房间中有另一个具有相同名称的层，则持久化实例将被分配给具有该名称的层，而不管该层的深度如何。

When checking using this function, if the object is a parent, then all child objects will also be included in the return value, and also note that those instances which have been deactivated with the instance deactivate functions will not be included in this check.
使用此函数检查时，如果对象是父对象，则所有子对象也将包括在返回值中，同时注意，使用实例停用功能停用的那些实例将不包括在此检查中。
When comparing values, for example when searching in a map or sorting a list, GameMaker must decide when two values are equal.
当比较值时，例如在地图中搜索或排序列表时，GameMaker必须决定两个值何时相等。

When copying from a vertex buffer into a regular buffer with this function, both buffers must have previously been created (using the vertex_create_buffer() and buffer_create() functions, for example).
当使用此函数从顶点缓冲区复制到常规缓冲区时，两个缓冲区必须都已创建(例如，使用vertex_create_buffer()和buffer_create()函数)。
When created a points struct is empty and you need to set the following variables to generate the point data:
当创建一个点结构是空的，你需要设置以下变量来生成点数据:
When creating a physics system in GameMaker, it is often important to have a visual representation of what is actually happening with an instance.
在GameMaker中创建物理系统时，拥有一个实例实际发生情况的可视化表示通常很重要。
When defining a font in GameMaker, you can define a range of characters to include.
在GameMaker中定义字体时，你可以定义要包含的字符范围。

When developing for mobile devices, you need to have a way to check that the device is still focused on your game or not, especially as if your game is on an iOS, Android or Windows Phone device then it can be interrupted by phone calls and other apps.
在为移动设备开发时，你需要有一种方法来检查设备是否仍然专注于你的游戏，特别是如果你的游戏是在iOS、Android或Windows Phone设备上，那么它可能会被电话和其他应用程序中断。
When enabled (set to true), additional information about texture page use will be sent to the output window.
当启用时(设置为true)，关于纹理页面使用的附加信息将被发送到输出窗口。

When enabled, each tap event will have an additional "tapcount" DS map entry which will have registered the number of taps, and when enabled it means that all tap events will be triggered, ie: two taps will trigger both the single tap event and the double tap event, with the single tap event tap count being 1 and the double tap event tap count being 2.
启用时，每个点击事件将有一个额外的"点击计数"DS映射条目，该条目将记录点击次数，启用时，这意味着所有点击事件都将被触发，即:两次点击将触发单次点击事件和两次点击事件，其中单次点击事件点击计数为1，两次点击事件点击计数为2。
When performing image blending and colouring, HTML5 cannot do it dynamically in the same way an executable could be performed.
在执行图像混合和着色时，HTML5不能像执行可执行文件那样动态地执行。
When performing image blending, HTML5 cannot do it dynamically in the same way an executable could be performed.
当执行图像混合时，HTML5不能像执行可执行文件那样动态地执行。
When set to true tap counting is enabled, and when set to false it is disabled, although you can check which state it is in using the function gesture_get_tap_count().
当设置为true时，点击计数被启用，当设置为false时，它被禁用，尽管您可以使用函数gesture_get_tap_count()检查它处于哪个状态。

When set to true the element sprite will be stretched to fit the room (either scaled up or scaled down depending on the sizes of the sprite and the room), and when set to false, the element sprite will be displayed at its native resolution.
当设置为true时，元素精灵将被拉伸以适合房间(根据精灵和房间的大小放大或缩小)，当设置为false时，元素精灵将以其原始分辨率显示。
When set to true the element will be displayed, and when set to false, the element will not be displayed.
当设置为true时，将显示该元素，当设置为false时，将不显示该元素。

When the arguments are set to true these messages will appear, informing the player of any local or remote challenges received as well as those challenges that have been completed, while setting them to false will suppress these notifications.
当参数设置为真时，这些消息就会出现，通知玩家收到的任何本地或远程挑战以及已经完成的挑战，而设置为假则会抑制这些通知。
When the data being added reaches the limit of the buffer size, the overwrite will be placed back at the start of the buffer, and further writing will continue from that point.
当添加的数据达到缓冲区大小的限制时，覆盖将被放回到缓冲区的开始处，并且进一步的写入将从该点继续。
When the instance would run into a solid instance (or any instance when checkall is true) it will change the direction of motion to try to avoid that instance and move around it.
当实例遇到实体实例（或 checkall 为真时的任何实例）时，它将改变运动方向以尝试避开该实例并在其周围移动。
When the instance would run into an instance of the object specified by the "obj" argument it will change the direction of motion to try to avoid that instance and move around it.
当实例遇到由"obj"参数指定的对象的实例时，它将改变运动方向，试图避开该实例并绕其移动。

When the number of arguments is even, the smaller of the two middle values is returned and the function can have as many arguments as required (note that more arguments will mean that the function will be slower to parse) which must all be real values.
当参数数量为偶数时，返回两个中间值中较小的那个，函数可以根据需要拥有任意数量的参数(注意，参数越多，函数解析的速度就越慢)，这些参数必须都是实数。

When the surface is first created, it may contain "noise" as basically it is just an area of memory that is put aside for the purpose (and that memory may still contain information), so you may want to clear the surface before use with a function like draw_clear_alpha().
当第一次创建表面时，它可能包含"噪声",因为基本上它只是为此目的而保留的一个内存区域(并且该内存可能仍然包含信息),所以您可能希望在使用draw_clear_alpha()之类的函数之前清除表面。

When this is enabled (true) all textures will be smoothed when drawn (this includes sprites as they too are considered textures), meaning that when scaled or moved if there is not a 1:1 pixel ratio then there will be a "smudging" across various pixels which may make images appear blurry depending on the art style used.
当启用此选项时(true)，所有的纹理在绘制时都将被平滑化(这包括精灵，因为它们也被认为是纹理)，这意味着当缩放或移动时，如果没有1:1的像素比，那么将会在各种像素之间产生"模糊"，这可能会使图像看起来模糊，这取决于所使用的美术风格。
When this is enabled (true) the sampler texture will be smoothed and if this is disabled (false) then images will be drawn based on the nearest pixel.
当启用(true)采样器纹理将被平滑，如果禁用(false)，那么图像将基于最近的像素绘制。
When this is on, the first tap will be detected as mb_left, and the second as mb_right, so make sure that any code you use takes this into account.
启用此选项后，第一次点击将被检测为mb_left，第二次点击将被检测为mb_right，因此请确保您使用的任何代码都考虑到这一点。
When used, the key will be flagged as being pressed until the corresponding release function is called (see keyboard_key_release()).
当使用该键时，该键将被标记为被按下，直到相应的释放函数被调用为止(参见keyboard_key_release())。
When using more than a single flag, these need to be merged using the bitwise "or", as shown in the example below.
当使用多个标志时，需要使用位或(bitwise "or" | )进行合并，如下例所示。
When using multiple listeners on a system, you can set the bit-mask for a sound and have it heard from the flagged listener only.
当在一个系统上使用多个时，您可以为一个声音设置位掩码，并让它只从标记的中听到。
When using this feature the game won't autostart and instead require rollback_start_game to be called after all players have set their preferences.
当使用此函数时，游戏不会自动启动，而是需要在所有玩家都设置好偏好后调用rollback_start_game。

When using this function the priority queue being copied to must have been previously created and if it contained any items before the copy, then these will be cleared first (meaning this information will be lost).
在使用此函数时，要复制的优先级队列必须是以前创建的，如果它在复制之前包含任何项，那么这些项将首先被清除(这意味着该信息将丢失)。

When using this function the queue being copied to must have been previously created and if it contained any items before the copy, then these will be cleared first (meaning this information will be lost).
使用此函数时，要复制到的队列必须是以前创建的，如果它在复制前包含任何项目，则这些项目将首先被清除(意味着此信息将丢失)。

When using this function the stack being copied to must have been previously created and if it contained any items before the copy, then these will be cleared first (meaning this information will be lost).
在使用此函数时，被复制的堆栈必须是之前创建的，如果它包含复制之前的任何项，那么这些项将首先被清除(这意味着这些信息将丢失)。

When using this function you should use a sprite index that has been created and stored in a variable using other functions like sprite_add() or sprite_create_from_surface(), or even sprite_duplicate(), rather than a resource tree sprite asset.
使用此函数时，您应该使用一个sprite索引，该索引是使用sprite_add()或sprite_create_from_surface()或sprite_duplicate()等其他函数创建并存储在变量中的，而不是使用资源树sprite资源。
When using this function, numbers, minus signs, decimal points and exponential parts in the string are taken into account, while other characters (such as letters) will cause an error to be thrown.
使用此函数时，字符串中的数字、减号、小数点和指数部分都将被考虑在内，而其他字符(如字母)将导致抛出错误。
When using this function, you define a circular area and GameMaker will work out whether the given point falls within its bounds or not.
当使用此函数时，你定义一个圆形区域，GameMaker将计算出给定点是否在它的范围内。
When using this function, you define a rectangular area and GameMaker will work out whether the given point falls within its bounds or not.
当使用此函数时，你定义一个矩形区域，GameMaker将计算出给定点是否在其边界内。
When using this function, you define a triangular area and GameMaker will work out whether the given point falls within its bounds or not.
当使用此函数时，你定义一个三角形区域，GameMaker将计算出给定点是否在其边界内。

When using two buffers and copying from one to the other, both buffers must have previously been created using the buffer_create() function (for example), and you can specify a data offset (in bytes) for the start point of the data to be copied from the source buffer relative to the start of the buffer, as well as another data offset to define the position to copy the data to in the destination buffer.
当使用两个缓冲区并从一个缓冲区复制到另一个缓冲区时，这两个缓冲区都必须是先前使用buffer_create()函数创建的(例如),您可以为要从源缓冲区复制的数据的起始点指定一个相对于缓冲区起点的数据偏移量(以字节为单位),并指定另一个数据偏移量来定义要将数据复制到目标缓冲区中的位置。

When we talk about torque, we are generally talking about the tendency of a force or impulse to rotate an instance about its centre of mass, but in GameMaker you can also apply torque independently to an instance, causing it to rotate in a given direction.
当我们谈论扭矩时，我们通常谈论的是力或冲动使实例围绕其质心旋转的趋势，但在GameMaker中，您也可以独立地将扭矩应用于实例，使其沿给定方向旋转。

When working on mobile devices (in particular Android devices) this is an important factor to take into consideration as what may be appropriate for one display resolution, may not be appropriate for another.
在移动设备(特别是Android设备)上工作时，这是需要考虑的一个重要因素，因为适合一种显示分辨率的分辨率可能并不适合另一种分辨率。
When working with physics you need to apply not only gravity to objects, but forces as well.
当研究物理时，你不仅需要对物体施加重力，还要施加力。
When working with surfaces, it is often required that you capture the whole visible region of the screen to the surface, and so you would assign it to a view port using this variable.
在处理表面时，通常需要将屏幕的整个可见区域捕捉到表面上，因此可以使用此变量将其分配给一个视口。
When working with surfaces, it is often required to capture the whole visible region of the screen to the surface, and so you would assign it to a view port using this function.
在处理表面时，通常需要将屏幕的整个可见区域捕捉到表面，因此可以使用此函数将其分配给视图端口。
When you are debugging audio in this way, the overlay will show the following information:
当你用这种方式调试音频时，覆盖层将显示以下信息:
When you are finished adding layers or layer elements to a room, call the function layer_reset_target_room() to reset the room target (or call this function again with a room argument of -1).
当您完成向房间添加图层或图层元素时，调用函数layer_reset_target_room()来重置房间目标(或使用room参数-1再次调用此函数)。
When you are working with surfaces, you should always use this function whenever you are finished using them.
在处理表面时，应该在使用完表面后使用此函数。
When you bind a fixture to an instance using physics_fixture_bind() this returns an "id" for the bound fixture.
当您使用physics_fixture_bind()将夹具绑定到实例时，这将为绑定的夹具返回一个"id"。

When you call the function, you need to specify the width and height of the GIF (in pixels, and there is no upper limit on size except for available memory), and the function will return the unique ID value used to identify the gift in subsequent functions, or it will return -1 if the gif could not be initialized (for example, if the width/height are too big for the memory available).
调用此函数时，需要指定GIF的宽度和高度(以像素为单位，除了可用内存外，大小没有上限)，此函数将返回后续函数中用于标识gif的惟一ID值，或者如果GIF无法初始化(例如，如果宽度/高度对可用内存来说太大)，则返回-1。
When you call this function you are telling GameMaker that all further layer functions should be applied to the given room.
当你调用此函数时，你就是在告诉GameMaker所有进一步的层函数都应该应用到给定的房间。
When you call this function you need to provide one of the following constants for each of the first three arguments:
当您调用此函数时，需要为前三个参数分别提供以下常量之一:
When you create a room with no active view ports or view cameras, GameMaker still uses a camera to show the action in the game.
当您创建一个没有活动视口或相机的房间时，GameMaker仍然使用相机来显示游戏中的动作。
When you create a rope joint the two instances should already be created and have a fixture assigned, then you define the two anchor points in room coordinates.
当您创建一个绳连接时，两个实例应该已经创建并分配了一个夹具，然后在房间坐标中定义两个锚点。

When you create an object you can assign it an initial depth which defines how the instances of that object will be drawn in the room when the game is being played and this variable can be used to get and to change that depth value while the game is running.
当你创建一个对象时，你可以为它分配一个初始深度，这将定义当游戏正在进行时，该对象的实例将如何在房间中绘制，这个变量可以用于在游戏运行时获取和更改深度值。
When you create you skeletal animation sprite, you can assign attachment slots and attachments to go in them.
当你创建你的骨骼动画精灵时，你可以分配附件槽和附件。
When you created your sprite (in Spine) you will have defined multiple animations sets for different states and named each of them appropriately.
当你创建你的精灵时(在《Spine》中)，你将为不同的状态定义多个动画集，并适当地命名它们。
When you define a positional or a directional light you must assign it an index number which is then used by this function to switch the light on or off.
当你定义一个位置灯或方向灯时，你必须给它指定一个索引号，然后此函数使用这个索引号来打开或关闭灯光。
When you define a sprite in the sprite editor, you need to set the origin for that sprite.
在精灵编辑器中定义精灵时，需要设置精灵的原点。
When you define an audio group in the Game Options, you give it a unique "name" which is really a constant to use as an ID value for the group.
当你在Game Options中定义一个音频组时，你给它一个唯一的"名称"，这是一个常量，用作组的ID值。
When you define an object in GameMaker you can assign it a mask to be used for collisions rather than the one that corresponds to the defined sprite.
当你在GameMaker中定义一个对象时，你可以为它分配一个用于碰撞的掩码，而不是与所定义的精灵相对应的掩码。

When you destroy a layer in this way, all it's contents will be removed too, so any reference IDs for backgrounds or tile maps, etc... will no longer be valid and any instances assigned to the layer will be destroyed (performing their Destroy Event at the same time, if they have one, as well as the Clean Up Event).
当你以这种方式破坏一个图层时，它的所有内容也会被删除，所以任何背景或贴图的引用id，等等……将不再有效，任何分配给该层的实例将被销毁(同时执行它们的销毁事件，如果它们有一个，以及清理事件)。

When you have "maintain aspect ratio" ticked in the Game Options for a target platform, GameMaker will automatically set the draw position for the application surface so that it is displayed correctly centered and scaled on the given display.
当您在目标平台的游戏选项中勾选了"保持纵横比"时，GameMaker将自动设置应用程序表面的绘制位置，以便它在给定的显示器上正确居中和缩放显示。
When you have a joint with a motor (prismatic or revolute), you may want to be able to switch the motor on or off depending on variables and conditions within the game.
当你的关节与马达(移动或转动)相连时，你可能希望能够根据游戏中的变量和条件来开关马达。
When you pass in an instance ID value, each entry in the array will be a string of the variable name that corresponds to an instance scope variable that has been created in the instance.
当传入实例ID值时，数组中的每个条目都是变量名的字符串，对应于在实例中创建的实例作用域变量。

When you read or write data to a buffer using the buffer_read() or buffer_write() the current "seek" position is advanced by the bytes written or read, and with this function you can get the current "seek" position for use in other buffer functions.
当您使用buffer_read()或buffer_write()向缓冲区读写数据时，当前的"寻址"位置将根据写入或读取的字节数进行调整，通过此函数，您可以获得当前的"寻址"位置以便在其他缓冲区函数中使用。
When you set an animation set for your skeletal animation sprite, it is assigned track 0 internally.
为骨骼动画精灵设置动画集时，会在内部为其指定轨迹0。
When you specify a distance joint the two instances should already be created and have a fixture assigned, then you define the two anchor points in room coordinates.
指定距离接头时，应该已经创建了两个实例并指定了装置，然后在房间坐标中定义两个定位点。

When you start a room with physics, or bind fixtures to instances, the fixtures are always considered to be "awake"... that is to say, they are processing events and interacting with the surrounding instances.
当你用物理开始一个房间，或将夹具绑定到实例时，夹具总是被认为是"醒着的"……也就是说，它们正在处理事件并与周围的实例交互。

When you stop recording, no further Audio Recording Asynchronous Events will be triggered for the given recorder channel, so you would normally use this function in the actual asynchronous event to ensure that you have captured all the data.
当您停止记录时，将不会为给定的录音机通道触发进一步的音频记录异步事件，因此您通常会在实际的异步事件中使用此函数，以确保您已经捕获了所有数据。
When you use this function you need to give one of the following constants which will determine the type of the return value:
当你使用此函数时，你需要给出以下一个常量来决定返回值的类型:

When you use this function, all particles of the given type will disappear from the room and the particle itself is removed form memory, so this function should be used only when you no longer need the particle.
使用此函数时，所有给定类型的粒子将从房间中消失，并且粒子本身将从内存中删除，因此此函数应仅在您不再需要该粒子时使用。

When you use this you are checking a single point in the room for all instances of an object, and the check will be done against the bounding box of the instances or against the mask of the instances if that object has precise collisions checked.
使用此选项时，您将在房间中的一个点上检查一个对象的所有实例，如果该对象选中了精确碰撞，检查将针对实例的边界框或实例的遮罩进行。
When you use this you are checking a single point in the room for an instance or an object.
当您使用此选项时，您正在检查房间中的某个点是否有实例或对象。
When you use this you are effectively asking GameMaker to move the instance to the new position, check for a collision, move back and tell you if a collision was found or not.
当你使用这个的时候，你实际上是在要求GameMaker将实例移动到新的位置，检查是否有碰撞，返回并告诉你是否发现了碰撞。
When you use this you are effectively asking GameMaker to move the instance to the new position, check for a collision, then move back and tell you if a collision was found or not.
当你使用这个的时候，你实际上是在要求GameMaker将实例移动到新的位置，检查是否有碰撞，然后返回并告诉你是否发现了碰撞。
When your game is compiled, it also includes certain internal functions to error check while running.
当你的游戏被编译时，它还包括一些内部函数，在运行时进行错误检查。
Where in the list to delete the value.
列表中要删除值的位置。
Where the GUI is positioned (ie: the (0,0) position) will depend on whether you have used the function display_set_gui_maximise() or not.
GUI的位置(即(0，0)位置)将取决于您是否使用了display_set_gui_maximise()函数。
Where the bar is "anchored" (0 = left, 1 = right, 2 = top, 3 = bottom)
其中栏是"锚定的"(0 =左，1 =右，2 =上，3 =下)
Whether automatic drawing is on (true) or not (false).
自动绘图是否打开 (true) 或关闭 (false)。
Whether automatic updating is on (true) or not (false).
自动更新是否开启(true)或未开启(false)。
Whether each texture in the group should be loaded into GPU memory (defaults to true)
组中的每个纹理是否应该加载到GPU内存中(默认为true)
Whether old particles should be drawn behind newer ones (true) or vice versa (false).
旧粒子是否应该被画在新粒子的后面(true)或相反(false)。
Whether the animation should loop (defaults to true).
动画是否应该循环播放(默认为true)。
Whether the bar's background is drawn (true) or not (false).
是否绘制条形图的背景(true或false)。
Whether the bar's elements have a 1px wide black border (true) or not (false).
条形图的元素是否有1px宽的黑色边框(true或false)。
Whether the button is up (true) or down (false)
按钮是上(true)还是下(false)
Whether the calling instance should follow the absolute path as it is in the editor (true) or a relative path to its current position (false).
调用实例应该遵循编辑器中的绝对路径(true)还是当前位置的相对路径(false)。
Whether the calling instance, if relevant, should be excluded (true) or not (false).
如果相关，是应该排除调用实例(true)还是不排除调用实例(false)。
Whether the check is based on pixel-perfect collisions (true = slow) or its bounding box in general (false = fast).
检查是基于像素完美碰撞(true=慢)还是基于其边界框(false=快)。
Whether the check is based on precise collisions (true, which is slower) or its bounding box in general (false, faster).
检查是基于精确碰撞(true，这比较慢)还是基于它的边界框(false，这比较快)。
Whether the circle is an outline (true) or not (false).
圆是轮廓(true)或不(false)。
Whether the circle is drawn filled (false) or as a one pixel wide outline (true).
画圆是填充的(false)还是一个像素宽的轮廓(true)。
Whether the ellipse is an outline (true) or filled in (false).
椭圆是轮廓(true)还是填充的(false)。
Whether the ellipse is drawn filled (false) or as a one pixel wide outline (true).
椭圆是否绘制为填充(false)或作为一个像素宽的轮廓(true)。
Whether the font is bold (true) or not (false).
字体是粗体(true)还是非粗体(false)。
Whether the font is italic (true) or not (false).
字体是斜体(true)还是非斜体(false)。
Whether the instance is interesecting with the boundary of the given view (0 to 7)
实例是否与给定视图的边界相交(0到7)
Whether the instance is intersecting the boundary
实例是否与边界相交
Whether the instance is outside of the room
实例是否在房间之外
Whether the instance is outside the given view (0 to 7)
实例是否在给定视图之外(0到7)
Whether the layer should be visible (true) or not (false)
该层是否应该可见(true)或不可见(false)
Whether the list should be ordered by distance (true) or not (false).
列表应该按距离排序(true)还是不排序(false)。
Whether the match should be complete of partial.
比赛是否应该是完全的还是部分的。
Whether the motor should be active (true) or not (false)
马达是否应活动(true)或不(false)
Whether the object should be flagged as persistent (true) or not (false).
对象是否应该标记为持久化(true)或非持久化(false)。
Whether the particles should be blended additively (true) or normally (false).
颗粒是否应添加混合(true)或正常混合(false)。
Whether the path is closed (true) or not (false).
路径是闭合的(true)还是不闭合的(false)。
Whether the path is drawn at the absolute position (true) or the relative position (false)
是在绝对位置(true)还是相对位置(false)绘制路径
Whether the rectangle is an outline (true) or filled in (false).
矩形是轮廓(true)还是填充(false)。
Whether the rectangle is drawn filled (false) or as a one pixel wide outline (true).
矩形是填充绘制(false)还是作为一个像素宽的轮廓绘制(true)。
Whether the room shall be persistent (true) or not (false).
房间是否应该持久(true)或不持久(false)。
Whether the rounded rectangle is drawn filled (false) or as a one pixel wide outline (true).
是否绘制圆角矩形填充(false)或作为一个像素宽的轮廓(true)。
Whether the to limit the angle of the joint (true) or not (false)
是否限制关节的角度(true)或不(false)
Whether the tracks in the group should loop (true) or not (false).
组中的轨道是否应该循环(true)或不循环(false)。
Whether the triangle is an outline (true) or filled in (false).
三角形是轮廓(真)还是填充(假)。
Whether the triangle is drawn filled (false) or as a one pixel wide outline (true).
三角形是填充绘制(false)还是作为一个像素宽的轮廓绘制(true)。
Whether the two instances can collide (true) or not (false)
两个实例是否会碰撞 (true) 或不 (false)
Whether the values should be ascending (true) or descending (false) order.
这些值应该是升序(true)还是降序(false)。
Whether this should repeat indefinitely
这种情况是否应该无限重复
Whether to abort (true) or not (false).
是否中止(true)或不中止(false)。
Whether to activate instances on the inside of the region (true) or the outside (false).
是激活区域内部的实例(true)还是激活区域外部的实例(false)。
Whether to bypass all effects and gain scaling of the bus.
是否绕过总线的所有效果和增益缩放。
Whether to bypass the effect.
是否绕过该效果。
Whether to check all instances (true) or just solid ones (false).
是检查所有实例(true)还是只检查实体实例(false)。
Whether to check for collisions with all instances (true) or just solid ones (false).
是检查与所有实例的碰撞(true)还是只检查实体实例的碰撞(false)。
Whether to choose a random sub-image (true) or not (false).
是否选择随机子图像(true)或否(false)。
Whether to close the chain (true) or not (false).
是否关闭链(true)或不(false)
Whether to create collision masks for each sub-image of the sprite (true), or one mask for all (false).
是为精灵的每个子图像创建碰撞掩码(true)，还是为所有子图像创建一个掩码(false)。
Whether to deactivate instances on the inside of the region (true) or the outside (false).
是停用区域内部的实例(true)还是外部的实例(false)。
Whether to destroy all of the children of the time source too
是否也要销毁时间源的所有子级
Whether to enable (set to true or disable (set to false) Z depth forcing
是否启用(设置为true或禁用(设置为false) Z深度强制
Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) AA for added fonts.
此函数可以用来检查使用font_add()添加的字体是否启用了抗锯齿(AA)。
Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) SDF rendering for the specified font.
为指定字体启用 (true) 还是禁用 (false) SDF呈现。
Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) views in the given room.
在给定房间中启用(true)还是禁用(false)视图。
Whether to enable advanced bouncing (true) or not (false).
是否启用高级弹跳(true)或不启用(false)。
Whether to exclude the calling instance from deactivation (true) or not (false).
是否从停用中排除调用实例(true)或不(false)。
Whether to filter the results to those that are on your friends list or to all players (see the Description below)
是将结果过滤到你的好友列表中还是所有玩家(见下面的描述)
Whether to follow the sprite's animation normally (true) or not (false).
是否正常跟随精灵的动画(true)或否(false)。
Whether to keep the calling instance activated (true) or not (false).
是否保持调用实例激活(true)或不激活(false)。
Whether to limit the movement of the joint (true) or not (false)
是否限制关节的运动(true)或不(false)
Whether to perform that new object's Create event (true) or not (false).
是执行新对象的创建事件(true)还是不执行(false)。
Whether to perform that new object's create and destroy events (true) or not (false).
是否执行新对象的创建和销毁事件(true)或不执行(false)。
Whether to perform the new instance's Create event (true) or not (false).
是否执行新实例的Create事件(true)或不执行(false)。
Whether to set its angle relative to the direction of the particle's motion (true) or not (false).
是相对于粒子运动方向设定其角度(true)还是不设定角度(false)。
Whether to set the screen to fullscreen (true) or not (false).
是否将屏幕设置为全屏(true)或不设置(false)。
Whether to sort lowest to highest (true), or highest to lowest (false).
是从最低到最高排序(true)，还是从最高到最低排序(false)。
Whether to stretch the sprite's animation to match the particle lifespan (true) or not (false).
是否扩展精灵的动画以匹配粒子的寿命(true)或否(false)。
Whether to wrap horizontally (true) or not (false).
水平环绕(true)或不(false)。
Whether to wrap vertically (true) or not (false).
垂直环绕(true)或不(false)。
Whether white space around each letter should be removed (if false, the created font will be monospaced, otherwise it'll be like most regular fonts).
是否应该删除每个字母周围的空白(如果为false，创建的字体将是等间距的，否则它将像大多数常规字体一样)。
Whether you wish to turn the motor on (true) or off (false)
您是希望打开马达(true) 或不 (false)
Which gamepad "slot" index to check
要检查哪个手柄"槽位"索引
Which gamepad "slot" to check.
检查哪个游戏手柄"插槽"。
Which gamepad "slot" to get the name of.
游戏手柄"插槽"的名称。
Which gamepad button constant to check for.
检查哪个手柄按钮常量。
Which gamepad device "slot" to check.
检查哪个游戏手柄设备"插槽"。
Which gamepad device "slot" to set.
要设置哪个游戏手柄设备"插槽"。
Which gamepad hat (or hats) to check for.
要检查哪个(哪些)游戏手柄帽。
Which gamepad index "slot" to get the mapping from.
从哪个手柄索引"槽位"获取映射。
Which gamepad index "slot" to remove the mapping from.
从哪个游戏手柄索引"槽"中移除映射。
Which gamepad index "slot" to set.
要设置哪个手柄索引"槽位"。
Which keyboard key event should be triggered by touching this area
触摸该区域应触发哪个键盘按键事件
Which mouse button constant to check for.
要检查哪个鼠标按钮常量。

While you can draw these sprites using the normal draw functions (like draw_self()), there are times when you may want to draw a single frame or show a change of skin texture without actually changing the sprite properties for an instance.
虽然你可以使用普通的绘制函数(如draw_self())绘制这些精灵，但有时你可能想要绘制单个帧或显示皮肤纹理的变化，而不实际更改实例的精灵属性。

While you can draw these sprites using the normal draw functions (like draw_self()), there are times when you may want to draw a single frame or show a change of skin texture without actually changing the sprite properties.
虽然你可以使用普通的绘制函数(如draw_self())绘制这些精灵，但有时你可能想在不实际改变精灵属性的情况下绘制单个帧或显示皮肤纹理的变化。

While you can set any view camera using the specific camera_set_* functions, the new settings will not be used for rendering until the next game frame, but with this function you can make those changes immediately.
虽然您可以使用特定的camera_set_*函数设置任何视图相机，但新设置将不会用于渲染，直到下一个游戏帧，但使用此函数，您可以立即进行这些更改。
Windows 10 Universal Windows Platform
Windows 10 通用Windows平台
Windows App
Windows应用程序
Windows OS
Windows系统

With a distance joint, you can get "joint stretching" where the two fixtures will separate and behave strangely should too much stress be put on the joint, however the rope joint does not do this and will not stretch any further than the maximum defined length.
使用距离连接，你可以得到"连接拉伸"，如果在连接上施加过多的应力，两个夹具将分离，并表现出奇怪的行为，然而绳子连接不会这样做，不会拉伸任何超过最大定义的长度。
With mouse input, the mouse button will have to be released and pressed again for any further input to be detected, but with the keyboard it's not quite that simple.
对于鼠标输入，要检测到任何进一步的输入，必须释放并再次按下鼠标按钮，但对于键盘，这并不那么简单。
With skeletal animation sprites, you can assign separate textures (called "skins") to the animation, thereby using one animation for multiple different things.
使用骨骼动画精灵，可以将单独的纹理(称为"皮肤")指定给动画，从而将一个动画用于多个不同的事情。
With the buffer_read() function, you can read data from the given buffer at the current "seek" position, with each piece of data being read advancing this position by the bytes being read or written.
使用buffer_read()函数，您可以在当前的"seek"位置从给定的缓冲区中读取数据，每读取一段数据，就会将该位置向前推进所读取或写入的字节。
With the buffer_write() function, you can write data to the given buffer at the current "seek" position, with each piece of data advancing this position by the bytes being written or read.
使用buffer_write()函数，您可以将数据写入给定的缓冲区的当前"查找"位置，每一段数据都将此位置向前推进被写入或读取的字节。
With this built in array you can get or set the x position of the given view port.
有了这个内置的数组，你可以获取或设置给定视口的x位置。
With this built in array you can get or set the y position of the given view port.
有了这个内置的数组，你就可以获取或设置给定视口的y位置。
With this code you can append one path onto another one, effectively joining them together, and for this to work, both paths must previously exist.
使用这段代码，您可以将一条路径附加到另一条路径上，有效地将它们连接在一起，要实现这一点，两条路径必须预先存在。
With this function we can mark individual cells within the given MP grid as being "forbidden" meaning that the path finding functions will not ever cross them.
通过此函数，我们可以将给定MP网格内的单个单元标记为"禁止的",这意味着路径查找功能将永远不会跨越它们。
With this function you begin the definition of a custom primitive.
通过此函数，您可以开始定义一个自定义图元。
With this function you can "clone" an instance as this will create a new version of the instance running the code at its same position.
使用此函数，您可以"克隆"一个实例，因为这将创建一个在其相同位置运行代码的实例的新版本。
With this function you can "lock" your device to the current orientation until such time as you "free" it to allow all Game Options enabled orientations again for that target platform.
通过此函数，您可以将您的设备"锁定"到当前方向，直到您"释放"它以允许该目标平台的所有游戏选项再次启用方向。
With this function you can "reset" a particle, returning all the values for each of the functions relating to the particle (life, colour, alpha, orientation etc...) to their default values.
使用此函数，你可以"重置"一个粒子，返回与粒子相关的每个函数的所有值(寿命、颜色、alpha、方向等)到它们的默认值。
With this function you can activate a layer that has been deactivated previously.
通过此函数，你可以激活一个之前被停用的层。
With this function you can activate a single instance or all instances of a specific object from all those that have been deactivated previously.
通过此函数，您可以从以前已停用的所有实例中激活特定对象的单个实例或所有实例。
With this function you can add a name and a score to the internal global high score list.
通过此函数，您可以向内部全局高分列表添加姓名和分数。
With this function you can add a new (empty) time line into your game.
通过此函数，你可以添加一个新的(空)时间线到你的游戏。
With this function you can add a point to the specified path and set its speed factor.
通过此函数，您可以向指定路径添加一个点，并设置其速度乘数。
With this function you can add a value (either a real number or a string) to a priority queue, at the same time assigning it a priority value.
使用此函数，您可以向优先队列添加一个值(实数或字符串)，同时为其分配一个优先值。

With this function you can add an image as a sprite, loading it from an external source where the image file to be loaded should always be in either *.png, *.gif, *.jpg/jpeg or *.json format (*json files are used for loading skeleton animation sprites made with Spine).
通过此函数，您可以将图像添加为精灵，从外部源加载图像，加载的图像文件应该总是*.png, *.gif, *.jpg/jpeg or *.json格式(*json文件用于加载用Spine制作的骨骼动画精灵)。
With this function you can add an instance into any room other than the current one and at any position within that room.
通过此函数，您可以将实例添加到除当前房间之外的任何房间以及该房间内的任何位置。
With this function you can add one or more tag strings to any asset from the asset browser.
使用此函数，您可以从资源浏览器向任何资源添加一个或多个标记字符串。
With this function you can assign a (previously created) DS list to a key within the given DS map.
使用此函数，您可以将(先前创建的)DS list分配给给定DS map中的键。
With this function you can assign a (previously created) DS map to a key within the given DS map .
通过此函数，您可以将(之前创建的)DS map分配给给定DS map中的键。
With this function you can assign a camera to a specific viewport in a room other than the current one.
通过此函数，您可以将相机指定给房间中的特定视口，而不是当前视口。
With this function you can assign a script function to a layer and it will be called after the layer is rendered.
通过此函数，你可以给一个图层分配一个脚本函数，它会在图层渲染后被调用。
With this function you can assign a script function to a layer and it will be called before the layer is rendered.
使用此函数，你可以给一个层分配一个脚本函数，它将在层被渲染之前被调用。
With this function you can assign a shader resource to any given layer and the layer will then be rendered using that shader.
通过此函数，你可以给任何给定的层分配一个着色器资源，然后该层将使用该着色器渲染。
With this function you can assign a sound to a previously create sync group.
通过此函数，您可以将声音分配到之前创建的同步组。
With this function you can assign a sprite resource to a layer to be used as a background in your project.
通过此函数，您可以将精灵资源分配给一个层，用作项目中的背景。
With this function you can assign a sprite resource to a layer to be used in your project.
通过此函数，你可以将精灵资源分配到你的项目中使用的层。
With this function you can assign a tile-set resource to a layer to be used as a tile map in your project.
通过此函数，您可以将切片集资源分配给要在项目中用作tile map的图层。
With this function you can bind any function that has previously been defined to a given instance or struct, creating a method variable that can be used later.
使用此函数，您可以将以前定义的任何函数绑定到给定的实例或结构，创建一个可以在以后使用的方法变量。
With this function you can broadcast the data from a buffer locally to a range of IP addresses (for more information on buffers see Reference - Buffers).
通过此函数，您可以从缓冲区本地广播数据到一系列IP地址(有关缓冲区的更多信息，请参阅参考-缓冲区)。
With this function you can center the game window in the display when the target module is Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or macOS, or you can center it in the browser if the target module is HTML5.
通过此函数，当目标模块是Windows、Ubuntu (Linux)或macOS时，您可以将游戏窗口置于显示屏的中央，或者如果目标模块是HTML5，您可以将其置于浏览器的中央。
With this function you can change (or set) the height of any room in your game except the current one.
通过此函数，您可以更改(或设置)游戏中除当前房间之外的任何房间的高度。
With this function you can change (or set) the persistence of any room in your game except the current one.
通过此函数，您可以更改(或设置)游戏中除当前房间之外的任何房间的持久性。
With this function you can change (or set) the width of any room in your game except the current one.
通过此函数，您可以更改(或设置)游戏中除当前房间之外的任何房间的宽度。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game display which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
通过此函数，您可以更改或设置鼠标在游戏显示中的位置，这对于FPS游戏非常有用。
With this function you can change or set the position of the mouse within the game window which can be useful for FPS games, for example.
通过此函数，你可以在游戏窗口中改变或设置鼠标的位置，这对于FPS游戏来说非常有用。
With this function you can change or set the windows caption for the room that you are currently in.
通过此函数，您可以更改或设置您当前所在房间的窗口标题。
With this function you can change the "smoothness" of a path.
通过此函数，您可以更改路径的"平滑度"。
With this function you can change the group flags for a group of particles.
通过此函数，您可以更改一组粒子的组标志。
With this function you can change the orientation of the given listener within the 3D audio space.
通过此函数，您可以在3D音频空间中改变给定侦听器的方向。
With this function you can change the orientation of the listener within the 3D audio space.
通过此函数，您可以在3D音频空间内改变侦听器的方向。
With this function you can change the particle flags for a category of particles.
使用此函数，您可以更改粒子类别的粒子标志。
With this function you can change the particle flags for an individual particle.
使用此函数，您可以更改单个粒子的粒子标志。
With this function you can change the playback speed of the given sequence.
通过此函数，您可以改变给定序列的播放速度。
With this function you can change the position and/or the speed factor of any point previously defined for a path (the path can have been created in the path editor or through code using path_add()).
通过此函数，您可以更改之前为路径定义的任何点的位置和/或速度系数(路径可以在路径编辑器中创建，也可以通过使用path_add()的代码创建)。
With this function you can change the position of a given listener within the 3D audio space.
通过此函数，你可以在3D音频空间中改变给定的位置。
With this function you can change the position of an audio emitter within the 3D audio space.
通过此函数，您可以更改音频发射器在3D音频空间中的位置。
With this function you can change the position of the listener within the 3D audio space.
通过此函数，你可以在3D音频空间中改变的位置。
With this function you can change the size of the game window.
通过此函数，你可以改变游戏窗口的大小。
With this function you can change the sprite and position of a clickable icon previously created with clickable_add().
通过此函数，你可以改变之前用clickable_add()创建的可点击图标的精灵和位置。
With this function you can change the value for the given key within the a DS map .
通过此函数，您可以更改DS map中给定键的值。
With this function you can change whether mipmapping is switched off, switched on for everything, or switched on only for texture groups selected in the Texture Group Manager.
通过此函数，你可以改变mpmapping是关闭的，还是对所有事物都打开，或者只对纹理组管理器中选择的纹理组打开。
With this function you can check a datetime value to see if it is valid (returns true) or not (returns false).
使用此函数，您可以检查一个日期时间值，看它是有效的(返回true)还是无效的(返回false)。
With this function you can check a position for a collision with all instances of an object using the collision mask of the instance that runs the code for the check.
通过此函数，您可以使用运行检查代码的实例的碰撞遮罩来检查与对象的所有实例的碰撞位置。
With this function you can check a position for a collision with all instances of another object.
通过此函数，您可以检查与另一个对象的所有实例发生碰撞的位置。
With this function you can check a position for a collision with another instance or all instances of an object using the collision mask of the instance that runs the code for the check.
通过此函数，您可以使用运行检查代码的实例的碰撞遮罩，检查与另一个实例或对象的所有实例的碰撞位置。
With this function you can check a position for a collision with another instance or all instances of an object.
通过此函数，您可以检查与另一个实例或对象的所有实例发生碰撞的位置。
With this function you can check and see if the origin of an instance (its x and y position) is aligned to a grid with the hsnap and vsnap values specified by you.
使用此函数，您可以检查并查看实例的原点(其x和y位置)是否与具有您指定的hsnap和vsnap值的网格对齐。

With this function you can check and see if your device currently has an internet connection and it will return true if it does, or false if it does not, and depending on the OS, it may attempt to make a connection before returning a value.
通过此函数，您可以检查并查看您的设备当前是否有互联网连接，如果有，它将返回true，如果没有，则返回false，并且根据操作系统，它可能会在返回值之前尝试建立连接。
With this function you can check and see whether a time line exists (returns true) or not (returns false).
通过此函数，您可以检查并查看时间线是否存在(返回true)或不存在(返回false)。
With this function you can check and see whether the room you specify exists or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查你指定的房间是否存在。
With this function you can check any font asset to see if it has the bold flag or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查任何字体资源，看看它是否有粗体标志。
With this function you can check any font asset to see if it has the italic flag or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查任何字体资源，看看它是否有斜体标志。

With this function you can check any given cell of the mp_grid to see if it has been flagged as occupied or not, giving the index of the (previously created) mp_grid and the x an y coordinates of the cell to check.
使用此函数，您可以检查mp_grid的任何给定单元格，查看它是否被标记为已占用，给出(先前创建的)mp_grid的索引和要检查的单元格的x和y坐标。
With this function you can check if all of the elements return true to the given predicate.
使用此函数，您可以检查是否所有元素都对给定的条件下返回true。
With this function you can check if any of the elements returns true to the given predicate.
使用此函数，您可以检查是否有任何元素对给定条件下返回 true。
With this function you can check the given DS list to see if it is empty (returns true) or not (returns false).
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的DS列表，看看它是空的(返回true)还是空的(返回false)。
With this function you can check the given DS priority queue to see if it is empty (returns true) or not (returns false).
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的DS优先队列，看看它是空的(返回true)还是空的(返回false)。
With this function you can check the given DS queue to see if it is empty (returns true) or not (returns false).
使用此函数，您可以检查给定的DS队列，看它是空的(返回true)还是不空的(返回false)。
With this function you can check the given DS stack to see if it is empty (returns true) or not (returns false).
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的DS堆栈，看看它是空的(返回true)还是空的(返回false)。
With this function you can check the given list for a value and the position within the list for that value will be returned.
使用此函数，你可以检查给定列表中的一个值，并返回该值在列表中的位置。
With this function you can check the given list position and the value held within the list for that position will be returned.
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的列表位置，并返回该位置在列表中的值。
With this function you can check the weak reference to a struct to see if it is still "alive" or not.
使用此函数，您可以检查对结构的弱引用，看看它是否仍然是"活动的"。
With this function you can check the weak reference to various structs to see if it they are still "alive" or not.
使用此函数，你可以检查对各种结构的弱引用，看看它们是否仍然"存活"。
With this function you can check the weak reference to a struct to see if it is still "alive" or not.
使用此函数，您可以检查对结构的弱引用，看看它是否仍然是"活动的"。
With this function you can check the weak reference to various structs to see if it they are still "alive" or not.
使用此函数，你可以检查对各种结构的弱引用，看看它们是否仍然"活的"。
With this function you can check to see if a DS list is stored in the given map key.
通过此函数，您可以查看DS列表是否存储在给定的map键中。
With this function you can check to see if a DS map is stored at the given position within a DS list.
通过此函数，您可以检查DS map是否存储在DS列表中的给定位置。
With this function you can check to see if a DS map is stored in the given map key.
通过此函数，您可以查看DS map是否存储在给定的map键中。
With this function you can check to see if a data structure of the given type exists.
使用此函数，您可以检查给定类型的数据结构是否存在。
With this function you can check to see if a key has been pressed or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查一个键是否被按下。
With this function you can check to see if a key has been released or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查一个密钥是否已经被释放。
With this function you can check to see if a key is held down or not.
通过此函数，您可以查看某个键是否被按下。
With this function you can check to see if a particle system currently has any particles created in the room, and it will return the number of them too.
使用此函数，你可以查看一个粒子系统当前是否有任何粒子在房间中被创建，并且它也将返回它们的数量。
With this function you can check to see if a sequence element exists on the given layer.
通过此函数，你可以检查给定层上是否存在序列元素。
With this function you can check to see if a sequence object exists or not.
使用此函数，您可以检查序列对象是否存在。
With this function you can check to see if a specific permission has been granted to the game by the user.
通过此函数，你可以查看用户是否授予了游戏特定的权限。
With this function you can check to see if a specific value (real or string) is present within a circular area of a given DS grid.
使用此函数，你可以检查一个特定的值(实数或字符串)是否出现在一个给定的DS网格的圆形区域内。
With this function you can check to see if a specific value (real or string) is present within a rectangular area of a given DS grid.
使用此函数，您可以检查特定的值(实数或字符串)是否出现在给定DS网格的矩形区域内。
With this function you can check to see if another DS list is stored at the given position within a DS list.
通过此函数，您可以查看在DS列表中的给定位置是否存储了另一个DS列表。
With this function you can check to see if one or more tag strings is assigned to any asset from the asset browser.
使用此函数，您可以检查是否有一个或多个标记字符串被分配给资源浏览器中的任何资源。
With this function you can check to see if the garbage collector is enabled or not.
通过此函数，您可以检查垃圾收集器是否被启用。
With this function you can check to see if the given particle emitter indexed exists in the given system or not.
通过此函数，您可以查看给定粒子发射器索引是否存在于给定系统中。
With this function you can check to see if the given particle system indexed exists in the game or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的粒子系统索引是否存在于游戏中。
With this function you can check to see if the given particle type indexed exists in the game or not.
通过此函数，你可以检查给定的粒子类型是否存在于游戏中。
With this function you can check to see if two arrays are equal (equivalent or the same).
使用此函数，你可以检查两个数组是否相等(等价或相同)。
With this function you can check to see whether alpha testing is enabled (returns true) or not (returns false).
使用此函数，您可以检查alpha测试是否启用(返回true)或不启用(返回false)。
With this function you can check to see whether texture filtering (linear interpolation) is enabled (returns true) or not (returns false).
通过此函数，您可以查看纹理过滤(线性插值)是否已启用(返回true)或未启用(返回false)。
