通过此函数，您可以了解是关闭mipmapping贴图，打开所有贴图，还是只打开在纹理组管理器中选择的纹理组。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of days, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以给定的日期时间值增加特定的天数，它将返回新的日期时间值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of hours, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以给定的日期时间值增加特定的小时数，它将返回新的日期时间值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of minutes, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以给定的日期时间值增加特定的分钟数，它将返回新的日期时间值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of months, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以给定的日期时间值增加特定的月数，它将返回新的日期时间值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of seconds, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以将给定的datetime值增加特定的秒数，它将返回新的datetime值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of weeks, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以将给定的datetime值增加特定的周数，它将返回新的datetime值。
With this function you can increment a given datetime value by a specific number of years, and it will return the new datetime value.
使用此函数，您可以将给定的datetime值增加特定的年数，它将返回新的datetime值。
With this function you can indicate to the garbage collector that it shoulde aim to spend no more than the time specified running each frame.
通过此函数，您可以向垃圾收集器指示，它的目标是不超过运行每帧所指定的时间。
With this function you can insert a new point into a path (the path can have been created in the path editor or through code using path_add()).
通过此函数，您可以在路径中插入一个新点(路径可以在路径编辑器中创建，也可以通过使用path_add()的代码创建)。
With this function you can insert a value (or values) into an array at any given position.
使用此函数，您可以在数组的任何给定位置插入一个(或多个)值。
With this function you can join two or more arrays into a single one, removing the duplicates
通过此函数，您可以将两个或多个数组合并为一个，删除重复项
With this function you can join two particle groups together, and the joined groups will then behave as if they were both part of a single entity.
通过此函数，您可以将两个粒子组连接在一起，然后连接的粒子组将表现得好像它们都是单个实体的一部分。
With this function you can load a file that you have created previously using the buffer_save() function (or any of the other functions for saving buffers) into a buffer.
使用此函数，您可以将之前使用buffer_save()函数(或任何其他用于保存缓冲区的函数)创建的文件加载到缓冲区中。
With this function you can load a game state that has been saved previously.
通过此函数，您可以加载之前保存的游戏状态。
With this function you can load a game that has been previously saved using game_save().
通过此函数，你可以加载之前使用game_save()保存的游戏。
With this function you can load all the pages for the specified texture group.
通过此函数，你可以加载指定纹理组的所有页面。
With this function you can maintain an input value between a specified range.
通过此函数，您可以将输入值保持在指定的范围内。
With this function you can make your game go to the next one as listed in the Room Manager at the time the game was compiled.
通过此函数，你可以让你的游戏进入游戏编译时房间管理器中列出的下一个。
With this function you can make your game go to the previous one as listed in the Room Manager at the time the game was compiled.
通过此函数，你可以让你的游戏回到之前的房间管理器中列出的游戏编译时间。
With this function you can make your particles be drawn with an additive blend mode (true) or not (false).
通过此函数，你可以用添加混合模式(true)或不(false)绘制粒子。
With this function you can multiply two matrix arrays together to create a new transform matrix.
使用此函数，您可以将两个矩阵数组相乘以创建一个新的变换矩阵。
With this function you can mutate an existing array by mapping the element values using the given predicate.
使用此函数，您可以通过使用给定的条件映射元素值来改变现有的数组。
With this function you can mutate an existing array reversing the elements order.
使用此函数，您可以改变现有数组的元素顺序。
With this function you can mutate an existing array to filter the elements that return true to the given predicate.
使用此函数，您可以更改现有数组，以筛选返回给定条件下为true的元素。
With this function you can mutate an existing array with only unique value.
使用此函数，您可以更改仅具有唯一值的现有数组。
With this function you can open a video from the specified path or url
通过此函数，您可以从指定的路径或url打开视频
With this function you can override (replace) all instances of an object used in a sequence with another one.
使用此函数，您可以用另一个对象覆盖(替换)序列中使用的对象的所有实例。
With this function you can pause all sounds that are currently playing.
通过此函数，你可以暂停所有正在播放的声音。
With this function you can pause any sound that is currently playing.
通过此函数，你可以暂停任何正在播放的声音。
With this function you can pause the playback of the given sequence.
使用此函数，您可以暂停给定序列的回放。
With this function you can play any sound resource at a given position within the audio space.
通过此函数，你可以在音频空间的给定位置播放任何声音资源。
With this function you can play any sound resource in your game.
通过此函数，你可以在游戏中播放任何声音资源。
With this function you can play any sound resource through an emitter, with any changes to the emitter gain, position, pitch or velocity affecting how the user hears the final sound being played.
通过此函数，您可以通过发射器播放任何声音资源，对发射器增益、位置、音高或速度的任何更改都会影响用户听到播放的最终声音。
With this function you can poll the window (or tab) state and if it loses focus the function will return false otherwise it will return true.
使用此函数，您可以轮询窗口(或选项卡)状态，如果失去焦点，函数将返回false，否则将返回true。
With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with all the names of the animations included as part of the skeletal animation sprite.
通过此函数，你可以填充一个(预先创建的)DS列表，其中包含作为骨骼动画精灵一部分的所有动画名称。
With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with all the names of the bones used as part of the skeletal animation sprite.
通过此函数，您可以使用作为骨骼动画精灵一部分的所有骨骼名称填充(预先创建的)DS列表。
With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with all the names of the slots created as part of the skeletal animation sprite.
使用此函数，您可以使用作为骨骼动画精灵的一部分创建的所有插槽的名称填充(预先创建的)DS列表。

With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with data for each of the available attachment slots for the Spine sprite associated with the current instance (including any attachment modifications).
使用此函数，您可以使用与当前实例相关联的Spine sprite的每个可用附件插槽的数据填充(预先创建的)DS列表(包括任何附件修改)。
With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with data for each of the available attachment slots that an animation contains.
通过此函数，您可以为动画包含的每个可用附件插槽填充一个(预先创建的)DS列表。
With this function you can populate a (pre-created) DS list with all the names of the skins included as part of the skeletal animation sprite.
使用此函数，您可以使用骨骼动画精灵中包含的所有皮肤名称来填充(预先创建的)DS列表。
With this function you can push a value (or values) onto the end of an array without having to know the length of the array.
使用此函数，您可以将一个(或多个)值压入数组的末尾，而不必知道数组的长度。
With this function you can push the current GPU state onto a stack to be used later.
通过此函数，你可以把当前的GPU状态推到堆栈上，以便以后使用。
With this function you can read a real number value from a text file and the function returns that value to be used or stored in a variable.
使用此函数，您可以从文本文件读取实数值，然后函数返回该值以使用或存储在变量中。
With this function you can read a string from a text file and the function returns that value to be used or stored in a variable.
使用此函数，您可以从文本文件中读取字符串，然后函数返回该值以使用或存储在变量中。
With this function you can recreate a saved DS list (one that has previously been written as a string using ds_list_write()).
使用此函数，您可以重新创建一个保存的DS列表(之前已经使用ds_list_write()作为字符串写入的列表)。
With this function you can recreate a saved DS priority (one that has previously been written as a string using ds_priority_write()).
通过此函数，你可以重新创建一个保存的DS优先级(这个优先级以前已经使用ds_priority_write()作为字符串写入)。
With this function you can recreate a saved DS queue (one that has previously been written as a string using ds_queue_write()).
使用此函数，您可以重新创建一个已保存的DS队列(之前已经使用ds_queue_write()作为字符串写入的队列)。
With this function you can recreate a saved DS stack (one that has previously been written as a string using ds_stack_write()).
使用此函数，您可以重新创建一个已保存的DS堆栈(之前已经使用ds_stack_write()作为字符串写入的堆栈)。
With this function you can remove a network socket connection from your game.
通过此函数，你可以从游戏中删除网络套接字连接。
With this function you can remove a point from the specified path.
通过此函数，您可以从指定路径中删除一个点。
With this function you can remove a variable from a struct.
使用此函数，您可以从结构中删除变量。
With this function you can remove all characters that are not classed as letters.
通过此函数，您可以删除所有不属于字母的字符。
With this function you can remove all point definitions from a path, effectively making an "empty" path.
通过此函数，您可以从路径中删除所有点定义，有效地创建一个"空"路径。
With this function you can remove all textures from video memory, and they will then be reloaded on first use.
通过此函数，你可以从视频内存中删除所有的纹理，然后他们将在第一次使用时重新加载。
With this function you can remove any given key (and its corresponding value) from the given, previously created, DS map .
使用此函数，您可以从先前创建的DS map中删除任何给定的键(及其对应的值)。
With this function you can remove one or more tag strings to any asset from the asset browser.
使用此函数，您可以从资源浏览器中删除任何资源的一个或多个标记字符串。
With this function you can remove the any number of texture pages for the given sprites from texture memory.
使用此函数，你可以从纹理内存中删除给定精灵的任意数量的纹理页面。
With this function you can remove the given emitter from memory.
使用此函数，您可以从内存中删除给定的发射器。
With this function you can remove the given texture page for the given sprite from texture memory.
使用此函数，你可以从纹理存储器中删除给定精灵的纹理页面。
With this function you can remove the selected key (and its corresponding value) from an ini file.
通过此函数，您可以从ini文件中删除选定的键(及其相应的值)。
With this function you can remove the specified particle type from the game.
通过此函数，您可以从游戏中移除指定的粒子类型。
With this function you can remove the value stored at a specific position within the list.
通过此函数，您可以删除存储在列表中特定位置的值。
With this function you can replace a DS Map that has been stored in the given "key" with another map that has been created previously.
通过此函数，你可以用之前创建的另一个映射替换存储在给定"键"中的DS Map。
With this function you can replace a DS list that has been stored in the given "key" with another list that has been created previously.
使用此函数，您可以用之前创建的另一个列表替换存储在给定"键"中的DS列表。
With this function you can resize a given buffer to be the size (in bytes) that you specify.
使用此函数，你可以把一个给定的缓冲区调整到你指定的大小(以字节为单位)。
With this function you can resize an existing array dimension to a new size.
通过此函数，您可以将现有的数组维度调整为新的大小。
With this function you can resize the given DS grid to have a different width and/or height.
通过此函数，您可以调整给定DS网格的大小，使其具有不同的宽度和/或高度。
With this function you can restart the game.
用此函数你可以重启游戏。
With this function you can resume all sounds that have been paused previously.
通过此函数，您可以恢复之前暂停的所有声音。
With this function you can resume any sound that is currently paused (after using the function audio_pause_sound()).
通过此函数，您可以恢复当前暂停的任何声音(使用audio_pause_sound()函数后)。
With this function you can retrieve a value from the end of an array without having to know the length of the array.
使用此函数，您可以从数组的末尾检索值，而不需要知道数组的长度。
With this function you can retrieve all of the keys that a DS map contains.
使用此函数，您可以检索DS map包含的所有键。
With this function you can retrieve all of the values that a DS map contains for each key in the map.
通过此函数，您可以检索DS map为映射中的每个键所包含的所有值。
With this function you can retrieve all the tags assigned to an asset from the Asset Browser.
通过此函数，您可以从资源浏览器中检索分配给资源的所有标记。
With this function you can retrieve an array of all the object indices that have instances being created within the given sequence.
使用此函数，您可以检索所有对象索引的数组，这些对象索引在给定序列中创建了实例。
With this function you can retrieve an array populated with the instance variable names for an instance, or the global variables for a game.
通过此函数，你可以检索一个由实例变量名填充的数组，或者一个游戏的全局变量。
With this function you can retrieve an array populated with the variable names from a struct.
使用此函数，您可以从结构中检索用变量名填充的数组。
With this function you can retrieve information about the current state of the garbage collector.
通过此函数，您可以检索关于垃圾收集器当前状态的信息。
With this function you can retrieve that seed, which can then be stored to reproduce a specific series of random events.
通过此函数，您可以检索该种子，然后将其存储起来以再现特定的随机事件系列。
With this function you can retrieve the GUID for the gamepad connected to the given slot index.
通过此函数，您可以检索连接到给定插槽索引的手柄的GUID。
With this function you can retrieve the Script index for the script where the method was defined.
通过此函数，您可以检索定义方法的脚本的Script索引。
With this function you can retrieve the angular velocity of a group of particles.
用此函数你可以得到一组粒子的角速度。
With this function you can retrieve the current target frame value for the garbage collector.
通过此函数，您可以为垃圾收集器检索当前目标帧值。
With this function you can retrieve the details of a view port in a room other than the current one.
通过此函数，您可以检索当前房间以外的其他房间中的视图端口的详细信息。
With this function you can retrieve the font index of each of the fonts assigned to texture pages within the given texture group.
通过此函数，你可以在给定的纹理组中检索分配给纹理页面的每个字体的字体索引。
With this function you can retrieve the group flags for a group of particles.
使用此函数，您可以检索一组粒子的组标志。
With this function you can retrieve the horizontal velocity of a group of particles.
用此函数你可以得到一组粒子的水平速度。
With this function you can retrieve the index of the room after the room input into the function.
通过此函数，您可以在将房间输入到此函数后检索房间的索引。
With this function you can retrieve the index of the room before the room input into the function.
通过此函数，您可以在将房间输入到此函数之前检索房间的索引。
With this function you can retrieve the inertia of an entire group of particles.
通过此函数，您可以检索整个粒子组的惯性。
With this function you can retrieve the instance ID or struct reference which is the self context used when the method is called.
使用此函数，您可以检索实例ID或结构引用，这是调用方法时使用的self上下文。
With this function you can retrieve the load status of the specified texture group.
通过此函数，你可以检索指定纹理组的加载状态。
With this function you can retrieve the mipmap bias value for a given shader sampler.
使用此函数，您可以检索给定着色器采样器的mipmap偏移值。
With this function you can retrieve the mipmap bias value, where a value of 0 equals no bias, 1 equals the first mipmap, 2 equals the second mipmap etc...
通过此函数，您可以检索多纹理贴图偏移值，其中值0等于无偏移，1等于第一个多纹理贴图，2等于第二个多纹理贴图，依此类推...
With this function you can retrieve the name of a shader resource.
使用此函数，你可以检索着色器资源的名称。
With this function you can retrieve the name string that has been stored in the high score list at the given position.
通过此函数，您可以检索存储在高分列表中给定位置的名称字符串。
With this function you can retrieve the names of all assets that have been assigned the given tag or tags.
通过此函数，您可以检索已分配给给定标签的所有资源的名称。
With this function you can retrieve the priority of any given value.
使用此函数，您可以检索任何给定值的优先级。
With this function you can retrieve the rotation (angle) in the room of a group of particles.
通过此函数，您可以检索一组粒子在房间中的旋转(角度)。
With this function you can retrieve the sequence object struct from a sequence asset index.
使用此函数，您可以从序列资源索引中检索序列对象结构。
With this function you can retrieve the sprite index of each of the sprites assigned to texture pages within the given texture group.
通过此函数，你可以在给定的纹理组中检索分配给纹理页面的每个精灵的精灵索引。
With this function you can retrieve the tileset index of each of the tilesets assigned to texture pages within the given texture group.
通过此函数，你可以在给定的纹理组中检索分配给纹理页面的每个tileset的索引。
With this function you can retrieve the value from an index in an array.
使用此函数，您可以从数组的索引中检索值。
With this function you can retrieve the vertical velocity of a group of particles.
用此函数你可以得到一组粒子的垂直速度。
With this function you can retrieve the x component of the center of mass of an entire group of particles.
通过此函数，您可以检索一整组粒子的质心的x分量。
With this function you can retrieve the x position in the room of a group of particles.
用此函数你可以检索一组粒子在房间里的x位置。
With this function you can retrieve the y component of the center of mass of an entire group of particles.
使用此函数，您可以检索一整组粒子的质心的y分量。
With this function you can retrieve the y position in the room of a group of particles.
用此函数你可以检索一组粒子在房间里的y位置。
With this function you can return the first element of the array or undefined if the array is empty.
使用此函数，您可以返回数组的第一个元素，如果数组为空，则返回undefined。
With this function you can return the last element of the array or undefined if the array is empty.
使用此函数，您可以返回数组的最后一个元素，如果数组为空，则返回undefined。

With this function you can reverse the order in which the individual path points are numbered, so, for example, if the path has 5 points, point 0 would become point 4, point 1 would be point 3 and point 2 would not be changed.
通过此函数，您可以反转各个路径点的编号顺序，例如，如果路径有5个点，则点0将成为点4，点1将成为点3，而点2将保持不变。
With this function you can save a frame to a GIF file from a surface.
通过此函数，您可以从表面上将帧保存为GIF文件。
With this function you can save a screenshot of a part of the game as it currently appears in the game display.
通过此函数，你可以保存游戏部分的截图，因为它目前出现在游戏显示中。
With this function you can save a screenshot of the game as it currently appears in the game window.
通过此函数，你可以保存游戏的截图，因为它目前出现在游戏窗口。
With this function you can save out a GIF animation.
通过此函数，您可以保存GIF动画。
With this function you can save part of the contents of a buffer to a file, ready to be read back into memory using the buffer_load() function (or any of the other functions for loading buffers).
使用此函数，您可以将一个缓冲区的部分内容保存到一个文件中，以备使用buffer_load()函数(或任何其他用于加载缓冲区的函数)读回内存中。
With this function you can save part of the contents of a buffer to a file, ready to be read back into memory using the buffer_load() function.
使用此函数，您可以将缓冲区的内容保存到一个文件中，以便使用buffer_load()函数将其读回内存中。
With this function you can save the contents of a buffer to a file, ready to be read back into memory using the buffer_load() function.
使用此函数，您可以将缓冲区的内容保存到一个文件中，以便使用buffer_load()函数将其读回内存中。
With this function you can send a "raw" data packet through the network.
通过此函数，你可以通过网络发送一个"原始"数据包。
With this function you can send a data "packet" through the network.
通过此函数，你可以通过网络发送一个数据"包"。
With this function you can send a request to connect to a server.
通过此函数，您可以发送连接到服务器的请求。
With this function you can send data over the network using UDP to a server.
通过此函数，您可以通过网络使用UDP发送数据到服务器。
With this function you can set a circular region of a grid to a certain value.
通过此函数，您可以将网格的圆形区域设置为某个值。
With this function you can set a global state for all shaders being used where, when enabled, the shader "steals" 2 bits from the input colour values.
使用此函数，你可以为所有正在使用的着色器设置一个全局状态，当启用时，着色器从输入颜色值中"窃取(steals)"2位。
With this function you can set a hue, saturation and value range for all particles of the given type.
通过此函数，您可以为给定类型的所有粒子设置色调、饱和度和值范围。
With this function you can set a shader constant to hold an array of values.
使用此函数，你可以设置一个着色器常量来保存一个数组。
With this function you can set an attachment slot colour and alpha so all sprites attached to it will be drawn with these blend values.
通过此函数，你可以设置附件槽的颜色和alpha值，这样所有附加到它的精灵都将用这些混合值绘制。
With this function you can set an attachment to a given slot, where you are required to give the names (as strings) of the slot and the attachment.
通过此函数，您可以将附件设置到给定的插槽，您需要给出插槽和附件的名称(字符串形式)。
With this function you can set different network configurations.
通过此函数，您可以设置不同的网络配置。
With this function you can set how many audio channels are available for playing audio in GameMaker.
通过此函数，你可以在GameMaker中设置播放音频的音频通道数量。
With this function you can set some platform specific options for the buffer group being saved.
通过此函数，您可以为所保存的缓冲组设置一些特定于平台的选项。
With this function you can set that seed to a known value and so "force" the outcome of all random events afterwards to be the same every time the program is run.
使用此函数，你可以将种子设置为一个已知的值，这样就"强制"所有随机事件的结果在程序每次运行时都是相同的。
With this function you can set the X scale for the given sequence element.
通过此函数，您可以为给定的序列元素设置X缩放。
With this function you can set the Y scale for the given sequence element.
通过此函数，您可以为给定的序列元素设置Y缩放。
With this function you can set the absolute value for the global volume of all sounds and music for a specific listener.
通过此函数，您可以为特定侦听器设置所有声音和音乐的全局音量绝对值。
With this function you can set the absolute value for the global volume of all sounds and music.
通过此函数，您可以设置所有声音和音乐的全局音量的绝对值。
With this function you can set the angle of rotation for the given sequence element.
通过此函数，您可以设置给定序列元素的旋转角度。
With this function you can set the base draw alpha for the game.
通过此函数，您可以设置游戏的基本绘制alpha。
With this function you can set the base draw colour for the game.
通过此函数，您可以设置游戏的基本抽奖颜色。

With this function you can set the base position for the particle system relative to the (0,0) position of the room, meaning that all further particle functions relating to this system will now be drawn relative to the new position.
通过此函数，你可以设置粒子系统相对于房间的(0,0)位置的基本位置，这意味着所有与该系统相关的进一步粒子函数现在将相对于新位置绘制。
With this function you can set the cross origin type to use when loading images from a file.
通过此函数，您可以设置从文件加载图像时使用的跨域类型类型。
With this function you can set the current maximum level of anisotropy when using the tf_anisotropic filter mode (see gpu_get_tex_mip_filter() for more information).
使用此函数，您可以在使用tf_anisotropic filter模式时设置当前的最大各向异性级别(有关详细信息，请参见gpu_get_tex_mip_filter())。
With this function you can set the current mip filter mode to one of the three types supported.
通过此函数，您可以将当前mip过滤器模式设置为支持的三种类型之一。
With this function you can set the currently set maximum mipmap level which is to be used, where a value of 0 is the highest resolution, 1 is to use the first mipmap, 2 is the second etc...
通过此函数，您可以设置当前设置的要使用的最大mipmap级别，其中值0表示最高分辨率，1表示使用第一个mipmap，2表示第二个mipmap，依此类推...

With this function you can set the cursor for the game window to any one of the constants listed below (to find the current cursor being used you can use the function window_get_cursor() which will also return one of these constants):
使用此函数，你可以将游戏窗口的光标设置为下面列出的任意一个常量(为了找到当前正在使用的光标，你可以使用函数window_get_cursor()，它也会返回这些常量之一):
With this function you can set the density of the particles in a physics simulation.
通过此函数，您可以在物理模拟中设置粒子的密度。
With this function you can set the direction for the given sequence playhead.
通过此函数，您可以为给定的序列播放头设置方向。

With this function you can set the draw depth for the particle system, much the same as you can set the render depth of different layers within the room, where a low draw depth means that it will appear on top of all things drawn with a higher depth, and a high draw depth placing it below everything with a lower draw depth.
通过此函数，你可以为粒子系统设置绘制深度，就像你可以设置房间内不同图层的渲染深度一样，较低的绘制深度意味着它将出现在所有具有较高深度的绘制对象的上方，而较高的绘制深度则意味着它将出现在具有较低深度的绘制对象的下方。
With this function you can set the drawing target to the given shader and all further drawing will be done using that.
通过此函数，你可以将绘制目标设置为给定的着色器，所有后续的绘制都将使用该着色器完成。
With this function you can set the fall-off distance for an emitter.
通过此函数，您可以设置发射器的衰减距离。
With this function you can set the game window to a specific position within the display (on macOS, Linux(Ubuntu) and Windows) or within the browser (HTML5).
通过此函数，您可以将游戏窗口设置到显示器(在macOS、Linux(Ubuntu)和Windows上)或浏览器(HTML5)中的特定位置。
With this function you can set the game window to be full screen (true) or not (false).
通过此函数，你可以将游戏窗口设置为全屏(true)或非全屏(false)。
With this function you can set the given particle type to be a random blend of two colours.
通过此函数，您可以将给定的粒子类型设置为两种颜色的随机混合。
With this function you can set the gravity scale factor for particles in the physics simulation.
通过此函数，您可以在物理模拟中设置粒子的重力缩放倍数。
With this function you can set the instance to a position anywhere in the room, but aligned to an "invisible" grid.
通过此函数，您可以将实例设置到房间中的任何位置，但要与"不可见"的网格对齐。
With this function you can set the linear damping of particles in the simulation.
通过此函数，您可以在模拟中设置粒子的线性阻尼。
With this function you can set the mask_index of a specific object (for more information on masks see The Object Editor).
使用此函数，您可以设置特定对象的mask_index(有关掩码的更多信息，请参阅对象编辑器)。
With this function you can set the maximum level of anisotropy when using the tf_anisotropic filter mode (see gpu_get_tex_mip_filter() for more information) on a shader sampler.
使用此函数，可以在着色器采样器上使用tf_anisotropic过滤器模式时设置最大各向异性级别(有关详细信息，请参见gpu_get_tex_mip_filter())。
With this function you can set the minimum mipmap level which is currently used for a given shader sampler.
使用此函数，您可以设置当前用于给定着色器采样器的最小mipmap级别。
With this function you can set the minimum mipmap level which is currently used, where a value of 0 is the highest resolution, 1 is to use the first mipmap, 2 is the second etc...
通过此函数，您可以设置当前使用的最小中见大贴图级别，其中值0表示最高分辨率，1表示使用第一个中见大贴图，2表示第二个，依此类推...
With this function you can set the mip filter mode for a given shader sampler.
使用此函数，您可以为给定的着色器采样器设置mip过滤器模式。
With this function you can set the mipmap bias value for a given shader sampler.
通过此函数，你可以为给定的着色采样器设置mipmap偏置值。
With this function you can set the mipmap bias value, where a value of 0 equals no bias, 1 equals the first mipmap, 2 equals the second mipmap etc...
通过此函数，您可以设置多纹理贴图偏移值，其中值0等于无偏移，1等于第一个多纹理贴图，2等于第二个多纹理贴图，依此类推...
With this function you can set the mix of red, green and blue colours for all particles created of the given type.
通过此函数，您可以为给定类型的所有粒子设置红、绿、蓝颜色的混合。
With this function you can set the persistence of a specific object.
通过此函数，您可以设置特定对象的持久性。
With this function you can set the playhead position of a sequence element to a specific frame.
使用此函数，您可以设置序列元素的播放头位置到特定帧。
With this function you can set the position along the X (horizontal) axis of the room for the given sequence element.
通过此函数，您可以为给定的序列元素设置沿房间X(水平)轴的位置。
With this function you can set the position along the Y (vertical) axis of the room for the given sequence element.
通过此函数，您可以设置给定序列元素沿房间的Y(垂直)轴的位置。
With this function you can set the position of the game window within the browser (HTML5) or display (Windows, Ubuntu (Linux) or macOS) and set the scale of the window too.
通过此函数，您可以在浏览器(HTML5)或显示器(Windows、Ubuntu (Linux)或macOS)中设置游戏窗口的位置，还可以设置窗口的比例。
With this function you can set the properties of the collision mask that a sprite should have.
使用此函数，你可以设置一个精灵应该拥有的碰撞遮罩的属性。
With this function you can set the radius (in pixels) for the particles in a physics simulation.
通过此函数，您可以设置物理模拟中粒子的半径(以像素为单位)。
With this function you can set the sprite index of a specific object.
通过此函数，你可以设置特定对象的精灵索引。
With this function you can set the sprite shape to use for the particle type, with the following constants being acceptable:
使用此函数，您可以设置用于粒子类型的精灵形状，以下常量是可接受的:
With this function you can set the timeout for reading and writing data to/from a server through the given socket.
通过此函数，您可以设置通过给定套接字向服务器读写数据的超时时间。
With this function you can set the value (or values) of a shader constant to the current transform matrix (as set using the Matrix Functions).
使用此函数，你可以设置一个着色器常量的值(或多个值)为当前变换矩阵(使用矩阵函数设置)。
With this function you can set the value (or values) of a shader constant.
使用此函数，你可以设置一个着色器常量的值。
With this function you can set the value of a given global variable.
通过此函数，您可以设置给定全局变量的值。
With this function you can set the value of a given variable in a struct.
使用此函数，您可以在结构中设置给定变量的值。
With this function you can set the value of a given variable in an instance.
通过此函数，您可以在实例中设置给定变量的值。
With this function you can set the value of a key within a given DS map.
通过此函数，您可以在给定的DS map中设置键的值。
With this function you can set the value of an index in an array to a value.
使用此函数，您可以将数组中的索引值设置为某个值。
With this function you can set the vibration of the gamepad motors, with either motor using a value from 0 (no vibration) to 1 (full vibration).
通过此函数，您可以设置游戏手柄马达的振动，任一马达使用从0(无振动)到1(完全振动)的值。
With this function you can set the view port properties for any room in your game except the current one.
通过此函数，您可以为游戏中除当前房间之外的任何房间设置视口属性。
With this function you can set the way in which particles are drawn when created on the screen.
通过此函数，您可以设置在屏幕上创建粒子时绘制粒子的方式。
With this function you can set values of a shader constant from a buffer.
使用此函数，您可以设置使用缓冲区的着色器常量的值。
With this function you can set whether mipmapping is switched off, switched on for everything or switched on only for texture groups selected in the Texture Group Manager on a shader sampler.
通过此函数，您可以设置 mipmapping 是否关闭、打开所有内容或仅打开着色器采样器上纹理组管理器中选择的纹理组。
With this function you can set whether the browser window should capture all input (set it to false) or whether the game should capture the input (set it to true).
通过此函数，你可以设置浏览器窗口是否应该捕获所有输入(设为false)或游戏是否应该捕获输入(设为true)。
With this function you can shift a path along the horizontal and vertical axis.
通过此函数，您可以沿水平轴和垂直轴移动路径。
With this function you can show, or suppress, the various different "toast" pop-up notifications relating to challenges.
通过此函数，你可以显示或抑制与挑战相关的各种不同的"toast"弹出通知。
With this function you can shuffle a list, which will re-order all the component values into random positions from those in which they were originally added to the list.
通过此函数，您可以打乱列表，这将把所有组件值从它们最初添加到列表的位置重新排序到随机位置。
With this function you can shuffle an array (or subsection) in place, nothing is returned
使用此函数可以将数组(或子部分)置乱到位，不会返回任何内容
With this function you can shuffle an array (or subsection), a new array is returned that is a copy of the original with the entries shuffled.
使用此函数，您可以对数组(或子部分)进行置乱，返回一个新的数组，该数组是原始数组的副本，其中的条目被置乱。
With this function you can simulate the press of any key on the keyboard.
通过此函数，您可以模拟键盘上任何键的按下。
With this function you can simulate the release of any key on the keyboard.
使用此函数，您可以模拟键盘上任何键的释放。
With this function you can skip the remainder of the current line from a given opened text file and move to the start of the next one.
使用此函数，您可以跳过给定打开文本文件的当前行其余部分，并移动到下一个文本文件的开头。
With this function you can sort all the values within a list, either in ascending or descending order.
通过此函数，可以对列表中的所有值进行升序或降序排序。
With this function you can sort an array in ascending order or descending order or using a custom function to define the sort order.
使用此函数，可以按升序或降序对数组进行排序，也可以使用自定义函数定义排序顺序。
With this function you can specify a region of the grid in which to multiply each cell value by a given amount.
通过此函数，您可以指定网格的一个区域，其中每个单元格的值乘以给定的数量。
With this function you can start playing a previously created sync group.
通过此函数，您可以开始播放之前创建的同步组。
With this function you can start the playback of the given sequence.
通过此函数，你可以开始播放给定的序列。
With this function you can switch on or off the colour channels and the alpha channel for all further drawing.
通过此函数，你可以打开或关闭颜色通道和alpha通道进行进一步的绘图。
With this function you can take two colours and then merge them together to make a new colour.
通过此函数，您可以选择两种颜色，然后将它们合并成一种新的颜色。
With this function you can tell GameMaker to activate all instances that have been previously deactivated in a room.
通过此函数，你可以告诉GameMaker去激活房间中之前被停用的所有实例。

With this function you can tell an instance to move in a direction, resolving collisions on the way and specify a direction in which the instance will attempt to move to get past obstacles, thus allowing traversal of slopes or small steps.
使用此函数，您可以告知实例向某个方向移动，解决途中的碰撞，并指定实例将尝试移动以通过障碍物的方向，从而允许穿越斜坡或小步。

With this function you can tell an instance to move out of a collision in any direction and any number of pixels each step, with a value of -1 or 0 for the maxdist being a default 1000px, ie: GameMaker will move the instance continually up 1000 pixels until it is out of collision.
使用此函数，你可以告诉一个实例在任何方向和任何数量的像素每步移出碰撞，maxdist的值为-1或0，默认为1000像素，即:GameMaker会将实例连续向上移动1000像素，直到它移出碰撞。

With this function you can tell an instance to move out of a collision with any instance flagged as solid in any direction and any number of pixels each step, with a value of -1 or 0 for the maxdist being a default 1000px, ie: GameMaker will move the instance continually up 1000 pixels until it is out of collision.
使用此函数，你可以告诉一个实例在任何方向上以任何数量的像素从任何标记为实体的实例中脱离碰撞，maxdist的值为-1或0，默认为1000像素，即:GameMaker会将实例连续向上移动1000像素，直到脱离碰撞。

With this function you can toggle the visibility of a layer. You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) as well as the toggle value for the layer where visible is true and invisible is false.
使用此函数，你可以切换一个图层的可见性。你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，以及层的切换值，其中可见为真，不可见为假。
With this function you can traverse the array/range performing a cumulative operation on its elements.
使用此函数，您可以遍历数组/范围，对其元素执行累积操作。
With this function you can trigger the garbage collector, forcing it to run at the end of the current frame (step).
通过此函数，您可以触发垃圾收集器，强制它在当前帧(步骤)的末尾运行。
With this function you can turn any value into a string.
使用这个函数，您可以将任何值转换为字符串。
With this function you can turn on or off the power saving features of the device.
通过此函数，您可以打开或关闭设备的节能功能。
With this function you can unload all pages in the specified texture group.
通过此函数，你可以卸载指定纹理组中的所有页面。

With this function you can use a "sprite strip" (the sprite itself must be a sprite asset from the Asset Browser, or a sprite you have added to the game resources using sprite_add) to create a new font asset, where each sub-image would be an individual symbol or letter.
通过此函数，您可以使用"精灵条"(精灵本身必须是来自资源浏览器的精灵资源，或者是您使用sprite_add添加到游戏资源中的精灵)来创建新的字体资源，其中每个子图像都是一个单独的符号或字母。
With this function you can use a "sprite strip" to create a new font asset, where each sub-image would be an individual symbol or letter.
通过此函数，你可以使用一个"精灵条"来创建一个新的字体资源，其中每个子图像将是一个单独的符号或字母。
With this function you can use a "sprite strip" to replace a previously created sprite font asset, where each sub-image would be an individual symbol or letter.
通过此函数，你可以使用"精灵条"来取代之前创建的精灵字体资源，其中每个子图像将是一个单独的符号或字母。
With this function you can write a new line to an opened text file.
使用此函数，您可以向打开的文本文件写入新行。
With this function you can write a number to the previously opened text file.
通过此函数，您可以向之前打开的文本文件写入一个数字。
With this function you can write a string to a previously opened text file.
通过此函数，您可以将字符串写入先前打开的文本文件。
With this function you can write information from a buffer to a given surface.
使用此函数，您可以将信息从缓冲区写入给定的表面。
With this function you can write information from a surface to a given buffer.
使用此函数，您可以将信息从表面写入给定的缓冲区。
With this function you can indicate to the garbage collector that it shoulde aim to spend no more than the time specified running each frame.
通过此函数，您可以向垃圾收集器指示，它的目标是不超过运行每帧所指定的时间。
With this function you end the building of the custom primitive.
使用此函数，您可以结束自定义图元的构建。
With this function you reset all further drawing from the target surface back to the screen.
通过此函数，你重置所有从目标表面的进一步绘图回到屏幕上。
With this function you retrieve the type of buffer that is being referenced by a buffer ID value.
通过此函数，您可以检索缓冲区ID值所引用的缓冲区类型。
With this function you set all further drawing to the target surface rather than the screen and in this way you can tell GameMaker to only draw specific things to the specified surface.
通过此函数，你可以将所有进一步的绘图设置到目标表面而不是屏幕上，通过这种方式，你可以告诉GameMaker只在指定的表面上绘制特定的东西。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will check if the sequence is currently paused or not, returning true if it is paused, and false if it is not.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID -由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回-它将检查序列当前是否暂停，如果暂停则返回true，如果没有返回false。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will check if the sequence is finished playing or not, returning true if it is, and false if it is not.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID—由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回—它将检查序列是否播放完毕，如果是则返回true，如果不是则返回false。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current X position in the game room for the sequence.
通过此函数，你提供了序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回序列在游戏空间中的当前X位置。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current Y position in the game room for the sequence.
通过此函数，你提供了序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回序列在游戏空间中的当前Y位置。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current angle of the sequence element in the game room.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID—由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回—它将返回游戏房间中序列元素的当前角度。
With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playback speed scale.
使用此函数，您可以提供序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回当前回放速度比例。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playhead direction, which will be one of the constants listed below.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID—由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回—它将返回当前播放头方向，这将是下面列出的常量之一。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current playhead position (the current frame the playhead is on).
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID -由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回-它将返回当前播放头位置(播放头所在的当前帧)。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current scale along the X axis of the sequence element in the game room.
使用此函数，您可以提供序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回游戏房间中序列元素沿X轴的当前比例。

With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the current scale along the Y axis of the sequence element in the game room.
使用此函数，您可以提供序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回游戏房间中序列元素的Y轴上的当前比例。
With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the length of the sequence.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID—由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回—它将返回序列的长度。
With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the sequence instance struct.
通过此函数，您提供序列元素ID—由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回—它将返回序列实例结构。
With this function you supply the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return the sequence object struct.
使用此函数，您可以提供序列元素ID——由layer_sequence_create()或层元素函数之一返回——它将返回序列对象结构。
With this function you tell an instance to take a "step" towards a specific point, specified by the xgoal and ygoal values.
使用此函数，您可以告诉一个实例向一个特定的点"前进"，这个点由xgoal和ygoal值指定。
With this function you tell the instance to run the actions or code that has been placed within one of the 16 user defined events.
使用此函数，您可以告诉实例运行已经放置在16个用户定义的事件之一中的动作或代码。
With this function you would get a return string of "81".
使用此函数，您将得到一个返回字符串"81"。
With this function, you can connect to the specified URL in order to retrieve information in the form of a file.
通过此函数，您可以连接到指定的URL，以便以文件的形式检索信息。

With this function, you can create an HTTP header request to define the operating parameters of an HTTP transaction, which can be used for many things like (for example) authentication via HTTP headers if you use RESTful APIs.
通过此函数，您可以创建一个HTTP报头请求来定义HTTP事务的操作参数，如果使用RESTful api，可以将其用于许多事情，比如通过HTTP报头进行身份验证(例如)。
With this function, you can toggle on (true) or off (false) drawing the collision data for the current skeletal animation sprite being used by the instance.
使用此函数，可以打开(true)或关闭(false)绘制实例正在使用的当前骨骼动画精灵的碰撞数据。
With this function, you connect to the specified URL in order to retrieve information.
使用此函数，您可以连接到指定的URL以检索信息。
With this read only variable you can get a count of all active instances that are in the room.
使用这个只读变量，您可以获得房间中所有活动实例的计数。
With this variable you can get the keycode of the key that is currently being pressed and it will return 0 if no key is being pressed when the check is done.
用这个变量你可以得到当前被按下的键的键码，如果检查完成后没有键被按下，它将返回0。
With this variable you can set the contents of a given view port to draw to a surface, or get the current surface id if one has been assigned to a view port.
使用此变量，您可以将给定视口的内容设置为绘制到表面，或者获取当前的表面id(如果已将一个id分配给视口)。
With this variable you can set the contents of a view port to draw to a surface.
通过这个变量，您可以设置视图端口的内容以绘制到一个表面上。
Working_directory can actually return two different values depending on what you are using it for.
Working_directory实际上可以返回两个不同的值，这取决于您使用它的目的。
You also need to supply the number of samples in the buffer and the channels that the sound requires.
您还需要提供缓冲区中的样本数量和声音所需的通道。
You are also able to use a format string with "{x}" placeholders (i.e. {0},{1},...) where 'X' is the argument number after the format string (starting at 0).
您还可以使用带有"{x}"占位符的格式字符串(例如{0},{1},...)，其中 'X' 是格式字符串后面的参数号(从0开始)。
You are required to supply the sync group ID as returned by the function audio_create_sync_group().
您需要提供函数audio_create_sync_group()返回的同步组ID。
You assign a buffer to write the primitive to, and the vertex format to use (previously defined using the vertex format functions).
您分配一个缓冲区来写入图元，并指定要使用的顶点格式(以前使用顶点格式函数定义)。
You call this function whenever you wish to destroy an instance, normally triggering a Destroy Event and also a Clean Up Event.
您可以在希望销毁实例时调用此函数，通常会触发一个销毁事件(destroy Event)和一个清理事件(Clean Up Event)。
You can add up the following constants to see the type of files you want (if you do not wish to add any attributes, use 0):
您可以添加以下常量来查看所需的文件类型(如果您不想添加任何属性，请使用0):
You can add up the following constants to see the type of files you want:
您可以添加以下常量来查看所需的文件类型:
You can also avoid this by using the file_text_readln() function along with the file_text_eof() function to loop through the contents of the file until you get to the end and then start writing.
您还可以通过使用file_text_readln()函数和file_text_eof()函数来避免这种情况，它们循环遍历文件的内容，直到到达末尾，然后开始写入。

You can also colour the particles "on the fly" as they are created with this function, and this colour will over-ride the predefined colour of the particle, but it does not blend this colour over the particles lifetime.
您还可以在通过此函数创建粒子时"动态地"为粒子着色，并且此颜色将覆盖粒子的预定义颜色，但它不会在粒子生命周期内混合此颜色。
You can also give an object_index (ie: the name of the object in the Asset Browser) and the function will check if any instances of that object are on the given layer.
您还可以给定一个object_index(即:资源浏览器中对象的名称),此函数将检查该对象的任何实例是否在给定的层上。
You can also select either horizontal/vertical movement only, or allow full diagonal movements by specifying true in the allowdiag argument.
您也可以选择仅水平/垂直移动，或者通过在allowdiag参数中指定true来允许全对角线移动。

You can also select to choose a random sub-image so that if the sprite is not animated, a different image will be chosen at random to create the sprite, or if the particle is animated it will start the animation at a random point.
也可以选择随机子图像，这样，如果精灵没有设置动画，将随机选择不同的图像来创建精灵，或者如果粒子设置了动画，它将在随机点开始动画。
You can also set a value for the alpha of the sprite to draw it with transparency.
您也可以设置精灵的透明度(Alpha)值，以透明方式绘制精灵。

You can also set an axis vector, which is the imaginary line along which the joint will act as a "spring" permitting the wheel to bounce up and down along it as it encounters obstacles (much like the piston joint).
您也可以设置一个轴向量，它是一条假想的线，关节将沿着这条线充当"弹簧"，允许轮子在遇到障碍物时沿着它上下弹跳(很像活塞关节)。
You can also set this variable to effectively turn "on" or "off" a view by setting the value to true (visible) or false (invisible).
您还可以通过将该值设置为true(可见)或false(不可见)来设置该变量，以有效地"打开"或"关闭"视图。
You can also set this variable to either true or false to start and stop the time line at any time.
您还可以将此变量设置为true或false，以便在任何时间开始和停止时间线。

You can also specify whether the game should be aborted after the error, however please note that this only exists for compatibility reasons and showing errors will require the game to be aborted regardless of the value specified in this argument.
您也可以指定游戏是否应该在错误发生后中止，但是注意，这只是出于兼容性的原因，显示错误将要求游戏中止，而不管该参数中指定的值。

You can also supply a quantization value, which is an integer between 0 and 3, where 0 is full quantization and 3 is zero quantization (lower values will have a subsequent degradation in quality, but create a smaller GIF).
您还可以提供一个量化值，该值是一个介于0和3之间的整数，其中0表示完全量化，3表示零量化(较低的值会导致质量下降，但会创建较小的GIF)。

You can also supply an optional "name" argument, which will enable you to give the layer a specific name (as a string), and instead of using the layer ID to access the layer, you can use this name string instead, although it should be noted that using name strings will have a greater impact on performance than using just the ID value.
您还可以提供一个可选的"名称"参数，这将使您能够为图层指定一个特定的名称(作为字符串)，并且您可以使用此名称字符串而不是使用图层ID来访问图层，但是应该注意，使用名称字符串比仅使用ID值对性能的影响更大。
You can also supply this to functions like animcurve_get() to later get the data from the curve.
您还可以将此提供给animcurve_get()等函数，以便稍后从曲线中获取数据。

You can also tell it to use precise collision checking when enabled, but be aware that this requires all instances to have precise masks enabled and will greatly slow down your game when many instances are involved due to the amount of processing that has to be done.
你也可以告诉它在启用时使用精确的碰撞检查，但是注意，这需要所有的实例都启用精确的遮罩，并且当涉及到许多实例时，会由于必须完成的处理量而大大降低游戏速度。
You can also use real numbers and not integers in this function like this - random(0.5), which will return a value between 0 and 0.4999999.
您还可以在此函数中使用实数而不是整数，例如random(0.5)，它将返回0到0.4999999之间的值。

You can also use the keyword all to iterate through all the instances in a room, as well as a parent object to iterate through all the instances that are part of that parent / child hierarchy, and you can even specify an instance (if you have its id) as a check to see if it actually exists in the current room.
还可以使用关键字all遍历房间中的所有实例，也可以使用父对象遍历父/子层次结构中的所有实例，甚至可以指定一个实例(如果有它的id)作为检查，以查看它是否实际存在于当前房间中。

You can also use this function to create the camera and then use the different camera_set_* functions to set up the view, however note that you must provide at least a position and view size, otherwise the resulting camera will not be valid and give odd results if applied to a view port (if you do not set the object following, borders or move speed these will be set to the default values for a view camera in the Room Editor).
您也可以使用此函数创建相机，然后使用不同的camera_set_*函数来设置视图，但是注意，您必须至少提供一个位置和视图大小，否则生成的相机将无效，并且如果应用于视口，会产生奇怪的结果(如果您没有设置对象跟随、边界或移动速度，这些将在房间编辑器中设置为视图相机的默认值)。
You can also use this function to design a system where the user can define their own keys for playing by simply mapping the user input key to the key that you have coded into the game.
您还可以使用此函数设计一个系统，在该系统中，用户可以通过简单地将用户输入键映射到您已编码到游戏中的键来定义自己的游戏键。
You can assign each virtual key you define to a variable too, which can then be used in the further virtual key functions to show, hide and delete them.
您也可以将您定义的每个虚拟键分配给一个变量，该变量可用于进一步的虚拟键功能，以显示、隐藏和删除它们。
You can assign script functions to a layer with layer_script_begin() and layer_script_end().
您可以使用layer_script_begin()和layer_script_end()将脚本函数分配给图层。
You can call the function with a value of -1 to switch off the overlay.
您可以调函数用值-1的来关闭覆盖。
You can change it to give the instance a different sprite by giving it the name of a sprite from the resource tree or by using a variable that has an externally loaded sprite indexed in it.
你可以通过给它一个来自资源树的精灵的名字或者使用一个外部加载的精灵索引的变量来改变它，给实例一个不同的精灵。
You can change the base time zone to use with the function date_set_timezone()
您可以通过函数date_set_timezone()来更改基本时区
You can change the base time zone to use with the function date_set_timezone().
您可以使用date_set_timezone()函数来更改基本时区。
You can change this value to skip parts of the time line, or to repeat parts or to start the time line again from the beginning.
您可以更改此值以跳过时间线的部分内容，或重复部分内容，或从开始重新开始时间线。
You can change this variable to change the height of the room at any time, and changes will be applied to the bottom of the room, as the origin is considered to be the top left corner.
您可以随时更改此变量来更改房间的高度，更改将应用于房间的底部，因为原点被认为是左上角。
You can change this variable to change the width of the room at any time.
你可以在任何时候改变这个变量来改变房间的宽度。
You can change this variable to switch looping on or off and it works with a negative time line speed (if the time line position goes below 0 it will start again at the last defined moment).
您可以更改这个变量来切换循环的开启或关闭，并且它以负的时间线速度工作(如果时间线位置低于0，它将在最后定义的时刻重新开始)。
You can check font indices as defined from the Asset Browser, or fonts that have been added using functions like font_add().
要检查的字体索引。

You can check the return value of this function too as a debug tool to check whether the surface target was set or not, with a return value of 0 being a failure to set the target and any other positive value being a success.
您也可以检查此函数的返回值，作为一个调试工具来检查是否设置了表面目标，返回值0表示设置目标失败，任何其他正值表示设置成功。

You can check this function to see if it was successful or not (it will return true on success or false otherwise), as it may fail if there already exists the same key in the DS map or you specify a non-existent DS map as the ID of the map to add to.
您可以检查此函数，看看它是否成功(如果成功，它将返回true，否则返回false)，因为如果DS map中已经存在相同的键，或者您指定一个不存在的DS map作为要添加到的map的ID，它可能会失败。
You can check to see if a variable holds an int64 using the function is_int64().
可以使用is_int64()函数检查变量是否包含int64。

You can create a bit-mask by using the audio_get_listener_info() and then using the bitwise or ("|") to create a custom mask with those listeners that you require the sound to play from, and then apply this custom mask to the emitter.
您可以使用audio_get_listener_info()创建一个位掩码，然后使用按位or("|")创建一个自定义掩码，其中包含您需要播放声音的那些侦听器，然后将此自定义掩码应用到发射器。

You can create a bit-mask by using the audio_get_listener_info() and then using the bitwise or ("|") to create a custom mask with those listeners that you require the sound to play from, and then apply this custom mask to the sound after you have played it.
您可以使用audio_get_listener_info()创建一个位掩码，然后使用按位or ("| ")创建一个自定义掩码，用于您需要播放声音的那些侦听器，然后在您播放声音后将该自定义掩码应用于声音。

You can create and maintain multiple grid structures at the same moment if you need them for different things, but be aware that each grid will require memeory, and the more cells they have the more memory they will require. Also note that the MP functions are quite processor heavy to use so the more often you call them and the higher the cell resolution then the more likely you are to have a drop in performance.
如果你需要它们做不同的事情，你可以同时创建和维护多个网格结构，但是要注意每个网格都需要内存，并且它们拥有的单元越多，它们需要的内存就越多。还要注意的是，MP函数使用起来相当耗费处理器资源，因此调用次数越多，单元分辨率越高，性能下降的可能性就越大。
You can create such a matrix using the matrix_build() or matrix_get() functions or simply building the array yourself and passing that into the function.
可以使用matrix_build()或matrix_get()函数创建这样的矩阵，也可以自己构建数组并将其传递到函数中。

You can define "space" as being any character you want, for example a single line the size that you want the space to be, and all spaces in text will be rendered at that width (but the image chosen will never be rendered), or if you don't supply a sprite for space then the width of the widest character in the sprite font will be used instead.
您可以将"空格"定义为您想要的任何字符，例如您想要的空格大小的单行，文本中的所有空格都将以该宽度呈现(但所选的图像永远不会呈现)，或者如果您没有为空格提供sprite，则将使用sprite字体中最宽字符的宽度。
You can define how precise the drawing is with the function draw_set_circle_precision().
可以使用draw_set_circle_precision()函数定义绘图的精确度。

You can define how precise the drawing of the corners is with the function draw_set_circle_precision(), but this function uses a fixed radius for them (should you need to change the corner radius, use the function draw_roundrect_ext()).
您可以使用draw_set_circle_precision()函数来定义绘制角的精确度，但是此函数使用固定的半径(如果需要更改角的半径，可以使用draw_roundrect_ext()函数)。
You can define how precise the drawing of the corners is with the function draw_set_circle_precision().
可以使用draw_set_circle_precision()函数定义绘制角的精确度。
You can define the size of the font (in points), as well as whether the font should be bold or italic, and you can also define the range of characters to include.
您可以定义字体的大小(以点为单位)，以及字体应该是粗体还是斜体，还可以定义要包含的字符范围。
You can define the text that is to appear in the dialogue, as well as the text you wish to appear on the two buttons and the URL where the comment has to be posted.
您可以定义将出现在对话框中的文本，以及您希望出现在两个按钮上的文本，以及必须发布评论的URL。
You can end shader use with function shader_reset().
你可以使用shader_reset()函数来结束着色器的使用。

You can even give x a real value like 12.345, but as you cannot get .345 of a pixel, the instance may not appear to have moved, although these values will be maintained and used internally by GameMaker and are perfectly valid.
你甚至可以给x一个实数值，比如12.345，但是由于你不能得到一个像素的0.345，这个实例可能看起来没有移动，尽管这些值将被GameMaker内部维护和使用，并且完全有效。

You can even give y a real value like 12.345, but as you cannot get .345 of a pixel, the instance may not appear to have moved, although these values will be maintained and used internally by GameMaker and are perfectly valid.
你甚至可以给y一个实数值，比如12.345，但是由于你不能得到一个像素的0.345，实例可能看起来没有移动，尽管这些值将由GameMaker内部维护和使用，并且完全有效。
You can even specify a parent object and all children instances with that parent will also receive the fixture.
您甚至可以指定一个父对象，并且具有该父对象的所有子实例也将接收该夹具。
You can find a complete list of the available constants this function requires from the the page for the function event_perform().
您可以从函数event_perform()的页面中找到此函数所需的可用常量的完整列表。
You can find a list of Android system flags here.
你可以在这里找到Android系统标志的列表。
You can find out how many recorder sources are available using the function audio_get_recorder_count(), and the map returned will contain the following key/value pairs:
你可以使用函数audio_get_recorder_count()找出有多少录音机源可用，返回的映射将包含以下键/值对:
You can find out more about creating projection matrices from the section Matrix Functions, specifically matrix_build_projection_perspective() and matrix_build_projection_ortho().
有关创建投影矩阵的更多信息，请参阅矩阵函数一节，特别是Matrix _ build _ projection _ perspective()和matrix_build_projection_ortho()。
You can find out more about creating view matrices from the section Matrix Functions, specifically matrix_build_lookat().
您可以从矩阵函数一节了解更多关于创建视图矩阵的信息，特别是matrix_build_lookat()。
You can find out more about the format of the sequence instance struct on this page.
您可以在这个页面上找到更多关于序列实例结构的格式的信息。
You can find out more about the format of the sequence object struct on this page.
您可以在本页找到有关序列对象结构格式的更多信息。

You can find the number of parameters for the current game using the function parameter_count(), where the first parameter has index 1 and the last one has the index returned by the function (a value of 0 is special on that it is the filename of the game executable, including the path).
您可以使用parameter_count()函数找到当前游戏的参数数量，其中第一个参数的索引为1，最后一个参数的索引由此函数返回(值0是特殊的，因为它是游戏可执行文件的文件名，包括路径)。

You can find the number of parameters for the current game using this function, where the first parameter has index 1 and the last one has the index returned by the function (a value of 0 is special on that it is the filename of the game executable, including the path).
您可以使用此函数找到当前游戏的参数数量，其中第一个参数的索引为1，最后一个参数的索引由此函数返回(值0是特殊的，因为它是游戏可执行文件的文件名，包括路径)。
You can get more information about the returned texture page using the different texture_ functions found here.
你可以使用这里找到的不同的texture_函数获得更多关于返回的纹理页面的信息。
You can get or set these message events, and when getting this property an array of keyframe structs is returned, and for setting the property you should supply an array of keyframe structs.
您可以获取或设置这些消息事件，当获取此属性时，将返回一个关键帧结构数组，为了设置该属性，您应该提供一个关键帧结构数组。
You can get or set these moment events, and when getting this property an array of keyframe structs is returned, and for setting the property you should supply an array of keyframe structs.
您可以获取或设置这些moment事件，当获取此属性时，将返回一个关键帧结构数组，为了设置该属性，您应该提供一个关键帧结构数组。
You can get or set this property, and when getting this property an array of track structs is returned, and for setting the property you should supply an array of track structs.
您可以获取或设置此属性，当获取此属性时，将返回一个跟踪结构数组，为了设置该属性，您应该提供一个跟踪结构数组。

You can get or set this value and it will modify the global audio output for all tracks - for example, if you have an audio track with a volume of 0.8 and then set the sequence volume property to 0.5, the audio track will have a final volume of 0.4.
您可以获取或设置该值，它将修改所有轨道的全局音频输出-例如，如果您有一个音量为0.8的音频轨道，然后将序列音量属性设置为0.5，则该音频轨道的最终音量将为0.4。
You can get or set this value, but note that making a sequence shorter may cause issues if a sequence instance referencing this sequence has its playhead set to past the new length.
您可以获取或设定此值，但注意，如果引用此序列的序列实例将其播放头设定为超过新长度，则缩短序列可能会导致问题。
You can get or set this value.
您可以获取或设置该值。

You can get the ID for the notification to cancel using the functions push_get_first_local_notification() and push_get_next_local_notification() and the function will return true on success or false otherwise (for example if the notification does not exist or has already been triggered).
您可以使用函数push_get_first_local_notification()和push_get_next_local_notification()获取要取消的通知的ID，如果成功，此函数将返回true，否则返回false(例如，如果通知不存在或已经被触发)。

You can get the available environment variables on macOS and Ubuntu (Linux) by typing "env" into the terminal app, and for information on Windows environment variables, if you are using the command prompt then type "echo %PATH%", and using PowerShell it's "ls env".
在macOS和Ubuntu (Linux)上，您可以通过在终端应用程序中键入"env"来获取可用的环境变量，有关Windows环境变量的信息，如果您使用的是命令提示符，则键入"echo %PATH%"，使用PowerShell则是"ls env"。

You can get the number of recorder sources using the function audio_get_recorder_count(), and once you start recording the audio will be stored in a temporary buffer and start triggering an Audio Recording Asynchronous Event.
您可以使用函数audio_get_recorder_count()获得录音机源的数量，一旦您开始记录，音频将被存储在一个临时缓冲区中，并开始触发音频记录异步事件。

You can get the playerid using the achievement_load_friends() or the achievement_load_leaderboard() functions and you must also supply the challengeid which is the unique value given the challenge when you created it on your iTunes Connect or Google Play dashboard.
您可以使用成就_加载_好友()或成就_加载_排行榜()函数获取playerid，还必须提供挑战id，这是您在iTunes Connect或Google Play dashboard上创建挑战时给出的唯一值。

You can give it an object_index to check for, in which case this function will return true if any active instances of the specified object exist in the current room, or you can also supply it with an instance id, in which case this function will return true if that specific instance exists and is active in the current room.
您可以给它一个object_index来进行检查，在这种情况下，如果指定对象的任何活动实例存在于当前房间中，此函数将返回true;或者您也可以为它提供一个实例id，在这种情况下，如果特定实例存在并且在当前房间中活动，此函数将返回true。
You can have an object with no mask while an instance of that same object can have one and vice-versa, or they can even have different masks.
您可以有一个没有掩码的对象，而该对象的实例可以有掩码，反之亦然，或者它们甚至可以有不同的掩码。
You can have an object with no sprite while an instance of that same object can have one and vice-versa, or they can even have different sprites.
你可以让一个对象没有精灵，而该对象的实例可以有精灵，反之亦然，或者它们甚至可以有不同的精灵。
You can have as many arguments as you require (note that more arguments will mean that the function will be slower to parse).
您可以有您需要的任意数量的参数(注意，更多的参数将意味着函数解析的速度会更慢)。

You can have up to 8 view ports active in a room (array values 0 through 7), and can assign a camera to any of them by simply setting this variable to the camera ID value (as returned by the functions camera_create() or camera_create_view()).
在一个房间中最多可以有8个活动的视图端口(数组值从0到7)，并且可以通过简单地将该变量设置为相机ID值(由camera_create()或camera_create_view()函数返回)来将相机分配给其中的任何一个。
You can read the returned string from this function back into a ds_grid using the function ds_grid_read().
您可以使用函数ds_grid_read()将此函数返回的字符串读回ds_grid。

You can replace a sprite from the game assets using this function, but doing so means that you will lose the reference ID for the sprite that you are replacing, regardless of whether you call game_restart() or not, and so is not recommended.
您可以使用此函数替换游戏资源中的精灵，但是这样做意味着您将丢失正在替换的精灵的引用ID，无论您是否调用game_restart()都是如此，因此不建议这样做。
You can retrieve tile data using the function tilemap_get() and then use the tile_ functions to change it before setting the cell using this function.
可以使用函数tilemap_get()检索平铺数据，然后在使用此函数设置单元格之前使用tile_函数更改它。
You can retrieve tile data using the function tilemap_get_at_pixel() and then use the tile_ functions to change it before setting it again using this function.
您可以使用函数tilemap_get_at_pixel()检索平铺数据，然后使用tile_函数在使用此函数再次设置之前更改它。

You can select the sprite and then tell GameMaker to use the sprite and animate it or not, and if you choose animated, then you can also choose to have the sub-images changed at an interval such that the animation will begin and end at the beginning and end of the lifetime of each particle created (so that if you have a lifetime set to a 15 step minimum and a 30 step maximum, no matter what value the lifetime has the animation will be made to fit, with it running faster for the shorter lifetimes and slower for the longer).
您可以选择精灵，然后告诉GameMaker使用精灵并设置动画或不设置动画，如果您选择动画，那么您还可以选择以一定的间隔更改子图像，以便动画将在创建的每个粒子的生命周期的开始和结束时开始和结束(这样，如果您将生命周期设置为最小15步，最大30步，无论生命周期的值是多少，动画都将被调整，生命周期越短运行越快，生命周期越长运行越慢)。

You can set a negative value for the step number and a particle will be emitted at a random interval based on that, so that, for example, a value of -3 will have a 1:3 chance of emitting a particle each step.
你可以为步数设置一个负值，然后粒子将在此基础上以随机间隔发射，例如，值为-3的每一步发射粒子的几率为1:3。

You can set a timeout value for connection, or alternatively make the creation asynchronous, using the function network_set_config(), or alternatively use the function network_connect_async() instead.
您可以为连接设置超时值，或者使用函数network_set_config()使创建异步，或者使用函数network_connect_async()代替。

You can set a timeout value for connection, or alternatively make the creation asynchronous, using the function network_set_config(), or alternatively use the function network_connect_async_raw() instead.
您可以设置连接的超时值，或者使用函数network_set_config()使创建异步，或者使用函数network_connect_async_raw()代替。
You can set an individual instances mask index using the mask_index instance variable.
可以使用mask_index实例变量设置单个实例掩码索引。
You can set an individual instances persistent flag using the persistent instance variable.
可以使用持久化实例变量设置单个实例持久化标志。
You can set an individual instances solid flag using the solid instance variable.
可以使用solid实例变量设置单个实例的固体标志。
You can set an individual instances sprite using the sprite_index instance variable.
您可以使用sprite_index实例变量设置一个单独的实例精灵。
You can set an individual instances visibility using the visible instance variable.
可以使用可见实例变量设置单个实例的可见性。
You can set it to an empty string "" to effectively clear the clipboard of text.
您可以将其设置为空字符串 ""，以有效地清除剪贴板中的文本。

You can set the "perf" argument to true which will force GameMaker to perform the Destroy and Clean Up events of the found instance as well as the Create event of the new instance, or false to not perform any of these events.
您可以将"perf"参数设置为true，这将强制GameMaker执行找到的实例的销毁和清理事件以及新实例的创建事件，或者设置为false，不执行任何这些事件。
You can set the AA level using the function draw_set_swf_aa_level().
您可以使用函数 draw_set_swf_aa_level() 设置 AA 级别。

You can set the number of particles being streamed to zero and call this function again to "switch off" the particle streaming, and the function will also accept negative numbers for the amount, in which case the emitter will produce particles based on random chance.
您可以将粒子流的数量设置为零，并再次调用此函数来"关闭"粒子流，此函数也将接受负数的数量，在这种情况下，发射器将基于随机机会产生粒子。

You can set the time value to values higher than the total duration of the animation and the animation will loop back to the beginning, but you run the risk of losing floating point accuracy as the accumulated time gets larger.
您可以将时间值设置为高于动画的总持续时间的值，这样动画就会循环回到开始，但是随着累积时间的增加，您将面临失去浮点精度的风险。
You can set this in one of two ways - as either game frames per second (FPS) or as microseconds per game frame (MPF) - using one of the following two constants:
您可以使用以下两个常量之一以两种方式进行设置，即每秒游戏帧数(FPS)或每游戏帧微秒数(MPF):
You can set this to -1 to remove a mask sprite and so default to the mask defined for the sprite of the object (or no masks if no sprite has been chosen).
你可以将其设置为-1以删除一个遮罩精灵，并默认使用为对象的精灵定义的遮罩(如果没有选择精灵则不使用遮罩)。
You can set this to a particular time line to use that one, or set it to -1 to stop using a time line for the instance (if no time line is defined for the instance, -1 is returned too).
您可以将其设置为特定的时间线以使用该时间线，或者将其设置为-1以停止对实例使用时间线(如果没有为实例定义时间线，则也返回-1)。
You can specify a local x and y position to copy from as well as the width and height of the section.
您可以指定要复制的局部x和y位置以及截面的宽度和高度。

You can specify a margin outside the edges of the room for this to occur, and when the instance has travelled outside of that margin GameMaker will automatically wrap it back into the room at the other side.
您可以在房间边缘之外指定一个边界来实现这一点，当实例移动到边界之外时，GameMaker会自动将其从房间的另一边返回。
You can specify an initial starting size for the buffer (in bytes) and it will return a "handle" (index) for the buffer which should then be used in all further calls to the buffer.
您可以指定缓冲区的初始起始大小(以字节为单位)，它将为缓冲区返回一个"句柄"(索引)，然后在所有对缓冲区的后续调用中使用该句柄。

You can specify an object index for the target and all instances present in the room at the time will receive that fixtures properties (but not any new instances of the object created later), or you can use the special keywords other and all.
您可以为目标指定一个对象索引，此时房间中的所有实例都将接收到该夹具属性(但不是后来创建的对象的任何新实例)，或者您可以使用特殊关键字other和all。
You can specify in the function whether to consider precise collisions or not and the forbidden cells marked will change depending on this setting.
您可以在函数中指定是否考虑精确碰撞，标记的禁用单元格将根据此设置而变化。

You can specify the range of vertex data that you wish to copy into the buffer, where the start vertex can be anywhere between 0 and the number of vertices -1, and you can give the number of vertices from that point on to copy.
您可以指定要复制到缓冲区中的顶点数据的范围，其中起始顶点可以是0到顶点数-1之间的任何值，并且您可以给出从该点开始要复制的顶点数。
You can supply a value of -1 for the size argument and the entire buffer will be loaded.
您可以为size参数提供-1的值，这样就会加载整个缓冲区。
You can switch animation sets easily using the skeleton_animation_set() function, but this may cause a skip or stutter as one animation is swapped for another.
您可以使用skeleton_animation_set()函数轻松切换动画集，但这可能会导致在一个动画与另一个动画交换时出现跳跃或停顿。
You can then re-load the ds_map using the function ds_map_secure_load().
然后可以使用ds_map_secure_load()函数重新加载ds_map。
You can use -1 or 0 for the maxdist being a default 1000px, ie: GameMaker will move the instance continually up 1000 pixels until it is out of collision.
你可以使用-1或0作为默认的1000像素的最大距离，例如:GameMaker会将实例连续向上移动1000像素，直到它脱离碰撞。
You can use hex notation ($AARRGGBB) a real number or use any of the make_colour_*() functions to define the colour value.
您可以使用十六进制表示法($AARRGGBB)表示一个实数，或者使用任何make_colour_*()函数来定义颜色值。
You can use negative values to signify that the instance should follow the path in reverse.
您可以使用负值来表示实例应该沿相反的路径前进。

You can use real numbers (like 0.5, or 2.4 for example) and if the value is larger than one, several moments can happen within the same time step (they will all be performed in the same order as defined for the time line, so no actions will be skipped).
您可以使用实数(例如0.5或2.4)，如果值大于1，则可以在同一时间步内发生多个时刻(它们将按照时间线定义的相同顺序执行，因此不会跳过任何动作)。
