您可以使用函数 tilemap_get() 来获取可以使用图块(Tile)函数操作的图块数据，或者您可以使用以下图块常量以及要创建的图块的索引值自己构建它：
You can use the function vertex_get_number() on the vertex buffer to get the total number of vertices stored.
您可以在顶点缓冲区上使用vertex_get_number()函数来获取存储的顶点总数。
You can use this code to remove a path from memory.
您可以使用此代码从内存中移除一个路径。

You can use this function to change one instance of an object into another instance of a different object, and while doing so decide whether to perform the initial instances Destroy and Clean Up Events and the new instances Create Event.
您可以使用此函数将对象的一个实例更改为不同对象的另一个实例，并在此过程中决定是否执行初始实例销毁事件和清理事件以及新实例创建事件。
You can use this function to check and see if a background element exists on any given layer.
您可以使用此函数来检查和查看任何给定图层上是否存在背景元素。
You can use this function to check and see if a sprite element exists on any given layer.
你可以使用此函数来检查精灵元素是否存在于任何给定的图层上。
You can use this function to check and see if a tile map element exists on any given layer.
您可以使用此函数来检查并查看在任何给定的层上是否存在一个tile map元素。
You can use this function to check and see if the calling instance would collide with any instance flagged as solid in your game.
您可以使用此函数来检查并查看调用实例是否会与游戏中标记为实体的任何实例发生碰撞。
You can use this function to check and see if the calling instance would collide with any other instance of an object or all instances in your game.
你可以使用此函数来检查和查看调用实例是否会与一个对象的任何其他实例或者游戏中的所有实例发生碰撞。
You can use this function to check if the device is paused or not.
您可以通过此函数检查设备是否暂停。
You can use this function to check the attributes of a given file.
您可以使用此函数来检查给定文件的属性。
You can use this function to copy the contents of one map into another one that you have previously created using ds_map_create().
您可以使用此函数将一个map的内容复制到前面使用ds_map_create()创建的另一个中。
You can use this function to destroy the indicated mp_grid (as defined by the function mp_grid_create()) and free up the memory allocated it.
您可以使用此函数来销毁指定的mp_grid(由函数mp_grid_create()定义)并释放分配给它的内存。
You can use this function to enable or disable the automatic drawing of the application surface.
您可以使用此函数来启用或禁用应用程序表面的自动绘制。
You can use this function to find the current value for the alpha test reference (default is 0, but you can use gpu_set_alphatestref() to set this value to something other than this).
您可以使用此函数来查找alpha测试引用的当前值(默认值为0，但您可以使用gpu_set_alphatestref()将此值设置为除此之外的值)。
You can use this function to find the status of the keypad number lock with true being returned for on, and false returned for off.
您可以使用此函数查找键盘号码锁的状态，打开返回true，关闭返回false。
You can use this function to get or to set the speed of a path after it has been started using the function path_start().
在使用函数path_start()启动路径后，可以使用此函数获取或设置路径的速度。
You can use this function to get the IDs of all layers assigned a specific depth.
你可以使用此函数来获取指定深度的所有层的id。
You can use this function to get the Layer ID that the given element is on.
你可以使用此函数来获取给定元素所在的图层ID。
You can use this function to get the depth value associated with a given layer.
您可以使用此函数来获取与给定层相关的深度值。
You can use this function to get the element IDs of the given layer.
你可以使用此函数来获取给定层的元素id。
You can use this function to get the element type for the given element.
可以使用此函数获取给定元素的元素类型。
You can use this function to get the exact length of a path in pixels.
您可以使用此函数来获得路径的精确长度(以像素为单位)。
You can use this function to get the name of the given layer.
你可以使用此函数来获取给定层的名称。
You can use this function to get the unique identifying index for a game asset from its name.
你可以使用此函数从名称中获取游戏资源的唯一标识索引。
You can use this function to get the value of the different axes from a given gamepad slot.
你可以使用此函数从一个给定的游戏手柄插槽中获取不同轴的值。
You can use this function to move an element from one layer to another.
您可以使用此函数将元素从一层移动到另一层。

You can use this function to optimise your game for devices as the lower the number of channels for audio the better the performance, but bear in mind that this may also cause noticeable cut off of certain sounds if many are played at once.
你可以通过此函数针对设备优化游戏，因为音频通道数量越少，性能越好，但请记住，如果同时播放多个音频，这也可能导致某些声音明显中断。
You can use this function to parse a given string and get any numbers from it.
您可以使用此函数解析给定的字符串并从中获取任意数字。
You can use this function to parse a string looking for a specific part, which can then be replaced by the new string that you have specified.
您可以使用此函数解析字符串，查找特定的部分，然后可以用您指定的新字符串替换该部分。
You can use this function to parse a string looking for specific parts, which can then be replaced by the new string that you have specified in all places that they occur.
您可以使用此函数解析字符串，查找特定的部分，然后可以在它们出现的所有位置用您指定的新字符串替换这些部分。
You can use this function to read a number from an ini data file.
您可以使用此函数从ini数据文件中读取一个数字。
You can use this function to read a string (text) from an ini data file.
您可以使用此函数从 ini 数据文件中读取字符串（文本）。
You can use this function to remove a specific part of a string.
您可以使用此函数来移除字符串的特定部分。
You can use this function to retrieve the horizontal speed (in pixels per game frame) of the layer within the currently scoped room.
你可以使用此函数来检索当前房间范围内的层的水平速度(以像素为单位)。
You can use this function to retrieve the vertical speed (in pixels per game frame) of the layer within the currently scoped room.
您可以使用此函数来检索当前范围内房间的层的垂直速度(以每游戏帧的像素为单位)。
You can use this function to retrieve the x position of the layer within the currently scoped room.
您可以使用此函数来检索当前范围内的房间中的层的x位置。
You can use this function to retrieve the y position of the layer within the currently scoped room.
您可以使用此函数来检索当前范围房间内的层的y位置。
You can use this function to return a specific character at a specific position within a string, with the index starting at 1 for the first character.
您可以使用此函数返回字符串中特定位置的特定字符，第一个字符的索引从1开始。
You can use this function to return a specific character code at a specific position within a string, with the index starting at 1 for the first character.
您可以使用此函数在字符串中的特定位置返回特定的字符代码，其中第一个字符的索引从1开始。
You can use this function to rotate a given path around its center.
您可以使用此函数将给定的路径绕其中心旋转。
You can use this function to send your achievements to the chosen leaderboard and achievement service.
您可以通过此函数将您的成就发送到所选的排行榜和成就服务。
You can use this function to send your score to the chosen leaderboard and achievement service.
你可以使用此函数发送你的分数到选择的排行榜和成就服务。
You can use this function to set the follow border of the view camera within the room.
您可以使用此函数来设置房间内视图相机的跟随边界。
You can use this function to set the follow target of the view camera within the room.
您可以通过此函数设置房间内查看相机的跟随目标。
You can use this function to set the horizontal speed (in pixels per game frame) of the layer within the currently scoped room.
您可以使用此函数来设置当前范围房间内的层的水平速度(以每游戏帧像素为单位)。
You can use this function to set the vertical speed (in pixels per game frame) of the layer within the currently scoped room.
你可以使用此函数来设置当前房间范围内图层的垂直速度(单位是像素/游戏帧)。
You can use this function to set the x position of the layer within the currently scoped room.
你可以使用此函数在当前范围的房间内设置层的x位置。
You can use this function to set the y position of the layer within the currently scoped room.
你可以使用此函数在当前范围的房间内设置层的y位置。
You can use this function to submit the contents of a vertex buffer to the graphics pipeline for use with a shader.
您可以使用此函数将顶点缓冲区的内容提交到图形管道，以便与着色器一起使用。
You can use this function to switch the keypad number-lock on or off (set to true for on, and false for off).
您可以通过此函数来切换键盘数字锁的开启或关闭(设置为true为开启，false为关闭)。
You can use this function to switch the player from the foreground layer to the background layer and make it appear behind the other layers being drawn.
您可以通过此函数将播放器从前景层切换到背景层，并使其出现在正在绘制的其他层的后面。
You can use this function to update the angle of the view camera within the room.
您可以通过此函数更新房间内的视角相机的角度。
You can use this function to update the position of the camera view within the room.
你可以使用此函数来更新房间内摄像头视图的位置。
You can use this function to update the size of the view camera within the room.
您可以通过此函数来更新房间内视图相机的大小。
You can use this function to update the speed of the view camera within the room.
您可以通过此函数来更新房间内查看相机的速度。
You can use this function to write a string (text) to an ini data file.
您可以使用此函数将字符串（文本）写入 ini 数据文件。
You can use this function to write a value (numeric) to an ini data file.
您可以使用此函数将值（数字）写入 ini 数据文件。
You can use this id to get the density value of the bound fixture (not the "base" fixture) at any time using this function.
您可以使用这个id在任何时候使用此函数来获得绑定夹具(而不是"基础"夹具)的密度值。
You can use this id to get the restitution (the "bounciness" property) value of the bound fixture, not the "base" fixture, at any time using this function.
您可以使用此ID随时使用此函数获取绑定固定装置的恢复（"弹性"属性）值，而不是"基本"固定装置。
You can use this id to set the density value of the bound fixture, not the "base" fixture, at any time using this function.
您可以在任何时候使用这个id来设置绑定夹具的密度值，而不是"基础"夹具。
You can use this id to set the friction value of the bound fixture, not the "base" fixture, at any time using this function.
您可以在任何时候使用这个id来设置绑定夹具(而不是"基础"夹具)的摩擦值。
You can use this id to set the restitution value of the bound fixture, not the "base" fixture, at any time using this function.
您可以随时通过此函数，使用此id来设置绑定夹具的恢复值，而不是"基础"夹具的恢复值。
You can use this if you need a unique file name, or anything else that needs something to identify your game only.
如果你需要一个唯一的文件名，或者其他需要识别游戏的东西，你可以使用这个。
You can use this to get the domain where your HTML5 game is being played.
你可以使用它来获取正在玩HTML5游戏的域。
You can, however, use this string to get the font index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用这个字符串使用返回的字符串和asset_get_index()函数来获取字体索引。
You can, however, use this string to get the object index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用这个字符串通过返回的字符串和asset_get_index()函数来获取对象索引。
You can, however, use this string to get the path index ID using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用这个字符串，通过使用返回的字符串和函数asset_get_index()来获取路径索引ID。
You can, however, use this string to get the room index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用这个字符串，使用返回的字符串和asset_get_index()函数来获取房间索引。
You can, however, use this string to get the sprite index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用该字符串，通过使用返回的字符串和函数asset_get_index()来获取sprite索引。
You can, however, use this string to get the tile set index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用此字符串，通过使用返回的字符串和函数asset_get_index()来获取图块集索引。
You can, however, use this string to get the timeline index using the returned string along with the function asset_get_index().
但是，您可以使用该字符串，通过使用返回的字符串和函数asset_get_index()来获取时间轴索引。

You create a DS list and supply its ID along with an x/y position to check and the list will be populated with name string for each of the available attachment slots for the sprite (including any attachment modifications).
您创建一个DS列表，并提供它的ID和一个x/y位置来检查，该列表将用sprite的每个可用附件插槽的名称字符串填充(包括任何附件修改)。
You define the point in the room where the joint should be created, as well as the angle that you wish the joint to try and maintain at all times, as shown in the image below:
你在房间中定义关节应该创建的点，以及你希望关节尝试并始终保持的角度，如下图所示:
You give the DS grid index (as returned by ds_grid_create()) along with the x/y positions for the center cell of the disk.
给出DS网格索引(由ds_grid_create()返回)以及磁盘中心单元的x/y位置。

You give the DS grid index (as returned by ds_grid_create()) along with the x/y positions for the top left and bottom right corners of the grid region to search, before supplying the value to search for.
在提供要搜索的值之前，需要给出DS网格索引(由ds_grid_create()返回)以及要搜索的网格区域左上角和右下角的x/y位置。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return a real value that represents the sprite index being shown.
给定背景元素ID(在使用layer_background_create()创建背景元素或使用函数layer_background_get_id()时获得)，此函数将返回一个表示所显示的sprite索引的真实值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return a value between 0 (fully transparent) and 1 (fully opaque).
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，函数将返回一个介于0(完全透明)和1(完全不透明)之间的值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return either true if the element is currently tiled, or false if it is not.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建一个背景元素时得到)，如果元素当前是平铺的，函数将返回true，如果不是，则返回false。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return either true if the element is currently visible, or false if it is not.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，如果元素当前可见，此函数将返回true，如果不可见，则返回false。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return either true if the element sprite is currently stretched to fit the room, or false if it is not.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，如果精灵元素当前被拉伸以适应房间，此函数将返回true，如果不是，则返回false。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return real value that represents the colour assigned.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，函数将返回代表分配的颜色的真实值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return real value that represents the image index being shown for the sprite.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，函数将返回真实值，表示为精灵显示的图像索引。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return real value that represents the scale multiplier being used to draw the sprite.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，函数将返回代表用于绘制精灵的缩放倍数值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and the function will return real value that represents the speed multiplier being used to animate the sprite.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，函数将返回代表用于动画精灵的速度乘数的真实值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the alpha value to use.
给出背景元素ID(使用layer_background_create()创建背景元素或使用layer_background_get_id()函数时获得)，然后设置要使用的透明度(alpha)值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the animation speed.
给出背景元素ID(使用layer_background_create()创建背景元素时获得，或者使用layer_background_get_id()函数获得)，然后设置动画速度。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the blending colour to use.
给出背景元素ID(使用layer_background_create()创建背景元素或使用layer_background_get_id()函数时获得)，然后设置要使用的混合颜色。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the image index to use.
你给出背景元素ID(当你使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，然后设置图像索引为use。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the scale value.
给出背景元素ID(当使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，然后设置缩放值。

You give the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()), and then set the tiling value.
给出背景元素ID(当使用layer_background_create()或使用layer_background_get_id()函数创建背景元素时获得)，然后设置平铺值。

You give the unique camera ID value (as returned by the different camera_create() functions) and then give the width and height (in pixels) to set the camera to.
给出惟一的相机ID值(由不同的camera_create()函数返回)，然后给出相机的宽度和高度(以像素为单位)。

You give the unique camera ID value (as returned by the different camera_create() functions) and then give the x and y (horizontal and vertical) speed that it should move when set to follow a given instance.
您给出唯一的相机ID值(由不同的camera_create()函数返回)，然后给出x和y(水平和垂直)速度，当设置为跟随给定实例时，它应该移动。
You give the unique camera ID value (as returned by the different camera_create() functions) and the ID of the function to be called.
您给出惟一的相机ID值(由不同的camera_create()函数返回)和要调用的函数的ID。
You give the unique camera ID value (as returned by the different camera_create() functions) and then give the x and y positions to set the camera to.
您给出唯一的相机ID值(由不同的camera_create()函数返回)，然后给出要设置相机的x和y位置。

You give the unique layer ID as returned by the function layer_create() or the name of the layer to use as a string - for example "instance_layer" - and then flag the system as being persistent or not.
你可以给出由layer_create()函数返回的唯一层ID，或者作为字符串使用的层名 -例如"instance_layer"——然后标记系统是否是持久化的。
You give the view port index (from 0 to 7) and the new height to use.
给出视图端口索引(从0到7)和要使用的新高度。
You give the view port index (from 0 to 7) and the new position to place it at.
您将给出视图端口索引(从0到7)和将其放置的新位置。
You give the view port index (from 0 to 7) and the new width to use.
给出视图端口索引(从0到7)和要使用的新宽度。
You give the view port to set (from 0 to 7), and supply the unique camera ID value (as returned by the camera_create() functions or when you use view_get_camera()).
给出要设置的视图端口(从0到7)，并提供唯一的相机ID值(由camera_create()函数返回或在使用view_get_camera()时返回)。
You have to have created the sprite to be copied to previously using the sprite_add() or sprite_duplicate() functions.
您必须已经使用sprite_add()或sprite_duplicate()函数创建了要复制到的sprite。

You may (optionally) supply X and Y offset values for the surface being used to add to the GIF, in which case the part drawn to the GIF will begin from the offset and not the default (0,0) position, permitting you to select only a section of the surface to add.
您可以(可选)为用于添加到GIF的表面提供X和Y偏移值，在这种情况下，绘制到GIF的零件将从偏移而不是默认(0，0)位置开始，允许您仅选择要添加的表面部分。
You may also add in a directory to start the search from, and a caption to be shown at the top of the window instead of the default one.
您还可以添加一个开始搜索的目录，并在窗口顶部显示一个标题，而不是默认的标题。
You may also specify an optional argument to set the "clear colour" for the GIF.
您还可以指定一个可选参数来设置GIF的"透明色"。

You may also supply two optional arguments to the function to specify an offset into the array to get the arguments from, as well as the number of arguments to use from the array (this must be a maximum of array_length - offset).
您还可以向函数提供两个可选参数，以指定要从数组中获取参数的偏移量，以及要从数组中使用的参数数量(这必须是array_length - offset的最大值)。
You must also give the light an index number which what will be used in other functions to reference it.
你还必须给光一个数字索引，这将用于其他函数来引用它。
You must also supply a score, and a short text message as well as set the challenge type.
您还必须提供一个分数，一个简短的文本消息，以及设置挑战类型。
You must also supply radius values for the x and y axis (in pixels) and the corners will be rounded by these amounts.
您还必须提供x轴和y轴的半径值(以像素为单位)，角将按这些值圆化。
You must call this first, then define the format values using the appropriate functions, and finally call vertex_format_end() to finish the definition and return the new format "handle".
您必须首先调用它，然后使用适当的函数定义格式值，最后调用vertex_format_end()来完成定义并返回新的格式"handle"。

You must define the socket protocol (see the list of constants below) and give a port to use, and the function will return a unique id which should be used in all further function calls for that socket, or a value of less than 0 if the connection fails.
您必须定义套接字协议(参见下面的常量列表)并给出要使用的端口，函数将返回一个惟一的id，该id应该在该套接字的所有后续函数调用中使用，或者在连接失败时返回一个小于0的值。

You must define the socket type (see the list of constants below) and the function will return a unique id for that socket, which should be used in all further function calls for that socket, or a value of less than 0 if the connection fails.
您必须定义套接字类型(参见下面的常量列表)，函数将为该套接字返回一个惟一的id，该id应该在该套接字的所有后续函数调用中使用，或者在连接失败时返回一个小于0的值。
You must first create a new DS list to read the string into, and if the DS list already exists and has information stored in it, then this will be cleared before reading.
您必须首先创建一个新的DS列表来读取字符串，如果DS列表已经存在并且其中存储了信息，那么在读取之前将会清除该列表。
You must first create a new DS priority to read the string into, and if the DS priority already exists and has information stored in it, then this will be cleared before reading.
您必须首先创建一个新的DS优先级来将字符串读入其中，如果DS优先级已经存在并在其中存储了信息，那么将在读取之前清除此优先级。
You must first create a new DS queue to read the string into, and if the DS queue already exists and has information stored in it, then this will be cleared before reading.
您必须首先创建一个新的DS队列来读取字符串，如果DS队列已经存在并且在其中存储了信息，那么在读取之前将会清除该队列。
You must first create a new DS stack to read the string into, and if the DS stack already exists and has information stored in it, then this will be cleared before reading.
您必须首先创建一个新的DS堆栈来读取字符串，如果DS堆栈已经存在并且其中存储了信息，那么在读取之前将会清除该堆栈。

You must first have begun the group definition using the function physics_particle_group_begin(), and then you would use this function to set the approximate half width and half height of the group in pixels - approximate because the exact width and height will depend on the size of the base particles, as defined by the physics_particle_set_radius() function, as the physics simulation tries to "fit" as many of the particles as possible into the defined shape.
必须首先使用函数physics_particle_group_begin()开始组定义，然后使用此函数以像素为单位设置组的近似半宽和半高，因为精确的宽度和高度将取决于基本粒子的大小，如physics_particle_set_radius()函数所定义的，因为物理模拟会尝试将尽可能多的粒子"适合"定义的形状。

You must first have begun the group definition using the function physics_particle_group_begin(), and then you would use this function to set the approximate radius of the group in pixels - approximate because the exact radius will depend on the size of the base particles, as defined by the physics_particle_set_radius() function, as the physics simulation tries to "fit" as many of the particles as possible into the defined shape.
您必须首先使用函数physics_particle_group_begin()开始组定义，然后使用此函数以像素为单位设置组的近似半径-近似，因为精确的半径将取决于基本粒子的大小，如physics_particle_set_radius()函数所定义的，因为物理模拟试图将尽可能多的粒子"适合"定义的形状。

You must first have begun the group definition using the function physics_particle_group_begin(), and then you would use this function to tell GameMaker that you are going to add in the approximate points that will be used to define the polygon shape - approximate because the exact shape will depend on the size of the base particles, as defined by the physics_particle_set_radius() function, as the physics simulation tries to "fit" as many of the particles as possible into the defined shape.
你必须首先开始组定义使用函数physics_particle_group_begin(),然后您将使用此函数告诉GameMaker你要加入的近似点用于定义多边形形状——大概是因为精确的形状取决于基本粒子的大小,定义的physics_particle_set_radius()函数,物理模拟试图"适合"尽可能多的粒子的成定义的形状。
You must give at least three points when defining the polygon shape, but can give up to eight, and the function will permit the definition of concave polygons.
在定义多边形形状时，您必须给出至少3个点，但最多可以给出8个点，并且此函数将允许定义凹多边形。
You must give the kind of primitive to use (see draw_primitive_begin() for more information) and the id of a texture to use, which can be a sprite or background image asset.
您必须给出要使用的图元的种类(有关更多信息，请参见draw_primitive_begin())和要使用的纹理的id，它可以是精灵或背景图像资源。
You must have previously called the function buffer_async_group_begin() to initiate the group, then call the function buffer_save_async() for each file that you wish to save out.
您必须在之前调用函数buffer_async_group_begin()来初始化组，然后为您希望保存的每个文件调用函数buffer_save_async()。

You must have previously signaled to GameMaker that you are going define a polygon shape using the function physics_particle_group_polygon() and then use this function to define the individual points of the polygon.
你必须事先通知GameMaker，你将使用physics_particle_group_polygon()函数定义一个多边形形状，然后使用此函数定义多边形的各个点。
You must previously have gotten the "handle" of the constant using the function shader_get_uniform(), and you will have to have previously initialised the array.
您必须事先使用函数shader_get_uniform()获得常量的"句柄"，并且必须事先初始化该数组。
You must previously have gotten the "handle" of the constant using the function shader_get_uniform(), and you will have to have previously initialised the buffer and filled it with buffer_f32 data.
您之前必须使用函数 shader_get_uniform() 获得常量的“句柄”，并且您必须事先初始化缓冲区并用 buffer_f32 数据填充它。

You must previously have gotten the "handle" of the constant using the function shader_get_uniform(), and you will have to know what type of constant it is to pass the correct number of floating point values through to it, ie: if you have a vec2 you will need to pass two values to the function.
你必须事先使用shader_get_uniform()函数获得常量的"句柄"，你必须知道它是什么类型的常量，通过它传递正确的浮点值的数量，即:如果你有一个vec2，你将需要传递两个值给函数。

You must previously have gotten the "handle" of the constant using the function shader_get_uniform(), and you will have to know what type of constant it is to pass the correct number of integer values through to it, ie: if you have a vec2 you will need to pass two values to the function.
你必须事先使用shader_get_uniform()函数获得常量的"句柄"，你必须知道它是什么类型的常量，通过它传递正确的整数值的数量，例如:如果你有一个vec2，你需要传递两个值给函数。
You must previously have gotten the "handle" of the constant using the function shader_get_uniform().
你必须在此之前使用shader_get_uniform()函数获得该常量的"句柄"。
You must previously have loaded the buffer into memory (using buffer_load()) and then passing that into this function will return a DS map populated with the contents of the buffer.
您以前必须将缓冲区加载到内存中(使用buffer_load())，然后将其传递给此函数将返回一个填充了缓冲区内容的DS map。
You must then supply the buffer id which contains the data to be sent (for more information on buffers see Reference - Buffers) and finally the size (in bytes) of the data.
然后必须提供包含要发送的数据的缓冲区id(有关缓冲区的更多信息，请参阅参考-缓冲区)，最后还要提供数据的大小(以字节为单位)。
You need to have previously created the both the button element (using clickable_add()) and the DS Map and supply the stored indices to each as arguments.
您需要在之前创建按钮元素(使用clickable_add())和DS Map，并将存储的索引作为参数提供给它们。
You need to supply a starting grid cell (as an x and y axis coordinate) as well as the radius of the disk to set and the value that you wish to set the disk too, as shown by the illustration below:
您需要提供一个起始网格单元(作为x和y轴坐标),以及要设置的圆盘半径和要设置的圆盘值，如下图所示:

You need to supply both the source and the destination arrays (both need to have been created previously), as well as a position within the source array to copy from and a position within the destination array to copy to.
您需要提供源数组和目标数组(这两个数组都需要事先创建好)，以及源数组中要复制的位置和目标数组中要复制的位置。
You need to supply the group index which is the value returned when you created the group using the function audio_create_sync_group().
您需要提供组索引，这是使用函数audio_create_sync_group()创建组时返回的值。

You need to supply the layer ID, which can either be the name of the layer as written in the code editor (as a string) or the actual layer ID value as returned by the layer_create(), and note that you can only deactivate instance layers with this function.
您需要提供层ID，它可以是代码编辑器中写入的层名称(作为字符串)，也可以是layer_create()返回的实际层ID值，注意，您只能通过此函数禁用实例层。

You need to supply the layer ID, which can either be the name of the layer as written in the code editor (as a string) or the actual layer ID value as returned by the layer_create() and all deactivated instances on that layer will activated once again.
你需要提供层ID，它可以是代码编辑器中写入的层名称(作为字符串)，也可以是layer_create()返回的实际层ID值，该层上所有未激活的实例将再次激活。
You need to supply the sprite index to set, the animation speed and the type of animation speed to apply.
您需要提供要设置的精灵索引、动画速度和要应用的动画速度类型。

You pass data format (only buffer_u8 or buffer_s16 are currently supported), the sample rate (which can be between 1000hz and 48000hz), and the channels that the audio requires from one of the constants listed below:
你传递数据格式(目前只支持buffer_u8或buffer_s16)，采样率(可以在1000hz到48000hz之间)，以及音频所需的通道，从下面列出的常量之一:
You pass in the struct reference to check, and each entry in the array will be a string of the variable names that the struct contains.
传入结构引用进行检查，数组中的每个条目将是结构包含的变量名的字符串。
You provide a struct which contains a set of required parameters as well as any additional playback parameters.
您提供了一个结构，其中包含一组必需的参数以及任何附加的回放参数。

You provide the coordinates for the upper left corner and lower right corner of the rectangular area to draw the text, and GameMaker will take care of the rest, with spacing and position being done automatically.
你为绘制文本的矩形区域的左上角和右下角提供坐标，GameMaker将负责剩下的工作，并自动完成间距和位置。
You provide the emitter index to use, the sound index of the sound to be played and then specify whether the sound is to loop or not.
您提供要使用的发射器索引，要播放的声音的声音索引，然后指定声音是否要循环。
You provide the format ID value (as returned by the function vector_format_end()), and this function will free the memory associated with it.
您提供格式ID值(由函数vector_format_end()返回)，此函数将释放与之相关的内存。

You provide the sound index and assign it a priority, which is then used to determine how sounds are dealt with when the number of sounds playing is over the limit set by the function audio_channel_num().
您提供声音索引并为其分配优先级，然后使用该优先级来确定当播放的声音数量超过函数audio_channel_num()设置的限制时如何处理声音。
You provide the sound index and then assign it a position within the 3D space.
您可以提供声音索引，然后在3D空间中为其分配一个位置。
You set whether it is enabled (true) or disabled (false), the colour that the fog should use for blending, as well as the start and end draw distances.
您可以设置它是启用(true)还是禁用(false)，雾应该用于混合的颜色，以及开始和结束绘制的距离。
You should also be aware that this function is dependent on the physics_world_update_speed() function.
你也应该知道此函数依赖于physics_world_update_speed()函数。

You should also be sure to use the function timeline_delete() whenever you no longer wish to use the time line (like at the end of the room) so as to prevent any possible memory leaks that could slow down or crash your game.
你还应该确保在你不再希望使用时间线的时候使用timeline_delete()函数(比如在房间的尽头)，以防止任何可能导致游戏变慢或崩溃的内存泄漏。

You should also note that HTTP request parameters (the bits sometimes "tacked on" to the end of a URL when you submit a form on a web page) are perfectly acceptable when using this function, for example:
你还应该注意HTTP请求参数(当你在网页上提交表单时，有时会"附加"到URL的末尾)在使用此函数时是完全可以接受的，例如:
You should also realise that nothing will be seen if the surface itself is not drawn on the screen in the draw event of an instance.
您还应该意识到，如果在实例的绘制事件中表面本身没有绘制到屏幕上，则什么也不会看到。
You should always check this using the is_undefined() function.
您应该总是使用is_undefined()函数来检查这一点。
You should call the function push_get_first_local_notification() to get the first notification in the queue and then use this function to continue through it.
您应该调用函数push_get_first_local_notification()来获取队列中的第一个通知，然后使用此函数继续处理它。

You should never destroy a camera that is currently assigned to a visible view, unless you are assigning a new camera to that view in the same step, and you should always destroy any cameras that you have created through code when no longer required by your game to prevent memory leaks, and you can also destroy the default cameras if you have any assigned in the Room Editor, but you should assign a new camera to the view port (or disable it) otherwise you will get odd results.
永远不要销毁当前分配给可见视图的相机，除非您在同一步骤中为该视图分配新的相机，并且您应该始终销毁您通过代码创建的游戏不再需要的任何相机，以防止内存泄漏，如果您在房间编辑器中分配了任何默认相机，您也可以销毁默认相机，但是您应该为视图端口分配一个新的相机(或禁用它)，否则您会得到奇怪的结果。
You should note that a persistent room uses considerably more memory than a normal room and it is not recommended to have too many of them in your game.
你应该注意到永久房间比普通房间占用更多的内存，不建议在你的游戏中有太多的永久房间。

You should note that if the texture page permits automatic cropping then this function may not work as expected, since the extra "empty" space around the sprite will have been removed for creating the texture page.
您应该注意，如果纹理页面允许自动裁剪，则此函数可能无法按预期工作，因为精灵周围的额外"空白"空间将在创建纹理时页面被删除。

You should note too that this function must be called before defining any points, and you must also have at least three points defined for your polygon before binding it to an instance or you will get an error.
你也应该注意到，此函数必须在定义任何点之前被调用，并且在将你的多边形绑定到一个实例之前，你也必须为你的多边形定义至少三个点，否则你将得到一个错误。
You should use this flag rather than set the density to 0.
您应该使用此标志，而不是将密度设置为0。
You simply supply the function with a buffer id, and then an offset position (from the buffer start) within that buffer to read from, as well as the data type that you are wanting to read.
您只需向此函数提供一个缓冲区id，然后提供要读取的缓冲区内的偏移位置(从缓冲区开始)，以及您想要读取的数据类型。
You simply supply the function with a buffer index, and then the offset position from the buffer start (in bytes) within that buffer to write to, as well as the data type and the value to be written.
您只需为此函数提供一个缓冲区索引，然后提供要写入的缓冲区中从缓冲区开始的偏移位置(以字节为单位)，以及要写入的数据类型和值。
You specify an FX struct (as returned from fx_create() or layer_get_fx()) and a struct containing its parameters (as returned from fx_get_parameters()).
指定一个FX结构(从fx_create()或layer_get_fx()返回)和一个包含其参数的结构(从fx_get_parameters()返回)。
You specify an FX struct (as returned from fx_create() or layer_get_fx()), a parameter name as a string, and its new value.
指定FX结构(从fx_create()或layer_get_fx()返回)、字符串形式的参数名及其新值。

You specify the anchor point for the joint well as the two physics enabled instances to joint, and the first instance will act as the "body" for the joint, while the second will be the "wheel", and be permitted to move freely around the joint axis.
您为关节井指定锚点，并为两个启用物理的实例指定关节，第一个实例将作为关节的"主体"，而第二个实例将作为"轮子"，并允许绕关节轴自由移动。

You specify the bounding box of the area within the function and then use any of a series of constants to define the final emitter shape within this bounding box as well as the distribution of particles within the shape.
在函数中指定区域的边界框，然后使用一系列常量中的任何一个来定义该边界框内的最终发射器形状以及该形状内的粒子分布。

You specify the buffer ID of the buffer to use, then an offset value (in bytes) for where to begin, and then a size (again in bytes) for the region to be hashed, and the function will return a 32 bit integer value for that region.
您指定要使用的缓冲区的缓冲区ID，然后指定开始位置的偏移值(以字节为单位),然后指定要散列的区域的大小(也是以字节为单位),此函数将返回该区域的32位整数值。
You specify the device slot to get, and the function will return a value between 0 to 1, where value reflects the threshold under which the joystick axis is considered to be at 0.
你指定要获取的设备槽位，函数将返回一个介于0到1之间的值，该值反映了操纵杆轴处于0以下的阈值。
You specify the device slot to set, and then give a colour, which can be any of the colour constants or a colour value created using the specific colour functions or a HEX value(like $FFFFFFF).
您指定要设置的设备插槽，然后给出一个颜色，它可以是任何颜色常量或使用特定颜色函数创建的颜色值或十六进制值(如$FFFFFFF)。
You specify the device slot to set, and then set a value from 0 to 1 and if the input amount is lower than the given value, the joystick axis is considered to be at 0.
您指定要设置的设备插槽，然后设置一个从0到1的值，如果输入量低于给定值，操纵杆轴将被视为处于0。

You specify the object that you want to find the instance of and a number, and if there is an instance at that position in the instance list then the function returns the id of that instance, and if not it returns the special keyword noone.
指定要查找实例的对象和一个数字，如果实例列表中该位置有实例，则函数返回该实例的id，如果没有，则返回特殊关键字noone。
You specify the queue index to add to, and the buffer ID to get the data from as well as the position (offset) within the buffer and the number of bytes to add.

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create() or when you use the layer name along with layer_get_id()), a position within the room, and a sprite index (which would be the name of the sprite as shown in the Asset Browser), and it will be added to the layer.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层或当你使用layer_get_id()层名时获得)，房间内的位置，和精灵索引(这将是在资源浏览器中显示的精灵的名称)，它将被添加到层。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and a sprite index (which would be the name of the sprite as shown in the Asset Browser), and it will be added to the layer.
您提供层ID(使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为字符串-这将影响性能)和精灵索引(将是资源浏览器中显示的精灵名称)，它将被添加到层。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the background element ID (which you get when you create a background element using layer_background_create() or when you use the function layer_background_get_id()) and the function will return either true if the element exists, or false if it does not.
提供图层ID(使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(以字符串形式，这将影响性能)和背景元素ID(使用layer_background_create()创建背景元素或使用layer_background_get_id()函数时获得)，如果元素存在，函数将返回true，否则返回false。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function returns a real number for the horizontal speed, where a positive value is to the right and a negative value to the left.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，函数返回水平速度的实数，其中正值为右，负值为左。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function returns a real number for the vertical speed, where a positive value is down and a negative value up.
您可以提供图层ID(在使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(以字符串形式，这将对性能产生影响),函数将返回垂直速度的实数，其中正值表示向下，负值表示向上。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function returns a real number for the x position of the layer, relative to the (0,0) position of the room.
您可以提供层ID(在使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为一个字符串，这将影响性能),此函数返回层的x位置的实数，相对于房间的(0，0)位置。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will move the layer the given number of pixels along the horizontal axis of the room.
您可以提供层ID(在使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名(作为字符串—这将影响性能)，函数将沿房间的水平轴移动层的给定像素数。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will move the layer the given number of pixels along the vertical axis of the room.
您可以提供层ID(在使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名(作为字符串—这将影响性能)，函数将沿房间的垂直轴移动层的给定像素数。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will return a boolean value of true if it exists or false if it does not.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，函数将返回布尔值true如果存在，false如果不存在。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will return an array of IDs, where each entry in the array is a unique ID for an element on that layer.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，函数将返回一个ID数组，其中数组中的每个条目是该层上一个元素的唯一ID。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will return that layers depth as a real number.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，函数将返回层深度作为实数。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will return the ID value associated with the tile map element on the layer.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，函数将返回与层上的tile map元素相关的ID值。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the function will return true if it is visible, and false otherwise.
您可以提供图层ID(在使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(作为字符串，这将影响性能),如果可见，函数将返回true，否则返回false。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the instance ID of the instance to check for.
您提供层ID(使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为字符串，这将影响性能)以及要检查的实例的实例ID。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the instance ID of the instance to move between layers.
您可以提供层ID(使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为字符串，这将影响性能)以及实例的实例ID，以便在层之间移动。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the speed value to set, where a positive value is downwards and a negative value upwards.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)和速度值设置，其中正值向下和负值向上。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the speed value to set, where a positive value is to the right and a negative value to the left.
您需要提供图层ID(使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(字符串形式，这将影响性能)以及要设置的速度值，其中正值在右侧，负值在左侧。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the sprite element ID (which you get when you create a sprite element using layer_sprite_create() or when you use the function layer_sprite_get_id()) and the function will return either true if the element exists, or false if it does not.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)和精灵元素ID(当你使用layer_sprite_create()或使用layer_sprite_get_id()函数创建精灵元素时获得)，函数将返回true如果元素存在，或false如果它不存在。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and the tile map element ID (which you get when you create a tile map element using layer_tilemap_create() or when you use the function layer_tilemap_get_id()) and the function will return either true if the element exists, or false if it does not.
您提供层ID(当您使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)和tilemap元素ID(当您使用layer_tilemap_create()或使用layer_tilemap_get_id()函数创建tilemap元素时获得)，函数将返回true如果元素存在，或false如果它不存在。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and then an initial (x, y) position to add the tile map to the room, the tile set resource to use, and then the width and height of the tile map in cells (ie: a width of 20 and a height of 10 will create a tile map with 200 cells that is 20 cells wide and 10 cells tall), with the size of the cells themselves being defined by the tile set chosen.
您提供层ID(使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为字符串，这将影响性能),然后提供初始(x，y)位置以将tile map添加到房间，要使用的图块集资源，然后是以单元为单位的tile map的宽度和高度(即:宽度为20，高度为10将创建具有200个单元的tile map，其中20个单元宽，10个单元高)，单元本身的大小由所选的图块集定义。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and then give the new depth to set it to (an integer value form -16000 to 16000).
您可以提供图层ID(使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(作为字符串，这将对性能产生影响)，然后给出新的深度以将其设置为(一个从-16000到16000的整数值)。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and this function will return the script function index of the function assigned to run at the beginning of rendering for that layer, or it will return -1 if no function is assigned. You can assign script functions to a layer with layer_script_begin() and layer_script_end().
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，此函数将返回在该层渲染开始时分配运行的函数的脚本函数索引，或者如果没有分配函数，它将返回-1。可以使用layer_script_begin()和layer_script_end()将脚本函数分配给一个层。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact) and this will remove it from the current room.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时得到)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，这将从当前房间删除它。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact), and the function will return either the shader index of the shader assigned, or -1 if no shader is assigned.
您可以提供层ID(在使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名称(作为字符串，这将对性能产生影响)，函数将返回指定着色器的着色器索引，如果没有指定着色器，则返回-1。

You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact), and then all instances that are on the layer will be removed from the game, triggering their Destroy and Clean Up events.
你提供层ID(当你使用layer_create()创建层时获得)或层名(作为字符串-这将有性能影响)，然后该层上的所有实例将从游戏中删除，触发它们的Destroy和Clean Up事件。
You supply the layer ID (which you get when you create the layer using layer_create()) or the layer name (as a string - this will have a performance impact).
您可以提供图层ID(在使用layer_create()创建图层时获得)或图层名称(作为字符串，这将对性能产生影响)。
You supply the layer ID (which you get when you use the layer name along with layer_get_id()) and the function will return the ID value associated with the background element on the layer.
你提供图层ID(当你使用图层名称和layer_get_id()时得到)，函数将返回与图层上的背景元素相关的ID值。

You supply the layer ID which can be a string of the layer name - as defined in the room editor - or the unique layer ID - as returned by the function layer_get_id(), as well as the X and Y position in the room to create the sequence at, and finally the ID of the sequence to create.
您提供的层ID可以是层名的字符串(如在房间编辑器中定义的那样)，也可以是函数layer_get_id()返回的惟一层ID，以及要创建序列的房间中的X和Y位置，最后是要创建序列的ID。

You supply the layer ID which can be a string of the layer name - as defined in the room editor - or the unique layer ID - as returned by the function layer_get_id(), as well the sequence element ID - as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions - and it will return true if the given element exists or false otherwise.
你提供的层ID可以是层名的字符串-在房间编辑器中定义-或唯一的层ID -由函数layer_get_id()返回，以及序列元素ID -由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回-如果给定的元素存在，它将返回true，否则返回false。
You supply the low value for the range as well as the high value, and the function will return a random integer value within (and including) the given range.
您提供范围的下限值和上限值，函数将返回给定范围内(包括)的随机整数值。
You supply the mouse button to check from one of the following constants:
你提供鼠标按钮从以下常量之一进行检查:
You supply the name (and path) of the file, then the name of the function that you wish to define.
先提供文件的名称(和路径)，然后再提供希望定义的函数的名称。

You supply the name of the global variable to get the value of as a string (see example code below) and the function will return the value held by the global variable or undefined if the variable does not exist.
您提供全局变量的名称以获得字符串形式的值(参见下面的示例代码)，函数将返回由全局变量持有的值，如果变量不存在，则返回undefined。
You supply the name of the global variable to set the value of as a string (see example code below), and then the value to set (can be any valid data type).
您提供全局变量的名称以字符串的形式设置值(参见下面的示例代码)，然后是要设置的值(可以是任何有效的数据类型)。

You supply the name of the previously defined function as well as each of the arguments it requires (each argument must be of the correct type, either real or string) and the function returns the result of the external call.
您提供前面定义的函数的名称以及它需要的每个参数(每个参数必须是正确的类型，要么是real要么是string)，函数返回外部调用的结果。
You supply the particle system ID value (as returned by the function part_system_create_layer()) and the function will return the ID value of the layer.
您提供粒子系统ID值(由函数part_system_create_layer()返回)，函数将返回层的ID值。

You supply the particle system ID value (as returned by the function part_system_create_layer()) and then the unique layer ID (as returned by the function layer_create() or the name of the layer to use as a string - for example "instance_layer" - as defined in the room editor), and the system will be moved to the new layer.
您可以提供粒子系统ID值(由函数part_system_create_layer()返回)，然后是惟一的层ID(由函数layer_create()返回，或者作为字符串使用的层名——例如"instance_layer"——如在room编辑器中定义的那样)，然后系统将被移动到新层。
You supply the permission to check as a string using the format "android.permission.<permission>", so to check the RECORD_AUDIO permission (for example) you would call
您使用"android.permission"格式将检查权限作为字符串提供。"，因此要检查RECORD_AUDIO权限(例如)，您将调用</permission>
You supply the room index (stored in the variable for the room name, or as a variable returned from the function room_add()).
您提供房间索引(存储在房间名称的变量中，或作为从函数room_add()返回的变量)。

You supply the room index to set the view port in, the view port index (from 0 to 7) and then whether the view port should be visible at the start of the room or not (set to true to make the port visible, and false otherwise).
您需要提供房间索引来设置视口，视口索引(从0到7)以及视口在房间开始时是否可见(设置为true以使视口可见，否则设置为false)。
You supply the room index, the view index (from 0 to 7) and then the index of the camera to use.
您提供房间索引、视图索引(从0到7)以及要使用的相机的索引。
You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the X position to set and the sequence will be moved to the new position.
您提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，并设置X位置，序列将被移动到新位置。
You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the Y position to set and the sequence will be moved to the new position.
您提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，并设置Y位置，序列将被移动到新位置。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the new angle to set and the sequence will be rotated about its origin to the new position.
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID以及要设置的新角度，序列将围绕其原点旋转到新位置。
You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the new position to set.
您提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID以及要设置的新位置。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the new scale to set on the X axis and the sequence will be scaled by this amount. A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the width of the sequence), larger values will scale up and negative values will mirror the sequence about its origin and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sequence is just mirrored about its origin with no scaling).
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，并在X轴上设置新的比例，序列将按此比例缩放。1表示不进行缩放(1:1)，较小的值将按比例缩小(例如，0.5将是序列宽度的一半)，较大的值将按比例扩大，负值将按原点镜像序列并缩放它，除非所使用的值正好是-1(在这种情况下，序列仅按原点镜像，不进行缩放)。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the new scale to set on the Y axis and the sequence will be scaled by this amount. A scale of 1 indicates no scaling (1:1), smaller values will scale down (0.5, for example, will half the width of the sequence), larger values will scale up and negative values will flip the sequence about its origin and scale it unless the value used is exactly -1 (in which case the sequence is just flipped about its origin with no scaling).
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，并在Y轴上设置新的比例，序列将按此比例缩放。1表示不进行缩放(1:1)，较小的值将按比例缩小(例如，0.5将是序列宽度的一半)，较大的值将按比例扩大，负值将按原点翻转序列并缩放它，除非使用的值正好是-1(在这种情况下，序列只是按原点翻转而没有缩放)。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions and the function will pause the sequence until you begin playback again using the function layer_sequence_play().
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，此函数将暂停序列，直到你使用layer_sequence_play()函数再次开始播放。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions and the function will play the sequence, which you can then pause if required using the function layer_sequence_pause().
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，此函数将播放序列，然后你可以在需要时使用layer_sequence_pause()函数暂停序列。
You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions and the sequence will be destroyed.
您提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个layer element函数返回的序列元素ID，序列将被销毁。
You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions and then a speed scale value.
您可以提供由layer_sequence_create()或其中一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，然后是速度缩放值。

You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions, and then give the playhead direction which should be one of the following constants:
你提供由layer_sequence_create()或由一个层元素函数返回的序列元素ID，然后给出播放头方向，应该是以下常量之一:

You supply the sequence instance struct ID (as returned when the sequence instance was created in the room or by using one of the room layer functions - see here), as well as the object index (as defined in the asset browser) for the object that you want to override.
您提供序列实例结构ID(当序列实例在房间中创建时返回，或者通过使用房间层函数之一返回—参见这里)，以及您想要覆盖的对象的对象索引(在资源浏览器中定义)。

You supply the server type, then give it a port to use, and finally the number of maximum connections that should be permitted at any one time to the server (note that this number is up to you, but too many connected clients will saturate the network or the device CPU won't be able to handle the processing of that number of players, so use with care).
你提供服务器类型，然后给它一个使用的端口，最后是在任何时候允许服务器的最大连接数(注意，这个数字取决于你，但太多连接的客户端会使网络饱和，或者设备CPU将无法处理这么多玩家的处理，所以使用时要小心)。

You supply the skeleton animation name (as a string, as defined in the program used to make the animation, or as returned by using the function skeleton_animation_get, and the function returns the frames that it has as an integer value.
您提供骨架动画名称(作为字符串，如用于制作动画的程序中定义的那样，或通过使用函数skeleton on_animation_get返回的那样，此函数返回作为整数值的帧。
You supply the slot name (a string) and the function will return an integer value for the colour.
您提供槽名(一个字符串),函数将返回颜色的整数值。
You supply the slot name (a string) and the function will return an real value for the alpha between 0 and 1.
您提供插槽名称(一个字符串),函数将返回一个介于0和1之间的alpha的实数值。
You supply the sprite ID (which you get when you create the sprite using layer_sprite_create() or when you use the layer ID along with layer_get_sprite_id()) and this will remove it.
你提供精灵ID(当你使用layer_sprite_create()创建精灵时，或者当你使用layer_get_sprite_id()时，你会得到它)，这将删除它。
You supply the sprite index (as defined when creating the sprite resource) and the texture page it is assigned to will be removed from texture memory.
你提供了精灵索引(创建精灵资源时定义的),它被分配到的纹理页面将从纹理内存中移除。
You supply the sprite index and the Nine Slice struct to apply, which can be retrieved using sprite_nineslice_create() or sprite_get_nineslice().
您提供sprite索引和要应用的九宫格结构，可以使用sprite_nineslice_create()或sprite_get_nineslice()来检索它们。
You supply the sprite index and the mode to use, which should be one of the following constants:
您需要提供精灵索引和要使用的模式，它应该是下列常量之一:
You supply the sprite index as defined when you created the sprite asset, and the texture page it is on will be loaded into memory.
您提供了创建sprite资源时定义的sprite索引，它所在的纹理页面将被加载到内存中。
You supply the sprite index of the sprite to check, and the function will return one of the constants shown below.
您提供要检查的精灵的精灵索引，此函数将返回如下所示的常量之一。
You supply the sprite index to use and then the left, top, right and bottom values for the bounding box positions.
您提供要使用的精灵索引，然后提供边界框位置的左、上、右和下值。
You supply the sprite indices as an array and the texture pages they are assigned to will be removed from texture memory.
你以数组的形式提供精灵索引，它们被分配到的纹理页面将从纹理内存中移除。
You supply the string to parse, and the function will return the top level array or struct which can then be checked in your code.
您提供要解析的字符串，函数将返回顶级数组或结构，然后可以在代码中进行检查。
You supply the struct ID to check, and the function will return an integer value for the number of variables encountered, or (if no struct of the given ID exists) -1.
您提供要检查的结构ID，函数将返回遇到的变量数量的整数值，或者(如果给定ID的结构不存在)-1。
You supply the struct ID to remove the variable from and the string name of the variable to be removed.
您提供要从中删除变量的结构ID和要删除的变量的字符串名称。

You supply the struct pointer for the channel (as returned by the function animcurve_get_channel(), or as returned in the animation curve struct from the function animcurve_get()) and the "x" (time) position along the curve channel to evaluate.
为通道提供结构指针(由函数animcurve_get_channel()返回，或由函数animcurve_get()在动画曲线结构中返回)和曲线通道沿线的"x"(时间)位置进行计算。
You supply the struct reference as well as the name of the variable to get the value of as a string (see example code below).
您提供结构引用以及变量名，以获得字符串形式的值(参见下面的示例代码)。
You supply the struct reference as well as the name of the variable to set the value of as a string (see example code below), and then finally the value to set (can be any valid data type).
您提供结构引用以及要设置为字符串的变量名(参见下面的示例代码)，最后是要设置的值(可以是任何有效的数据类型)。
You supply the struct reference to use as well as the variable name to check for as a string (see example code below).
您提供要使用的结构引用以及要作为字符串检查的变量名(参见下面的示例代码)。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the Texture Group Editor), and the function will return a 1D array, where each entry in the array is a single texture page ID.
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，函数将返回一个1D数组，其中数组中的每个条目都是单个纹理页面ID。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) and (optionally) specify whether you want to also prefetch the pages in the group (load them into GPU memory)..
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，并(可选)指定你是否也想在组中预取页面(将它们加载到GPU内存中)。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) and the function will return a 1D array where each entry contains the font index for a font resource.
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，函数将返回一个1D数组，其中每个条目包含字体资源的字体索引。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) and the function will return a 1D array where each entry contains the sprite index for a sprite resource.
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，函数将返回一个1D数组，其中每个条目包含一个精灵资源的精灵索引。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) and the function will return a 1D array where each entry contains the tileset index for a tileset resource.
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，函数将返回一个1D数组，其中每个条目包含一个纹理组资源的索引。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) and the function will return a value indicating the status.
你提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，函数将返回一个指示状态的值。
You supply the texture group ID string (as defined in the texture Group Editor) for the group to unload.
你为要卸载的组提供纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)。
You supply the tile map ID (which you get when you create the tile map using layer_tilemap_create() or when you use the layer ID along with layer_get_tilemap_id()) and this will remove it.
你提供瓷砖地图ID(当你使用layer_tilemap_create()创tile map时，或当你使用图层ID和layer_get_tilemap_id()时，你得到)，这将删除它。
You supply the transform matrix ID (as returned by the function matrix build()), as well as the x, y and z values for the vector to transform.
您提供转换矩阵ID(由函数矩阵build()返回)，以及要转换的向量的x、y和z值。
You supply the unique ID value for the shader to get the name of and the function will return the name of the resource as a string.
你为着色器提供唯一的ID值来获取资源的名称，函数将以字符串的形式返回资源的名称。

You supply the unique element ID value (for example, as returned by the function that created the element or from the room editor) and the function will return the unique ID of the layer that the element is found on.
您提供唯一的元素ID值(例如，由创建元素的函数或从room编辑器返回的值)，函数将返回元素所在层的唯一ID。

You supply the unique element ID value (for example, as returned the function that created the element or from the room editor) and the function will return one of the following constants (or -1 if the element does not exist or the ID value is erroneous):
你提供唯一的元素ID值(例如，返回创建元素的函数或来自room编辑器)，函数将返回以下常量之一(或者-1，如果元素不存在或ID值错误):

You supply the unique instance ID value (which can be found from the Instance Properties in the room editor, or is returned when you call the function instance_create_layer()) as well as the name of the variable to get the value of as a string (see example code below).
您提供唯一的实例ID值(可以从room编辑器中的instance Properties中找到，或者在调用instance_create_layer()函数时返回)以及变量名，以字符串的形式获取值(参见下面的示例代码)。

You supply the unique instance ID value (which can be found from the Instance Properties in the room editor, or is returned when you call the function instance_create_layer()) as well as the name of the variable to set the value of as a string (see example code below), and then finally the value to set (can be any valid data type).
您提供唯一的实例ID值(可以从room编辑器中的instance Properties中找到，或者在调用instance_create_layer()函数时返回)，以及要设置值的变量名作为字符串(参见下面的示例代码)，最后是要设置的值(可以是任何有效的数据类型)。

You supply the unique instance ID value (which can be found from the Instance Properties in the room editor, or is returned when you call the function instance_create_layer()) as well as the variable name to check for as a string (see example code below).
您提供唯一的实例ID值(可以从room编辑器中的instance Properties中找到，或者在调用instance_create_layer()函数时返回)以及要检查的变量名作为字符串(参见下面的示例代码)。
You supply the unique layer ID value and if the layer is one of the named layers created in the room editor, then the function will return a string with the layer name.
您只需提供惟一的层ID值，如果该层是在room编辑器中创建的已命名层之一，则此函数将返回包含层名的字符串。

You supply the unique texture page ID (as returned by the texturegroup_* functions) or the texture group ID string (as defined in the Texture Group Editor), and the function will return true if they have been unpacked, or false otherwise.
你提供唯一的纹理页面ID(由texturegroup_*函数返回)或纹理组ID字符串(在纹理组编辑器中定义)，如果它们已经解包，函数将返回true，否则返回false。

You supply the unique texture page ID (as returned by the texturegroup_* functions) to flush a single page, or you can supply a texture group name (as defined in the Texture Group Editor) to flush all the texture pages in the group.
你可以提供唯一的纹理页面ID(由texturegroup_*函数返回)来刷新单个页面，或者你可以提供一个纹理组名称(在纹理组编辑器中定义)来刷新组中的所有纹理页面。

You supply the unique texture page ID (as returned by the texturegroup_* functions) to prefetch a single page, or you can supply a texture group name (as defined in the Texture Group Editor) to prefetch all the texture pages in the group.
你可以提供唯一的纹理页面ID(由texturegroup_*函数返回)来预取单个页面，或者你可以提供一个纹理组名称(在纹理组编辑器中定义)来预取组中所有的纹理页面。
You supply the variable with the struct reference to check and the function will return either a string with the function name or undefined.
为变量提供结构引用以进行检查，函数将返回带有函数名或未定义的字符串。

You supply the weak reference to check (as returned by the function weak_ref_create()), and the function will return true if the struct is still being referenced somewhere or false if it's not and has been garbage collected.
您提供弱引用来检查(由函数weak_ref_create()返回)，如果该结构仍在某处被引用，则此函数将返回true，如果没有被引用且已被垃圾收集，则返回false。

You supply the x/y position of the center of the circular area to check along with the radius and the object to check for, and you can set the check to be precise (in which case all instances being checked will need to have precise collision masks) and whether the check should include the calling instance or not.
您提供要检查的圆形区域中心的x/y位置以及半径和要检查的对象，并且您可以将检查设置为精确的(在这种情况下，所有被检查的实例都需要具有精确的碰撞遮罩)以及检查是否应该包括调用实例。

You supply the x/y position of the point to check and you can set the check to be precise (in which case all instances being checked will need to have precise collision masks) and whether the check should include the calling instance or not.
您提供要检查的点的x/y位置，并且可以将检查设置为精确的(在这种情况下，所有被检查的实例都需要有精确的碰撞遮罩),以及检查是否应该包括调用实例。

You supply the x/y positions of the start and end of the line to check along with the object to check for, and you can set the check to be precise (in which case all instances being checked will need to have precise collision masks) and whether the check should include the calling instance or not.
您提供要检查的线的起点和终点的x/y位置以及要检查的对象，并且您可以将检查设置为精确的(在这种情况下，所有被检查的实例都需要具有精确的碰撞遮罩),以及检查是否应该包括调用实例。

You supply the x/y positions of the top left and bottom right of the area to check along with the object to check for, and you can set the check to be precise (in which case all instances being checked will need to have precise collision masks) and whether the check should include the calling instance or not.
您提供要检查的区域的左上和右下的x/y位置以及要检查的对象，并且您可以将检查设置为精确的(在这种情况下，所有被检查的实例都需要有精确的碰撞遮罩)以及检查是否应该包括调用实例。

You supply the x/y positions of the top left and bottom right of the elliptical area to check along with the object to check for, and you can set the check to be precise (in which case all instances being checked will need to have precise collision masks) and whether the check should include the calling instance or not.
您提供要检查的椭圆区域的左上和右下的x/y位置以及要检查的对象，并且您可以将检查设置为精确的(在这种情况下，所有被检查的实例都需要有精确的碰撞遮罩)以及检查是否应该包括调用实例。
You supply the variable that holds the array, and the function will return the contents of last entry in the array.
您提供保存数组的变量，函数将返回数组中最后一个条目的内容。
You tell the function the length of the array to create, and it will return the "handle" for the array which you can then assign to a variable.
您告诉函数要创建的数组的长度，它将返回数组的"句柄",然后您可以将该句柄赋给一个变量。

You then pass it to this function with the data format (only buffer_u8 or buffer_s16 are currently supported), the sample rate (which can be between 1000hz and 48000hz), and an offset into the buffer to get the data from.
然后将它传递给此函数，其中包含数据格式(目前仅支持buffer_u8或buffer_s16)、采样速率(可以在1000hz到48000hz之间)以及要从中获取数据的缓冲区偏移量。
You then supply the name of the channel, as a string, and the function will return the index value associated with that channel.
然后以字符串形式提供通道的名称，函数将返回与该通道关联的索引值。
You use this function to allocate a portion of memory as a buffer in your game filled with the data from a previously created vertex buffer.
您可以使用此函数来分配一部分内存作为游戏中的缓冲区，其中填充了以前创建的顶点缓冲区中的数据。

You use this function to allocate a portion of memory as a buffer in your game, with the function returning the unique buffer id that should be stored in a variable and used for all further function calls to the buffer.
您可以使用此函数分配一部分内存作为游戏中的缓冲区，此函数返回唯一的缓冲区id，该id应该存储在一个变量中，并用于对该缓冲区的所有进一步的函数调用。

You will also need to supply a DS map of key/value pairs (as strings, where the key is the header field and the value is the required data for the header), and the final argument is an optional data string that you can add to the request, and if it's not needed then it can be either 0 or an empty string "".
您还需要提供键/值对的DS map(作为字符串，其中键是报头字段，值是报头所需的数据)，最后的参数是可以添加到请求中的可选数据字符串，如果不需要它，那么它可以是0或空字符串""。

You would generally use this if you want to "save" the current GPU state (things like blend mode, alpha writing, culling, etc... will all be pushed to the stack), then draw something with different settings, and then reset the GPU stack to what it was before (by calling gpu_pop_state()).
如果你想"保存"当前的GPU状态(比如混合模式、alpha写入、剔除等)，你通常会使用这个方法。都将被推到堆栈中)，然后用不同的设置绘制一些东西，然后重置GPU堆栈到它之前的样子(通过调用GPU pop_state())。

You would normally not need to use this variable as you should be setting instances to be added to discreet layers, which in turn are set to a specific depth, but it may be that you want to change the depth of an instance using this value, in which case a "temporary layer" will be created specifically for the instance at the given depth.
通常不需要使用这个变量，因为您应该将实例添加到离散层中，而离散层又被设置为特定的深度，但是您可能希望使用这个值更改实例的深度，在这种情况下，将专门为具有给定深度的实例创建一个"临时层"。
You would normally use this function in conjunction with the gamepad_get_device_count() function to get the correct number of available game pads and/or gamepad "slots".
您通常会将此函数与gamepad_get_device_count()函数结合使用，以获得可用游戏手柄和/或游戏手柄"插槽"的正确数量。
You would then define the necessary points for each vertex of the primitive before calling vertex_end() to finalise the primitive creation.
然后，您将在调用 vertex_end() 以完成图元创建之前为图元的每个顶点定义必要的点。

You would then use this function to tell your instance which path to follow, what speed to follow the path (measured in pixels per step), how to behave when it reaches the end of the path, and whether to follow the absolute or relative path position.
然后，您可以使用此函数告诉您的实例要沿着哪条路径前进，沿着该路径前进的速度是多少(以每步的像素为单位)，到达路径末端时的行为，以及是沿着绝对路径位置还是相对路径位置前进。

Your skeletal animation is made up of a number of "bones", which you will have defined and given names to in your animation program, and this function can be used to get certain data for the named bone at any time.
您的骨骼动画由许多"骨骼"组成，您将在动画程序中定义这些骨骼并为其命名，此函数可用于随时获取已命名骨骼的某些数据。

Your skeletal animation is made up of a number of "bones", which you will have defined and given names to in your animation program, and this function can be used to set certain data for the named bone at any time.
您的骨骼动画由许多"骨骼"组成，您将在动画程序中定义这些骨骼并为其命名，此函数可用于随时为命名的骨骼设置某些数据。
Your skeletal animation is made up of a number of "bones", which you will have defined and given names to in your animation program.
您的骨骼动画由许多"骨骼"组成，您将在动画程序中定义并命名这些骨骼。
Zeroes or spaces will be inserted to match this.
将插入零或空格来匹配它。
Zeros will be added to the right of the decimal point if the value given is less than the total and the number of decimal places to include.
如果给定的值小于总数和要包含的小数位数，则将在小数点右侧添加零。

[可选]从0到3的量化量(0表示最低质量，3表示最高质量，默认值为2)

gravity is one of the "built in" variables all instances have and, when set, will apply a constant force in the gravity_direction of the instance, influencing both the instance speed and direction.
Gravity是所有实例都具有的"内置"变量之一，设置后将在实例的gravity_direction上施加恒定的力，从而影响实例的速度和方向。
gravity_direction is one of the "built in" properties all instances have and can be used to set the direction of movement when the instances gravity is greater than 0.
Gravity_direction是所有实例都具有的"内置"属性之一，可用于在实例gravity大于0时设置移动方向。
his function can be used to display debug information about any given sync group (the group index is the value returned when the group was created using the function audio_create_sync_group()).

his function returns whether a path with the given index exists or not.

the function requires that you give the attachment a UNIQUE name (as a string) and then set the sprite_index and image_index to use, as well as the x and y origin (which can be different to that defined by the sprite in the sprite properties), and you can also set any transforms that you wish to be applied to the image when attached, as well as the colour to be blended with the image and it's alpha (transparency) value.
此函数要求您为附件指定一个 唯一 的名称(作为字符串)，然后设置要使用的sprite_index和image_index，以及x和y原点(可以不同于sprite属性中sprite定义的原点)，并且您还可以设置附加时希望应用于图像的任何变换，以及要与图像混合的颜色及其alpha(透明度)值。
